summary: A very basic French toast recipe with cocoa in the egg mixture. I regularly serve it at our B&B and get rave reviews. It's great served with cherry pie filling and syrup. We prefer using homemade bread.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 slices french toast
ingredient: 1 cup milk + 4 eggs + <U+2154> cup white sugar + <U+2153> cup unsweetened cocoa powder + <U+215B> teaspoon baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + 8 slices bread

name: Overnight French Toast II
summary: Make this the night before and enjoy brunch with your kids rather than catering to them! Also great for taking places because the syrup is built-in.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 4 to 6 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons corn syrup + ½ cup butter + 1 cup packed brown sugar + 1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, sliced + 5 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Reduced Fat French Toast
summary: This is an easy variation on the basic French toast recipe, except it uses reduced fat substitutes! Serve with fruit or sugar-free maple syrup.
ingredient: ½ cup egg substitute + <U+2154> cup skim milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 6 slices reduced calorie white bread

name: French Toast II
summary: A simple French toast recipe that anyone can make. Use your favorite type of bread and serve with your favorite syrup.
ingredient: 4 eggs + ¾ cup milk + 3 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg + 12 slices white bread + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon

name: Hot or Cold Vegetable Frittata
summary: Not your typical zucchini quiche. This fantastic medley of fresh veggies may be served either hot or cold. You can even cut it into small pieces and serve as finger food!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped zucchini + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped fresh mushrooms + ¾ cup chopped onion + ¾ cup chopped green bell pepper + 1 clove garlic, minced + 6 eggs, beaten + ¼ cup half-and-half cream + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, diced + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 4 slices whole wheat bread, cubed + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Air Fryer Breakfast Frittata
summary: Frittatas are easy to make using a cake pan that fits in the air fryer basket. Switch up the ingredients to suit your taste. If you are worried about the frittata sticking to the cake pan, line the bottom of the pan with parchment paper.
ingredient: ¼ pound breakfast sausage, fully cooked and crumbled + 4 eggs, lightly beaten + ½ cup shredded Cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese blend + 2 tablespoons red bell pepper, diced + 1 green onion, chopped + 1 pinch cayenne pepper (Optional) + cooking spray

name: Frittata Alle Erbette (Baked Herb Omelette)
summary: This baked omelette is quick, easy and a great summer dish. Scamorza cheese is an Italian cheese similar to mozzarella, that's harder and has more flavor. You can use mozzarella or a semi-hard cheese instead. This omelette would go well with a side dish like cherry tomato and anchovy salad.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed + 6 eggs + ½ cup milk + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chopped fresh basil + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chopped fresh rosemary + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chopped fresh mint + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chopped fresh thyme + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 teaspoon honey + 1 lemon, zested + 1 (5.3 ounce) container plain Greek yogurt + 5 ounces Scamorza cheese, grated + 3 tablespoons grated Parmesan-Pecorino-Romano cheese

name: Smoked Salmon Frittata
summary: A delicious Pacific Northwest recipe made with smoked salmon and cream cheese. Garnish with fresh herbs or avocado slices for a beautiful presentation.
ingredient: 4 tablespoons olive oil + ¼ medium onion, chopped + salt and pepper to taste + 4 ounces pepper smoked salmon + 8 black olives, chopped + 6 eggs + 2 tablespoons milk + 2 tablespoons heavy cream + ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, cubed

name: Muffin Pan Frittatas
summary: What an easy way to make eggs for a group.
ingredient: cooking spray + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 cup chopped fresh asparagus + ¼ cup chopped green bell pepper + 2 tablespoons chopped red onion + 6 eggs + ½ cup milk + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Frittata di Zucchine e Fiori di Zucca (Italian Zucchini Frittata)
summary: This classic Italian frittata uses both zucchini and zucchini blossoms, boasting loads of summertime flavors. It's great warm or at room temperature, which makes it a great choice for buffets or picnics.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 34 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 4 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided + 1 small white onion, finely chopped + 1 bunch parsley, stems and leaves chopped separately + 3 zucchini, cut into long, thin strips + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 7<U+2009>½ cups zucchini blossoms, pistils removed + 6 eggs + 3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + 1 tablespoon grated Pecorino Romano cheese + 4 leaves fresh mint, chopped

name: Asparagus and Mushroom Frittata
summary: This is one of my favorites. The most important thing (I think) is to cook it slowly so the eggs stay tender.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter + 3 tablespoons olive oil + ½ pound fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces + ½ pound fresh mushrooms, sliced + 6 eggs + 1 tablespoon water + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme + 3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese + ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Potato and Vegetable Frittata
summary: This is an easy and filling supper dish, good with cooked greens or a tossed salad and some sprouted grain bread. Almost any vegetables can go into the mix; just make sure they're all cut up before you begin, and add the longest cooking ones first.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon olive oil + ½ cup chopped onion + 1 clove garlic, minced + ½ cup diced green bell pepper + 1 zucchini, halved lengthwise and cut in 1/4 inch slices + 2 cups cooked and diced potatoes + 1 cup chopped fresh tomato + 2 tablespoons black olives + 4 eggs + salt and pepper to taste + ¼ teaspoon dried oregano + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + ½ small tomato, sliced + ¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Tortilla Espanola
summary: Tortilla Espanola is a dish I make all the time at home. My boyfriend's family are Spanish, and he just loves this authentic dish. It's easy to prepare and always a crowd pleaser. Traditionally this dish only uses only onions, potatoes and egg; however I like to add a little green, either parsley or chives depending on your taste. They're both wonderful.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or more if needed + 2 large potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced + salt and pepper to taste + ¼ teaspoon smoked paprika, or to taste + 1 sweet Spanish onion, thinly sliced + 6 eggs + 1 teaspoon olive oil + 1 bunch fresh parsley, coarsely chopped + 1 tablespoon olive oil

name: Bacon Cheese Frittata
summary: Make this frittata even easier by using cooked bacon from the freezer. It's a wonderful dish to serve at brunch or to take as leftovers for lunch.
ingredient: 5 slices bacon + 6 eggs + 1 cup milk + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ cup chopped green onions + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: The Farmer's Frittata (Italian-Style Omelet)
summary: Loaded with fresh vegetables and a touch of bacon, this farmer's frittata is my favorite type of frittata. It's a perfect way to use your gorgeous, fresh garden vegetables. Curing the squash with kosher salt pulls out the bitterness and makes the squash taste sweeter. It's got great texture, taste, and visual appeal and can be served hot, warm, at room temperature or cold for any meal of the day.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 35 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 10-inch frittata
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups cubed zucchini + 2<U+2009>½ cups cubed yellow summer squash + 2 tablespoons kosher salt + 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided + 1 slice thick-cut bacon, cut crosswise into 1/4-inch strips + 8 large eggs + ¼ teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste + freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 2 tablespoons sliced green onions, or to taste + <U+2153> cup diced red onion + 1 cup diced sweet peppers + 2 ounces grated sharp Cheddar cheese + 4 ounces goat cheese, crumbled

name: Easy Asparagus Frittata
summary: I love making a frittata whenever I want a quick meal. I always have eggs in the fridge and you can use a variety of vegetables. I like asparagus the best, though. This is also a KETO-friendly recipe.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 teaspoons butter + ½ pound asparagus, trimmed, cut into 1-inch pieces + 8 eggs + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste + 7 tablespoons milk + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley (Optional)

name: Tortilla Espanola
summary: Tortilla Espanola is a dish I make all the time at home. My boyfriend's family are Spanish, and he just loves this authentic dish. It's easy to prepare and always a crowd pleaser. Traditionally this dish only uses only onions, potatoes and egg; however I like to add a little green, either parsley or chives depending on your taste. They're both wonderful.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or more if needed + 2 large potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced + salt and pepper to taste + ¼ teaspoon smoked paprika, or to taste + 1 sweet Spanish onion, thinly sliced + 6 eggs + 1 teaspoon olive oil + 1 bunch fresh parsley, coarsely chopped + 1 tablespoon olive oil

name: Nan's Potato and Egg Frittata
summary: A potato and 6 eggs are fried in olive oil to make this simple frittata. Cut it into rectangles or wedges and serve between 2 slices of Italian bread either by itself or with tomato slices. Delicious!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 2 mins,total: 27 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 large baking potato, peeled and sliced 1/4 inch thick + 6 eggs, beaten + salt and pepper to taste

name: Italian Frittata
summary: Frittatas are a cinch to make, and you can substitute the ingredients with whatever you have on hand! It's fun to get creative with them! They also make great leftovers!
ingredient: ½ cup diced salami + ½ cup artichoke hearts, drained and chopped + ½ cup chopped cherry tomatoes + 1 (4.5 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained + 6 eggs + <U+2153> cup milk + 2 green onions, chopped + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon dried basil + 1 teaspoon onion powder + 1 teaspoon salt + ground black pepper to taste + <U+2153> cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Potato and Cheese Frittata
summary: This potato and cheese frittata is great by itself or with some fruit on a Sunday morning.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 large russet potatoes, peeled and shredded + 1 medium onion, diced + salt and pepper to taste + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 4 eggs, beaten

name: Bacon and Potato Frittata with Greens
summary: This is a wonderful meal anytime of day or night. My grandfather used to make frittatas quite often. Instead of finishing a frittata under the broiler he would cook it halfway, put a plate on top of the pan, flip the pan over, and slide the frittata back into the pan to cook the other side. Sometimes a frittata would stick; other times the hot oil would drip on him as he performed this maneuver. It was during these moments that I learned all the really good Italian curse words I still use to this day.
ingredient: 6 slices bacon, chopped + 1 potato, peeled and sliced into thin 1-inch pieces + 2 tablespoons water, or as needed + 1 clove garlic, thinly sliced + ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 bunch Swiss chard, chopped + 8 eggs, beaten + <U+2153> cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Green Chile Frittata
summary: This rich recipe is great for either a brunch or breakfast. You can make this a day ahead if you want to serve it for an early morning breakfast. Just reheat in the microwave. You may use any combination of cheese in this recipe, even non-fat.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 10 eggs, beaten + ½ cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 pinch salt + 1 (7 ounce) can diced green chile peppers, drained + 1 (16 ounce) container low-fat cottage cheese + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + ¼ cup melted butter

name: Sausage Frittata
summary: Delicious for brunch or a quick week-night dinner, this frittata with sausage, potatoes, and Parmesan cheese is topped with chopped tomato and sliced green onion.
ingredient: 1 (9.6 ounce) package Jimmy Dean® Original Hearty Pork Sausage Crumbles + 2 cups cubed cooked red potatoes + 8 eggs + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ cup chopped seeded tomato + 2 green onions, thinly sliced

name: Freezer-Friendly Frittata
summary: Squares of breakfast goodness reheat nicely for an easy morning meal.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 frittata squares
ingredient: cooking spray + 10 eggs, beaten + 1 medium onion, chopped + 1 (10 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, chopped + ½ pound chopped fully cooked ham + 1 cup milk + 1 cup shredded Colby-Jack cheese + ½ cup crumbled goat cheese + ¼ cup chopped cooked bacon + ¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: American Frittata
summary: A simple frittata for the whole family. You may substitute your favorite sausage for ham in this recipe if you wish.
ingredient: 4 potatoes, peeled and cubed + ½ onions, sliced + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 8 eggs, beaten + ¾ cup cubed ham + salt and pepper to taste + ¾ cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Vegetable Stovetop Frittata
summary: A light and high-protein vegetarian egg dish, easy and fast, which can be enjoyed hot or cold with a green salad for lunch or some whole grain bread for breakfast. I love to eat this after a hard workout or bike ride. Serves 2 but easily scalable. Cut in half and serve with toast, a small salad, or some fresh fruit.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + <U+2154> cup 1-inch pieces broccoli florets + ½ red bell pepper, chopped + ½ sweet onion, chopped + 6 marinated olives, chopped + 2 eggs + 2 egg whites + 2 tablespoons whole milk + 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste + ¼ cup crumbled sheep's milk feta cheese (Optional)

name: Mini Ham and Swiss Frittatas
summary: These little frittatas are so quick and easy, and my husband and kids just gobble them up. Make them in a 24 cup mini-muffin tin. I first had these at a neighborhood breakfast, and my neighbor added fresh onions and veggies, but this is great for making on nights when there isn't much in the fridge! Honey ham is good in these, as well. They can be served hot or cold and are great as reheated leftovers.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 24 mini frittatas
ingredient: cooking spray + 6 slices Swiss cheese, finely chopped + 6 slices deli ham, finely chopped + 8 eggs + ½ teaspoon onion powder + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

name: Spinach Frittata
summary: This egg dish made in a skillet is filled with spinach, ham, bell pepper, onion, and cheese for a delicious and quick brunch option.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + ½ cup red bell pepper, cut into thin matchsticks + ½ cup chopped onion + 3 eggs + ½ cup milk + 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry + 1 cup chopped cooked ham + ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + ½ cup crumbled feta cheese + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Mexican Frittata
summary: This a yummy breakfast frittata with Mexican flair. Serve this on a Sunday morning instead of the traditional pancake breakfast. Full of flavor. Add a dollop of sour cream and diced avocado on top.
ingredient: cooking spray + 1 teaspoon olive oil + 1 red bell pepper, cut into thin strips + 1 medium white onion, thinly sliced + ¼ cup milk + 4 egg whites + 2 eggs + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 pinch ground cumin + ½ cup salsa

name: Mini Frittatas with Quinoa
summary: Savory bites equally excellent hot or cold. Ideal for breakfast, brunch, lunch, or dinner.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups water + ¾ cup quinoa, rinsed and drained + 2 eggs + 2 egg whites + 1 cup shredded zucchini + 1 cup shredded Swiss cheese + ½ cup diced ham + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon ground white pepper

name: Zucchini Oven Frittata
summary: A delicious, easy frittata recipe full of good vegetables and topped with cheeses.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 4 to 6 servings
ingredient: 1 cup water + 3 tablespoons olive oil + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ green bell pepper, seeded and chopped + 3 zucchini, cut into 1/2-inch slices + 2 cloves garlic, peeled + 1 small onion, diced + 6 fresh chopped mushrooms + 1 tablespoon butter + 5 eggs + salt and pepper to taste + 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese + 3 tablespoons Parmesan cheese

name: Spinach and Mushroom Frittata
summary: Looking for a vegetable with super health powers? Try spinach. It's packed with vitamins, minerals and antioxidants that protect you all your life.
ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed thoroughly to remove liquid + 4 eggs or equivalent egg substitute + 1 cup part-skim ricotta cheese + ¾ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese + ¾ cup chopped portobello mushrooms + ½ cup finely chopped scallions with some green tops + ¼ teaspoon dried Italian seasonings + 1 pinch Salt and pepper, to taste

name: Artichoke Frittata
summary: This rich, delicious, and easy-to-make appetizer can be served warm or cool. I sometimes use grated low-fat cheese and find that it is just as tasty and less greasy. Dried parsley works, too.
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped (reserve marinade) + 1 bunch green onions, chopped + 9 eggs, beaten + 1 pound sharp Cheddar cheese, grated + 14 saltine crackers, crumbled + ½ cup chopped fresh parsley + 2 cloves garlic, minced (Optional) + 1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®) + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Easy Broccoli Frittata
summary: Easy-to-make broccoli frittata!
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 3 cups bite-size broccoli pieces + 8 eggs + ¼ cup milk + 1 teaspoon paprika (Optional) + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Mini Frittatas
summary: Muffin-sized perky spinach frittatas. They are fun to make and even the kids love them! Accompany this dish with tortilla chips and salsa - makes for a great treat! Use egg substitute in place of the eggs to make this an even healthier treat.
ingredient: 6 ounces frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained + 1 cup ricotta cheese + 2 tablespoons sour cream + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 4 eggs + ¼ cup milk + ¼ teaspoon hot pepper sauce + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon lemon pepper + 2 tablespoons dried parsley + 3 tablespoons salsa

name: Zucchini Scallion Frittata Cups
summary: Portion-controlled, protein-packed portable meals for on-the-go lifestyles. These freeze well, so I can grab a few for lunch when I'm short on time.
ingredient: cooking spray + 7 egg whites + 3 eggs + 2 tablespoons half-and-half + 2 cups shredded zucchini + 1 cup chopped green onion + 3 tablespoons grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese

name: Air Fryer Spanish Tortilla
summary: A Spanish tortilla is just as tasty when made in your air fryer. This recipe saves on cleanup and reduces oil from the traditional recipes. Try this nestled in a ciabatta roll with some hot sauce.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 large potato, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes + 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil + <U+215B> cup leek, sliced into 1/4-inch pieces + 5 eggs + ¼ cup grated Pecorino Romano cheese + salt and ground black pepper to taste + <U+215B> cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley

name: Veggie Frittata
summary: This nutritious recipe is a favourite of egg farmers Mark and Joanie Hamel of Watford. The vegetables can be varied to your preference.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 5 mins,total: 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 10-inch/25 cm frittata
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter or margarine + 1 cup sliced mushrooms + ½ cup chopped green and/or red peppers + <U+2153> cup chopped onion + 12 eggs + ¼ cup water

name: Honey Peanut Granola
summary: This sweet, crunchy homemade granola combines quick oats with peanuts, wheat germ, honey, brown sugar, and vanilla. Baked in the oven, it's easy to make.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 cups quick cooking oats + ½ cup chopped peanuts + ¼ cup wheat germ + <U+2153> cup honey + <U+2153> cup brown sugar + ¼ cup vegetable oil + 2 tablespoons warm water + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Crunchy Pumpkin Pie Granola
summary: This recipe is a nice deviation from traditional recipes because it brings a little extra sweet flavor to your granola, which is perfect to celebrate the fall.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 5 cups
ingredient: <U+2153> cup brown sugar + 1 tablespoon pumpkin pie spice + 3<U+2009>½ cups rolled oats + ½ cup sliced almonds + ½ cup chopped pecans + <U+2154> cup applesauce + ½ cup honey + 1 tablespoon vanilla extract + ½ cup raisins + ½ cup dried cranberries

name: Grandma Nancy's Apricot Almond Granola
summary: My mother's recipe. Crunchy, sweet, buttery, and chewy, this is great as a snack or breakfast cereal.
ingredient: 2<U+2009>¾ cups rolled oats + ½ cup slivered almonds + ½ cup dried cranberries + ½ cup chopped dried apricots + <U+2153> cup chopped walnuts + <U+2153> cup golden raisins + ½ cup honey + <U+2153> cup butter, melted

name: Sugar Free Granola
summary: This granola recipe is tried and tested, I bring with me all my camping trips. It also makes a very filling and delicious breakfast. The only main ingredient in this recipe is the oatmeal, all the other ingredients can be substituted. This recipe is made without adding any honey or sugar, although if you don't have any dates at of home you can always add 1/2 cup honey to the other ingredients.
ingredient: 1 cup chopped dates + 1 cup water + 8 cups rolled oats + ½ cup chopped walnuts + 1 cup raisins + 1 cup wheat germ + ½ cup sunflower seeds + ½ cup slivered almonds + 2 cups shredded coconut + ¼ cup vegetable oil + ¼ cup frozen apple juice concentrate, thawed

name: Crunchy Peanut Butter, Chocolate, Coconut Granola
summary: If you're at movie night with your family, or just hungry for a sweet and salty snack, you will always be wanting to make 2 times the recipe! If you don't want the chocolate to melt, put them in after the rest of the granola cools and settles. Serve right away or store in fridge up to 1 week. Enjoy!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 tablespoons honey + 2 tablespoons peanut butter + 2 cups rolled oats + <U+2154> cup sunflower seeds + <U+2154> cup chocolate chips + <U+2153> cup shredded coconut + <U+2153> cup brown sugar + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Grandma Dalley's Honey Granola
summary: Grandma Dalley won a blue ribbon for this recipe at the Eastern Idaho State Fair in 2012. Store airtight in a covered container up to 2 weeks.
ingredient: 4 cups old-fashioned rolled oats + 2 cups coarsely chopped almonds + ¾ cup honey + ½ cup butter + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 pinch salt + 1 cup golden raisins

name: Dee's Dark Chocolate Granola
summary: I love food and creating new recipes. My Dark Chocolate Granola was created by myself and is great to snack on besides chips or cookies. Hope you like!
ingredient: cooking spray + ½ cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons peanut butter + 2 tablespoons honey + 2 tablespoons butter flavored spread (such as I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Spread) + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 cups oats (such as Quaker Oats®) + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ cup dark chocolate chips + ¼ cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Craisins®) (Optional) + ¼ cup sliced almonds (Optional)

name: Coconut Granola
summary: A quick, easy, and very delicious recipe that can be eaten for cold cereal, topping on yogurt or even for a snack. Because it does a better job than honey, I use part maltose syrup (purchased at Asian markets) to help bind the ingredients together instead of using all honey. Virgin coconut oil has many healthy properties and enhances the taste of the granola, but if that cannot be found you can substitute it with any other oil. Enjoy!
ingredient: 8 cups quick-cooking oats + 1 cup oat bran + 1 cup unsweetened flaked coconut + ¾ cup chopped almonds + ½ cup coconut milk + ¼ cup virgin coconut oil + ¼ cup vegetable oil + ½ cup barley malt syrup or maltose syrup + ½ cup honey + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ cup dried cranberries

name: Easy-Peezy Caramel Granola
summary: This is super easy to make and goes great with yogurt, ice cream, or just by itself! It's much sweeter than the classic honey granola.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 4 cups
ingredient: 2 cups quick cooking oats + 1 cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon + ½ cup butter, melted + 5 tablespoons caramel sauce + 2 tablespoons white sugar

name: Mom's Best Granola
summary: A crunchy, nutty granola that never fails to get compliments from breakfast guests.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 14,Yield: 14 cups
ingredient: 7 cups rolled oats + 1 cup wheat germ + 1 cup unsweetened flaked coconut + ½ cup unsalted sunflower seeds + ½ cup sesame seeds + 1 cup chopped almonds + ½ cup vegetable oil + ½ cup honey + ½ cup boiling water + ¼ cup brown sugar + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Chef John's Granola
summary: There's no better way to enjoy sweet, juicy, late-summer fruit than a parfait with yogurt and crunchy, homemade granola.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: ¼ cup packed brown sugar + 3 tablespoons maple syrup + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups rolled oats + ½ cup chopped almonds + ½ cup raw pumpkin seeds + <U+2153> cup shredded coconut + ½ cup dried currants

name: Sweet and Salty Granola
summary: A great granola recipe that's a perfect addition to cereal, yogurt, fruit or even just to enjoy plain.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 16,Yield: 4 cups
ingredient: ¾ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup water + 3 cups rolled oats + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon honey + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract

name: Crunchy Sugar-Free Granola
summary: Enjoy this crispy, crunchy granola without any added sugar or sugar substitutes. You can vary the nuts and seeds to take advantage of what you have in the cupboard.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3<U+2009>¾ cups rolled oats + ½ cup chopped almonds + ¼ cup dried unsweetened coconut + ¼ cup sesame seeds + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon salt + 3 large egg whites + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract (Optional)

name: Grandma's Homemade Granola
summary: My grandmother and I created this homemade granola recipe one day, and it is currently loved and requested by the rest of my family, including my other grandma who used to be anti-granola! My favorite ways to serve it are in coconut Greek yogurt or just in a bowl with milk. Simple and awesome.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 18,Yield: 18 servings
ingredient: nonstick cooking spray + 4 cups old-fashioned oats + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped pecans + 1<U+2009>½ cups slivered almonds + 1 cup coconut flakes + ½ cup vegetable oil + <U+2153> cup packed brown sugar + <U+2153> cup honey + ¼ cup maple syrup + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + ¾ teaspoon salt + 2 cups dried cranberries (Optional)

name: Keto Cinnamon Granola
summary: Grain-free granola. Suitable for the keto (low-carb, high-fat) diet. Enjoy, try it by itself, or use as cereal.
ingredient: ½ cup coarsely chopped walnuts + ½ cup coarsely chopped pecans + ½ cup unsweetened shredded coconut + <U+2153> cup sliced almonds + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 2 teaspoons granulated erythritol sweetener (such as Swerve®) + 1 (1 gram) packet granular sucrolose sweetener (such as Splenda®), or more to taste (Optional) + 2 tablespoons butter, melted

name: Chef John's Chocolate Granola
summary: Don't be deceived by its indulgent, chocolaty flavor--this granola contains less sugar than most. Introducing cocoa into the mix not only makes it delicious, but it also makes it better for you! Possibly... The point is this really tastes great, with a pronounced chocolate flavor, and would make a wonderful treat for chocolate lovers and hippies alike.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 14,Yield: 3 1/2 cups
ingredient: <U+2153> cup packed brown sugar + ¼ cup maple syrup + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + ¾ teaspoon kosher salt + 1 pinch cayenne pepper (Optional) + 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder + 2 cups rolled oats + ¾ cup chopped almonds

name: Homemade Granola Cereal
summary: This is a great granola recipe. So easy and so delicious!
ingredient: 4<U+2009>½ cups rolled oats + 2 cups whole wheat flour + 1<U+2009>¼ cups honey + ¾ cup wheat germ + ½ cup chopped raw cashews (Optional) + ½ cup chopped raw almonds (Optional) + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + ¼ cup flaked coconut (Optional) + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Ultimate Irresistible Granola
summary: This is THE BEST granola out there. Walnuts, pecans, coconut, sesame seeds and honey are just a few of the delectable ingredients that make this the most delicious and nutty granola out there, you won't be disappointed!
ingredient: 5 cups rolled oats + 1 cup blanched slivered almonds + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 1 cup chopped pecans + 1 cup sesame seeds + 1 cup wheat germ + 2 cups shredded coconut + 1 cup unsalted sunflower seeds + 1 cup canola oil + 1<U+2009>½ cups honey + 1 cup raisins + 1 cup dried cranberries

name: Cinnamon Stove Top Granola
summary: This is a super fast and simple to make granola that comes out tender, crisp and delicious every time! It's very versatile, simply add your favorite dried fruits, nuts, toasted coconut, etc. If you prefer your granola harder, just cook it a little longer at the end. Using butter will give it a deeper/heavier flavor, oil gives it a lighter flavor, more like the commercial granolas you find at your grocery store.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 6 cups
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ tablespoons olive oil + 5 cups rolled oats + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + <U+2153> cup butter + ¼ cup honey + 1 tablespoon molasses + ½ cup packed brown sugar + ½ cup blanched slivered almonds (Optional) + ½ cup dried cherries (Optional)

name: Light Fruit and Nut Granola
summary: A delicious granola without the fat can be made with spelt, flax seeds, and pecans!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 cups rolled oats + ½ cup spelt flour + ½ cup packed brown sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¾ teaspoon ground ginger + 3 tablespoons canola oil + ¼ cup applesauce + 3 tablespoons maple syrup + ¼ cup diced dried apricots + ¼ cup chopped pecans + 3 tablespoons flax seeds, ground

name: Almond Maple Granola
summary: This granola is good and crunchy with lots of sweet flavor, thanks to the pure maple syrup and dark brown sugar. It uses a lot less oil than some granola recipes. Can be made 1 week ahead.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 3 cups rolled oats + 1 cup blanched slivered almonds + ¼ cup wheat germ + 1 (14 ounce) package flaked coconut + <U+2153> cup unsalted sunflower seeds (Optional) + 6 tablespoons pure maple syrup + 6 tablespoons packed dark brown sugar + ¼ cup vegetable oil + 2 tablespoons warm water + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup raisins

name: Vanilla Granola
summary: An easy, healthy snack that is quick to make and enjoy. High in protein and good, complex carbs.
ingredient: non-stick cooking spray + 4 cups rolled oats + 1 cup sliced almonds + ½ cup granular sucralose sweetener with brown sugar (such as Splenda® Brown Sugar Blend) + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 cup applesauce + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 4 teaspoons vanilla extract

name: Daniel Fast Granola
summary: Homemade granola for the Daniel fast. Can eat as a snack or as cereal.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 hrs 5 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 3 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 5 cups
ingredient: ¼ cup pineapple juice + ¼ cup coconut oil + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon sea salt + 3 cups rolled oats + ¼ cup sunflower seeds + ½ cup pitted dates + ¼ cup roasted almonds + 1<U+2009>¼ cups quick-cooking oats + ½ cup raisins + ½ cup dried cranberries

name: Maple Granola
summary: Yum.
ingredient: ½ cup maple syrup + <U+2153> cup coconut oil, melted + 4 cups old-fashioned oats, or more to taste + 1 cup chopped pecans + ½ cup almond flour

name: Crunchy Granola Breakfast Cereal
summary: I'm a huge fan of crunchy granola breakfast cereals, but wanted to make my own so I could change it up now and again. Makes a great addition to yogurt or topping for ice cream.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 20 mins,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 25,Yield: 25 servings
ingredient: 6 cups rolled oats + 1 cup freshly ground flax seed meal + 1 cup steel-cut oats + 1 cup oat bran + ½ cup wheat germ + 1 cup chopped pecans + ¾ cup agave nectar + ½ cup canned pumpkin + ½ cup brown sugar + ½ cup water + 2 tablespoons canola oil + 2 tablespoons vanilla extract + 2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice + 1 teaspoon sea salt + 1 cup finely chopped dates + 1 cup miniature chocolate chips

name: Homemade Granola with Ginger
summary: This delicious homemade granola has loads of nuts for protein and is made with maple syrup.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: 2 cups rolled oats + 2 cups quick-cooking oats + ¼ cup chopped pecans + ¼ cup chopped walnuts + ¼ cup chopped almonds + ¼ cup pepitas + ½ cup maple syrup + ¼ cup coconut oil, melted + ¼ cup chopped crystallized ginger + 2 teaspoons ground turmeric + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground ginger, or to taste + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¾ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground cardamom + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Easiest Peanut Butter Granola Ever
summary: I wanted to find a peanut butter granola recipe that works for me, and here it is! Eat it like cereal, on yogurt, or by the handful.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 3,Yield: 3 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups oats + ¼ cup raisins + ¾ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 3 ounces peanut butter, slightly melted + 1 egg white, beaten + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons honey

name: Pumpkin Seed Granola
summary: This not-too-sweet pumpkin seed granola is sugarless, sweetened only with sugar-free, maple-flavored syrup. A great alternative for special diets!
ingredient: 1 cup raw pumpkin seeds + 1<U+2009>½ cups rolled oats + ½ cup pumpkin puree + ½ cup sugar-free maple-flavored syrup + ¼ cup shredded coconut + 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted + ½ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Mocha Morning Breakfast Yogurt
summary: Mocha morning breakfast yogurt is loaded with chocolate whey protein, Greek yogurt, and a jolt of caffeine to start your day off right!
ingredient: 2 cups plain Greek yogurt + 3 tablespoons honey + 2 scoops chocolate-flavored whey protein powder (such as ON™ Gold Standard) + 2 tablespoons instant coffee granules + 4 teaspoons cocoa powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 cup granola cereal with nuts + ½ cup sliced fresh strawberries + ½ cup fresh raspberries

name: Crunchy and Delicious Granola
summary: After searching for a healthier granola recipe, I tweaked a few to lessen the sugar. I use seeds instead of nuts due to allergies. Still very crunchy, delicious, and satisfying! Change the dried fruit to fit your tastes (blueberries, cherries, cranberries, apricots, etc.).
ingredient: 3 cups thick-cut oatmeal + ½ cup hulled sunflower seeds + <U+2153> cup hulled pumpkin seeds + 2 tablespoons sesame seeds + 2 tablespoons flax seeds + 1 tablespoon wheat germ + 1 cup chopped dried cherries + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + <U+2154> cup unsweetened applesauce + <U+2153> cup pure maple syrup + 1 tablespoon vanilla extract

name: Nutty Granola
summary: A very easy-to-make granola recipe that is delicious and the best snack ever. All the girls at my office eat this with yogurt every day. It's awesome! If you don't have some of the dry ingredients, just add more of what you do have. Walnuts are a fine substitute for pecans. You can also try dried blueberries instead of or with the cranberries.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 20 1/4 cup servings
ingredient: 6 cups old-fashioned oats + 1 cup slivered almonds + 1 cup flaked coconut + ½ cup hulled green pumpkin seeds + ½ cup shelled sunflower seeds + ½ cup crushed pecans + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup butter + <U+2154> cup honey + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup dried cranberries

name: Addictive and Healthy Granola
summary: This recipe is addictive and very easy. It tastes like the top crunchy part of cobbler desserts. It would be good as a cereal with milk or to put in yogurt or topped on fruit that has been fried in a little butter and brown sugar. A dollop of homemade whipped cream wouldn't hurt the latter!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 50 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 20 servings
ingredient: cooking spray + 1<U+2009>½ cups maple syrup + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon rose water (Optional) + ¾ teaspoon salt + 4 cups rolled oats + 1 cup puffed rice cereal + 1 cup unsweetened coconut flakes + ½ cup chopped cashews + ½ cup raisins + ½ cup dried blueberries + ¼ cup chopped pecans + ¼ cup chopped almonds + ½ cup sweetened dried cranberries + ½ cup packed brown sugar

name: Pina Colada Cottage Cheese Bowl
summary: For those days you don't feel like yogurt, this cottage cheese bowl is sure to hit the spot! It's both healthy and delicious! Play around with different fruits and toppings. I like to use a paleo granola that is grain free.
ingredient: ½ cup low-fat cottage cheese + ¼ cup chopped fresh pineapple + 1 tablespoon unsweetened toasted coconut + 1 tablespoon coarsely chopped macadamia nuts + 1 tablespoon granola

name: Maple Pecan Granola with Dried Fruit
summary: Great as a cereal or mixed in yogurt. Store in an airtight container.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 20,Yield: 10 cups
ingredient: 6 cups old-fashioned oats + 1<U+2009>½ cups finely chopped pecans + ½ cup finely chopped almonds + ½ cup vegetable oil + ½ cup pure maple syrup + <U+2153> cup boiling water + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon ground cardamom + ¾ cup minced dates + ¾ cup minced raisins + <U+2154> cup minced dried cranberries

name: Mighty Granola
summary: It took years of tinkering to come up with my own personal favorite granola recipe. Granola recipes are meant to be modified, but maybe you can start with this. Enjoy warm with milk or by itself! Does well in the freezer for several months!
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 26 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 56 mins,Servings: 88,Yield: 22 cups
ingredient: 8 cups rolled oats + 1 cup amaranth + 1 cup sunflower seeds + 1 cup finely chopped pecans + 1 cup finely chopped walnuts + 1 cup sliced almonds + 1 cup flaxseed meal + 1 cup ground chia seeds + 1 cup honey + 1 cup maple syrup + 1 cup coconut oil + ½ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup butter + 2 tablespoons vanilla extract + 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon + 2 teaspoons salt + 2 cups raisins + 1 cup dried cherries + ½ cup dried blueberries

name: Joyce's Granola
summary: This is a granola recipe fortified with wheat germ and flax seed that still tastes good.
ingredient: 4 cups rolled oats + 1 cup wheat germ + ½ cup flax seed meal + ½ cup sliced almonds + ½ cup walnuts + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 5 tablespoons unsweetened applesauce + 2 tablespoons agave nectar + 3 tablespoons (blank) sugar-free pancake syrup

name: Mushroom Spinach Omelet
summary: Light breakfast omelet.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) carton liquid egg substitute + 1 tablespoon shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 tablespoon shredded Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon red pepper flakes + 1 teaspoon olive oil + ½ cup chopped fresh mushrooms + 1 tablespoon chopped onion + ½ cup chopped fresh spinach, or more to taste

name: Green Eggs And Hash Omelet
summary: Spinach, eggs, and corned beef hash make for a great omelet!
ingredient: 2 eggs + 2 cups loosely packed fresh spinach + 1 cup corned beef hash (such as Hormel® Mary Kitchen®) + freshly ground black pepper to taste + cooking spray + 2 tablespoons shredded mozzarella cheese, or to taste

name: Tamagoyaki (Japanese Sweet Omelet)
summary: Fast, easy, simple, delicious. Even a klutz like me can manage to make it in no time. It adds a whole lot of flavor to those every day eggs. I made this recipe this morning. It was delicious and left me wanting more. Traditional tamagoyaki is not as flat and uses several eggs, but this is great when you just want a little snack or for breakfast. Kids with a sweet tooth will love it.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon water + 1 teaspoon soy sauce, or to taste (Optional) + ½ teaspoon white sugar + 1 egg

name: River Omelets
summary: A big oven-baked omelet stuffed with bacon, cheese, tomatoes, olives and mushrooms. Great for dinner or brunch.
ingredient: 10 eggs + <U+2153> cup milk + ½ teaspoon salt + 4 dashes hot pepper sauce, or to taste + ½ pound bacon - cooked, and chopped into bite-size pieces + 1 (4 ounce) can black olives, drained + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped + ¼ cup green onions, chopped + <U+2153> cup mushrooms, sliced + ¾ cup Colby-Monterey Jack cheese, shredded

name: Yummy Veggie Omelet
summary: I enjoy this omelet served on top of toast. Use any type of cheese you like - Swiss and Gouda are both good choices.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 1 small onion, chopped + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 4 eggs + 2 tablespoons milk + ¾ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 2 ounces shredded Swiss cheese

name: Cream Cheese and Tomato Omelet with Chives
summary: This omelet is light, fluffy, and delicious! Perfect with tomatoes and chives fresh from the garden. Use garlic chives to make this omelet extra flavorful.
ingredient: 2 eggs + 1 tablespoon milk + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 3 tablespoons cream cheese, softened + 2 tablespoons seeded and diced tomato + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives

name: Spanish Potato Omelet
summary: There's nothing too fancy about this rustic Spanish style omelet, just lots of hearty goodness from crispy fried potatoes and onions. Chopped tomatoes and green onions lend even more flavor and color.
ingredient: ½ cup olive oil + ½ pound potatoes, thinly sliced + salt and pepper to taste + 1 large onion, thinly sliced + 4 eggs + salt and pepper to taste + 2 tomatoes - peeled, seeded, and coarsely chopped + 2 green onions, chopped

name: Egyptian Feta Cheese Omelet Roll
summary: This omelet is juicy with this cheese - everyone that tried it, loved it, and they never expected it to turn out this good. Make sure pan is well greased, or else sides will stick and you won't be able to roll it.
ingredient: 4 eggs, beaten + ½ teaspoon black pepper + 3 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese + 1 teaspoon milk + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil

name: The Denver Omelet
summary: The Denver omelet is a change of pace from a French omelet and is known for its firmer texture and caramelized flavor. It's one of the first foods I learned to cook professionally as a line cook in high school. Make it a complete lunch or dinner with arugula salad and toasted bread.
ingredient: 3 large eggs + 1 tablespoon butter + ¼ cup diced smoked ham + 2 tablespoons diced onion + 2 tablespoons diced green bell pepper + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + <U+2153> cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 pinch cayenne pepper

name: Greek Omelet with Asparagus and Feta Cheese
summary: This omelet is filled with a mixture of cherry tomatoes, spinach, bell pepper, and asparagus. Feta cheese gives it that distinctive Greek flavor that pairs perfectly with the veggies.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 1 large omelet
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + 6 spears fresh asparagus, trimmed and chopped + ½ red bell pepper, chopped + ½ cup cherry tomatoes, halved + ½ cup chopped fresh spinach + ½ teaspoon minced garlic + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon dried basil + salt to taste + 2 tablespoons butter + 6 large eggs + ¼ cup whole milk + ½ cup crumbled feta cheese + ¼ cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Eggs Florentine
summary: This is a basic and elegant recipe for eggs Florentine. Make sure not to overcook it!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + ½ cup mushrooms, sliced + 2 cloves garlic, minced + ½ (10 ounce) package fresh spinach + 6 large eggs, slightly beaten + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 3 tablespoons cream cheese, cut into small pieces

name: Omelet Muffins with Sausage and Cheese
summary: These omelet muffins are easy to make ahead for a delicious and ultra-quick breakfast.
ingredient: 1 (6 inch) turkey sausage, diced + 1 tablespoon light olive oil + 1 (6 ounce) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained + 1 cup diced red onion + 1 cup diced red bell pepper + ½ teaspoon salt, divided + ground black pepper to taste + 12 eggs + 1 cup shredded Mexican cheese blend + 1 cup chopped fresh spinach + ½ cup milk + <U+2153> cup chopped fresh chives

name: Baked Omelet
summary: This is a great Christmas breakfast, brunch dish or company breakfast!
ingredient: 8 eggs + 1 cup milk + ½ teaspoon seasoning salt + 3 ounces cooked ham, diced + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese + ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + 1 tablespoon dried minced onion

name: Baked Denver Omelet
summary: My family loves omelets, and this is a quick and easy one. These directions are for a Denver omelet, but experiment with other ingredients to make your favorite.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + ½ onion, chopped + ½ green bell pepper, chopped + 1 cup chopped cooked ham + 8 eggs + ¼ cup milk + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Paleo Omelet Muffins
summary: Muffins in a cup! Easy, yummy, and best of all hearty.
ingredient: 8 eggs + 8 ounces cooked ham, crumbled + 1 cup diced red bell pepper + 1 cup diced onion + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons water

name: The Farmer's Frittata (Italian-Style Omelet)
summary: Loaded with fresh vegetables and a touch of bacon, this farmer's frittata is my favorite type of frittata. It's a perfect way to use your gorgeous, fresh garden vegetables. Curing the squash with kosher salt pulls out the bitterness and makes the squash taste sweeter. It's got great texture, taste, and visual appeal and can be served hot, warm, at room temperature or cold for any meal of the day.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 35 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 10-inch frittata
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups cubed zucchini + 2<U+2009>½ cups cubed yellow summer squash + 2 tablespoons kosher salt + 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided + 1 slice thick-cut bacon, cut crosswise into 1/4-inch strips + 8 large eggs + ¼ teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste + freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 2 tablespoons sliced green onions, or to taste + <U+2153> cup diced red onion + 1 cup diced sweet peppers + 2 ounces grated sharp Cheddar cheese + 4 ounces goat cheese, crumbled

name: Greek Omelet with Asparagus and Feta Cheese
summary: This omelet is filled with a mixture of cherry tomatoes, spinach, bell pepper, and asparagus. Feta cheese gives it that distinctive Greek flavor that pairs perfectly with the veggies.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 1 large omelet
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + 6 spears fresh asparagus, trimmed and chopped + ½ red bell pepper, chopped + ½ cup cherry tomatoes, halved + ½ cup chopped fresh spinach + ½ teaspoon minced garlic + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon dried basil + salt to taste + 2 tablespoons butter + 6 large eggs + ¼ cup whole milk + ½ cup crumbled feta cheese + ¼ cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Baked Brunch Omelet
summary: This is so easy to prepare and everyone raves about it. The best part is that you can put it together the night before and just pop it in the oven the next morning. Delicious!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 9x13 inch pan
ingredient: ½ (1 pound) loaf white bread, cut into cubes + 1<U+2009>½ pounds Cheddar cheese, shredded + 1 cup cubed cooked ham + 8 eggs + 2 cups milk + 1 pinch salt + 1 dash hot pepper sauce, or to taste + ¼ cup chopped green onion

name: Spinach Mushroom Omelet
summary: A hearty but healthy breakfast or brunch omelet, filled with cheese, mushrooms, spinach, and peppers. Serve with a slice of whole grain toast and fruit.
ingredient: 1 egg + 3 egg whites + 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese + 1 tablespoon shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon red pepper flakes + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground nutmeg + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon olive oil + ½ cup sliced fresh mushrooms + ¼ cup diced green onion + 2 tablespoons finely chopped red bell pepper + 1 cup torn fresh spinach + ½ cup diced fresh tomato

name: Western Omelet
summary: This is the ultimate Western omelet! You can even put red bell peppers and sausage in it, if you like.
ingredient: 2 teaspoons butter, divided + <U+2153> cup sliced fresh mushrooms (Optional) + ¼ cup chopped green bell pepper + 2 green onions, sliced on the bias + ¼ cup cooked ham strips + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 2 eggs

name: Three Egg Omelet
summary: These big, easy omelets satisfy everyone! Lots of meats, vegetables, and cheese to choose from - and they're HUGE!
ingredient: 12 eggs, lightly beaten + 3 slices cooked ham, chopped + 3 slices cooked turkey meat, chopped + 3 green onions, sliced + 1 tomato, diced + 1 sprig fresh parsley, chopped + ½ medium green bell pepper, diced + 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Parmalet (Crisp Parmesan Omelet)
summary: I was attempting to achieve a crispy, inside-out Parmesan omelet — and it worked! The caramelized cheese formed a thin but protective layer and, since the eggs had never directly touched the pan, they were moist and tender. This will also work whether you use one or three eggs, depending on the texture you're going for. Using a single egg is kind of a cool trick, since the cheese layer is almost as thick, and you can really appreciate the crispness even more.
ingredient: 2 eggs + ¼ teaspoon water + 1 teaspoon olive oil + 1 ounce freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, or a little less + kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper

name: Spinach, Tomato, and Feta Egg White Omelette
summary: Easy and filling egg white omelette stuffed with veggies and tangy feta.
ingredient: cooking spray + 3 egg whites + salt and ground black pepper to taste + ¼ cup chopped fresh spinach, or more to taste + 6 cherry tomatoes, sliced + 2 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese

name: My Big Fat Greek Omelet
summary: If you're low-carbing it, try my spinach omelet with tomato and feta filling. If you thaw the spinach and squeeze it dry the night before, this omelet is very doable even for speedy weekday breakfasts.
ingredient: 1 cup halved grape tomatoes + 1 teaspoon dried oregano, divided + ½ teaspoon salt, divided + Black pepper, to taste + ½ cup crumbled feta cheese (can use reduced-fat) + 8 large eggs + 1 (10 ounce) package chopped frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed dry + 1 tablespoon olive oil

name: Ultimate Low-Carb Ham and Cheese Omelet for Two
summary: This delicious low-carb keto omelet is a classic and versatile meal for two, either for lunch, breakfast, or brunch. So quick and easy to make!
ingredient: cooking spray (Optional) + 5 eggs + 2 tablespoons heavy whipping cream + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 cup shredded Swiss cheese + 4 ounces Black Forest ham, chopped + ¼ cup finely chopped green onions

name: Simple Italian Omelet
summary: I'm calling this an 'Italian' omelet for a couple reasons. First, I used olive oil instead of butter and, second, I cooked the eggs quickly in a hot pan, letting them get a little golden-brown. The traditional French omelets are thicker and cooked much more gently.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + 3 eggs, beaten + 1 tablespoon crumbled goat cheese, or to taste + 2 teaspoons chopped chives, divided, or to taste + sea salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Japanese Sweet Omelet
summary: Tamagoyaki is a delicious, easy, and fun Japanese breakfast! Serve hot with shaved daikon (Japanese radish) and soy sauce.
ingredient: 2 eggs + 1 tablespoon water + 1 teaspoon soy sauce + 1 teaspoon white sugar

name: Easy Omelet in a Bag
summary: Perfect for camping or fun family-style cooking. Pop in all ingredients in a baggie and boil. This recipe can be easily modified to suit the tastes of the consumer. Add salsa or hash browns. Fun for the whole family and is a great camping food since it doesn't require a frying pan. You can even use Egg Beaters® or other substitute.
ingredient: 2 extra large eggs + 2 tablespoons crumbled cooked bacon + 2 tablespoons shredded Cheddar cheese + 2 teaspoons diced onion + 1 teaspoon diced bell pepper + 1 teaspoon thinly sliced mushroom + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground paprika + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + 1 pinch salt to taste

name: Deluxe Bacon Onion Omelet
summary: With only four ingredients, this very flavorful omelet melts in your mouth!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 1 omelet
ingredient: 4 slices bacon + 3 eggs + 1 teaspoon water + cooking spray + 1 tablespoon butter + ½ white onion, diced

name: Easy Egg White Omelet
summary: This is my go-to breakfast every morning. Fast, easy, foolproof, customizable, and packed with protein, all for fewer calories than your average fast-food breakfast sandwich.
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 tablespoons chopped onion + 2 tablespoons chopped green bell pepper + 2 tablespoons chopped mushrooms + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 (32 ounce) container refrigerated pasteurized egg white substitute (such as Egg Beaters Whites®)

name: Ham and Cheese Omelet Casserole
summary: Delicious one dish meal. Breakfast for breakfast, for lunch or for dinner! Serve hot with hash browns if desired.
ingredient: 8 eggs + 1 cup milk + salt and pepper to taste + 2 cups diced ham + 1 cup shredded American cheese

name: Omuraisu (Japanese Rice Omelet)
summary: Similar in flavor and style to hash browns and eggs, this delicious Japanese dish works wonderfully as breakfast, lunch, or dinner, especially for those not completely ready for the traditional raw fish or white rice. This is my sister's most requested dish.
ingredient: 1 cup cooked white or brown rice + 2 thin slices cooked ham, cubed + 2 tablespoons ketchup + 1 slice processed cheese food (such as Velveeta ®) (Optional) + 2 eggs + salt and pepper to taste + 1 tablespoon ketchup + ¼ teaspoon chopped fresh parsley

name: Asparagus Omelet
summary: This may sound weird but when mixed together it's awesome. Also it's very low-carb and filling.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 1 large omelet
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed + ¼ cup chopped onion + ¼ cup chopped green pepper + 1 pound ham steak, cut into small pieces + 1 teaspoon garlic salt + 5 large eggs + 4 asparagus spears, chopped + 2 tablespoons milk (Optional) + 2 slices Provolone cheese

name: Crab Omelet
summary: Crab and egg go very well together in this delightful crab omelet. Fresh crab meat is best but if you can't find it, use canned.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 large omelet
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 small potato, peeled and diced + 1 onion, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, minced + ¼ pound fresh crabmeat, drained and flaked + salt and pepper to taste + 1 small tomato, diced + 1 (1.5 ounce) box raisins + ¼ cup peas + 1 red bell pepper, chopped + 3 eggs, beaten

name: Herbed Cream Cheese Omelet
summary: Somehow, when cream cheese is mixed with herbs and melted in an omelet, it acquires a wonderful taste that you wouldn't associate with cream cheese.
ingredient: 4 ounces cream cheese, softened + ½ cup fresh cilantro leaves + salt and pepper to taste + 3 tablespoons butter + 8 eggs

name: Scrambled Egg Omelet
summary: Say goodbye to the days when you had to decide whether to make scrambled eggs or an omelet, since with this exciting breakthrough in the latest breakfast technology, you're able to have both at the same time. Serve this up with toast slathered with jam.
ingredient: 3 large eggs + 1 pinch salt + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley + ½ teaspoon chopped fresh marjoram + ½ teaspoon chopped fresh thyme + 3 tablespoons grated sharp white Cheddar cheese + 2 teaspoons olive oil

name: Steel-Cut Oats with Pumpkin and Spice (Overnight Method)
summary: These nutty oats are enriched with the flavor of pumpkin pie. Serve with a splash of milk, honey, or pure maple syrup and a sprinkling of toasted walnuts and you have a delicious, hearty, healthy breakfast! This will last up to a week in your fridge.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 14 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 19 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 cups
ingredient: 3<U+2009>½ cups water + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup steel-cut oats + ½ cup pumpkin puree + 2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice

name: Vegan Overnight Oats with Chia Seeds and Fruit
summary: Chia seeds, oats, and fruit soak overnight in almond milk for a nutritious vegan breakfast of champions! I like my oatmeal warm, so I heat it up in the morning.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups almond milk + 2 ripe bananas, mashed + 1<U+2009>¼ cups rolled oats + ¾ cup water + 4 tablespoons chia seeds + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ cup fresh blueberries + ¼ cup fresh blackberries + 1 nectarine, peeled and diced

name: Slow Cooker Pumpkin Oatmeal
summary: An easy recipe for overnight oatmeal made in a slow cooker.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 7 hrs 30 mins,total: 7 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 cups
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 cups steel-cut oats + ½ cup firmly packed light brown sugar + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons ground cinnamon + ¾ teaspoon ground nutmeg + 1 cup canned pumpkin + 6 cups water + 1 cup fat-free half-and-half + 1 cup raisins + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 tablespoons firmly packed light brown sugar + 2 teaspoons firmly packed light brown sugar + 5 tablespoons chopped walnuts + 1 teaspoon chopped walnuts

name: No-Cook Overnight Oatmeal
summary: I love overnight oats with yogurt. I make up a few of these at a time for a quick, on-and-go breakfast. You can use different spices or maple syrup and your favorite berry or fruit.
ingredient: <U+2153> cup milk + ¼ cup Greek yogurt + ¼ cup rolled oats + 2 teaspoons honey + 2 teaspoons chia seeds + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ cup fresh blueberries

name: Berry Overnight Oats
summary: Prep these fruity, creamy oats the night before and in the morning you've got a quick, fresh breakfast.
ingredient: ½ cup Quaker® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked) + ½ cup non-fat milk + ½ cup non-fat plain Greek yogurt + 1 teaspoon chia seeds (Optional) + 1 cup fresh mixed berries and fruit

name: Classic Overnight Oats
summary: Almond Breeze almondmilk and oats make a great no-cook oatmeal. Change it up with different almondmilk flavors and toppings.
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 jars
ingredient: 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups Almond Breeze Vanilla almondmilk + 1 cup rolled oats + ¼ cup granola (Optional) + 3 tablespoons coarsely chopped Blue Diamond® Honey Roasted Almonds (Optional)

name: Chocolate Coconut Overnight Oats
summary: A yummy breakfast that is healthy but doesn't leave you feeling deprived, these no-cook coconut overnight oats will be creamy by morning and make breakfast prep time non-existent. Put all ingredients in a 12-ounce mason jar and vigorously shake to make preparation a breeze!
ingredient: 1 cup chocolate-flavored almond milk + ¾ cup old-fashioned rolled oats (such a Quaker®) + 1 tablespoon chia seeds + 1 tablespoon packed shredded sweetened coconut + 1 tablespoon maple syrup + 1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder + 1 splash vanilla extract

name: Easy, Healthy No-Cook Overnight Oats
summary: A little sweetness is all you need and vanilla extract makes it taste gourmet. You can get creative with this recipe and use berries instead of bananas, flax seeds instead of chia, or any unsweetened nut milk or nut butter that you fancy.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 jar of oats
ingredient: 1 banana, sliced + 1 tablespoon unsweetened almond butter, or more to taste + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chia seeds + 1 cup rolled oats + 1 cup unsweetened almond milk + 1 teaspoon pure maple syrup + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Overnight Oats Blueberry Smoothie Bowl
summary: I combined overnight oats with blueberries, banana, and almond vanilla milk and turned it into a yummy blueberry smoothie bowl! Top with whatever seeds, nuts or berries you enjoy!
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 bowls
ingredient: 1 cup rolled oats + 1<U+2009>¼ cups unsweetened vanilla-flavored almond milk, divided + 1 frozen banana, chopped + 1 cup blueberries + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon maple syrup, or to taste + 2 tablespoons flaked coconut + 1 tablespoon fresh blueberries + 1 teaspoon chia seeds

name: Overnight Light PB&J Oats
summary: This grab-and-go breakfast has it all: quick prep, easily customizable, great flavor with tons of health benefits. These oats are packed with whole grains, calcium, protein, and vitamins.
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 serving
ingredient: ½ cup almond milk + ¼ cup fresh raspberries + ¼ cup rolled oats + 2 tablespoons powdered peanut butter (such as PB2®) + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chia seeds + 1 teaspoon white sugar

name: Overnight Coconut Pecan Steel Cut Oats
summary: No-cook method of preparing steel cut oats. Soaking overnight makes for a chewy and hearty wholesome breakfast or snack that is ready when you are to eat.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 serving
ingredient: <U+2153> cup steel cut oats + 1 tablespoon unsweetened shredded coconut + 1 tablespoon crushed pecans + ½ teaspoon brown sugar + <U+215B> teaspoon ground cinnamon + <U+2153> cup milk + 1 tablespoon milk

name: Overnight Steel-Cut Oats with Yogurt and Blueberries
summary: Easy-to-make overnight steel-cut oats with stevia powder, yogurt, coconut milk, and blueberries.
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 serving
ingredient: ¼ cup steel-cut oats + 1 (8 ounce) container plain yogurt + 2 ounces fresh blueberries + ½ ounce stevia powder (such as Pure Via®) + 4<U+2009>½ ounces coconut milk

name: Coconut Overnight Oats with Protein Powder
summary: These overnight oats are creamy, full of coconut flavor, and high in protein. Great either cold or warmed and sure to keep you feeling full until way after lunch. I find that the protein powder sweetens the oats enough but feel free to add your choice of sweetener if needed. I top my oats just before serving with additional toasted coconut.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 overnight oats
ingredient: 1 cup coconut milk beverage (such as Silk®) + 1 (5.3 ounce) container toasted coconut Greek yogurt (such as Light & Fit®) + ¾ cup oats + 2 tablespoons sweetened flaked coconut + 1 scoop vanilla protein powder

name: Quaker® Banana Bread Overnight Oats
summary: All the delicious warm spices of banana bread are added to these easy-to-prepare overnight oats. Bananas are stirred in for banana bread flavour in a jiffy.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 cups skim or 1% milk + 2 tablespoons honey + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ¼ teaspoon salt + 3 bananas, divided + 3 cups (750 mL) Large Flake Quaker® Oats + ¼ cup chopped toasted pecans + 1 cup Plain or vanilla non-fat yogurt

name: Christmas Morning Oatmeal
summary: Start this the night before in your slow cooker and wake up to a hearty, hot breakfast for the whole family! If you have a large family and a large slow cooker you can easily double the recipe. Serve with cream or milk as you choose.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: <U+2153> cup brown sugar + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg + 2 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and sliced 1/4 inch thick + ¾ cup dried cranberries + ¼ cup butter, cut into pieces + 2 cups regular rolled oats + 2 cups water + 1 cup apple juice + 1 cup cranberry juice + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¾ cup candied walnuts (Optional)

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Overnight Oats
summary: These overnight oats are chock full of flavor, appealing to everyone, and almost hands-off. This is the perfect take-along breakfast!
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups almond milk + 1 cup old-fashioned rolled oats + ¼ cup peanut butter + 2 tablespoons chia seeds + 2 tablespoons pure maple syrup, or more to taste + 1 pinch coarse salt + ¼ cup strawberry preserves + 1 tablespoon peanut butter, or more to taste + ½ cup sliced fresh strawberries + ¼ cup slivered almonds

name: Pumpkin Pie Overnight Oats
summary: Warm spices and a hint of brown sugar mixed with pumpkin signal that fall is in the air. This grab-and-go breakfast tastes like Thanksgiving.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 12 ounces
ingredient: ½ cup rolled oats + <U+2154> cup Almond Breeze Original almondmilk + 3 tablespoons canned pumpkin puree + 2 teaspoons brown sugar + ¼ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice + 1 tablespoon shelled roasted pepitas

name: Joyful Chocolate Overnight Oats
summary: Components of a popular candy bar come together for a fun, yummy, and quick breakfast treat. Kids can have fun mixing up and topping their own jar of breakfast goodies.
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 jar
ingredient: ½ cup rolled oats + <U+2154> cup Almond Breeze Chocolate Almondmilk + 2 teaspoons powdered sugar + 2 teaspoons unsweetened cocoa powder + 1 tablespoon toasted slivered almonds + 1 tablespoon mini chocolate chips + 1 tablespoon flaked coconut

name: Spicy Gingerbread Overnight Oats
summary: A spicy, molasses-y, and slightly tangy overnight oat recipe!
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: ½ cup milk + ½ cup rolled oats + ¼ cup plain Greek yogurt + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 1 tablespoon flaxseed meal + 1 teaspoon molasses + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon ground ginger + 1 pinch salt + 1 pinch ground nutmeg + 1 pinch ground cloves + 1 pinch ground allspice + 3 tablespoons raisins (Optional) + 3 tablespoons chopped walnuts (Optional)

name: Spiced Chai Overnight Oats
summary: Save calories, while keeping a hearty portion, by using apple butter and chai tea to flavor the oats, without added sugars. If you need a little something extra on top, try adding toasted pecans, a chopped banana, or fresh blueberries. Serve chilled or microwave for 1 minute for a hot dish.
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 serving
ingredient: ½ cup rolled oats + ½ cup brewed chai tea + ½ cup unsweetened almond milk + 2 tablespoons apple butter

name: Overnight Caramel Gingerbread Oats
summary: Using a high-protein drink like Premier Protein® Salted Caramel and gingerbread morphs this regular overnight oats into the flavors of fall. I find adding the spices overnight dilutes the flavors, so I suggest waiting to add most of the spices before serving.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 jar
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter + ¼ pear, chopped + 2 tablespoons chopped walnuts + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, divided + 6 ounces caramel-flavored protein shake (such as Premier Protein®) + ½ cup rolled oats + 2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice + ½ teaspoon ground ginger

name: Vegan Pumpkin Overnight Oats in the Slow Cooker
summary: Sweetener can be added during cooking or you can cook it without and then each person can add their own sweetener of choice on top after cooking.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups water + 1 cup steel-cut oats + 1 cup almond milk + 1 cup canned pumpkin puree + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Good Old Fashioned Pancakes
summary: This is a great recipe that I found in my Grandma's recipe book. Judging from the weathered look of this recipe card, this was a family favorite.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 3<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt, or more to taste + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1<U+2009>¼ cups milk + 1 egg + 3 tablespoons butter, melted

name: Banana Pancakes
summary: Crowd-pleasing banana pancakes made from scratch that are ready in minutes. A fun twist on ordinary pancakes.
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 egg, beaten + 1 cup milk + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 2 ripe bananas, mashed

name: Wheat Germ Whole-Wheat Buttermilk Pancakes
summary: Pairs wheat germ and whole-wheat pastry flour for a healthy, wholesome breakfast treat. If you use a Teflon griddle you do not have to use oil.
ingredient: 2 eggs, lightly beaten + ¼ cup canola oil + 2 cups buttermilk + 2 teaspoons baking soda + ½ cup wheat germ + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups whole wheat pastry flour

name: Oatmeal Pancakes II
summary: I make this for my kids quite often. It is very simple. Preparing the batter in the food processor makes it that much easier. Serve with syrup and butter. Also good with applesauce!
ingredient: ½ cup all-purpose flour + ½ cup quick cooking oats + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + ¾ cup buttermilk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 egg

name: Chef John's Dutch Babies
summary: I've always been fascinated by how many different breakfast foods you can create using just milk, eggs, and flour; and this is one of the more interesting examples. Especially considering the unusual, and borderline disturbing name. Sometimes called German pancakes, these have very little to do with Germany, and nothing to do with the Dutch. Apparently they were invented by German immigrants who were referred to as Dutch.
ingredient: <U+2154> cup milk, room temperature + ½ cup packed all-purpose flour + 3 large eggs, room temperature + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract + ¼ teaspoon salt + 3 tablespoons clarified butter + 1 tablespoon butter + ½ Meyer lemon, juiced + 1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar, or to taste

name: The Best Ricotta Pancakes
summary: This is a well loved recipe! I have an old, small crumpled piece of paper with this recipe hand written out from some years ago, not sure where it came from! I have my own scribbles and scratches on it, so I must have changed it somewhere in time, but this is how I have been making it the last 10 years. It is our favorite pancake recipe. So light, a little tangy, and very satisfying. Perfect with some fresh blueberries or strawberries.
ingredient: 1 cup ricotta cheese plus + 2 tablespoons ricotta cheese + ½ cup skim milk + 2 eggs, separated + ¾ cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 pinch salt + 1 tablespoon canola oil, or as needed

name: Buttermilk Pancakes
summary: A very light and fluffy pancake recipe that requires fresh buttermilk, but it's the best I've ever made!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 - 5 inch pancakes
ingredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 3 teaspoons baking powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + ¾ teaspoon salt + 3 cups buttermilk + ½ cup milk + 3 eggs + <U+2153> cup butter, melted

name: Fluffy Pancakes
summary: Tall and fluffy. These pancakes are just right. Topped with strawberries and whipped cream, they are impossible to resist.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 8 pancakes
ingredient: ¾ cup milk + 2 tablespoons white vinegar + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 egg + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + cooking spray

name: Japanese-Style Fluffy Pancakes
summary: The Japanese have perfected this simple, yet exciting fluffy pancake recipe that anyone can make. So delicious, you might eat it without butter or syrup. Enjoy! Serve this right from the griddle or pan.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 medium pancakes
ingredient: 2 eggs + ¼ cup brown sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + <U+2154> cup milk + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Banana Bread Pancakes
summary: If you're a fan of our banana bread, then you're gonna love this, since it's based on that recipe. As easy as that is to make, these are even easier. I really think that this threads the needle between something that has the flavor of banana bread, but that is very close to the texture of a classic pancake. Top with butter and banana slices and serve with warm maple syrup.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 3,Yield: 6 pancakes
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon kosher salt + ½ teaspoon baking powder + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + 1 large ripe banana + 1 large egg + <U+2153> cup white sugar + ¼ cup milk + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract + ¼ cup unsalted butter, melted + ½ cup finely chopped walnuts + 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, or as needed

name: Best Buckwheat Pancakes
summary: These are delicious buckwheat pancakes that taste great with some butter and syrup or jam.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 15 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 to 3 servings
ingredient: 1 cup buttermilk + 1 egg + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 6 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 6 tablespoons buckwheat flour + 1 teaspoon white sugar + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 3 tablespoons butter

name: Homemade Pancakes
summary: This delicious homemade pancake batter makes about 10 pancakes. My brother is hard to please and even he loves my recipe!
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>¼ cups milk + 1 egg + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Easy Banana Nut Pancakes
summary: This has to be one of the best pancakes I have ever had. They smell wonderful and taste like banana nut bread! When you make these on a Sunday morning, they disappear before you know it.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 4 mins,total: 19 mins,Servings: 3,Yield: 6 to 8 pancakes
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + ¼ cup finely chopped walnuts + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup almond milk + 2 small overripe bananas, mashed + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons butter, melted + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 egg

name: Old-Fashioned Pancakes
summary: Anybody can add water to a boxed pancake mix, but you're better than that! These pancakes are not too thick, not too thin, but tender, light, buttery, and delicious.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 3<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 1 egg + 1<U+2009>¼ cups milk + cooking spray

name: Gluten-Free Buckwheat Pancakes
summary: An easy way to add fiber to your gluten-free pancakes. Optional ingredients: blueberries or bananas, walnuts or pecans.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 3 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 23 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 pancakes
ingredient: ¾ cup gluten-free baking and pancake mix (such as Pamela's®) + ¾ cup water + 1 egg + ¼ cup buckwheat flour + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil

name: Japanese-Style Fluffy Pancakes
summary: The Japanese have perfected this simple, yet exciting fluffy pancake recipe that anyone can make. So delicious, you might eat it without butter or syrup. Enjoy! Serve this right from the griddle or pan.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 medium pancakes
ingredient: 2 eggs + ¼ cup brown sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + <U+2154> cup milk + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Lemon-Ricotta Pancakes
summary: If these pancakes were any lighter, they would float off the plate--and I didn't even separate the eggs and whip the whites. Also, I used water instead of milk--and I liked them better that way. I like to serve these with a pat of butter, a pinch of lemon zest, and a drizzle of maple syrup.
