summary: This rotisserie chicken salad is great for parties or family gatherings, and prep is fast. This recipe is easily doubled. Don't worry about leftovers — there are never any left! Serve fresh or chilled on bread or crackers of choice.
ingredient: 5 pounds deli rotisserie chicken, boned and meat chopped + 1 white onion, chopped + 4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped + ½ cup sweet-hot pickle relish + 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard + 1 teaspoon paprika + ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes + ½ cup mayonnaise, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Chicken Salad II
summary: Awesome chicken salad!
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 4 eggs + 1 red apple, diced + 3 green onions, chopped + ½ cup sweet pickle relish + ½ cup mayonnaise + 3 stalks celery, thinly sliced + 1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks, juice reserved + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 1 cup chopped pecans + fajita seasoning to taste

name: Tara's Sweet and Chunky Chicken Salad
summary: A sweet, but healthy chicken salad. The sweet secret is dried cranberries. Awesome on homemade bread or on crackers. I spread cream cheese on the bread or crackers, and top with chicken salad.
ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) can chunk chicken, drained + 2 tablespoons mayonnaise + <U+215B> cup chopped dill pickle + <U+215B> cup chopped onion + 2 tablespoons sunflower seeds + ¼ cup dried cranberries

name: Mamaw's Chicken and Rice Casserole
summary: I grew up with this chicken and rice casserole recipe. My Grandmother got it from a lady from church at a pot luck a long time ago! She passed it down to my mom and it's always been a family favorite. Quick and easy for school nights, and the leftovers are just as good! You can use less butter on top of course, my Momma and Mamaw always put the full stick on top (gotta love Southern ladies and their butter!)
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 chicken breasts, cut into cubes + 2 cups water + 2 cups instant white rice + 1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of chicken soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of celery soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup + salt and ground black pepper to taste + ½ cup butter, sliced into pats

name: Broccoli Chicken Divan
summary: Chicken Divan with broccoli is a quick and easy casserole that's sure to be a hit with the family!
ingredient: 1 pound chopped fresh broccoli + 1<U+2009>½ cups cubed, cooked chicken meat + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of broccoli soup + <U+2153> cup milk + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 2 tablespoons dried bread crumbs + 1 tablespoon butter, melted

name: Chef John's Chicken a la King
summary: Chicken à la King is one of my favorite classic comfort foods. This recipe is easy to adapt--you can make it thicker or thinner by changing the amount of roux and having a little extra stock on hand. Usually I make this with leftovers from a large roasted chicken. Serve over pasta, toast, rice, or mashed potatoes.
ingredient: 6 tablespoons unsalted butter + ½ pound sliced mushrooms + 2 large shallots, minced + 1 cup diced sweet bell peppers + Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + <U+2153> cup all-purpose flour + ¼ cup dry sherry + 3<U+2009>½ cups chicken stock or broth + 1 pinch freshly grated nutmeg + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 2 teaspoons fresh thyme + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh Italian parsley + <U+2153> cup creme fraiche or heavy cream + 4 cups cubed roasted chicken + Chopped fresh chives for garnish

name: Easy Creamy Chicken Casserole
summary: This easy creamy chicken casserole is my mother's recipe and a family favorite. It's one of our comfort foods and regular easy recipes to make through a busy week. Can easily be prepared in advance, then popped in the oven for a nice hot meal. If making for the first time, add half of the sour cream and taste first. Add more if desired, tasting as you go, to reach desired flavor. Serve over cooked white rice.
ingredient: 1 sleeve buttery round crackers (such as Ritz®), crushed + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + 4 cups water + 1 (32 fluid ounce) container chicken stock + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed + 1 (24 ounce) container sour cream, or to taste + 1 (26 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup

name: Puerto Rican Arroz con Pollo
summary: This Puerto Rican rice with chicken recipe is a classic island-cuisine dish filled with the savory flavors of ham, pork, capers, olives, and tomatoes.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 3 pounds skinless, boneless chicken thighs, chopped into bite-sized pieces + 1 cup apple cider vinegar, or as needed + ¼ cup canola oil + ¼ pound salted pork, chopped into bite-sized pieces + ¼ pound cooked ham, chopped into bite-sized pieces + 1 red bell pepper, diced + 1 green bell pepper, diced + 1 yellow onion, diced + ¼ cup sofrito (such as Goya®) + ¼ cup recaito (such as Goya®) + ¼ teaspoon dried oregano + ¼ teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon capers + 6 cloves garlic, diced + 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce + ¼ cup rinsed and diced Spanish olives + 3 cups chicken broth + 1 (1.41 ounce) package sazon seasoning with coriander and achiote + 3 cups uncooked white rice

name: Quick Bruschetta Chicken Bake
summary: A simple yet creative chicken meal mimics the popular Italian appetizer 'bruschetta' for a delicious entree reminiscent of romantic Italian evenings.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice + ½ cup water + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1 (6 ounce) box chicken-flavored dry bread stuffing mix + 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese + 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning

name: Aunt Jewel's Chicken Dressing Casserole
summary: True Southern chicken and dressing recipe. Handed down from my great-great-aunt. Easy and delicious.
ingredient: 3 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can milk + 1<U+2009>½ cups chicken broth + 1 (6 ounce) package seasoned cornbread stuffing mix

name: Quick and Easy Green Chile Chicken Enchilada Casserole
summary: I got my picture in the paper for this one! My friends' husbands always fall in love with this when I bring it to parties! My 4 picky kids eat it! If you want to skip the charring step, simply tear the tortillas into fourths so they absorb the sauce better.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + garlic salt to taste + 18 (6 inch) corn tortillas, torn in half + 1 (28 ounce) can green chile enchilada sauce + 1 (16 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese + 1 (8 ounce) container reduced fat sour cream

name: Exotic Chicken and Rice Casserole
summary: Have you ever been eating chicken and rice and thought to yourself, "This is good, but I wish this was more exotic?" If so, you'll love this. This was inspired by many different recipes from many different places--which is why I chose this recipe name. Sprinkle this with red pepper flakes, if desired.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 4 hrs 10 mins,total: 5 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: <U+2153> cup plain yogurt + 1 medium lime, zested and juiced + 2 teaspoons kosher salt + 1 teaspoon ground paprika + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon ground coriander + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground white pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground cardamom + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon ground allspice + 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into 8 pieces + 1 pinch saffron + 2<U+2009>¼ cups chicken broth, divided + 2 tablespoons unsalted butter + 1 teaspoon kosher salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups basmati rice + 1 drizzle olive oil + salt to taste + ½ cup plain yogurt + 2 cloves garlic, crushed + 2 tablespoons thinly sliced green onions + 2 tablespoons finely chopped mint + 2 tablespoons finely chopped cilantro + salt to taste + 1 tablespoon water, or as needed

name: Chicken and Chinese Noodles Casserole
summary: This was one of our go-to recipes growing up. A home favorite!
ingredient: cooking spray + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 small onion, diced + 1 (10.75 ounce) can low-fat cream of mushroom soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can water + ¼ teaspoon garlic salt, or to taste + ground black pepper to taste + 1 roasted chicken, bones and skin removed, meat cut into cubes + 1 (8.5 ounce) package chow mein noodles + 1 (4 ounce) jar pimentos

name: Chicken Alfredo Casserole
summary: A nice play on chicken Alfredo, easy to make and yummy to eat. My entire family enjoys it, even my 1-year-old!
ingredient: 3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1 (8 ounce) package penne pasta + ½ (16 ounce) jar Alfredo sauce + 1<U+2009>½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided + ¼ cup milk + 1 tablespoon onion powder + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Keto Chicken-Broccoli Casserole
summary: This chicken and broccoli keto casserole is cheesy, creamy, and easy to prepare. Any cheese can be used, and any cut of chicken. I prefer chicken thighs because I find them more flavorful. The choice is yours.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup shredded Gouda cheese + ¼ cup mayonnaise + ¼ cup chicken broth + 2 tablespoons dry ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch®) + 2 cups chopped cooked broccoli + 1<U+2009>¾ cups diced cooked chicken + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1<U+2009>½ cups shredded sharp Cheddar cheese

name: Quick and Easy Green Chile Chicken Enchilada Casserole
summary: I got my picture in the paper for this one! My friends' husbands always fall in love with this when I bring it to parties! My 4 picky kids eat it! If you want to skip the charring step, simply tear the tortillas into fourths so they absorb the sauce better.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + garlic salt to taste + 18 (6 inch) corn tortillas, torn in half + 1 (28 ounce) can green chile enchilada sauce + 1 (16 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese + 1 (8 ounce) container reduced fat sour cream

name: Poppy Seed Chicken Casserole
summary: This poppy seed chicken casserole recipe is a wonderful dish. Very easy to make!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 9-inch casserole
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1 sleeve buttery round crackers (such as Ritz®), crushed + ½ cup butter, melted + 1 teaspoon poppy seeds, or more if desired + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese

name: White Chicken Enchilada Slow-Cooker Casserole
summary: An easy, creamy chicken enchilada casserole. Slow cooking gently melds together the flavors of chicken thigh meat, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, and green chiles.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 15 boneless, skinless chicken thighs or breasts + 1 (26 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 2 cloves garlic, chopped (Optional) + 1 (16 ounce) container sour cream + 1 (7 ounce) can diced green chile peppers + 15 flour tortillas + 3<U+2009>½ cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese + 1 (10 ounce) can sliced black olives (Optional) + 1 bunch chives for garnish + black pepper to taste

name: Chicken Enchiladas
summary: Learn how long to cook enchiladas with this quick and easy recipe. Good for quick suppers.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 enchiladas
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed + 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1 onion, chopped + 1<U+2009>¾ cups shredded Cheddar cheese, divided + ½ pint sour cream + 1 tablespoon dried parsley + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce + ½ cup water + <U+2153> cup chopped green bell pepper + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon chili powder + ½ teaspoon salt (Optional) + 8 (10 inch) flour tortillas + 1 (12 ounce) jar taco sauce

name: Creamy Chicken Cordon Bleu Casserole
summary: This is a second version of another member's yummy casserole. It has all the creamy and wonderful flavor of chicken cordon bleu with a little of the fat and hassle removed.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package wide egg noodles + 2 cups chopped cooked chicken breast + 8 ounces cooked ham, cubed + 8 ounces Swiss cheese, cubed + 1 (10.75 ounce) can reduced-fat, reduced-sodium cream of chicken soup (such as Campbell's® Healthy Request) + ½ cup 2% milk + ½ cup light sour cream + 2 tablespoons butter + <U+2153> cup seasoned bread crumbs + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Chicken, Broccoli, and Cottage Cheese Casserole
summary: This chicken and broccoli casserole is really rich and filling. I get requests for it all the time at family gatherings. One dish, not a lot of fuss, and good eats.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen broccoli + 2 (10 ounce) cans white meat chicken, drained and flaked + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 (8 ounce) container cottage cheese + 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Cheddar cheese + ¼ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®) + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 1 sleeve butter-flavored crackers, crushed + ¼ cup butter, melted

name: Chicken and Broccoli Casserole
summary: Delicious chicken and broccoli casserole without canned soup!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 40 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x13-inch casserole
ingredient: 1 stick butter + 1 medium onion, diced + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons garlic, minced + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ½ (32 ounce) container chicken broth + 1<U+2009>½ cups milk + 2 teaspoons chicken bouillon granules + 1 cup sour cream + 1 cup shredded Colby-Jack cheese + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 pound cooked chicken breasts, shredded + 3 cups chopped cooked broccoli + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 4 cups crushed cornflakes + 1 tablespoon butter, melted

name: Easy Chicken Casserole
summary: Easy chicken casserole that the children will love. Can be made ahead of time and frozen. Great for leftovers.
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 cup sour cream + 32 buttery round crackers + ¼ cup chopped onion (Optional) + ¼ cup chopped mushrooms (Optional)

name: Broccoli Chicken Casserole
summary: A deliciously creamy chicken, broccoli, and stuffing casserole with shredded chicken and tender broccoli in a cheesy mushroom sauce. Use your favorite stuffing mix to sprinkle over top for a crunchy, flavorful topping. Use leftover chicken or turkey to speed up prep time even more.
ingredient: 4 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 tablespoon mayonnaise + 1 pound broccoli florets, cooked + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 cup dry stuffing mix

name: Enchanted Sour Cream Chicken Enchiladas
summary: A delicious New Mexican enchilada that we had every year for our Christmas Eve dinner. Serve 2 to 3 enchiladas on a plate and surround with lettuce and tomatoes. Top with your choice of guacamole or sour cream or both.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 9x13-inch baking dish
ingredient: 2 cups cubed cooked chicken + 1 cup sour cream + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + 1 pinch ground black pepper + ½ cup vegetable oil for frying + 12 (5 inch) corn tortillas + 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained + 2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese

name: Quick and Easy Mexican Chicken
summary: An easy entree with Mexican flair! Serve over rice or buttered noodles.
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts + cooking spray + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 pinch salt + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 1 pinch ground cumin + 1 cup salsa + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Jalapeno Cream Cheese Chicken Enchiladas
summary: One of my favorite local Mexican restaurants serves a dish with jalapeno cream cheese and shredded chicken that is to die for. I had been experimenting with dishes that contained those two ingredients and came up with this!! It is absolutely to die for and I get nothing but rave reviews from people who try it! Give it a whirl... I promise your taste buds won't regret it. :-)
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 7,Yield: 7 servings
ingredient: 3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 large onion, minced + 2 jalapeno peppers, seeded and minced (wear gloves) + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ½ teaspoon paprika + ½ teaspoon chili powder + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + 1 (28 ounce) can green enchilada sauce + 7 flour tortillas + 8 ounces shredded Monterey Jack cheese, divided

name: Cheesy Chicken and Broccoli Casserole
summary: This cheesy chicken broccoli casserole is sure to hit the spot when you are craving something creamy and comforting with very little prep on a busy weeknight. Eat as-is or serve over rice.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon unsalted butter, or as needed + 2 each skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cubed + 3 cups finely chopped broccoli + 2 (10.5 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese, divided + ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + ½ cup sour cream + 1 pinch ground black pepper to taste

name: Chicken Enchiladas V
summary: A spicy chicken and chile pepper mixture is blended with a creamy soup mixture, rolled up in flour tortillas, and baked with Cheddar cheese on top. This is an easy chicken enchiladas recipe that you will love.
ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + ½ cup sour cream + 1 tablespoon margarine + 1 onion, chopped + 1 teaspoon chili powder + 2 cups chopped cooked chicken breast + 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers, drained + 8 (8 inch) flour tortillas + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Chicken Enchiladas II
summary: A great way to use leftover chicken. Even kids love these!
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter + ½ cup chopped green onions + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chiles + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + ½ cup sour cream + 1<U+2009>½ cups cubed cooked chicken breast meat + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, divided + 6 (12 inch) flour tortillas + ¼ cup milk

name: Salsa Chicken Rice Casserole
summary: Layers of rice, chicken breast, a creamy soup and salsa mixture and two kinds of cheese add up to a simply yummy salsa casserole! This recipe is a family favorite because it's delicious and easily made with ingredients found in the pantry.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups uncooked white rice + 2<U+2009><U+2154> cups water + 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 onion, chopped + 1<U+2009>½ cups mild salsa

name: Mexican Casserole
summary: Chicken breast simmered with a spicy black bean and corn mixture, then topped with cheese and tortilla chip crumbs and baked. Easy and quick to fix weekday casserole with a Mexican flair. Nutritious and kid friendly.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 4 to 6 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + ¾ pound cubed skinless, boneless chicken breast meat + ½ (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix + 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained + 1 (8.75 ounce) can sweet corn, drained + ¼ cup salsa + water as needed + 1 cup shredded Mexican-style cheese + 1<U+2009>½ cups crushed plain tortilla chips

name: Angela's Awesome Enchiladas
summary: The secret is in the seasonings! I whipped these up on my own using stuff I had on hand. Shredding the chicken is the most time-consuming step, but it's worth it in the end. Give these babies a try! Serve with sour cream and a side of Spanish rice.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 5 enchiladas
ingredient: 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cut into chunks + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1<U+2009>¼ cups sour cream + ¼ teaspoon chili powder + 1 tablespoon butter + 1 small onion, chopped + 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained + 1 (1.25 ounce) package mild taco seasoning mix + 1 bunch green onions, chopped, divided + 1 cup water + 1 teaspoon lime juice + ½ teaspoon onion powder + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + 5 (12 inch) flour tortillas + 3 cups Cheddar cheese, shredded, divided + 1 (10 ounce) can enchilada sauce + 1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives

name: Easy Chicken and Yellow Rice
summary: Easy to make chicken and yellow rice, served just like at your local Spanish restaurant.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 5 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 5<U+2009>½ cups water + 1 tablespoon chicken bouillon granules + 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1 green bell pepper, diced (Optional) + ¼ cup olive oil + 1 (16 ounce) package yellow rice + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 1 pinch poultry seasoning, or to taste

name: Fresh Asparagus and Chicken Casserole
summary: Great in the spring when asparagus first comes in and you can get it fresh.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package egg noodles + 1<U+2009><U+2153> tablespoons olive oil + 1 onion, chopped + 1 cup chopped, cooked chicken meat + 1 red bell pepper, chopped + 2 stalks celery, chopped + 1 cup chicken stock + 1<U+2009>½ cups sour cream + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + 1 pound fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2 inch pieces + 8 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, divided

name: Chicken Florentine Casserole
summary: Chicken Florentine casserole, which can also be adapted with either fish or shrimp, lies on a bed of spinach leaves and mushrooms, has a creamy white sauce mixed with garlic, Parmesan cheese, and Italian seasonings, and is topped with baked mozzarella.
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + ¼ cup butter + 3 teaspoons minced garlic + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning + ½ cup half-and-half + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 2 (13.5 ounce) cans spinach, drained + 4 ounces fresh mushrooms, sliced + <U+2154> cup bacon bits + 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese

name: King Ranch Chicken Casserole III
summary: A spicy, savory baked chicken treat. Food fit for kings!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 2 cups chicken broth + 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers + 1 (12 ounce) package corn tortillas + 3 cups cooked, diced chicken breast meat + 1 onion, chopped + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 8 ounces shredded Cheddar cheese + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chili powder + 1 teaspoon garlic salt

name: Easy Creamy Chicken Casserole
summary: This easy creamy chicken casserole is my mother's recipe and a family favorite. It's one of our comfort foods and regular easy recipes to make through a busy week. Can easily be prepared in advance, then popped in the oven for a nice hot meal. If making for the first time, add half of the sour cream and taste first. Add more if desired, tasting as you go, to reach desired flavor. Serve over cooked white rice.
ingredient: 1 sleeve buttery round crackers (such as Ritz®), crushed + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + 4 cups water + 1 (32 fluid ounce) container chicken stock + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 3 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed + 1 (24 ounce) container sour cream, or to taste + 1 (26 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup

name: Aunt Jewel's Chicken Dressing Casserole
summary: True Southern chicken and dressing recipe. Handed down from my great-great-aunt. Easy and delicious.
ingredient: 3 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can milk + 1<U+2009>½ cups chicken broth + 1 (6 ounce) package seasoned cornbread stuffing mix

name: Baked Chicken Wings
summary: Easy, crispy, and delicious. I normally serve with a side of rice, chicken gravy, and a vegetable or salad.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 10 wings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil + 3 cloves garlic, pressed + 2 teaspoons chili powder + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 10 chicken wings

name: Grill Master Chicken Wings
summary: This grilled wing recipe is always a hit! I grill them up before a party and keep them hot in a low oven. I always use Frank's RedHot sauce. It's got lots of flavor and isn't too spicy.
ingredient: 3 pounds chicken wings, cut apart at joints, wing tips discarded + ½ cup soy sauce + ½ cup Italian-style salad dressing + ¼ cup butter + ¼ cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®), or to taste + 1 teaspoon soy sauce

name: Air Fryer Balsamic-Glazed Chicken Wings
summary: Put a big stack of napkins on the table because once you start eating these crispy, sticky, sweet glazed chicken wings, you won't want to stop. This can be an appetizer for four or main course for two.
ingredient: cooking spray + 3 tablespoons baking powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons freshly ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon paprika + 2 pounds chicken wings, split and tips discarded + <U+2153> cup water + <U+2153> cup balsamic vinegar + 2 tablespoons soy sauce + 2 tablespoons honey + 2 tablespoons chili sauce (such as Heinz®) + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon water + ¼ teaspoon cornstarch + 1 green onion, thinly sliced + ¼ teaspoon toasted sesame seeds

name: Sweet Chili and Orange Marmalade Glazed Chicken Wings
summary: It doesn't get much easier than these three-ingredient sticky sweet wings. A combination of orange marmalade and sweet chili sauce make for some of the most addictive wings you've ever had.
ingredient: 2 pounds chicken wing pieces, drumettes and flats + ½ cup orange marmalade + ¼ cup sweet chili sauce

name: Air-Fried Korean Chicken Wings
summary: These Korean-style air-fried wings are crispy, sticky and spicy. Cooked in an air fryer they are ready in less than 30 minutes. They are perfect as an appetizer or add some rice and veggies on the side and you have a balanced meal.
ingredient: ¼ cup hot honey (such as Mike's Hot Honey®) + 3 tablespoons gochujang (Korean hot pepper paste) + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 1 tablespoon soy sauce + 1 teaspoon lemon juice + 2 teaspoons minced garlic + 1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger root + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon black pepper + ¼ cup finely chopped green onions (green part only) + 2 pounds chicken wings + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon onion powder + ½ teaspoon black pepper + ½ cup cornstarch + 2 tablespoons chopped green onions + 1 teaspoon sesame seeds

name: Instant Pot® Buffalo Wings
summary: Buffalo wings made simple in an Instant Pot® and without the fry. The Instant Pot® cooks these to perfection. They hold together for easy handling but as soon as you sink your teeth into them, they are fall-off-the-bone tender. Serve with carrot sticks, celery, and ranch if desired.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 2 pounds wings
ingredient: 1 cup water + 2 pounds chicken wings + ¾ cup buffalo wing sauce + 2 teaspoons dry ranch dressing mix

name: Indian Masala Chicken Wings
summary: Marinate chicken wings ahead of time in a simple homemade masala paste for an explosion of spicy Indian flavors. Serve with lemon wedges and steamed basmati rice.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 chicken wings
ingredient: 2 teaspoons ground coriander + 2 teaspoons ground cumin + ½ teaspoon ground cardamom + ½ teaspoon hot chile powder + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground cloves + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon water + 1 teaspoon salt, or more as needed + 5 large chicken wings, cut in 2, tips discarded

name: Ram (Rosemary, Ancho, Molasses) Wings
summary: Flavored with rosemary, ancho, and molasses, these chicken wings honor this year's Super Bowl® teams, one being the Los Angeles Rams and the other which shall not be named. You'll use the easiest of methods to produce the most crowd-pleasing, finger-messing 'sticky wings.' The technique simply involves soaking wings in a sweet, spicy marinade, baking them wet, and then tossing them with a finishing glaze.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 4 hrs 5 mins,total: 5 hrs,Servings: 6,Yield: 2 1/2 pounds of wings
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wing sections + 2 teaspoons vegetable oil + 3 teaspoons kosher salt + 1 tablespoon minced fresh rosemary + 2 tablespoons ancho chile powder + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + 3 tablespoons white vinegar + 1 tablespoon molasses, or more to taste + 2 teaspoons molasses + 1 tablespoon honey + 1 teaspoon ancho chile powder + 1 pinch salt + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 1 lime, juiced + 1 lime, cut into wedges

name: Hickory Smoked Chicken Wings
summary: Tender hickory-smoked chicken wings without the wait.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 4 pounds frozen chicken wings + 1 tablespoon paprika + 1 teaspoon chili powder + 1 teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + hickory wood chips + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce, or as needed

name: Caramelized Chicken Wings
summary: Yummy chicken wings that are so easy to fix on the stove top or in an electric skillet.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 12 wings
ingredient: 1 cup water + ½ cup white sugar + <U+2153> cup soy sauce + 2 tablespoons peanut butter + 1 tablespoon honey + 2 teaspoons wine vinegar + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 12 large chicken wings, tips removed and wings cut in half at joint + 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, or to taste (Optional)

name: Boneless Buffalo Wings
summary: These boneless wings are a great way to have chicken. I had these at a pub and fell in love with the taste. They're a nice change from your regular chicken wings. Serve with blue cheese dressing for dipping.
ingredient: oil for deep frying + 1 cup unbleached all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ½ teaspoon paprika + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + 1 egg + 1 cup milk + 3 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2-inch strips + ¼ cup hot pepper sauce + 1 tablespoon butter

name: Crispy Honey Sriracha Chicken Wings
summary: This honey sriracha sauce is quite delicious and incredibly simple, but merely an afterthought here. The real star of the show is the strange, but effective technique of coating the wings with a baking powder-laced spice rub before baking. Through the magic of chemical reactions, the surface of the chicken becomes bone-dry, and eventually crisps up to something very similar to what would come out of a deep fryer.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons baking powder + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon smoked paprika + 2<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wing sections + <U+2153> cup honey + <U+2153> cup sriracha sauce + 1 tablespoon seasoned rice vinegar + ¼ teaspoon sesame oil + 1 pinch sesame seeds, or as desired

name: Simple Marinated Chicken Wings
summary: These are my husband's favorite kind of wings. Easy to make and delicious. They taste even better if you double the sauce and marinate for 24 hours.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 2 hrs,total: 3 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 5 tablespoons soy sauce + ¼ cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons dry sherry + 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + 24 chicken wings

name: Dry-Rub Air-Fried Chicken Wings
summary: Yummy chicken wings made from a Memphis-style dry rub.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon dark brown sugar + 1 tablespoon sweet paprika + ½ tablespoon kosher salt + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon onion powder + 1 teaspoon poultry seasoning + ½ teaspoon mustard powder + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 8 chicken wings, or more as needed

name: Teriyaki Chicken Wings
summary: These wings are a hit at every party. I made 10 pounds of these wings for a recent get-together, and not one wing was left at the end of the night. Delicious!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 24 wings
ingredient: 1 cup water + 1 cup soy sauce + 1 cup white sugar + ¼ cup pineapple juice + ¼ cup vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon minced fresh garlic + 1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger + 3 pounds chicken wings or drumettes

name: Oven-Baked Chicken Wings
summary: This is my favorite way to eat oven-baked Buffalo chicken wings. Tons of flavor! Serve with blue cheese dressing on the side.
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 pounds chicken wings + ½ teaspoon salt, or more to taste + <U+2153> cup all-purpose flour + 6 tablespoons unsalted butter + ½ cup hot sauce + ½ tablespoon red wine vinegar + ½ tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + ½ tablespoon honey + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + 2 stalks celery, sliced, or to taste + 2 carrots, sliced, or to taste

name: Chinese Chicken Wings
summary: My late mother's recipe for chicken wings for potlucks. Now I am asked to bring this dish to parties.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 1 hr 5 mins,additional: 8 hrs 20 mins,total: 9 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 5 pounds chicken wings
ingredient: 2 cups soy sauce + 2 cups brown sugar + 2 tablespoons garlic powder + 5 pounds chicken wings, split and tips discarded

name: Amazing and Easy Chicken Wings
summary: These chicken wings are surprisingly delicious for how few ingredients are involved! I made them for the first time at a football party, and within 10 minutes everyone had eaten all 5 pounds!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 2 hrs,total: 3 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 cups brown sugar + 1 cup yellow mustard + ¼ cup soy sauce + 5 pounds chicken wings, cut into thirds and tips discarded

name: Buffalo Chicken Wings I
summary: Let your palate fly away on wings of fire - easy, spicy buffalo wings!
ingredient: 1 quart vegetable oil for deep frying + 24 chicken wings, tips removed and wings cut in half at joint + 4 tablespoons butter + 1 tablespoon distilled white vinegar + 5 tablespoons hot pepper sauce + salt and pepper to taste

name: Chicken Lollipops
summary: They're chicken lollipops - a succulent treat that lives up to the name!
ingredient: 10 chicken wings + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon soy sauce + ½ teaspoon chili powder + 1 drop red food coloring + 1 teaspoon distilled white vinegar + 1 teaspoon chopped garlic + 1 teaspoon finely chopped green chile peppers + 4 tablespoons cornstarch

name: Awesome Slow Cooker Buffalo Wings
summary: I made these wings for Super Bowl®; they were gone in five minutes and super-easy to make! Serve with ranch or blue cheese dressing.
process: cook: 4 hrs 30 mins,total: 4 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) bottle hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®) + ½ cup butter + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 2 teaspoons dried oregano + 2 teaspoons onion powder + 2 teaspoons garlic powder + 1 (4 pound) frozen chicken wing sections, thawed + ½ cup butter + 1 (12 ounce) bottle hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)

name: Jerk Chicken Wings
summary: These jerk chicken wings were so flavorful, so different, and so additively delicious, that I may have eaten my last Buffalo wing. Okay, I didn't mean that, but these really are amazing; a perfect balance of sweet, sour, salty, and spicy. I'm usually pretty casual about you changing my recipes, but I'm going to have to insist you not change any of the key ingredients, which are, every one of them.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 8 hrs 5 mins,total: 9 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: ½ yellow onion, chopped + ½ cup green onions, sliced + 6 cloves garlic + 3 habanero peppers, seeded and chopped + 2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + 2 teaspoons ground allspice + 1 teaspoon dried thyme + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 3 tablespoons soy sauce + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + <U+2153> cup lime juice + 3 pounds chicken wing drumettes + cooking spray

name: Sweet Spicy Wings
summary: Sweet and spicy wings! You can make two batches of the sauce, use one as a marinade before grilling the chicken, and pour the second batch over the chicken after it is grilled. It is not mandatory to do it this way, just better!
ingredient: 6 pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded + 1<U+2009>½ cups Louisiana-style hot sauce + ¾ cup butter + 1 cup honey + 1 pinch garlic salt + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste

name: Deep-Fried Hot Wings and Drumettes
summary: Wings and drumettes, deep-fried to a golden brown and coated with hot sauce. Yummy! Yummy! If you like it hotter, by all means dump more hot sauce on. Serve with ranch or blue cheese dressing. Enjoy!
ingredient: 3 cups peanut oil for frying, or as needed + 1 cup self-rising flour + 3 eggs + 2 (5 ounce) bottles hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®), divided + <U+2153> cup water + 2<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wings and drummettes + ½ teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste + ½ cup butter

name: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
summary: Breaded chicken wings that consist of bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, melted butter, and a cookie sheet.
ingredient: cooking spray + 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese (such as Kraft®) + 1 cup seasoned bread crumbs + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon onion powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 pinch salt + 5 pounds chicken wings, tips discarded + ½ cup melted butter

name: Smoked Chicken Hot Wings
summary: Smoked chicken wings that are tender and delicious. Serve with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 8 mins,total: 1 hr 23 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground black pepper + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons Cajun seasoning + 2<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wings + <U+2154> cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®) + ½ cup butter + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons white vinegar + ½ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + 1 pinch salt to taste

name: 3-Ingredient Baked BBQ Chicken Wings
summary: This BBQ sauce is unexplainable. Its not a rich BBQ but not quite a honey BBQ either. You'll love these!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 5 pounds wings
ingredient: 5 pounds frozen chicken wings, thawed + 10 fluid ounces barbeque sauce (such as Kraft® Original) + 2 tablespoons maple-flavored syrup (such as Mrs. Butterworth's®)

name: Garlic and Parmesan Chicken Wings
summary: The trick to keeping these oven-baked chicken wings crispy, is parboiling the wings in a flavorful liquid, which helps season the chicken and produce a surface texture in the oven that your guests will swear came straight out of a deep fryer.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 4 pounds chicken wings
ingredient: cooking spray + 3 quarts cold water + <U+2153> cup balsamic vinegar + ¼ cup salt + 1 bay leaf + 1 teaspoon dried thyme + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1 teaspoon dried rosemary + 8 cloves garlic, minced + 1 pinch salt + 3 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed + 1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper + 2 teaspoons red pepper flakes, or to taste + 4 pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded + 2 tablespoons fine bread crumbs + 1 cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, divided

name: Awesome Crispy Baked Chicken Wings
summary: Incredibly tasty variation of baked chicken wings with no marinade - just butter, garlic, and herbs. Great for the low-carb eater!
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 1 hr 3 mins,total: 1 hr 28 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 4 pounds chicken wings + ½ cup butter + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 tablespoon dried parsley + 1 tablespoon dried oregano + 2 teaspoons ground paprika + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Malaysian Barbecue Chicken Wings
summary: This is a Malaysian barbecue recipe that I came up with myself. It is very delicious, especially with chicken wings.
ingredient: 12 chicken wings + 4 tablespoons soy sauce + 2 tablespoons dark soy sauce + 1 tablespoon sesame oil + 2 tablespoons oyster sauce + ½ tablespoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon onion powder + ground black pepper to taste + 1 tablespoon dried basil

name: Buttermilk Fried Chicken Wings
summary: My take on classic Southern fried chicken wings.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 2 hrs 10 mins,total: 2 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 chicken wings
ingredient: ½ large white onion, chopped + 8 cloves garlic, crushed + 2 tablespoons Sriracha hot sauce, or to taste + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + 2<U+2009>½ cups buttermilk + 4 pounds chicken wings + 2 cups fresh peaches, peeled, halved and sliced 1/2 inch thick + 2 tablespoons kosher salt + 1 tablespoon paprika + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + 1 tablespoon onion powder + 1 tablespoon lemon zest + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper + 3 teaspoons dried oregano + 3 teaspoons cayenne pepper, or to taste + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon dried sage + 1 teaspoon dry mustard + 8 cups peanut oil for frying

name: Krista's Sticky Honey Garlic Wings
summary: These sweet and sticky chicken wings are sure to be a hit with the whole family. The sauce is so much better than store bought jarred sauce. You can fry the chicken wings, but I prefer baking for less fat. This recipe is equally good with thighs, breasts, or skinless boneless chicken. You'd just have to adjust the cooking time. Serve with fried rice and stir fried veggies. Enjoy!
ingredient: 24 chicken wings, split and tips discarded + ¾ cup packed brown sugar + 5 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger root + 2<U+2009>½ cups water + 5 tablespoons honey + ¼ cup reduced-sodium soy sauce + 3 tablespoons cornstarch + ¾ cup water

name: Air Fryer Old Bay® Chicken Wings
summary: Old Bay® is a seasoning most people think is for seafood. But it's also a great seasoning for poultry. These wings are crispy and lower in calories because they are air fried and tasty thanks to the addition of Old Bay® seasoning.
ingredient: 2 pounds chicken wings + 2 tablespoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®) + ¼ teaspoon freshly cracked black pepper + ½ cup cornstarch + 4 tablespoons butter + 1 teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)

name: Garlic-Ginger Chicken Wings
summary: My mom lives in a small town in western New York, called Clifton Springs. Whenever I go home to visit, I usually indulge in some Buffalo chicken wings from a place called Emerson's. They have two flavors of wings; Buffalo-style, and sweet and sour. I came up with what turned out to be a deliciously sticky, ginger and garlic glaze. I really hope you give these a try.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 5 pounds wings
ingredient: cooking spray + 5 pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 3 tablespoons hot sauce (such as Frank's Red Hot ®) + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 3 crushed garlic cloves + 2 tablespoons minced fresh ginger root + 1 tablespoon Asian chile pepper sauce + ½ cup rice vinegar + ½ cup packed brown sugar + 1 tablespoon soy sauce

name: Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Wings
summary: Chicken wings slow cooked with a spicy tangy sauce mixture which includes chili sauce, chili powder lemon juice and molasses!
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 5 hrs,total: 5 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 5<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wings, split and tips discarded + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle chile sauce + ¼ cup fresh lemon juice + ¼ cup molasses + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 3 drops hot pepper sauce + 1 tablespoon salsa + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons chili powder + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 2 teaspoons salt

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
summary: This yummy honey barbeque sauce is great on chicken wings, pork, or short ribs. The soy sauce and oyster sauce hint at an Asian inspiration, while the gin gives it an undeterminable edge.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 9 hrs,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ½ cup teriyaki sauce + 1 cup oyster sauce + ¼ cup soy sauce + ¼ cup ketchup + 2 tablespoons garlic powder + ¼ cup gin + 2 dashes liquid smoke flavoring + ½ cup white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded + ¼ cup honey

name: Chicken Parmesan
summary: My version of chicken Parmesan is a little different than what they do in the restaurants, with less sauce and a crispier crust.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 2 large eggs + 1 cup panko bread crumbs, or more as needed + ¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or more if needed + ½ cup olive oil for frying, or as needed + ½ cup prepared tomato sauce + ¼ cup fresh mozzarella, cut into small cubes + ¼ cup chopped fresh basil + ½ cup grated provolone cheese + 2 teaspoons olive oil

name: Chicken Parmigiana
summary: This is a very nice dinner for two. Serve it with your favorite pasta and tossed greens.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: 1 egg, beaten + 2 ounces dry bread crumbs + 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + ¾ (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce + 2 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Baked Garlic Parmesan Chicken
summary: Breaded chicken breasts flavored with garlic and Parmesan cheese are baked until golden and crispy for the easiest chicken dish ever. Serve with a salad and pasta for a quick, scrumptious dinner.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 cup dry bread crumbs + <U+2154> cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 teaspoon dried basil leaves + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

name: Rick's Best Chicken Parmesan
summary: Crunchy chicken Parmesan that your family will love. Everyone I have made this for has told me it's the best chicken Parmesan ever. Serve over your favorite pasta with your favorite sauce (I use marinara). Sometimes I sprinkle mozzarella cheese over my chicken as well as the Parmesan. I also garnish with chopped fresh basil.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 mins,additional: 2 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + ¼ cup crushed fish-shaped crackers (such as Goldfish®) + 3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, divided + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 eggs + ¾ cup vegetable oil

name: Cindy's Microwave Chicken Parmesan
summary: This is a great summer recipe. It's easy and not much mess to clean up. My family loves it! The chicken stays very moist and leftovers are yummy! Serve over your favorite pasta. I serve over linguini with Alfredo sauce.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 18 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 43 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts + 1 cup Italian-seasoned bread crumbs + 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 tablespoon smoked paprika + 1 teaspoon dried parsley flakes + 2 eggs + olive oil cooking spray + 1 (28 ounce) jar chunky marinara sauce (such as Barilla®) + 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese + 2 teaspoons crushed oregano

name: Chicken Parmesan with Zucchini Pasta
summary: Using a spiralizer, zucchini is turned into a tasty stand-in for pasta in this non-breaded take on chicken Parmesan.
ingredient: 4 zucchini, cut into spirals using a spiral slicer + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning + 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 cup marinara sauce + cooking spray + 4 slices mozzarella cheese + ¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste

name: My Chicken Parmesan
summary: My Italian husband says this is his absolute favorite dinner. Parmesan-coated chicken swimming in a pool of pasta and sauce with a blanket of melted shredded Italian-blend cheese over all.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ½ cup all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper + 6 chicken breast tenderloins + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon half-and-half + 1 cup seasoned bread crumbs + ½ cup panko bread crumbs + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 tablespoon minced fresh flat-leaf parsley + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 3 quarts water + 1 tablespoon salt + 6 ounces angel hair pasta + 1<U+2009>½ cups prepared marinara sauce, divided + 3 ounces shredded Italian cheese blend

name: Homemade Chicken Parmigiana
summary: I received this recipe several years ago from a family member who swore it was a great romantic meal. She was right. My husband asks me to make this meal every time we have a date night. The quantity of ingredients look intimidating, but don't let them fool you. It's easy and delicious! The whipping cream gives it a creamy texture that you just can't get enough of!
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + <U+2153> cup minced onion + 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice + ½ teaspoon sugar + ¼ cup heavy cream + salt and pepper to taste + <U+2153> cup fine dry bread crumbs + 2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + 1 egg, beaten + 2 tablespoons milk + 3 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 3 tablespoons olive oil + ¾ cup shredded Mozzarella cheese + 1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmesan cheese

name: Quick Baked Chicken Parmesan
