name: Nana's Beef Stroganoff
summary: This is a delicious Stroganoff that my Nana made all the time. My husband's favorite meal is Stroganoff, and before we met he never had homemade Stroganoff sauce. Once my mom made this for him, he has never eaten any other! Serve over rice or egg noodles.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 2 hrs 20 mins,total: 2 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ pounds beef sirloin, cut into 1/4-inch wide strips + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 cup mushrooms + ½ cup chopped onion + 1 clove garlic, crushed + 2 tablespoons butter + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons tomato paste + 1<U+2009>¼ cups chilled beef stock + 1 cup sour cream + ¼ cup dry white wine

name: Ground Beef Stroganoff
summary: This easy, fast, and economical recipe sure to please. It is equally good over rice. Serve this family favorite with a green salad and a light dessert.

name: One-Pot Ground Beef Stroganoff
summary: This one-pot ground beef stroganoff is creamy and delicious! My family loved the boxed version of ground beef stroganoff, but we have done away with processed foods. I created this out of necessity, and they don't miss the box at all!
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons cornstarch + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons dried parsley + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon onion powder + 1<U+2009>¾ cups milk + 1<U+2009>¼ cups beef stock + 1 (8 ounce) package egg noodles + ½ cup sour cream + ¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese

name: Classic Beef Stroganoff in a Slow Cooker
summary: This classic beef stroganoff recipe uses ingredients commonly kept on hand for an easy and delicious family meal.

name: Beef Stroganoff with White Wine
summary: Based on a dish I had a pub in Scotland, this beef stroganoff is best served with rice instead of noodles. The sauce is not very thick, so it coats the rice nicely.

name: Best Ever Russian Beef Stroganoff
summary: Being of Norwegian descent, I really don't know how this Russian beef stroganoff came into the family. My grandma has made this recipe for 50 years that I know of and it is truly my favorite. Serve over noodles. For a wintertime comfort food this is the best. I actually like it so much that my wife and I will have this for dinner and the next morning we will eat the leftovers with a couple of eggs on the side for brunch. You can't beat it!
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons all-purpose flour + ¾ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 pound beef sirloin, cut into 1/4-inch wide strips + 3 tablespoons butter + 1 cup thinly sliced mushrooms + ½ cup chopped onion + 1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste + 3 tablespoons butter + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon tomato paste + 1<U+2009>¼ cups cold beef stock + 1 cup sour cream + 3 tablespoons cooking sherry

name: Elegant Beef Stroganoff
summary: This recipe is easy to make and makes an elegant-looking meal that anyone would be proud to offer to guests. This is one of the favorite dinners for my family. It can be easily increased to serve more people with a little increase in prep time.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds sirloin steak, pounded to 1/4-inch thickness and cut into 1 x 1 1/2-inch strips + ½ cup red wine + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon paprika + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ cup butter + 1 small onion, diced + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 2 cups canned sliced mushrooms + 1 (10 ounce) can beef broth + ½ cup water + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 2 teaspoons red pepper flakes + 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard + <U+2153> cup cream cheese + <U+2153> cup sour cream + 2 cups hot cooked noodles

name: Stroganoff
summary: Here's a simple way to prepare a Stroganoff. Just a few ingredients combined with beef and you have a whole meal in about thirty minutes.
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + ½ cup chopped onion + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon paprika + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 cup sour cream + 8 ounces macaroni

name: Best Beef Stroganoff
summary: Thinly sliced beef in a rich creamy sour cream sauce. This beef stroganoff recipe is how Count Stroganoff intended the dish to be made!

name: Slow Cooker Beef Stroganoff II
summary: A delicious beef stroganoff recipe for the slow cooker. This one uses round steak and golden mushroom soup mixed with egg noodles and sour cream. Very simple to assemble and the slow cooker does the work for you.

name: Simple Ground Beef Stroganoff

summary: Always a family favorite, this classic dish of quickly sauteed beef and onion in a creamy mushroom sauce is perfect over hot cooked noodles. Garnish with fresh parsley for a colorful table presence and serve with a family favorite green vegetable.

name: Easy Beef Stroganoff

name: Healthier Beef Stroganoff III
summary: Fresh mushrooms, light sour cream and less butter give Donna's classic stroganoff recipe a healthier twist. Be sure to serve over whole wheat noodles!
process: prep: 35 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds beef chuck roast + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon butter + ½ pound white mushrooms, sliced + 4 green onions, sliced (white and green parts) + 2 tablespoons butter, divided + <U+2153> cup white wine + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>¼ cups reduced-sodium beef stock, divided + 1 teaspoon prepared mustard + <U+2153> cup light sour cream + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Beef Stroganoff Casserole
summary: With this incredibly rich beef stroganoff casserole, all you need is a crisp green salad. Garnish with more dill sprigs if desired.

name: Cream Cheese Steak Stroganoff
summary: I created this recipe as a way to use leftover filet mignon steak from a New Year's dinner. Hubby really liked it and said I needed to write it down so he could have it again sometime. I hope you will enjoy this great comfort food!
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package farfalle (bow-tie) pasta + 2 teaspoons olive oil + 1 teaspoon butter + 1 (6 ounce) package sliced white mushrooms + ¼ cup French-fried onions + 1 clove garlic, minced + ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, cubed + <U+2153> cup white wine + 2 tablespoons tomato paste + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 1 tablespoon cornstarch + 1 beef bouillon cube + ½ teaspoon dried parsley + ½ teaspoon seasoned salt + ¼ teaspoon smoked paprika + ¾ pound cooked steak, thinly sliced + ¼ cup milk, or as needed + freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Hybrid Hamburger Stroganoff
summary: I created this hamburger stroganoff as an amalgamation of about a half-dozen stroganoff recipes. Really hits the spot on a cold day, served over egg noodles with peas and carrots.

name: Beef Stroganoff with Noodles
summary: This recipe is our family favorite. The sauce is very rich and creamy and is great served over egg noodles. It does take a little longer to make, but it is well worth it!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>½ pounds beef stew meat, cut into 1/2 inch pieces + ½ pound bacon, cut into 1/4 inch pieces + ½ onion, diced + 3 strips celery, diced + 2 tablespoons seasoning salt + ¼ cup Worcestershire sauce + 3 (14 ounce) cans beef broth + 1 (8 ounce) package dry egg noodles + 1 teaspoon butter + 2 (4 ounce) cans sliced mushrooms + ¼ cup cornstarch + <U+2153> cup cold water + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream

name: Wonderful Short Ribs
summary: This tender meat that falls right off the bone is great served over rice! It is great even as leftovers!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (28 ounce) can tomato sauce + 3 tablespoons lemon juice + 4 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce + 2 tablespoons dried parsley + 1 teaspoon dried thyme + 2 bay leaves + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 teaspoons salt + 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes + 1 medium onion, cut into rings + 3 pounds beef short ribs

name: Slow-Cooked German Short Ribs
summary: Dust off your slow cooker. This recipe is worth it. I love coming home to a waiting meal!
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 8 hrs 20 mins,total: 8 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 3 pounds beef short ribs + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 large onion, sliced + ½ cup dry red wine + ½ cup chile sauce + 3 tablespoons packed brown sugar + 3 tablespoons vinegar + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + ½ teaspoon dry mustard + ½ teaspoon chili powder + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + ¼ cup water

name: Smothered Beef Short Ribs
summary: Here's a great stove top recipe for cooking beef short ribs. They are cooked in beef stock with mixed vegetables. This dish is great served over mashed potatoes.

name: Kalbi (Korean BBQ Short Ribs)
summary: This is the staple of Korean fine dining, but too expensive in the restaurants. It is also simple to make at home, and will leave your guests asking for more. Total time includes marinating time. Traditionally, should be served sliced, rolled in romaine lettuce leaves, along with white rice, lightly browned garlic slices, and gochujang (Korean red pepper paste).
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ¾ cup soy sauce + ¾ cup brown sugar + ¾ cup water + 1 garlic clove, minced + 2 green onions, chopped + 1 tablespoon Asian (toasted) sesame oil + 2 pounds Korean-style short ribs (beef chuck flanken, cut 1/3 to 1/2 inch thick across bones)

name: Broiled Short Ribs
summary: Short ribs boiled, then broiled and basted with a molasses, mustard and ketchup sauce.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 2 hrs 15 mins,total: 2 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 4 pounds boneless beef short ribs + salt and pepper to taste + <U+2153> cup molasses + <U+2154> cup ketchup + ¼ cup fresh lemon juice + 1 tablespoon dry mustard + ½ teaspoon chili powder + ½ teaspoon garlic powder

name: Easy and Simple Korean BBQ Ribs
summary: This is a family recipe that's not only simple, but tastes great! Only needs some steamed rice to complete the meal.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 cup soy sauce + 1 cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 5 cloves garlic, chopped + 3 green onions, chopped + 2 tablespoons Asian (toasted) sesame oil + 1 teaspoon sesame seeds + 2 pounds Korean-style short ribs (beef chuck flanken, cut 1/3 to 1/2 inch thick across bones)

name: Bloody Mary Short Ribs
summary: Beef short ribs are slowly braised with Bloody Mary mix and red wine in this savory dish. I would normally use some garlic in this, but this recipe was developed for a good friend who is allergic to garlic. I serve this with homemade spaetzle.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 3 hrs 20 mins,total: 3 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 pounds beef short ribs + salt and pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 large onion, sliced into rings + 2 leeks (white portion only), sliced + 1 cup red wine + 1 cup beef stock + 1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes + 3 cups bottled Bloody Mary mix + 6 large carrots, peeled and cut into 3-inch pieces + 20 small mushrooms, stems removed

name: Braised Beef Short Ribs
summary: After not being able to find a recipe for beef short ribs on the internet, I thought I might share this one that I came across many years ago. I have received raves about my short ribs every time I have served them. Try them, I'm sure you will agree! Enjoy!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 2 hrs 40 mins,total: 2 hrs 55 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: ½ cup all-purpose flour for coating + 2 teaspoons salt + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 4 pounds beef short ribs + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 cup water + 1 cup stewed tomatoes + 1 clove garlic, minced + 6 potatoes, peeled and cubed + 3 onions, chopped + 6 carrots, chopped + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons all-purpose flour + 4 tablespoons water

name: Super Short Ribs
summary: This are delicious beef short ribs cooked in a sweet hot sauce. Makes a great family meal. Try serving with mashed potatoes.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 4<U+2009>¼ pounds beef short ribs + 2 onions, quartered + 1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks + 1 (14 ounce) can beef broth + ½ cup chili sauce + ¼ cup honey + 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 4 cloves garlic, minced + salt and pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, for garnish

name: Korean BBQ Short Ribs (Galbi)
summary: This is an easy way to make Korean short ribs. You can also substitute chicken breast or sliced rib-eye for the short ribs. If you use chicken or rib-eye, you must add thinly sliced green onion tops. This can also be broiled in the oven for the same amount of time.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 7 hrs,total: 7 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 5
ingredient: ¾ cup soy sauce + ¾ cup water + 3 tablespoons white vinegar + 2 tablespoons sesame oil + ½ large onion, minced + ¼ cup minced garlic + ¼ cup dark brown sugar + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon black pepper + 3 pounds Korean-style short ribs (beef chuck flanken, cut 1/3- to 1/2-inch-thick across bones)

name: Simple Beef Short Ribs
summary: Learn how to cook short ribs with this basic recipe passed down to me from my mom and grandmother. I changed it a little, and you can too. For instance, you can braise the beef ribs in almost any liquid. The short ribs cook for hours in a flavorful broth and turn out delicious and tender every time.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 2 hrs 15 mins,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 4
ingredient: 1 pound beef short ribs + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 tablespoon butter + 1 onion, sliced + 1 clove garlic + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle stout beer + 1 cup beef stock

name: Insane Oven Beef Ribs
summary: Cook beef ribs in the oven at 400 degrees F with this recipe for the most unbelievable, easy-to-make beef ribs ever!
ingredient: 2 pounds beef short ribs + ¾ cup red wine + ½ cup olive oil + <U+2153> cup soy sauce + ¼ cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 1 pinch curry powder

name: Manhattan Filet with Pan Sauce Bordelaise
summary: This simple technique not only provides you with a NY strip steak that eats like a filet mignon but the trimmings are used to make a world-class pan sauce. Even if a faux-bordelaise isn't your cup of tea, you can always save the scraps for a Sunday sauce or meatballs. The overnight dry-aging step is optional but does add a little something extra to the final product.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 1 hr 20 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 9 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 2
ingredient: 2 large New York strip steaks + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + ¼ cup sliced shallots + ½ cup red wine + 2 (10.75 ounce) cans low-sodium chicken broth + 1 tablespoon cold butter

name: Instant Pot® Short Ribs
summary: It's easy to love fall-off-the-bone short ribs. The only problem with a traditional braising recipe is that it will be hours before eating happens. Make short ribs in an electric pressure cooker and eat these in half the time. The pressure inside the cooker transforms any liquid into hot steam, which goes deep into the meat and produce far more tender ribs than any other method would make. Less time and better? You bet.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 39 mins,additional: 8 hrs 5 mins,total: 10 hrs 4 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle full-bodied red wine + 4 pounds beef short ribs + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ¼ cup olive oil + 3 tablespoons unsalted butter + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped white onion + 1 cup peeled and minced carrots + 2 cloves garlic, sliced + 2 sprigs fresh rosemary + 1 quart chicken stock, or as needed + ¼ cup water + 2 tablespoons cornstarch

name: Fast and Easy Slow-Cooked Short Ribs
summary: Few ingredients, under 3 minutes, and come back to a finished dinner. Fresh rosemary is best, but dried works just fine too.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 pounds beef short ribs, or more to taste + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed French onion soup + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 (12 ounce) bottle chili sauce + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary, or more to taste

name: BBQ NY Strip
summary: A quick and easy way to make a tasty, tender steak on the grill! Marinate for a minimum of 2 hours.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ½ cup extra virgin olive oil + ½ cup Worcestershire sauce + ¼ cup minced garlic + ¼ cup steak seasoning + 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar + ½ teaspoon dried basil + ½ teaspoon Italian seasoning + 4 (1/2 pound) New York strip steaks

name: Peposa Dell'Impruneta (Tuscan Black Pepper Beef)
summary: The story goes that terracotta tile workers in Impruneta, Tuscany, would place this stew into clay pots and cook it in their still-hot kilns overnight where it would be ready in the morning. They used a lot of pepper because the meat was not always top quality. The amount of pepper is up to you--I used a ridiculous amount, but even so it wasn't overpowering.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 3 hrs 30 mins,total: 3 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 6 beef short ribs (8 to 10 oz. each) + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 8 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed + 1 tablespoon tomato paste + 2 tablespoons whole black peppercorns, freshly crushed + 1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper + 3 sage leaves + 3 small sprigs fresh rosemary + 2 bay leaves + 2 cups red wine, preferably Chianti + salt to taste, to adjust sauce

name: Kalbi (Marinated Beef Short Ribs)
summary: This is a variation of a traditional Korean recipe for marinated beef short ribs. My friends all request it repeatedly! Very tasty!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: ¾ cup white sugar + ¾ cup soy sauce + ¼ cup sesame oil + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 3 green onions, chopped + 2 tablespoons sesame seeds + 5 pounds beef short ribs

name: The Real Deal Korean Beef Ribs
summary: This is an authentic Korean beef rib recipe, not the Americanized version. This is super easy and a crowd pleaser. This is for 4 pounds of ribs. I find 2 tablespoons of honey is perfect for a not-so-sweet rib. This gives you the perfect amount of tanginess. However, if you like it sweeter you can add up to 3 tablespoons.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 1 day 1 hr,total: 1 day 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 4 pounds Korean-style short ribs (beef chuck flanken, cut 1/3 to 1/2 inch thick across bones) + ½ cup reduced-sodium soy sauce + ½ cup white sugar + 2 tablespoons honey + 2 tablespoons minced garlic + 2 tablespoons ground black pepper + 3 tablespoons water + 1 tablespoon Asian (toasted) sesame oil + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons Asian plum wine

name: Delicious Carne Asada
summary: I got this carne asada recipe from my friend's mother in Phoenix. This recipe will marinate 5-6 pounds of meat and can be halved or doubled. Serve this with flour tortillas and salsa.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 5 pounds carne asada
ingredient: 5 pounds beef skirt steak, thinly sliced + 1 cup water + 1 orange, sliced + <U+2154> cup orange juice + <U+2154> cup lime juice + ½ cup red wine vinegar + 1 lime, sliced + 1 bunch fresh cilantro leaves, chopped + ¼ cup vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon salt + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon ground white pepper + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon dried Mexican oregano + 1 tablespoon ground cumin + 1 tablespoon chili powder + ¼ teaspoon ground cloves

name: Kalbi (Korean Marinated Short Ribs)
summary: On my half-day off, I decided to relax by making my favorite Korean meat dish, kalbi (marinated short ribs). Serve with white rice and kimchi. If serving small children (and wanting to prevent a mess), it's best to cut the meat off the bone and slice into bite-sized pieces. The dark marinade can stain clothes, so be careful.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 8 mins,additional: 9 hrs,total: 9 hrs 28 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 3 pounds ribs
ingredient: 3 pounds beef short ribs + ½ cup soy sauce + 1 Asian pear, cored and diced + ½ small onion + 2 tablespoons finely chopped garlic + 1 tablespoon chopped ginger + 2 green onions, thinly sliced + 2 tablespoons sesame oil + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds + 1 tablespoon honey + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Kalbi (Korean BBQ Short Ribs): Authentic Recipe
summary: After trying many recipes for homemade-style Korean BBQ, I finally found a great recipe from a friend who learned it from his mom. It's sweet, salty, spicy, and very tender (Thanks to the Coke®). I use this same recipe to make Bulgogi and Dae Ji Bool Gogi (Spicy Pork) and simply change the onions to sliced bulbs for the bulgogi.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 6 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 21 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ¾ cup cola-flavored carbonated beverage (such as Coca-Cola®) + ¼ cup white sugar + ¼ cup soy sauce + ¼ cup water + 2 green onions, chopped + 3 tablespoons sesame oil + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons sesame seeds + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 pounds short ribs

name: Brazilian-Style Beef Ribs
summary: Whenever I go to Brazil I must eat at a Brazilian churrascaria and have some beef ribs. The meat is so tender and flavorful, it's hard to believe it's only seasoned with salt. Here's my version of Brazilian-Style Beef Ribs, enjoy!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 6 hrs,additional: 10 mins,total: 6 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 3,Yield: 3 servings
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) rack of whole beef ribs (not short ribs) + 2 tablespoons sea salt, or more if needed + ¾ cup water

name: Instant Pot® Galbi (Korean-Style Short Ribs)
summary: This version of delicious Korean beef short ribs dish for your Instant Pot® or other multi-cooker pressure cooker will have the ribs falling off the bone! Soaking the ribs first is the traditional method. I recommend soaking for at least an hour, though traditionally you would soak them for longer than that, changing the water after the first hour. If you don't have an Asian pear, an apple will do as a substitute. Serve over white rice.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 55 mins,additional: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 2 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 pounds beef short ribs + 1 Asian pear - peeled, cored, and coarsely chopped + 1 small onion, chopped + 4 cloves garlic, chopped + ½ tablespoon peeled and coarsely chopped fresh ginger + 1 cup low-sodium soy sauce, divided + ¼ cup rice wine + ¼ cup water + ¼ cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons sesame oil, divided + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 carrots, peeled and cut in chunks + 5 radishes, peeled and cut into chunks + ¼ cup white sugar + ½ bunch green onions, chopped, or to taste + 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, or to taste

name: Slow Cooker Asian Short Ribs
summary: An alternative to traditionally oven-braised short ribs, these slow-cooker, fall-of-the-bone short ribs are Asian-flavored, incredibly tender, and perfect for a cold winter evening.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 4 hrs 10 mins,total: 4 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 ribs
ingredient: 6 beef short ribs, or more to taste + salt and pepper to taste + ½ cup soy sauce + ½ cup vegetable broth + 2 tablespoons rice vinegar + ¼ cup brown sugar + 5 cloves garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon finely grated ginger + 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 teaspoon sesame oil + 1 tablespoon potato starch + 2 tablespoons cold water + 2 green onion tops, thinly sliced

name: Ribs Fantastic
summary: This is a simple, yet tasty recipe that uses beef short ribs. The longer cooking time is definitely worth the wait. The sauce is excellent. Serve with baked potato and fresh sweet corn on the cob.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 pounds beef short ribs + ½ cup brown sugar + 1 cup ketchup + 2 tablespoons water + 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar + ½ cup lemon juice + ½ cup grated celery + ½ cup grated onion + salt and pepper to taste

name: Beef Short Ribs Sauerbraten
summary: The 24-hour marinade in this classic German dish, Sauerbraten, ensures succulent short ribs have that signature tanginess. Gingersnaps give the sauce a beautiful texture and add a sweet spiciness.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 3 hrs 35 mins,additional: 1 day,total: 1 day 4 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 pounds beef short ribs + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + <U+2154> cup cider vinegar + <U+2154> cup red wine vinegar + 12 juniper berries + 9 whole cloves + 2 bay leaves + 1 tablespoon salt + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 cup cold water + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 large onion, chopped + 2 stalks celery, chopped + 1 carrot, chopped + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 cup water + 1 cup chicken broth + 2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste + ½ cup crushed gingersnaps + 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar + salt and pepper to taste

name: New York Strip Chicago Style
summary: New York Strip on a grill has never been easier. This recipe is easy and ingredients are usually around the house!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil + 1 clove garlic, minced + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon white sugar + 2 tablespoons apricot preserves + 2 (1/2 pound) New York strip steaks, 1 inch thick + salt and pepper to taste

name: Argentinean-Style Ribs
summary: At first glance you'll say 'whoa! that's way too salty for me to try...' but stick with it. This is one of the best rib recipes I've ever tried. Very quick and easy.
ingredient: 1 cup coarse salt, or as needed + 6 pounds beef short ribs + 6 limes, quartered

name: Grilled Flanken Short Ribs
summary: These are utterly addicting. A little sweet, a little spicy and very tasty.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 6 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 16 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds beef short ribs, cut flanken-style + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 2 tablespoons steak seasoning + <U+2153> cup soy sauce + 2 tablespoons white vinegar + 2 tablespoons maple syrup + 2 tablespoons cayenne pepper + 2 teaspoons cayenne pepper + 1 teaspoon sesame oil + ½ teaspoon ground ginger + ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes

name: Spicy Pressure Cooker Short Ribs
summary: Cooking ribs in the pressure cooker is an easy and fast way to put food on your plate. The heat from this dish is countered very nicely with the sweetness. If you like spicy food, then you will love this recipe! If you aren't too tolerant of spicy foods, I included a slight variation in the notes. Enjoy!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 3 mins,additional: 45 mins,total: 2 hrs 8 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 2 pounds ribs
ingredient: 1 habanero pepper, minced + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon monosodium glutamate (MSG) + 1 teaspoon paprika + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + 2 pounds beef short ribs + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle cola + 2 tablespoons apple cider + 1 tablespoon raspberry jam + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 2 teaspoons canola oil + ½ onion, diced + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 2 tablespoons water + 2 tablespoons cornstarch

name: 72-Hour Sous-Vide Short Ribs
summary: Sous-vide cooking works its magic on a lot of foods, but short ribs yield some of the most dramatic results I've seen. In traditional recipes, the ribs (usually cut into short 2- to 3-inch chunks by the butcher) are braised for several hours. Although the braising method adds great flavor and makes the meat extremely tender, the meat is also necessarily well-done. But, thanks to our sous-vide wizardry, we're able to maintain a perfectly pink medium-rare and have our meat come out fork-tender. After tasting these short ribs, I may never cook any type of ribs the same way again. This summer, I plan to lightly smoke a rack of spare ribs, then cook them sous-vide for a few days before finishing them back on the grill. I expect pretty incredible results.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 days,total: 3 days 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 pounds
ingredient: 6 pounds beef short ribs + 8 cloves garlic, crushed + 2 tablespoons smoked salt

name: Jane's Barbecued Short Ribs
summary: A recipe I got from an dear friend many, many years ago, who got it from her mother. Very easy, and wonderful flavor. Good in the summer and even better in the winter on a cold night. Can also cook it in the slow cooker. Then when you come home from work, all you have to do is either grill or broil them to brown them before serving. Serve with mashed potatoes or potato salad or egg noodles.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 2 hrs 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 10 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 3 pounds bone-in beef short ribs + 2 onions, finely chopped + 1 cup tomato sauce + 1 cup water + ¼ cup cider vinegar + 3 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley + 1 tablespoon prepared horseradish + 1 tablespoon prepared mustard + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Beef and Riced Broccoli Bowl
summary: All the flavor you love in that popular Chinese takeout dish but without all the carbs.
ingredient: ½ cup beef broth + ¼ cup hoisin sauce + 2 tablespoons reduced-sodium soy sauce + 2 tablespoons sesame oil, divided + 1 tablespoon oyster sauce + 1 tablespoon cornstarch + 1 teaspoon brown sugar + 1<U+2009>¼ pounds New York strip steak, thinly sliced into bite-sized pieces + 2 tablespoons butter + 2 (10 ounce) bags frozen broccoli rice + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds, or to taste (Optional) + <U+215B> teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste (Optional)

name: Electric Pressure Cooker Short Ribs
summary: This easy short ribs recipe can be thrown together in no time. You'll be surprised at how flavorful these are and amazingly tender from being cooked inside a pressure cooker (such as the Instant Pot®)! Serve with veggies, plus egg noodles, rice, or mashed potatoes to turn this into a hearty satisfying meal.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ pounds beef short ribs + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + 2 teaspoons kosher salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground black pepper + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons olive oil + 1 cup beef stock + 1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste + 2 carrots, coarsely chopped + 1 onion, coarsely chopped + ¼ cup balsamic vinegar + 1 large portobello mushroom cap, chopped + 2 tablespoons water, or as needed + 1 tablespoon cornstarch, or as needed + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Not-Barbecued Short Ribs
summary: A slow-cooked crock of short ribs that is easy to prepare, tasty, very tender and offer a Polynesian twist. Great over rice. Great as a potluck dish.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 3 large onions, chopped + 7 pounds beef short ribs, or more to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 3 cups water + 2 (20 ounce) cans pineapple chunks in juice, undrained + 1<U+2009>½ cups brown sugar + 7 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 5 tablespoons ketchup + 4 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste + 1 tablespoon dried sage + 1 tablespoon dried thyme + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons dry mustard

name: Simply the Easiest Beef Brisket
summary: Simply the best and easiest beef brisket there is. Great recipe to make the day before and reheat to serve.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) beef brisket, trimmed of fat + 1 medium onion, thinly sliced + salt and pepper to taste + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can beer + 1 (12 ounce) bottle tomato-based chili sauce + ¾ cup packed brown sugar

name: Oklahoma Brisket
summary: This is absolutely fabulous and so easy. Brisket that isn't dried out can be so good. The bar-b-que sauce is also wonderful and can be used for other meat dishes.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: ½ cup honey + 3 tablespoons soy sauce + seasoned salt to taste + 1 (5 pound) beef brisket + 1 cup apple cider + seasoned salt to taste + ¾ cup ketchup + ¼ cup packed brown sugar + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + ¼ cup apple cider vinegar + seasoned salt to taste + ½ teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste

name: Slow-Cooker Corned Beef and Cabbage
summary: No more dry corned beef! Cook this in your slow cooker all day and you're guaranteed success! Serve this with soda bread for a warm and satisfying meal.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 9 hrs,total: 9 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 4 large carrots, peeled and cut into matchstick pieces + 10 baby red potatoes, quartered + 1 onion, peeled and cut into bite-sized pieces + 4 cups water + 1 (4 pound) corned beef brisket with spice packet + 6 ounces beer + ½ head cabbage, coarsely chopped

name: Nana Lara's Brisket
summary: Easy and festive brisket, straight from my grandma in Newfoundland. This recipe is goof-proof and very tasty. Really good with a glass of Lambrusco, a sparkling red wine, or with ale.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 4 hrs,additional: 30 mins,total: 4 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon chili powder + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + 1 tablespoon onion powder + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 1 tablespoon meat tenderizer + 1 (6 pound) beef brisket + ½ cup soy sauce + 2 cups water + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained

name: Jewish Style Sweet and Sour Brisket
summary: This is the best brisket you will ever taste. No matter who comes for dinner, they always make sure that I'll be making this brisket. It is a very traditional dish for Rosh Hashanah and Passover but it certainly is a winner any time of the year for anyone who loves very tender beef.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 2 hrs 45 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 11 hrs,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 4 pounds beef brisket + 1 cup water + 1 cup ketchup + ½ cup white vinegar + 2 onions, sliced + 1 clove garlic, minced + ¾ cup brown sugar + 1 tablespoon salt

name: Midwest Brisket
summary: This is a recipe I got from my aunt and her family, it is time consuming but worth it. For a different size brisket, just bake 1 hour per pound.
ingredient: 4 tablespoons liquid smoke flavoring + 4 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 2 tablespoons garlic salt + ½ cup chopped onion + 2 tablespoons celery seed + 5 pounds beef brisket

name: Oh So Tender Brisket
summary: Brisket - tender, tasty and oh so easy!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 7,Yield: 6 to 8 servings
ingredient: Roasting bag + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 3 pounds beef brisket + 1<U+2009>¾ fluid ounces liquid smoke flavoring + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

name: Slow Cooked Corned Beef for Sandwiches
summary: This is an excellent recipe for party sandwiches. I always make 2 (and sometimes 3) briskets because it goes so fast. The meat should cook slowly for a minimum of 4 hours--cooking longer will just make it more tender. It sounds like a LOT of garlic, but no one has ever complained that it tasted too garlicky. Serve with brown mustard on rye or kaiser rolls. Can also add cole slaw to the sandwich for a uniquely delicious sandwich.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 15 servings
ingredient: 2 (3 pound) corned beef briskets with spice packets + 2 (12 fluid ounce) bottles beer + 2 bay leaves + ¼ cup peppercorns + 1 bulb garlic cloves, separated and peeled

name: Cousin David's Slow Cooker Brisket
summary: This is a family recipe passed along by my late cousin David. It is so simple...just four ingredients thrown in the slow cooker! Not only is it great to come home to a hot delicious meal...your home will smell wonderful too! It is great with the extra gravy spooned over egg noodles or mashed potatoes.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 10 hrs,total: 10 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) beef brisket + 2 (12 ounce) bottles chili sauce + 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix + 2 teaspoons garlic powder

name: Slow Cooker Texas Smoked Beef Brisket
summary: Cook brisket in a crockpot with this wonderful and very easy recipe that's great on those really busy days. The recipe can be increased for a large group or downsized for 2 people. It reminds me of summers in Texas.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 6 hrs,additional: 40 mins,total: 6 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 4
ingredient: 3 tablespoons smoked paprika + 2 tablespoons ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons kosher salt + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 1 tablespoon chili powder + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + 1<U+2009>½ pounds beef brisket + ¾ cup barbeque sauce + ¼ cup water (Optional) + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + ¼ teaspoon liquid smoke flavoring + ½ onion, sliced into rings

name: Easy Homemade Pastrami
summary: Great pastrami is not the easiest thing to find west of the Catskills, so a few years ago I embarked on a mission to find a way to turn the common corned beef into something similar. My goal was to come up with a reasonable substitute that could be done in less than a day at home, without a smoker, or any other special equipment. Impossible? No!
process: prep: 1 hr 35 mins,cook: 6 hrs 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 15 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 4-pound pastrami
ingredient: 2 cloves garlic, crushed + ½ cup vegetable oil + ¼ cup coarsely ground fresh black pepper + 2 tablespoons smoked paprika + 2 teaspoons ground coriander + 1 teaspoon dry mustard + ½ teaspoon ground white pepper + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + 4 pounds corned beef brisket

name: Deluxe Corned Beef Hash
summary: Fresh corned beef hash tastes much better than canned hash, and it's a great way to use up leftover St. Paddy's Day corned beef. I purposely cook a whole corned beef just to make hash. I throw the carrot in for color, claiming it's the leprechaun's gold. Serve with fried eggs and brown soda bread (farls).
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil + 1 large onion, chopped + 5 large Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch cubes + 1 large carrot, coarsely shredded + 2 pounds cooked corned beef, cubed + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste + ¼ teaspoon dried thyme leaves + 1 pinch salt to taste

name: Brisket Marinade
summary: My family has been using this brisket marinade recipe for about 15 years now. So easy, and absolutely to die for! Marinade is good for oven-baked or grilled brisket. You can find liquid smoke at the grocery store, near the bottled marinades.
ingredient: ½ cup red wine + ¼ cup Worcestershire sauce + ¼ cup liquid smoke flavoring + 2 teaspoons onion salt + 2 teaspoons garlic salt + 4 teaspoons pepper + 4 teaspoons celery flakes

name: Slow Cooker Reuben Dip
summary: A wonderful, easy, creamy hot dip that even sauerkraut haters love. I often take this to work potlucks because I can assemble it at work. Just throw everything in and stir a few times. Also, it's delicious when it's overcooked and kind of dry!
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) jar sauerkraut, drained + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 2 cups shredded Swiss cheese + 2 cups shredded cooked corned beef + ¼ cup thousand island dressing

name: BBQ Beef Brisket Sandwiches
summary: Slow-cooked seasoned brisket shredded and prepared for tantalizing barbeque sandwiches. Enjoy on your favorite bread.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 9 hrs 5 mins,total: 9 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 sandwiches
ingredient: 2 teaspoons celery salt + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1 teaspoon garlic salt + 1 teaspoon onion salt + 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce + 3 pounds beef brisket + 1 cup Russian dressing + 1 cup hickory-flavored barbeque sauce

name: Basic Beef Brisket in a Dutch Oven
summary: Imagine delicious, tender slices of brisket, piled high on your plate. You could make this your reality in just a few hours with this simple recipe for the Dutch oven.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) beef brisket + ½ teaspoon seasoned salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 large onions, sliced + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 cup beef broth + 1 cup ketchup + <U+2153> cup packed brown sugar + <U+2153> cup cider vinegar + 3 tablespoons chili powder + 2 bay leaves + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ¼ cup cold water + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour

name: Slow Cooker Beef Brisket
summary: This beef brisket turned out perfect! My husband couldn't stop bragging about. It will melt in your mouth and the broth it cooks in is amazing and simple.
process: prep: 35 mins,cook: 8 hrs,additional: 10 mins,total: 8 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 4
ingredient: 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 1 teaspoon chili powder + 1 teaspoon ground paprika + 1 teaspoon coarse salt + ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground mustard powder + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + 2 cups low-sodium beef broth + 1 teaspoon liquid smoke + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire Sauce + ¼ cup water, or as needed (Optional) + 1 (2 pound) beef brisket + 2 medium yellow onions, quartered + 3 large carrots, cut into 1-inch pieces + ¼ cup prepared barbecue sauce

name: Yeah, I-Lived-in-Texas, Smoked Brisket
summary: This is hands-down the best way I have found to cook a brisket.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 13 hrs 30 mins,additional: 1 day,total: 1 day 13 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: wood chips + ¼ cup paprika + ¼ cup white sugar + ¼ cup ground cumin + ¼ cup cayenne pepper + ¼ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup chili powder + ¼ cup garlic powder + ¼ cup onion powder + ¼ cup kosher salt + ¼ cup freshly cracked black pepper + 10 pounds beef brisket, or more to taste

name: Corned Beef Hash
summary: A combination of corned beef, potatoes, and onions. A quick and easy meal.
ingredient: 6 large potatoes, peeled and diced + 1 (12 ounce) can corned beef, cut into chunks + 1 medium onion, chopped + 1 cup beef broth

name: Reuben Dip
summary: This is a party favorite. Everyone fights over the pan as soon as it comes out of the oven! Serve it with wheat crackers or small pieces of rye bread.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 9,Yield: 8 to 10 servings
ingredient: ½ cup mayonnaise + ½ cup Thousand Island dressing + 16 ounces sauerkraut, rinsed and squeezed dry + 8 ounces shredded corned beef + 16 ounces shredded Swiss cheese

name: Corned Beef Roast
summary: This is a basic corned beef roast recipe. It is easy to prepare and wonderful to eat.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 5 hrs,total: 5 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (5 1/2 pound) corned beef brisket with spice packet + 7 small potatoes, peeled and diced + 4 carrots, peeled and diced + 3 cloves garlic, chopped + 1 medium onion, diced

name: Newfoundland Jigg's Dinner
summary: A traditional Newfoundland meal, comparable to Corned beef and cabbage. Newfoundland is Canada's easternmost province, and is an island in the Atlantic. Make sure that the split peas are securely tied into a cloth bag (pudding bag), a dish towel or cheesecloth, if they escape you will not have a dinner, you will have pea soup!!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 3 hrs,additional: 8 hrs,total: 11 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) boneless corned beef brisket + 1<U+2009>½ cups yellow split peas + 1 large head cabbage, quartered + 1 medium turnip, peeled and cubed + 6 carrots, peeled and cut in chunks + 6 large potatoes, peeled and quartered + 2 tablespoons butter + ½ teaspoon black pepper + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¾ cup water

name: Easy Corned Beef and Cabbage
summary: This corned beef and cabbage recipe is quick and easy. A no-fuss meal, that's great for St. Patrick's Day or a weeknight family dinner.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 onion, cut into wedges + 4 potatoes, peeled and quartered + 1 pound carrots, cut into large chunks + 3 cups water + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 bay leaf + 2 tablespoons sugar + 2 tablespoons cider vinegar + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 (3 pound) corned beef brisket with spice packet, cut in half + 1 small head cabbage, cut into wedges

name: The Real Reuben
summary: Dark pumpernickel rye, heaped corned beef, drained sauerkraut and imported Swiss cheese make this sandwich something special.
ingredient: 2 slices dark rye bread + ¼ pound thinly sliced corned beef + 3 ounces sauerkraut, drained + 2 slices Swiss cheese + ¼ cup thousand island dressing

name: Samoan Palusami
summary: Palusami is a main dish from Samoa made with coconut milk. In the islands of Samoa, we use taro leaves and the Samoan corn-beef but here in America, my family can not live with out it so we use other substitute you can buy at the grocery store.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) bags fresh spinach + 1 (12 ounce) can corned beef, broken into pieces + 2 (10 ounce) cans coconut milk

name: Irish Boiled Dinner (Corned Beef)
summary: Easy boiled dinner of mouthwatering, tender corned beef with potatoes, cabbage, and carrots. This is my great-grandmother's recipe from Ireland. We served it with Irish soda bread and cornbread at our house. Use leftovers to make corned beef soup by reducing the broth and dicing up the leftover beef and vegetables.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 4 hrs 30 mins,total: 4 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 6
ingredient: 1 (5 1/2 pound) corned beef brisket + 2 large onions + 10 carrots, cut into 1 inch pieces + 2 heads cabbage, cored and cut into wedges + 15 small white (Irish) potatoes

name: Slow Cooked Corned Beef for Sandwiches
summary: This is an excellent recipe for party sandwiches. I always make 2 (and sometimes 3) briskets because it goes so fast. The meat should cook slowly for a minimum of 4 hours--cooking longer will just make it more tender. It sounds like a LOT of garlic, but no one has ever complained that it tasted too garlicky. Serve with brown mustard on rye or kaiser rolls. Can also add cole slaw to the sandwich for a uniquely delicious sandwich.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 15 servings
ingredient: 2 (3 pound) corned beef briskets with spice packets + 2 (12 fluid ounce) bottles beer + 2 bay leaves + ¼ cup peppercorns + 1 bulb garlic cloves, separated and peeled

name: Wine-Braised Beef Brisket
summary: This is yummy the day you make it, but is even more delicious the next day.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 2 hrs 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 teaspoon dried thyme + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 (3 pound) beef brisket + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 red onion, sliced + 1 (14.5 ounce) can beef broth + 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce + ½ cup red wine

name: Spaghetti with Corned Beef
summary: Quick and easy spaghetti using canned corned beef and bottled spaghetti sauce. Delicious! For added nutrition, add a can of mixed vegetables or cut-up fresh vegetable, such as chopped onion or green peppers and tomatoes.
ingredient: 8 ounces spaghetti + 1 (12 ounce) can corned beef + 1 cup spaghetti sauce + 1 cube chicken bouillon + 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning + ½ teaspoon garlic powder (Optional) + ½ tablespoon dried minced onion (Optional)

name: Sensational Slow Cooked Beef Brisket
summary: Beef brisket cooked to perfection with the perfect blend of seasonings. So tender you can cut it with a fork.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 5 hrs 15 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 6 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons paprika + 2 tablespoons garlic powder + 2 tablespoons ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons sea salt + 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper + <U+2153> cup extra-virgin olive oil + 1 (16 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms + 3 shallots, chopped + ¼ cup unsalted margarine + 1<U+2009>½ cups Worcestershire sauce (such as Lea & Perrins®), divided + 1 (5 pound) beef brisket + 2 cups red wine + ½ cup water + 1 clove garlic, chopped + 1 (32 fluid ounce) container beef broth (such as Progresso®) + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce (such as Lea & Perrins®) + 2 tablespoons unsalted margarine, thinly sliced

name: Oven Barbecued Beef Brisket I
summary: This is a great recipe for the family on the go as it needs very little attention. Choose a brisket that weighs between 4 and 5 pounds, depending on how many you are feeding.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 5 hrs,total: 5 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 9,Yield: 8 to 10 servings
ingredient: 4 pounds beef brisket + salt to taste + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 cup barbecue sauce + 1 cup water

name: Slow Cooker 3-Ingredient French Dips
summary: This is a super simple slow cooker recipe that needs just 3 ingredients for French dip sandwiches. It's always a hit with my family! I love it served on French rolls; they soak up the au jus and taste great.
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) beef brisket + 1 envelope onion soup mix + 1 (14 ounce) can beef broth + 8 large French rolls, split

name: One Skillet Corned Beef Hash
summary: Corned beef, taters, onions, pepper and vinegar make this a hearty, quick-fix skillet meal. It's great with spinach on the side, and marvelous with fried eggs.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 2 onions, chopped + 4 potatoes, peeled and chopped + 2 (12 ounce) cans corned beef + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper + 5 tablespoons cider vinegar

name: Slow Cooker Texas Pulled Pork
summary: Slow cooked, Texas-style pulled pork that is served on a buttered and toasted roll. My family's favorite.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 5 hrs,total: 5 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 sandwiches
ingredient: 1 teaspoon vegetable oil + 1 (4 pound) pork shoulder roast + 1 cup barbeque sauce + ½ cup apple cider vinegar + ½ cup chicken broth + ¼ cup light brown sugar + 1 tablespoon prepared yellow mustard + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 tablespoon chili powder + 1 extra large onion, chopped + 2 large cloves garlic, crushed + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons dried thyme + 8 hamburger buns, split + 2 tablespoons butter, or as needed

name: Chef John's Pulled Pork BBQ
summary: Use your favorite dry rub and barbeque sauce to make this succulent pork. A little trick I like is to put 2 ramekins with liquid smoke flavoring in with the meat and roast it slowly. Do your patriotic American duty and serve this on the cheapest, lightest white hamburger buns you can find.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 12 hrs,total: 12 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons dry barbeque rub, or more as needed + 1 (3 1/2) pound bone-in pork shoulder blade roast + ½ teaspoon liquid smoke flavoring, divided + 1 cup water, divided + ¾ cup barbeque sauce, or as needed + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 12 soft white hamburger buns + ¾ cup barbeque sauce, divided

name: Slow Cooker Carnitas
summary: Carnitas means 'little meats' and is traditionally fried then braised. This recipe is made much easier using the slow cooker but the results are just as tasty. This makes a great filling for tamales, enchiladas, tacos and burritos. This filling is also great combined with your favorite barbecue sauce and served on buns.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 hrs,total: 10 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon crumbled dried oregano + ½ teaspoon ground coriander + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 (4 pound) boneless pork shoulder roast + 2 bay leaves + 2 cups chicken broth

name: Slow Cooker Root Beer Pulled Pork
summary: This simple slow cooker pulled pork recipe is big hit with my family of picky eaters. For a spicy kick, mix 1 part Frank's® RedHot® Buffalo sauce and 1 part of your favorite mustard-based BBQ sauce. You can use a pork loin instead of pork shoulder, if desired. Combine with your favorite BBQ sauce and enjoy.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 (4 pound) pork shoulder roast + 2 tablespoons coarse kosher salt, or to taste + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle root beer + 1 (4 fluid ounce) bottle liquid smoke flavoring, or to taste + 4 cloves garlic

name: Instant Pot® Dr Pepper® Pulled Pork
summary: A simple and tasty pulled pork recipe made in the Instant Pot® with the flavoring of Dr Pepper®.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 cups caffeinated pepper-type soda (such as Dr Pepper®) + 2 cups barbeque sauce (such as Sweet Baby Ray's®), divided + 1 pound pork tenderloin + 4 hamburger buns + 2 cups prepared coleslaw (Optional)

name: Pulled Pork Ya'll
summary: This is a favorite at our church. I made it for a fundraiser and now every time we have a potluck I get a inbox-full asking me to make this.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 6 hrs,additional: 15 mins,total: 6 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups water + ½ cup cider vinegar + 2 tablespoons oil + 1 (5 pound) boneless pork shoulder, trimmed + ¼ cup packed brown sugar + 1 teaspoon seasoned salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon onion powder + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce

name: North Carolina Pulled Pork
summary: I got this from an North Carolina native and it is the best. It is pretty much foolproof. This is made in the slow cooker.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 9 hrs,total: 9 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds pork shoulder roast + salt and ground black pepper to taste + ½ cup ketchup + ½ cup brown sugar + <U+2153> cup red wine vinegar

name: Super-Easy Pulled Pork Sandwiches
summary: I use this hearty recipe for my Super Bowl® parties. It's super easy and feeds a lot of hungry football fans. Serve on a large bun with some baked beans, coleslaw, and chips.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 9 hrs,total: 9 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 20 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons brown sugar + 3 tablespoons paprika + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons garlic powder (such as McCormick® California Style) + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons ground black pepper + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + ½ cup Dijon mustard (such as Hellmann's®) + 8 pounds pork shoulder roast (butt roast), rind removed + ½ cup barbeque sauce, or to taste + 18 large hamburger buns, split

name: Valerio's Pulled Pork Sandwich
summary: This is a very messy but delicious sandwich with lots of BBQ sauce.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 2 hrs 15 mins,additional: 5 hrs 15 mins,total: 8 hrs,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 sandwiches
ingredient: 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 tablespoons garlic powder + 2 tablespoons ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons red pepper flakes + 2 tablespoons salt + 2 tablespoons paprika + 1 (3 1/2) pound pork butt roast with bone + 4 cups beef stock + ½ cup hot sauce + 3 tablespoons honey + 1 tablespoon molasses + 1 tablespoon maple syrup + 4 cloves garlic, crushed + 1 cup mayonnaise + 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard + 1 teaspoon hot sauce + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons white vinegar + 1 (16 ounce) bag coleslaw mix + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 5 cloves garlic, minced + 2 cups ketchup + ½ cup honey + 2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce + 2 tablespoons molasses + 5 tablespoons cider vinegar + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 8 Kaiser rolls, split

name: Simple Slow Cooker Pulled Pork
summary: Succulent pulled pork slow cooked in a smokey homemade barbeque sauce makes perfect sandwiches for picnics, football Sundays, or dinner.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon salt + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon paprika + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + 1 (2 1/2 pound) boneless pork loin roast + 1<U+2009>½ cups diet cola-flavored carbonated beverage + 1<U+2009>½ cups ketchup + 2 tablespoons liquid smoke flavoring + 6 Portuguese rolls, split

name: Bob's Pulled Pork on a Smoker
summary: This smoked pulled pork recipe is the correct way to smoke a pork shoulder with professional results — from the cider brine and sugar rub to the rave reviews you will receive. Smoke is the key to breaking down the fat, which adds flavor and moisture to the meat. Place in a bun with your favorite BBQ sauce.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 hrs,additional: 12 hrs 30 mins,total: 20 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 20
ingredient: 1 (8 pound) pork shoulder roast + 1 quart apple cider, or as needed + 5 tablespoons white sugar + 5 tablespoons light brown sugar + 2 tablespoons kosher salt + 2 tablespoons paprika + 1 tablespoon onion powder + 1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + 3 cups hickory chips, or more as needed, soaked in water + 1 onion, chopped

name: Homestyle Kalua Pork with Cabbage in a Slow Cooker
summary: Inspired by the luaus in Hawaii, I set out to make an easy, tasty slow-cooker version of kalua pork. The meat is fall-off-the-bone yummy. This recipe is not overly smoky, but you may add more smoke if you like. Serve with rice, buns, or poi.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 hrs 30 mins,total: 10 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons kosher salt + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon ground ginger + 1 (5 pound) bone-in pork shoulder roast + 1 tablespoon soy sauce + 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon liquid smoke flavoring + ½ large head cabbage, shredded

name: Slow Cooker Carnitas
summary: Carnitas means 'little meats' and is traditionally fried then braised. This recipe is made much easier using the slow cooker but the results are just as tasty. This makes a great filling for tamales, enchiladas, tacos and burritos. This filling is also great combined with your favorite barbecue sauce and served on buns.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 hrs,total: 10 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon crumbled dried oregano + ½ teaspoon ground coriander + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 (4 pound) boneless pork shoulder roast + 2 bay leaves + 2 cups chicken broth

name: Carnitas - Pressure Cooker
summary: Cook pork shoulder in an Instant Pot for savory and tender pork carnitas.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 24
ingredient: 1 (6 pound) pork butt roast + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons salt + 1 tablespoon dried oregano + 2 teaspoons ground cumin + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon chile powder + ½ teaspoon paprika + 2 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste + 1 cup orange juice + 1 onion, coarsely chopped + 4 cloves garlic, diced, or more to taste

name: Slow Cooker Beer Pulled Pork
summary: My way of making pulled pork is simple: slow cooker, 1 can of beer, a 5 to 6 pound pork butt, seasonings, and a bottle of barbecue sauce. My beer choice is Shiner Bock®. My seasoning choices are salt, pepper, onion powder, and garlic powder. My barbecue sauce choice is Sweet Baby Ray's®. Just put it in a slow cooker before you go to bed and when you wake up the magic has happened. See for yourself. This recipe is perfect for a party, and you can even prepare 2 and feed around 30 people. Serve on onion or hamburger buns.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 hrs,total: 10 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: 1 (5 pound) pork butt roast + 2 teaspoons salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon onion powder + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can beer (such as Shiner® Bock) + 1 (12 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce (such as Sweet Baby Ray's®)

name: Apple Jack Pulled Pork Buns
summary: We're using apple juice and whiskey to produce one of my favorite versions of pulled pork. Which, by the way, we're not pulling it, it's more like smashing. Speaking of smash, the name comes from the fact that this was originally made with Jack Daniels®, but you can use any whiskey you want, like I did, or not at all. This is served with a very mustardy and acidic slaw specifically made to pair with the sweet pork.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 2 hrs 25 mins,chill: 8 hrs,total: 10 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 8
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ pounds pork shoulder roast + 1 red onion, diced + 6 cloves garlic, minced + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons kosher salt + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon smoked paprika + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + <U+2153> cup bourbon whiskey + ¼ cup apple cider vinegar + 3 cups apple juice + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives, or to taste + 8 sesame seed burger buns + 4 cups finely shredded Savoy cabbage + <U+2154> cup thinly sliced green bell pepper + 2 tablespoons thinly sliced green onions + 2 tablespoons prepared yellow mustard, or to taste + 2 tablespoons mayonnaise + 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar + ½ teaspoon salt, or to taste + freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste

name: Crispy Pork Carnitas
summary: There's nothing like carnitas. Cubes of fragrantly spiced pork are slowly cooked in lard until they're crispy on the outside while at the same time remaining soft and succulent inside. Bust some up on a warm tortilla, drizzle with braising liquid, top with a little salsa, onion, and cilantro, and you're probably enjoying the world's best taco.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 hrs 40 mins,total: 3 hrs 55 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 pounds boneless pork butt (shoulder) + 8 cloves garlic, peeled + ¼ cup olive oil + 1 orange, juiced, orange parts of peel removed and sliced into thin strips + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 2 bay leaves, torn in half + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ¾ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon Chinese 5-spice powder

name: Sweet and Savory Slow Cooker Pulled Pork
summary: This is a sweet and savory pulled pork that combines many techniques for the best flavor. The slow cooker makes the meat fall off the bone!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 6 hrs 15 mins,additional: 8 hrs 30 mins,total: 15 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 (4.5 pound) bone-in pork shoulder roast + 1 cup root beer + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons light brown sugar + 2 teaspoons kosher salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground paprika + ½ teaspoon dry mustard + ½ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon garlic salt + ¼ teaspoon celery salt + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon ground ginger + ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg + <U+2153> cup balsamic vinegar + 1<U+2009>½ cups root beer + 1<U+2009>½ fluid ounces whiskey + ¼ cup brown sugar + 1 tablespoon olive oil + ¾ cup prepared barbecue sauce + 10 hamburger buns, split

name: Slow-Smoked Pulled Pork (Boston Butt)
summary: This simple yet effective Boston butt recipe gives the pulled pork a mildly spicy and tangy flavor. The combination of smoke and moisture from the drip pan works very well for cooking the meat evenly and leaves plenty of juices within the meat itself. I've tried several different methods with Boston butt and this one is my favorite, as well as a favorite among my friends. Give it a try and see if you like it, and please don't be shy and leave some feedback! I usually serve with barbeque sauce and baked beans (throwing the fat chunks from the pulled pork into the beans to add a little extra flavor). Check out my Sweet and Spicy Cornbread Muffins recipe for a great side. Enjoy!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 4 hrs 5 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 5 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 5 tablespoons dark brown sugar + 4<U+2009>½ teaspoons garlic powder + 4<U+2009>½ teaspoons onion powder + 4 teaspoons paprika + 4 teaspoons seasoned salt (such as LAWRY'S®) + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper + 2 teaspoons ground cumin + 1 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper + 3<U+2009>½ pounds bone-in Boston butt roast + ½ cup spicy brown mustard + 1 cup pickle juice + ¾ cup olive oil + charcoal + 8 pounds fruit wood chunks for smoking + 2 cups pilsner-style beer (such as Budweiser®) + 4<U+2009>¼ cups water, or as needed

name: Easy, Two-Ingredient Pulled Pork
summary: Use a slow cooker to make these great sandwiches using just a pork loin and your favorite BBQ sauce. Easy.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 7 hrs 45 mins,total: 8 hrs,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 sandwiches
ingredient: 1 (2 1/2 pound) boneless pork loin roast + water as needed + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce (such as Dinosaur®) + 8 large sandwich buns, split

name: Slow Cooker Pulled Pork Barbeque
summary: Make sure you have extra buns on hand because people will be going back for more. Excellent the next day for leftovers. Serve with your favorite coleslaw recipe.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 cups chopped celery + 1 onion, chopped + 1 cup barbeque sauce + 1 cup ketchup + ½ cup water + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon chili powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 (4 pound) pork shoulder roast

name: Smoked Pork Butt
summary: We love pulled BBQ pork sandwiches at our house, so we make this every few weeks. The pork just shreds apart after it's done, and the smoky flavor is incredible. It's best to brine the meat overnight to help it retain moisture during smoking, but it's not necessary. There's a basic brine recipe on this site titled 'Basic Brine for Smoking' if you want to brine the pork. I like to rub the pork before I smoke it with a very spicy dry rub that I usually make up each time, so that it's always different. Also, I use apple wood chips because we like the sweet, fruity flavor they yield. When it's done, shred it apart, heat up your favorite sauce, and slather some on a bun. Authentic pit barbecue right in your own house!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 18 hrs,additional: 18 hrs,total: 1 day 12 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: 7 pounds fresh pork butt roast + 2 tablespoons ground New Mexico chile powder + 4 tablespoons packed brown sugar

name: Memphis Pulled Pork
summary: Best ever southern pulled pork.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 onion, thinly sliced + 6 cloves garlic, peeled + 2 (14 ounce) cans beef broth + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce + <U+2153> cup brown sugar + <U+2153> cup cider vinegar + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 (4 pound) Boston butt pork shoulder roast + 2 tablespoons cornstarch + 3 tablespoons water

name: Easy Oven Pulled Pork
summary: This is my grandmother's no-fail pork recipe and it produces tender, moist, rich meat. Pulled pork is so versatile-use it in sandwiches, tacos, stews, and pasta ragu. Or make it ahead of time and keep it in a slow cooker for BBQ sliders. A great, inexpensive option to serve at a party. My favorite way to eat this is on a bun with lots of tangy barbecue sauce and slaw.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 hrs 30 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 4 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 (5 pound) bone-in pork butt + 8 cloves garlic + 4 teaspoons kosher salt + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper

name: Easy Slow Cooker BBQ
summary: Southern pulled pork BBQ that is so easy to make! I have shared this Boston butt BBQ crockpot recipe with family, friends, and co-workers, and they have told me that this is amongst the best BBQ they have ever eaten. I use a North Carolina-style vinegar-based sauce when making this, but this is the fun part of the recipe because you can use any sauce you like, and it turns out great. The pulled pork makes good BBQ plates; it's good on sandwiches, too.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 hrs 30 mins,total: 10 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) boneless pork shoulder (Boston Butt) roast + ¾ cup cider vinegar + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 cup barbeque sauce, or to taste

name: Slow Cooker Pineapple Pulled Pork
summary: Slow-cooker-made-easy pineapple pulled pork recipe.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) boneless pork butt roast + 1 (20 ounce) can unsweetened crushed pineapple in 100% pineapple juice + 2 tablespoons minced garlic + 2 tablespoons ground cumin + 2 teaspoons kosher salt + 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes + 1 pinch freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Dutch Oven Pulled Pork
summary: A wonderful oven-roasted BBQ pulled pork made with about any pork roast in a Dutch oven. Low and slow roasting up above the juices is the key. Serve by itself or on buns. I like mine with coleslaw and a root beer-BBQ sauce on multi-grain buns. Baked beans are a nice side dish, too.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 hrs 30 mins,total: 8 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) boneless pork loin roast, or more to taste + 1 tablespoon barbeque spice rub, or to taste + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbecue sauce, or to taste

name: Easy North Carolina Barbeque
summary: I just love vinegar-based barbeque. I looked high and low for an easy recipe for North Carolina barbeque; this is it! Be warned; your friends will want the recipe. Eat it with a fork or on rolls with coleslaw.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 9 hrs,total: 9 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 (5 pound) pork butt roast + 2 cups white vinegar + 1 cup butter, melted + 2 tablespoons salt + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 2 tablespoons crushed red pepper flakes + 1 tablespoon hot sauce + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons white sugar

name: Slow Cooker Barbecue Pulled Pork
summary: This slow cooker barbecue pulled pork is spice-rubbed for the best flavor.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 hrs 30 mins,additional: 3 hrs,total: 11 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: 4 tablespoons paprika + 2 tablespoons dark brown sugar + 2 tablespoons chili powder + 2 tablespoons ground cumin + 2 tablespoons salt + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon dried oregano + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 tablespoon ground white pepper + 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste + 1 (7 pound) bone-in pork shoulder roast + ¼ cup water + ½ teaspoon liquid smoke flavoring (Optional) + 2 cups barbecue sauce

name: North Carolina-Style Pulled Pork
summary: This North Carolina pulled pork recipe is delicious, especially when smoked with hickory chips on a charcoal grill. A spicy rub and a zesty vinegar sauce turn this pork into a favorite dish.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon mild paprika + 2 teaspoons light brown sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons hot paprika + ½ teaspoon celery salt + ½ teaspoon garlic salt + ½ teaspoon dry mustard + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + 8 pounds pork butt roast + 2 cups cider vinegar + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups water + <U+215D> cup ketchup + ¼ cup firmly packed brown sugar + 5 teaspoons salt + 4 teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon ground white pepper + 2 pounds hickory wood chips, soaked

name: Awesome Pulled Pork BBQ
summary: This is a pulled pork BBQ that is sure to please everyone's taste. Best to use a slow cooker!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 hrs 15 mins,total: 10 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 (5 pound) boneless pork loin roast + 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste + 1 pinch poultry seasoning, or to taste + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste + 1 large onion, quartered + 1 apple, cored and quartered + 3 stalks celery + 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth + ½ cup butter + 2 cups chopped celery + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped onion + 4 cups ketchup + 2 cups water + <U+2154> cup cider vinegar + ½ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup Worcestershire sauce + 2 tablespoons prepared mustard + 1 tablespoon liquid smoke flavoring + 1 tablespoon garlic powder

name: Slow Cooker Pulled Pork with Orange Juice
summary: 'Discovered' this by accident when starting the pork butt about 10 p.m. one night (the butt was still partially frozen). Started with the basics, but decided to add the stone ground mustard and the orange juice on a whim. Husband loves it, so I must have been inspired.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (5 pound) pork butt roast + 1 cup water + ½ cup orange juice + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons minced garlic + 1 tablespoon stone-ground mustard, or more to taste + 1 large sweet onion (such as Vidalia®), chopped

name: 3 Ingredient Pulled Pork Barbeque
summary: Cooking the pork loin alone is too dry. Add country-style pork ribs in the slow cooker along with the pork loin to give it more moistness and flavor. Serve this pulled pork barbeque on top of a baked potato or on buns for a sandwich.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 7 hrs,additional: 30 mins,total: 7 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce + 1 envelope dry onion soup mix + 1 (4 pound) boneless pork loin roast + 1 (4 pound) package thick country-style pork ribs + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce

name: Eaton's Easy Pulled Pork
summary: This is one of the easiest pulled pork recipes I've made. Since my husband was from 'south of the Mason-Dixon line' and raved about pulled pork in Virginia/South Carolina, I had a tough job ahead of me, but he loved it (!) so I guess I passed the test.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 onion, thinly sliced + 4<U+2009>½ pounds bone-in pork loin end roast + salt and ground black pepper to taste + ¾ cup cider vinegar + ¼ cup water + ½ (18 ounce) bottle hickory brown sugar barbeque sauce + 3 tablespoons brown sugar, or to taste

name: Juicy Pulled Pork
summary: Juicy, soft, fall-apart pork. Spoon directly onto plates or put it on a bun for sandwiches. Save leftovers for a few days in the fridge and enjoy as a snack whenever the urge hits you.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (18 ounce) bottle hickory flavored barbeque sauce + 1 (16 ounce) package fresh mushrooms (Optional) + 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes + 2 large onions, coarsely chopped + ½ cup brown sugar + ½ head garlic, peeled + 2 tablespoons malt vinegar + 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste + ¼ cup water, if needed + 2 pounds pork chops

name: Instant Pot® Pulled Pork
summary: This pulled pork dish is a blend of a couple other recipes, made in the Instant Pot®. We had this on the Fourth of July, and it was a huge hit! Serve on warmed hamburger rolls, top with the thickened sauce, bread and butter pickles, or cole slaw as desired.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr 45 mins,additional: 8 hrs 5 mins,total: 10 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: ¼ cup brown sugar + 1 tablespoon chili powder + 1 tablespoon paprika + 2 teaspoons garlic powder + 2 teaspoons kosher salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper + 1 (4 pound) pork shoulder roast, trimmed, or more as desired + 2 teaspoons olive oil + 1 cup chicken stock + 2 cups water + <U+2153> cup apple cider vinegar + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste, divided + 1 large sweet onion, quartered, or more to taste + ½ cup ketchup, divided + ½ cup brown sugar

name: World's Best Honey Garlic Pork Chops
summary: A quick and simple grilled pork chop that everyone will love featuring a simple and easy glaze.
ingredient: ½ cup ketchup + 2<U+2009><U+2154> tablespoons honey + 2 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce + 2 cloves garlic, crushed + 6 (4 ounce) (1-inch thick) pork chops

name: Pork Chops Italiano
summary: Flavorful, tender pork chops with Italian pizzazz. Great served over noodles.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 teaspoon olive oil + 2 cups sliced mushrooms + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 6 (3/4 inch thick) pork loin chops + 2 cloves garlic, crushed + 1 cup chopped onion + 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced Italian tomatoes, undrained + 1 teaspoon dried basil + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ cup water, if necessary + 1 large green bell pepper, cut in 6 pieces

name: Mom's Best Pork Chops
summary: Tender and crunchy breaded pork chops are everyone's favorite!
process: prep: 40 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 eggs + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon onion powder + 3 (4 ounce) packets saltine crackers, crushed + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 6 thin cut pork chops

name: Creamy Herbed Pork Chops
summary: This is one of the best comfort meals I have ever had. It is so creamy and delicious you won't want to stop eating.
ingredient: 4 thick-cut pork chops + 1 teaspoon Montreal steak seasoning, or to taste + ½ cup butter, divided + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons all-purpose flour, or as needed + 1 tablespoon dried basil + 1 teaspoon instant beef bouillon granules + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 2 cups milk

name: San Francisco Pork Chops
summary: Tender chops in a delicious sauce are great over noodles or thin spaghetti.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 4 (3/4 inch-thick) boneless pork chops, trimmed + 1 clove garlic, minced + ¼ cup beef broth + ¼ cup soy sauce + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 teaspoons vegetable oil + ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes + 2 teaspoons cornstarch + 2 tablespoons water

name: Grilled Asian Ginger Pork Chops
summary: Asian ingredients give these grilled chops lots of unique flavour. They can also be put in the oven and broiled.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: ½ cup orange juice + 2 tablespoons soy sauce + 2 tablespoons minced fresh ginger root + 2 tablespoons grated orange zest + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 teaspoon garlic chile paste + ½ teaspoon salt + 6 pork loin chops, 1/2 inch thick

name: Apple Cider Sauce and Pork Loin Chops
summary: Seasoned pork loin chops baked with apple cider and Worcestershire sauce and finished with sherry make even the pickiest husband say, 'Wow!' Serve with mashed potatoes.
