ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 8 ounces andouille sausage, cut into 1/4-inch slices + 2 tablespoons ground paprika + 1 tablespoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ½ cup diced tomatoes + 2 stalks celery, sliced 1/4 inch thick + 1 large green bell pepper, diced + 4 green onions, thinly sliced + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 bay leaf + 1 cup uncooked brown rice + 3 cups chicken stock + 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Shrimp Fried Rice II
summary: The real shrimp fried rice, restaurant style. This is how I used to cook fried rice when my father still owned a restaurant.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups uncooked white rice + 3 cups water + 4 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 cup fresh bean sprouts + ½ cup chopped onion + 1<U+2009>½ cups cooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined without tail + ¼ cup chopped green onion + 2 eggs, beaten + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 4 tablespoons soy sauce + ¼ teaspoon sesame oil

name: Japanese-Style Deep-Fried Shrimp
summary: These deep-fried shrimp are coated with crispy panko crumbs to make the easiest, tastiest deep-fried shrimp ever!
ingredient: 1 pound medium shrimp, peeled (tails left on) and deveined + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon paprika + 2 eggs, beaten + 1 cup panko crumbs + 1 quart vegetable oil for frying

name: Grilled Garlic and Herb Shrimp
summary: This is an easy recipe to prep for grilled shrimp using a marinade made with fresh garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, Italian herb seasoning, brown sugar, and paprika. Every time I make it I have people begging me for the recipe.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 4
ingredient: 2 teaspoons ground paprika + 2 tablespoons fresh minced garlic + 2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, or to taste + 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice + ¼ cup olive oil + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 teaspoons dried basil leaves + 2 tablespoons brown sugar, packed + 2 pounds large shrimp (21-25 per pound), peeled and deveined

name: Chef John's Shrimp Etouffee
summary: We're going to use this spicy and delicious New Orleans classic to demonstrate that it is possible to get good results from using waterlogged frozen shrimp, which unfortunately is sometimes the only option. To make them work we've got to use a few tricks. I prefer this with little chunks of browned chicken or pork, actually.
process: prep: 35 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ¾ teaspoon paprika + ¼ teaspoon ground thyme + ¼ teaspoon dried oregano + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon white pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 pounds shrimp, peeled and deveined + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>¾ cups chicken stock, or as needed + 3 tablespoons butter + <U+2153> cup diced onion + <U+2153> cup diced green bell pepper + <U+2153> cup thinly sliced celery + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or as needed + ½ cup diced tomatoes + ½ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 dash hot sauce, or more to taste + salt to taste + ¼ cup sliced green onions + 2 cups cooked rice, or to taste

name: Figs and Toasted Almonds Brie
summary: This has a been a hit every time I have served it. Is a great appetizer for the holidays or when figs are in season.
ingredient: ½ cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons water + 6 fresh figs, stemmed and quartered + 1 (14 ounce) round 4 1/4-inch diameter round Brie cheese + ½ cup toasted almonds + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Baked Brie with Caramelized Onions
summary: I got this recipe from my boyfriend's sister. It is absolutely amazing, and very easy to do. Spend a little bit of time preparing, and a lot of time enjoying! You can also garnish with candied walnuts.
ingredient: 1 head garlic + ¼ cup butter + 1 yellow onion, sliced + 1 Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and sliced + 1 (8 ounce) wedge Brie cheese + 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed + 1 tablespoon melted butter

name: Jamie's Baked Brie
summary: My ex-wife Jamie's been making this savory Brie en croute since way back before we were married. I think she must have gotten the idea from a magazine, but I've never seen the recipe... I just wing it. It can be made with either puff pastry sheets (quick and easy) or phyllo sheets (more work, flakier shell). Serve with fancy table crackers or digestive biscuits.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 25,Yield: 1 baked brie
ingredient: 1 shallot, minced + 2 cloves garlic, minced + ¼ teaspoon white pepper + 1 tablespoon dry vermouth + 1 (8 ounce) round Brie cheese + 3 sheets phyllo dough + 2 tablespoons melted butter

name: Garlicky Baked Brie
summary: This yummy, warm baked Brie has a garlicky center with a touch of sweet red pepper jelly topping. Serve with fresh baguette or crackers. Your guests will be begging for the recipe!
ingredient: 1 (9 inch) wheel Brie cheese + 5 cloves garlic, crushed + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons red pepper jelly, divided

name: Brie Cups
summary: If you are looking for a quick, easy, delicious appetizer, this is for you. I've served them many times and my friends always gobble them up. Even cheese haters love this. You can find the phyllo cups in the freezer section.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 7 mins,total: 17 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 15 phyllo tart cups
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) wedge Brie cheese, rind removed, cut into 1-inch pieces + 15 frozen phyllo tart cups + ½ cup raspberry preserves, or to taste

name: Baked Stuffed Brie with Cranberries & Walnuts
summary: One of the most common mistakes people make when serving cheese is not letting it come to room temperature first, so that all the flavors can be fully realized. This beautiful baked stuffed brie takes that principle to the next level.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr 20 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 small wheel of brie (about 6 to 8 inches), chilled + ¼ cup dried cranberries + ¼ cup chopped walnuts + 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed, plus extra for (optional) design + 1 egg, beaten with + 1 teaspoon water

name: Brie Cheese Appetizer
summary: A light, fluffy puff pastry is filled with melted Brie cheese and hot fruit preserves. If you do not want a sweet wheel, you may substitute herbed cheese spread for the preserves. Baking times are the same for the substitution.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) wheel Brie cheese + 3 tablespoons apricot preserves + ½ (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed + 1 egg white

name: Warm Brie and Pear Tartlets
summary: These make a simple, delicious, and elegant appetizer. They impress every time!
ingredient: 24 mini phyllo tart shells + ¼ pound ripe Brie cheese, cut into 24 small chunks + 1 ripe pear, cut into small dice + 2 sprigs fresh thyme + 2 tablespoons honey, or to taste

name: Baked Brie in Puff Pastry
summary: This wonderful, light puff pastry is filled with melted Brie cheese. Serve with crackers on the side.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 to 10 servings
ingredient: ½ (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed + 1 (8 ounce) wheel Brie cheese + ¼ cup sliced almonds

name: Cranberry Brie Bites
summary: These cranberry Brie bites are an appetizer that will surely wow your guests at any party or holiday function. Tangy cranberry, creamy Brie, and crunchy walnuts come together in a buttery puff pastry shell, delivering the perfect balance of flavor and texture in every bite. Bonus: These can be made up to 3 days ahead! Just wrap them in plastic wrap before baking and store in the refrigerator. Serve warm or at room temperature.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 bites
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) round Brie cheese + cooking spray + 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed + ½ cup cranberry sauce + ½ cup finely chopped walnuts + 24 pinches sea salt

name: Honey Brie Spread
summary: Better titled as 'Bedroom Brie'! This is our favorite food after the kids have gone to sleep. A wheel of Brie is wrapped in pastry, then topped with pecans and honey, and baked to golden perfection. Best paired with a Sauvignon Blanc.
ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) round Brie cheese + 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated crescent roll dough + 1<U+2009>½ cups honey + 1<U+2009>½ cups pecan halves

name: Raspberry Walnut Baked Brie
summary: This is a simple, elegant appetizer that is sure to impress!
ingredient: 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed + 1 (8 ounce) round Brie cheese + <U+2153> cup seedless raspberry jam + 2 tablespoons chopped walnuts

name: Baked Brie en Croute
summary: This is delicious! A great appetizer everyone will love!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 egg + 1 tablespoon water + 1 (17.3 ounce) package frozen puff pastry (such as Pepperidge Farm®), thawed + ½ cup apricot preserves + ¾ cup dried cranberries + ½ cup sliced almonds + 1 (7 inch) wheel Brie cheese

name: Baked Brie with Quebec Maple Syrup
summary: Baked Brie with walnuts and maple syrup. A party favorite! I use a can of finest light AA grade Quebec maple syrup for this.
ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) round Brie cheese + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 2 cups real maple syrup (fine light grade) + 1 18-inch French baguette, cut into 3/4-inch slices

name: Baked Brie with Maple Caramelized Apples and Spiced Praline Bacon
summary: This is a party in your mouth. Creamy, smoky, spicy, sweet, this recipe makes for a dramatic appetizer that will wow at your Thanksgiving cocktail hour! The recipe also works with a 16-ounce round of Brie if you're feeding a big crowd. Serve with a baguette or your favorite crackers.
ingredient: 3 slices bacon + 2 tablespoons finely chopped pecans + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 1 teaspoon chili powder + sea salt to taste + 2 tablespoons unsalted butter + 2 Golden Delicious apples - peeled, cored, and cut into 1/2-inch thick slices + 3 tablespoons pure maple syrup + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 (8 ounce) round Brie cheese + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary (Optional)

name: Easy Baked Brie with Almonds and Brown Sugar
summary: This baked Brie is my go-to recipe when I have to make something elegant, tasteful, and extremely easy when entertaining guests.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 23 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: ½ cup sliced almonds, divided + ½ cup packed brown sugar + 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard + 1 (8 ounce) round Brie cheese + 1 French baguette + cooking spray

name: Honey-Walnut Brie Bites
summary: This elegant appetizer is deceptively easy to make! Using prepared puff pastry dough saves a lot of time and energy for these tasty little bites, which will become a go-to recipe for parties.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 bites
ingredient: nonstick cooking spray + 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed + 1 (8 ounce) wheel Brie cheese + 2 tablespoons honey + ¼ cup chopped walnuts

name: Chutney Baked Brie
summary: This round wheel of Brie is dusted with curry powder, then spread with a mango chutney, studded with chopped cashews, and baked until the cheese inside the rind is melted. The sweet/savory combination is creamy and delicious.
ingredient: 1 (2.2 pound) wheel Brie cheese + 2 teaspoons ground curry powder + 1 (12 ounce) jar mango chutney + 1 cup chopped cashews + 1 French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch slices

name: Dried Cherries, Pecans and Rosemary Brie en Croute
summary: Dried cherries, toasted pecans, and honey top this brie round baked in puff pastry.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr 25 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: ½ (17.3 ounce) package Pepperidge Farm® Puff Pastry Sheets + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon water + <U+2153> cup dried cherries, softened* + ¼ cup chopped toasted pecans + ¼ cup honey + ½ teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary leaves + 1 (13.2 ounce) round Brie cheese + 1 (26 ounce) package Pepperidge Farm® Entertaining Cracker Quartet Collection

name: Herbed Brie in Puff Pastry
summary: This is a great appetizer! Serve with water crackers.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 32,Yield: 1 2-pound baked Brie
ingredient: ¾ teaspoon chopped fresh parsley + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon dried rosemary + 1 teaspoon dried thyme + 1 teaspoon dried marjoram + 2 ounces thinly sliced salami, chopped + 1 (2.2 pound) wheel Brie cheese + 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed + water + 1 egg, beaten

name: Elegant Baked Brie
summary: This is an elegant twist to an already elegant dish. This baked brie combines the strong but coordinating flavors of brie cheese with pesto sauce and pine nuts. It has a sweet taste and can be eaten alone or served with crackers or baked French bread.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) round Brie cheese + 2 tablespoons pesto sauce + ¼ cup toasted pine nuts + 2 teaspoons brown sugar + 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent rolls

name: Brie, Lemon Curd, and Blueberry Bites
summary: Looking for a quick and easy appetizer/snack made with minimal effort that will WOW your guests? These bites are buttery, creamy, cheesy, and balanced out with tart lemon curd and a sweet pop of flavor from blueberries. Finger food at its best!
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 bites
ingredient: cooking spray + 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed + ½ (8 ounce) round Brie cheese, chilled + <U+2153> cup lemon curd + 24 each fresh blueberries + confectioners' sugar for dusting + 24 small fresh mint leaves for garnish (optional)

name: Rye Whiskey Brie
summary: This mix of baked brie topped with brown sugar, pecans, and rye whiskey is too good for words. You could use any other type of whiskey, such as bourbon. Serve with crackers.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) round Brie cheese + ¼ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup chopped pecans + 1 tablespoon rye whiskey

name: Ham and Brie Crostini with Fig Jam
summary: Toasted baguette slices are topped with ham and Brie, baked until warm and melty, then topped with fig jam.
ingredient: 24 (1/4-inch thick) baguette slices + ½ cup extra virgin olive oil + ¾ pound Smithfield Ham slices, cut into 24 pieces + 9 ounces Brie cheese, sliced and cut into 24 pieces + ¼ cup fig jam

name: Brie and Caramelized Onion Pinwheels
summary: Dazzle your guests with an easy but impressive appetizer. I received this recipe from a friend and have used it many times, much to the delight of my family and friends! I usually use more brie than what is called for below.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 18,Yield: 18 pinwheels
ingredient: 3 tablespoons butter + 2 medium onions, thinly sliced + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + ½ teaspoon white wine vinegar + 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed + 4 ounces Brie cheese, rind removed, softened + 1 teaspoon caraway seeds, or more to taste + 1 egg + 2 teaspoons water

name: Sweet Potato Sausage Bites
summary: Mennonite Farmer Sausage nestled between gooey brie and sweet potato slices. This Grimm's Fine Foods appetizer is gluten free.
ingredient: 2 medium sweet potatoes, sliced into 1/4-inch rounds + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 (8 ounce) round Brie cheese, cut into 1-inch chunks + 1 package Grimm’s Fine Foods Sausage Bites (such as Mennonite Style Farmer Sausage Bites) + ¼ cup dried cranberries + ¼ cup pecans + 2 tablespoons fresh rosemary, chopped + Honey for drizzling

name: Caramel Apple Brie Pretzel Bites
summary: An elegant, quick, and easy snack that is perfect for any date night. Pairs well with a nice moscato or Champagne.
ingredient: 1 (7 inch) wheel Brie cheese + 2 large Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and cut into 1/4-inch dice + 1 tablespoon butter + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 tablespoon caramel sauce, or to taste + 1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®

name: Balsamic Bruschetta
summary: Bruschetta is a classic Italian appetizer that is easy to make at home. Toasted bread is topped with tomatoes, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and fresh basil. Use a high-quality balsamic vinegar for best results.
ingredient: 1 loaf French bread, cut into 1/4-inch slices + 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil + 8 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + <U+2153> cup chopped fresh basil + 1 ounce Parmesan cheese, freshly grated + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon good quality balsamic vinegar + 2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil + ¼ teaspoon kosher salt + ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

name: Best Bruschetta Ever
summary: This is a great garlicky bruschetta recipe. Serve it on slices of French bread. It's a wonderful accompaniment to tomato pastas.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 2 cups
ingredient: 2 tomatoes, cubed + 1 teaspoon dried basil + 4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 clove garlic, crushed + seasoning salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Artichoke Bruschetta
summary: This is a great bruschetta recipe based on an artichoke dip. It's always a huge hit! Try adding spinach or tomatoes!
ingredient: 1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped + ½ cup grated Romano cheese + <U+2153> cup finely chopped red onion + 5 tablespoons mayonnaise + 1 French baguette, cut into 1/3 inch thick slices

name: Tomato and Ricotta Salata Bruschetta
summary: This tomato bruschetta with ricotta salata is a perfect appetizer for dinner parties and a definite crowd pleaser.
ingredient: 1 loaf Italian bread, cut into 1/2-inch diagonal slices + 6 cloves garlic, halved + 6 medium tomatoes, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch pieces + 1 (4 ounce) package ricotta salata, cut into 1/2-inch pieces + 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil + 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar + 1 tablespoon finely chopped red onion + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Ali's Amazing Bruschetta
summary: This bruschetta will turn out every time you make it. Use small slices of bread for a unique appetizer, or serve with Italian dishes.
ingredient: 2 large tomatoes, coarsely chopped + ½ sweet onion, chopped + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh basil + 2 teaspoons chopped fresh parsley + ½ (1 pound) loaf Italian bread, cut into 1 inch slices + ¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese

name: Truffle Bruschetta
summary: I love the unique and delicate flavor of truffles. This recipe highlights the truffle flavor in a creamy texture spread. The appetizer will fill your home with a lovely aroma and presents well on a platter. Mushroom lovers beware! This appetizer spread can be made ahead and stored in the fridge until you are ready to for your guests.
ingredient: ¼ cup black truffle-infused olive oil, divided + 1 (10 ounce) package crimini mushrooms, sliced + ¼ cup diced red bell pepper + ¼ cup minced flat-leaf parsley + 2 cloves garlic, pressed, or more to taste + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + salt and ground black pepper to taste + ½ large baguette, sliced into thin rounds

name: Burrata Bruschetta with Figs
summary: I can't guarantee you'll be able to find Burrata and fresh Black Mission figs, but if you can, you really must give this a try. I'll tell you right now that there really isn't a substitute for this heavenly cheese.
ingredient: 12 Black Mission figs, halved lengthwise + 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar + 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil + 6 ounces Burrata cheese, thickly sliced + 6 (1/2 inch thick) slices Italian bread, toasted + sea salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Chef John's Grilled Swordfish Bruschetta
summary: There are two keys to this recipe. First, add enough oil and vinegar to your tomatoes to make a good amount of 'sauce' with which to douse the grilled fish and bread. Second, grill the bread very well over the coals. It should be golden brown with distinctive charred grill marks. The bitter hit from these stripes of charred bread actually makes the tomatoes even sweeter and more delicious.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: 1 cup cherry tomato halves + ¼ cup balsamic vinegar + ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil + 2 tablespoons thinly sliced basil + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 6 slices French bread + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 swordfish steaks + 1 teaspoon grapeseed oil

name: Bruschette al Lardo di Colonnata
summary: Lardo is not for everybody, but if you like it you will love it on warm toasted bread. This bruschetta is true indulgence!
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 slices
ingredient: 1 clove garlic, halved, divided + 1 pound cherry tomatoes, halved + 1 bunch fresh rosemary, minced + 1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil + 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes + 1 pinch salt + 1 loaf crusty Italian bread, sliced and toasted + 7 ounces lardo (such as Lardo di Colonnata) + freshly ground pink peppercorns to taste

name: Nikol's Garlic Bruschetta
summary: Bruschetta makeover is what I call it. The flavor combination with the tomatoes and cream cheese is perfection. This appetizer goes a long way - another crowd pleaser, that's for sure.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil + 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 7 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 sourdough baguette, cut into 1/2 inch thick slices + 1 (4 ounce) package semi-soft cheese with garlic and herbs (such as Alouette®)

name: Strawberry Goat Cheese Bruschetta
summary: The way the tangy, slightly salty goat cheese works with the syrupy, balsamic-coated strawberries and crispy, charred bread is a thing of beauty.
ingredient: ½ cup balsamic vinegar + 12 slices Italian bread + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 pound strawberries, washed and diced + 2 teaspoons fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving + 1 cup goat cheese, room temperature + salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

name: Chicken and Sun-Dried Tomato Bruschetta
summary: This recipe is the definition of versatility - if the weather's mild, use the grill outside to prepare this appetizer. In colder months, use your oven instead. The amount of ingredients for this recipe can be scaled back or multiplied to accommodate any range of party guests. You can also alter the amount of most of the ingredients according to your personal preference. You'll enjoy this variation on regular old bruschetta appetizers!
ingredient: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1<U+2009>¼ cups Italian salad dressing, divided + 4 cups fresh spinach, torn + <U+2153> cup crumbled feta cheese + 8 sun-dried tomatoes, packed without oil, chopped + 1 (1 pound) loaf focaccia bread, cut into 1/2-inch thick slices + ¼ cup olive oil

name: Double Tomato Bruschetta
summary: A delicious and easy appetizer. The balsamic vinegar gives it a little bite. Dried basil can be substituted but it is best with fresh.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 7 mins,additional: 13 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 6 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped + ½ cup sun-dried tomatoes, packed in oil + 3 cloves minced garlic + ¼ cup olive oil + 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar + ¼ cup fresh basil, stems removed + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 French baguette + 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Strawberry Goat Cheese Bruschetta
summary: The way the tangy, slightly salty goat cheese works with the syrupy, balsamic-coated strawberries and crispy, charred bread is a thing of beauty.
ingredient: ½ cup balsamic vinegar + 12 slices Italian bread + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 pound strawberries, washed and diced + 2 teaspoons fresh thyme leaves, plus more for serving + 1 cup goat cheese, room temperature + salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

name: Easy Bruschetta
summary: I always serve this as a starter at dinner parties. Everyone loves it because it is so light and tasty.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: 1 French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch thick circles + 8 plum tomatoes, diced + 1 cup chopped fresh basil + ½ red onion, minced + freshly ground black pepper + 3 cloves garlic

name: Strawberry Bruschetta
summary: This is a delicious variation of the popular tomato based appetizer. The strawberries are warm and sweet and the sugar is caramelized and crunchy! Your guests will love it!
ingredient: 24 slices French baguette + 1 tablespoon butter, softened + 2 cups chopped fresh strawberries + ¼ cup white sugar, or as needed

name: Bruschetta III
summary: This is a bruschetta recipe I came up with for a dinner party.
ingredient: 1 French baguette + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, thinly sliced + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 pinch ground white pepper + 1 (8 ounce) package sliced mozzarella cheese + 1 (6 ounce) package sliced provolone cheese

name: Bruschetta al Pomodoro
summary: A great summer appetizer featuring fresh tomato salsa on toasted Italian bread.
ingredient: 8 seeded, chopped roma (plum) tomatoes + 5 leaves chopped fresh basil + 2 cloves minced garlic + 1 pinch dried oregano + 1 dash crushed red pepper + 1 pinch salt + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 (1 pound) loaf French or Italian-style bread

name: Hunt's® Easy Tomato Bruschetta
summary: Classic bruschetta made with simple ingredients of petite diced tomatoes, basil, and garlic.
ingredient: 1 (18-inch) French baguette, cut into 3/4-inch slices + ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, divided + 1 (14.5 ounce) can Hunt's® Petite Diced Tomatoes, drained + <U+2153> cup chopped fresh basil + 2 teaspoons minced garlic + ¼ teaspoon kosher salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Tomato Bruschetta
summary: This recipe has been modified slightly over tim, but is always a winner, whether for an appetizer or main dish. It even works with winter store-bought tomatoes. The vinegar and basil bring out the flavors.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 large tomatoes, diced + ½ cup finely chopped red bell pepper + ¼ cup finely chopped red onion + ¼ cup balsamic vinegar + ¼ cup olive oil (Optional) + 10 leaves fresh basil, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, cut into 1/4-inch slices + ¼ cup olive oil (Optional) + ¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Becca's Bruschetta
summary: This is a great appetizer, especially for entertaining guests. It goes well with any Italian entree, doesn't require a lot of work, and it tastes wonderful!
ingredient: 1 loaf French bread, sliced + ½ sweet onion, finely chopped + 2 cloves garlic, chopped + 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained + 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano + 2 teaspoons chopped fresh basil + 2 teaspoons chopped fresh parsley + 2 large fresh tomatoes, diced + 1 cup crumbled feta cheese + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Bruschetta with Roasted Sweet Red Peppers
summary: This is a fast and easy appetizer or side dish which is colorful and delicious. You'll get compliments. My sons devour this in minutes!
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 16 ounces Italian bread + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 (16 ounce) jar marinated roasted sweet red peppers + 3 cloves garlic, chopped + 1 tomato, seeded and chopped + 1 cup chopped fresh basil + 1 onion, chopped (Optional) + 3 teaspoons balsamic vinegar

name: Russian Tomato Salad Bruschetta
summary: Paired with sweet onions, dressed with a simple, tangy, creamy sauce, and served on charred bread, this is one of the most delicious uses of fresh summer tomatoes you will ever experience.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 clove garlic, crushed + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 tablespoons plain yogurt + ¼ cup sour cream, or to taste + ½ cup thinly sliced sweet onion + 2 cups thinly sliced tomatoes + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste + 8 thick slices French bread + 1 tablespoon sliced fresh chives

name: Mushroom and Tomato Bruschetta
summary: Wonderful for an appetizer before a pasta meal and great paired with a glass of Chianti. Feel free to add your own touches to taste!
ingredient: 1 loaf Italian bread, cut into 3/4-inch thick slices + ½ cup olive oil + ½ pound diced fresh mushrooms + 5 green onions, minced + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley + 3 large tomatoes, diced + 1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar + 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Best Ever Bruschetta!
summary: This is a fail proof version of bruschetta! They turn out so yummy, I can't keep them on the plate for more then 15 minutes. When I make this recipe, the pieces don't see the next day. No Complaints about this recipe!
ingredient: 4 English muffins, split + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil + 4 large fresh tomatoes, peeled and chopped + 8 black olives, pitted and halved + 1 tablespoon tomato paste + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 teaspoons lemon juice + 1 teaspoon honey + 4 slices mozzarella cheese, halved + salt and pepper to taste

name: Papaya Bruschetta
summary: I love making this as an appetizer if we're planning on having a heavy dinner. It's a light, healthful treat made with papaya, tomato, and red pepper in a lovely papaya seed dressing. Awesome with pieces of fresh baguette, crackers, or tortilla chips.
ingredient: 1 small papaya + 5 medium Roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + ½ medium red onion, diced + 1 medium red bell pepper, seeded and diced + ¼ cup chopped fresh basil leaves + 2 tablespoons white sugar + ¼ cup red wine vinegar + ¼ cup vegetable oil + ½ teaspoon mustard powder + 2 stalks green onions, chopped + 1 (16 inch) French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch pieces

name: Apple Goat Cheese Bruschetta
summary: If you like sweet and savory, this one is for you. Easy to make and a beautiful presentation.
ingredient: ¼ cup crumbled goat cheese + 1 Fuji apple - peeled, cored, and chopped + ¾ teaspoon chopped fresh thyme + ½ teaspoon chopped fresh oregano + ¼ teaspoon coarse ground black pepper + 8 thin slices French bread

name: Mango Bruschetta
summary: This bruschetta is made with mango, basil, and Romano cheese, which yields an interesting combination of sweet, sour, and peppery flavors.
ingredient: 1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, cut into 1/2 inch pieces + 1 mango - peeled, seeded and diced + 1 tablespoon fresh basil, minced + 1 cup grated Romano cheese

name: Eggplant and Tomato Caponata
summary: Another form of bruschetta, this is a great low calorie and healthy appetizer. Serve bruschetta-style, on toasted French bread and topped with Parmesan cheese. Caponata can be frozen in resealable bags or in pint jars.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 Japanese eggplant, cut into 1/2-inch cubes + 1 yellow onion, chopped + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 (14.5 ounce) can fire-roasted tomatoes (such as Hunt's®) + <U+2153> cup red wine + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons capers + 2 teaspoons dried oregano + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon ground allspice + 1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder + ½ teaspoon white sugar + 1 bay leaf

name: Jen's Tomato Arugula Bruschetta
summary: This is a wonderful combination of ripe plum tomatoes, Parmesan cheese, fresh garlic and arugula that together pack a punch when served on a slice of French bread.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 32,Yield: 4 cups
ingredient: 20 roma (plum) tomatoes + ¼ cup olive oil + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 8 cloves garlic, minced + 1 bunch arugula - rinsed, dried and chopped + 20 sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained and chopped + 3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese

name: Tomato-Garlic Bread
summary: This bread goes great with any Italian or Mediterranean meal. I've also cut the bread into smaller pieces and served it as an appetizer.
ingredient: 4 large fresh tomatoes, coarsely chopped + 2 cloves garlic, minced + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+2153> lemon, zested + 1 teaspoon brown sugar + 1 loaf ciabatta bread, split in half horizontally + <U+2153> lemon, juiced + 2 tablespoons olive oil + black pepper to taste

name: Healthier Double Tomato Bruschetta
summary: A delicious and easy appetizer that's made healthier with whole grain bread, reduced-fat cheese, and less oil.
ingredient: 1 loaf whole grain artisan bread, cut into 3/4-inch slices + 6 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped + ½ cup ready-to-eat sun-dried tomatoes, chopped + 3 cloves minced garlic + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar + ¼ cup fresh basil, stems removed and leaves chopped + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 cup shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese

name: Bruschetta with Peas and Mint
summary: This is a fun take on bruschetta with peas, shallots, and mint that I invented one year when my neighbor brought me a bunch of fresh peas. I have also made it with frozen peas.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter + 4 shallots, minced + ¾ cup fresh or frozen peas + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint + 6 slices ciabatta bread + 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed + 1 clove garlic, peeled

name: Fantastic Fennel Bruschetta
summary: This bruschetta is really delicious, a little different than the average bruschetta. It always gets devoured around my house, or wherever I take it. The fennel seed really makes the dish.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 20 servings
ingredient: 6 large tomatoes, diced + ½ large sweet Bermuda onion, diced + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons fennel seed + <U+2153> cup minced fresh basil + <U+2153> cup extra-virgin olive oil + salt and pepper to taste + 1 (20 ounce) loaf French bread, sliced 1/2-inch thick + ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, for brushing

name: Caprese Grilled Bread
summary: Grilled bread with caprese toppings is a a quick and easy appetizer or side dish.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste + ½ French baguette, halved lengthwise + 1 clove garlic, minced + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 tomato, thinly sliced + 1 teaspoon dried parsley + 1 teaspoon dried basil + ½ (8 ounce) package mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced + 6 fresh basil leaves + 1 sprig fresh parsley (Optional)

name: Sweet Summer Fruit Bruschetta
summary: In this sweet and fruity appetizer, baguette slices are broiled with cinnamon and sugar, topped with a juicy mix of fresh California peaches and plums and finished with chopped glazed walnuts.
ingredient: 24 slice (blank)s 1/4-inch baguette slices + ¼ cup butter, softened + 6 tablespoons brown sugar, divided + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ cup chopped peaches and/or nectarines + ½ cup chopped plums + 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice + 2 tablespoons chopped glazed walnuts

name: Baked Chicken Wings
summary: Easy, crispy, and delicious. I normally serve with a side of rice, chicken gravy, and a vegetable or salad.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 10 wings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil + 3 cloves garlic, pressed + 2 teaspoons chili powder + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 10 chicken wings

name: Grill Master Chicken Wings
summary: This grilled wing recipe is always a hit! I grill them up before a party and keep them hot in a low oven. I always use Frank's RedHot sauce. It's got lots of flavor and isn't too spicy.
ingredient: 3 pounds chicken wings, cut apart at joints, wing tips discarded + ½ cup soy sauce + ½ cup Italian-style salad dressing + ¼ cup butter + ¼ cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®), or to taste + 1 teaspoon soy sauce

name: Air Fryer Balsamic-Glazed Chicken Wings
summary: Put a big stack of napkins on the table because once you start eating these crispy, sticky, sweet glazed chicken wings, you won't want to stop. This can be an appetizer for four or main course for two.
ingredient: cooking spray + 3 tablespoons baking powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons freshly ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon paprika + 2 pounds chicken wings, split and tips discarded + <U+2153> cup water + <U+2153> cup balsamic vinegar + 2 tablespoons soy sauce + 2 tablespoons honey + 2 tablespoons chili sauce (such as Heinz®) + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon water + ¼ teaspoon cornstarch + 1 green onion, thinly sliced + ¼ teaspoon toasted sesame seeds

name: Sweet Chili and Orange Marmalade Glazed Chicken Wings
summary: It doesn't get much easier than these three-ingredient sticky sweet wings. A combination of orange marmalade and sweet chili sauce make for some of the most addictive wings you've ever had.
ingredient: 2 pounds chicken wing pieces, drumettes and flats + ½ cup orange marmalade + ¼ cup sweet chili sauce

name: Air-Fried Korean Chicken Wings
summary: These Korean-style air-fried wings are crispy, sticky and spicy. Cooked in an air fryer they are ready in less than 30 minutes. They are perfect as an appetizer or add some rice and veggies on the side and you have a balanced meal.
ingredient: ¼ cup hot honey (such as Mike's Hot Honey®) + 3 tablespoons gochujang (Korean hot pepper paste) + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 1 tablespoon soy sauce + 1 teaspoon lemon juice + 2 teaspoons minced garlic + 1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger root + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon black pepper + ¼ cup finely chopped green onions (green part only) + 2 pounds chicken wings + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon onion powder + ½ teaspoon black pepper + ½ cup cornstarch + 2 tablespoons chopped green onions + 1 teaspoon sesame seeds

name: Instant Pot® Buffalo Wings
summary: Buffalo wings made simple in an Instant Pot® and without the fry. The Instant Pot® cooks these to perfection. They hold together for easy handling but as soon as you sink your teeth into them, they are fall-off-the-bone tender. Serve with carrot sticks, celery, and ranch if desired.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 2 pounds wings
ingredient: 1 cup water + 2 pounds chicken wings + ¾ cup buffalo wing sauce + 2 teaspoons dry ranch dressing mix

name: Indian Masala Chicken Wings
summary: Marinate chicken wings ahead of time in a simple homemade masala paste for an explosion of spicy Indian flavors. Serve with lemon wedges and steamed basmati rice.

name: Ram (Rosemary, Ancho, Molasses) Wings
summary: Flavored with rosemary, ancho, and molasses, these chicken wings honor this year's Super Bowl® teams, one being the Los Angeles Rams and the other which shall not be named. You'll use the easiest of methods to produce the most crowd-pleasing, finger-messing 'sticky wings.' The technique simply involves soaking wings in a sweet, spicy marinade, baking them wet, and then tossing them with a finishing glaze.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 4 hrs 5 mins,total: 5 hrs,Servings: 6,Yield: 2 1/2 pounds of wings
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wing sections + 2 teaspoons vegetable oil + 3 teaspoons kosher salt + 1 tablespoon minced fresh rosemary + 2 tablespoons ancho chile powder + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + 3 tablespoons white vinegar + 1 tablespoon molasses, or more to taste + 2 teaspoons molasses + 1 tablespoon honey + 1 teaspoon ancho chile powder + 1 pinch salt + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 1 lime, juiced + 1 lime, cut into wedges

name: Hickory Smoked Chicken Wings
summary: Tender hickory-smoked chicken wings without the wait.

ingredient: 4 pounds frozen chicken wings + 1 tablespoon paprika + 1 teaspoon chili powder + 1 teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + hickory wood chips + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce, or as needed

name: Caramelized Chicken Wings
summary: Yummy chicken wings that are so easy to fix on the stove top or in an electric skillet.

ingredient: 1 cup water + ½ cup white sugar + <U+2153> cup soy sauce + 2 tablespoons peanut butter + 1 tablespoon honey + 2 teaspoons wine vinegar + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 12 large chicken wings, tips removed and wings cut in half at joint + 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, or to taste (Optional)

name: Boneless Buffalo Wings
summary: These boneless wings are a great way to have chicken. I had these at a pub and fell in love with the taste. They're a nice change from your regular chicken wings. Serve with blue cheese dressing for dipping.
ingredient: oil for deep frying + 1 cup unbleached all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ½ teaspoon paprika + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + 1 egg + 1 cup milk + 3 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2-inch strips + ¼ cup hot pepper sauce + 1 tablespoon butter

name: Crispy Honey Sriracha Chicken Wings
summary: This honey sriracha sauce is quite delicious and incredibly simple, but merely an afterthought here. The real star of the show is the strange, but effective technique of coating the wings with a baking powder-laced spice rub before baking. Through the magic of chemical reactions, the surface of the chicken becomes bone-dry, and eventually crisps up to something very similar to what would come out of a deep fryer.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons baking powder + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon smoked paprika + 2<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wing sections + <U+2153> cup honey + <U+2153> cup sriracha sauce + 1 tablespoon seasoned rice vinegar + ¼ teaspoon sesame oil + 1 pinch sesame seeds, or as desired

name: Simple Marinated Chicken Wings
summary: These are my husband's favorite kind of wings. Easy to make and delicious. They taste even better if you double the sauce and marinate for 24 hours.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 2 hrs,total: 3 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 5 tablespoons soy sauce + ¼ cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons dry sherry + 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + 24 chicken wings

name: Dry-Rub Air-Fried Chicken Wings
summary: Yummy chicken wings made from a Memphis-style dry rub.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon dark brown sugar + 1 tablespoon sweet paprika + ½ tablespoon kosher salt + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon onion powder + 1 teaspoon poultry seasoning + ½ teaspoon mustard powder + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 8 chicken wings, or more as needed

name: Teriyaki Chicken Wings
summary: These wings are a hit at every party. I made 10 pounds of these wings for a recent get-together, and not one wing was left at the end of the night. Delicious!

name: Oven-Baked Chicken Wings
summary: This is my favorite way to eat oven-baked Buffalo chicken wings. Tons of flavor! Serve with blue cheese dressing on the side.

name: Chinese Chicken Wings
summary: My late mother's recipe for chicken wings for potlucks. Now I am asked to bring this dish to parties.

ingredient: 2 cups soy sauce + 2 cups brown sugar + 2 tablespoons garlic powder + 5 pounds chicken wings, split and tips discarded

name: Amazing and Easy Chicken Wings
summary: These chicken wings are surprisingly delicious for how few ingredients are involved! I made them for the first time at a football party, and within 10 minutes everyone had eaten all 5 pounds!

ingredient: 2 cups brown sugar + 1 cup yellow mustard + ¼ cup soy sauce + 5 pounds chicken wings, cut into thirds and tips discarded

name: Buffalo Chicken Wings I
summary: Let your palate fly away on wings of fire - easy, spicy buffalo wings!
ingredient: 1 quart vegetable oil for deep frying + 24 chicken wings, tips removed and wings cut in half at joint + 4 tablespoons butter + 1 tablespoon distilled white vinegar + 5 tablespoons hot pepper sauce + salt and pepper to taste

name: Chicken Lollipops
summary: They're chicken lollipops - a succulent treat that lives up to the name!
ingredient: 10 chicken wings + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon soy sauce + ½ teaspoon chili powder + 1 drop red food coloring + 1 teaspoon distilled white vinegar + 1 teaspoon chopped garlic + 1 teaspoon finely chopped green chile peppers + 4 tablespoons cornstarch

name: Awesome Slow Cooker Buffalo Wings
summary: I made these wings for Super Bowl®; they were gone in five minutes and super-easy to make! Serve with ranch or blue cheese dressing.
process: cook: 4 hrs 30 mins,total: 4 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) bottle hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®) + ½ cup butter + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 2 teaspoons dried oregano + 2 teaspoons onion powder + 2 teaspoons garlic powder + 1 (4 pound) frozen chicken wing sections, thawed + ½ cup butter + 1 (12 ounce) bottle hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)

name: Jerk Chicken Wings
summary: These jerk chicken wings were so flavorful, so different, and so additively delicious, that I may have eaten my last Buffalo wing. Okay, I didn't mean that, but these really are amazing; a perfect balance of sweet, sour, salty, and spicy. I'm usually pretty casual about you changing my recipes, but I'm going to have to insist you not change any of the key ingredients, which are, every one of them.

ingredient: ½ yellow onion, chopped + ½ cup green onions, sliced + 6 cloves garlic + 3 habanero peppers, seeded and chopped + 2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + 2 teaspoons ground allspice + 1 teaspoon dried thyme + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 3 tablespoons soy sauce + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + <U+2153> cup lime juice + 3 pounds chicken wing drumettes + cooking spray

name: Sweet Spicy Wings
summary: Sweet and spicy wings! You can make two batches of the sauce, use one as a marinade before grilling the chicken, and pour the second batch over the chicken after it is grilled. It is not mandatory to do it this way, just better!
ingredient: 6 pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded + 1<U+2009>½ cups Louisiana-style hot sauce + ¾ cup butter + 1 cup honey + 1 pinch garlic salt + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste

summary: Wings and drumettes, deep-fried to a golden brown and coated with hot sauce. Yummy! Yummy! If you like it hotter, by all means dump more hot sauce on. Serve with ranch or blue cheese dressing. Enjoy!

summary: Breaded chicken wings that consist of bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, melted butter, and a cookie sheet.

name: Smoked Chicken Hot Wings

process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 8 mins,total: 1 hr 23 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground black pepper + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons Cajun seasoning + 2<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wings + <U+2154> cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®) + ½ cup butter + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons white vinegar + ½ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + 1 pinch salt to taste

name: 3-Ingredient Baked BBQ Chicken Wings
summary: This BBQ sauce is unexplainable. Its not a rich BBQ but not quite a honey BBQ either. You'll love these!

name: Garlic and Parmesan Chicken Wings
summary: The trick to keeping these oven-baked chicken wings crispy, is parboiling the wings in a flavorful liquid, which helps season the chicken and produce a surface texture in the oven that your guests will swear came straight out of a deep fryer.

ingredient: cooking spray + 3 quarts cold water + <U+2153> cup balsamic vinegar + ¼ cup salt + 1 bay leaf + 1 teaspoon dried thyme + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1 teaspoon dried rosemary + 8 cloves garlic, minced + 1 pinch salt + 3 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed + 1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper + 2 teaspoons red pepper flakes, or to taste + 4 pounds chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded + 2 tablespoons fine bread crumbs + 1 cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, divided

name: Awesome Crispy Baked Chicken Wings
summary: Incredibly tasty variation of baked chicken wings with no marinade - just butter, garlic, and herbs. Great for the low-carb eater!

summary: These sweet and sticky chicken wings are sure to be a hit with the whole family. The sauce is so much better than store bought jarred sauce. Serve with fried rice and stir fried veggies. Enjoy!

name: Air Fryer Old Bay® Chicken Wings
summary: Old Bay® is a seasoning most people think is for seafood. But it's also a great seasoning for poultry. These wings are crispy and lower in calories because they are air fried and tasty thanks to the addition of Old Bay® seasoning.

They have two flavors of wings; Buffalo-style, and sweet and sour. I came up with what turned out to be a deliciously sticky, ginger and garlic glaze. I really hope you give these a try.

name: Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Wings

name: BBQ Chicken Wings

name: Baked Maryland Lump Crab Cakes
summary: These baked crab cakes are authentic Maryland-style crab cakes. Many people claim to make a true Maryland crab cake, but I have lived by the Chesapeake Bay on Kent Island, MD, nearly my whole life and can say that this recipe with all lump meat with almost no filler tastes incredible!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 crab cakes
ingredient: ¼ cup bread crumbs + 2 teaspoons seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay™ + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon dried parsley + 1 teaspoon mustard powder + <U+215B> teaspoon black pepper + ¾ cup cholesterol-free egg product + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + 1 tablespoon mayonnaise + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 pound lump crab meat

name: Cajun Crab Cakes (No Breadcrumbs)
summary: Two of the most crucial ingredients used in New Orleans cooking are Cajun spice and local seafood! Crab has always been my favorite type of shellfish, but I have never really cared much for crab cakes. The overpowering presence of seasoned breadcrumbs used in most recipes interferes with the sweet and delicate flavors of the fresh lump crabmeat. After years of experimenting with many of New Orleans' most famous crab cake recipes, I have created a flavorful, mouth-watering, delicious piece of work! The key is to use a small amount of crumbled crackers instead of breadcrumbs. I hope you enjoy!

name: True Maryland Crab Cakes

summary: To make this simple remoulade sauce, combine mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, fresh dill, pickles, minced garlic, capers, lemon juice, and a dash of cayenne. This version has some body to it. It's easy and so much better than store-bought versions. Try it with crab cakes or pretty much any grilled, broiled, or pan-seared fish.

name: Best Ever Crab Cakes
summary: Learn how to cook crab cakes with this easy and fast recipe that makes some of the best I've ever eaten! Serve with coarse mustard on the plate or your favorite mustard sauce.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 crab cakes
ingredient: 1 egg + 3 tablespoons mayonnaise + 1 tablespoon minced green onions + 4 teaspoons lemon juice + 1 teaspoon dried tarragon + <U+215B> teaspoon red pepper flakes + 8 ounces crabmeat + ½ cup crushed buttery round crackers + 1 tablespoon butter

name: Baked Maryland Lump Crab Cakes
summary: These baked crab cakes are authentic Maryland-style crab cakes. Many people claim to make a true Maryland crab cake, but I have lived by the Chesapeake Bay on Kent Island, MD, nearly my whole life and can say that this recipe with all lump meat with almost no filler tastes incredible!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 crab cakes
ingredient: ¼ cup bread crumbs + 2 teaspoons seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay™ + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon dried parsley + 1 teaspoon mustard powder + <U+215B> teaspoon black pepper + ¾ cup cholesterol-free egg product + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + 1 tablespoon mayonnaise + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 pound lump crab meat

name: Maryland Crab Cakes I
summary: Growing up near the Chesapeake Bay you learn that crabs are as valuable as gold. My mom made crab cakes every Friday in the summer months, but I like my recipe just a tad better. Don't tell mom.

name: Lori's Famous Crab Cakes
summary: These crab cakes are just the best. I make these often at home, and I make a smaller appetizer size for parties. They are always a hit. They are easy and delicious. I won't eat crab cakes out anymore! Serve with fresh squeezed lemon and tartar sauce!

summary: These crab cakes are rich and moist with lots of meat and very little filling. Typical of finer restaurants!

summary: Perfect Crab Cakes -- heavy on crab and light on filler -- anchor a dinner. Be sure to form them compactly so the cakes hold together during frying.

summary: Easy, restaurant-grade crab cakes with panko. Serve them warm with lemon wedges, cocktail sauce, or tartar sauce alongside a salad.

name: Ranch-Style Deviled Eggs

name: Stuffed Eggs

name: Everything Deviled Eggs

name: Unbelievably Good Fruit Dip
summary: This creamy fruit dip has only three ingredients. If you want a simple dip that's the perfect complement to fruit, especially strawberries, please try this one.

name: World's Best Cream Cheese and Pineapple Dip
summary: I have been making this dip for over 25 years and it is always the first to be eaten at parties. Delicious! Serve in a dipping bowl and eat with crisps of French bread.

name: Baby Shower Raspberry Dip
summary: This easy, sweet dip is excellent on a fruit platter. I usually serve this dip at baby showers because it has a lovely pastel pink color. The taste can easily be altered by using your choice of extract flavorings. Also, the dip is thick enough that it can also be used as a tea sandwich filling. This is my own creation.

summary: A cream cheese dip that's loved by all (unless they're counting calories)! You can substitute reduced-fat cream cheese if you wish. It's been my favorite since it was shared with me in college! Enjoy with apples, bananas, oranges, pears, pineapple, strawberries, etc.

summary: This is a fruit dip that's very easy! Blend your favorite yogurt flavor with frozen whipped topping and dip! I use slices of Granny Smith, Golden and Red delicious apples, white & red grapes, orange sections, strawberries, kiwi fruit and pineapple chunks for a platter.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed + 1 (8 ounce) container yogurt

name: Lemony Cream Cheese Fruit Dip
summary: This recipe is the result of wanting fruit dip and not having most of the ingredients. When I got the ingredients and made it according to original, I discovered I preferred this one to the original. Can be served right away or chilled firm.
ingredient: ½ cup white sugar + ¼ cup water + ¼ teaspoon lemon juice + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + ½ cup sifted confectioners' sugar + 1 egg white + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened

name: Creamy Vanilla Fruit Dip
summary: This is the best fruit dip ever and so simple. You can easily reduce the calories by using the low-fat whipped topping and cream cheese without reducing the flavor. Serve this with a fresh fruit salad or with fruit and small shortbread cookies. It's perfect for baby and wedding showers!
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup confectioners' sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: Creamy Strawberry Fruit Dip
summary: This is the fruit dip that Farmer Jack puts in with your fruit tray when you order it in the deli. Its creamy and delicious and i always have to make an extra batch...quick and easy to make.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) container blended strawberry yogurt + 1 (8 ounce) tub frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed + 5 teaspoons strawberry flavored Jell-O® mix + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 2 tablespoons strawberry flavored cream cheese (Optional) + 2 fresh strawberries

name: Easy Fruit Dip
summary: Easy and delicious fruit dip. Always a hit, and the kids LOVE IT. Slice up a selection of fruit and snacks to serve with the dip. My family likes apples, strawberries, cantaloupe, grapes, pretzels, raisin bread, or muffins.
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 16 ounces marshmallow creme + 1 tablespoon maraschino cherry juice

name: Casey and Leigh's Delightful Fruit Dip
summary: Sweet creamy dip for fresh fruit -- strawberries, cantaloupe, pineapple, apple -- This is a great one for the kids to eat and to make. My girls love making and serving this to company.
ingredient: 4 ounces cream cheese + 1<U+2009><U+215B> cups marshmallow fluff + ½ cup vanilla yogurt + 1 dash food coloring

name: Coffee Flavored Fruit Dip
summary: This is a creamy, luscious, coffee-flavored dip for fruit -- strawberries, tart apples, pineapple, grapes, etc. It's perfect for bridal or baby showers, and it's quick and easy to make.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + ½ cup brown sugar + <U+2153> cup coffee-flavored liqueur + 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: Creamy Dip for Fruit
summary: This is a recipe a friend gave me. I have a few variations of it, too.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 32,Yield: 2 cups
ingredient: 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + ¼ cup packed brown sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla + 2 tablespoons milk

name: Lemon-Poppy Seed Fruit Dip
summary: This easy, creamy, fresh-tasting dip will give your fresh fruit tray some extra zip. Try it with any combination of fresh fruit. I especially like it with mangos and bananas.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + 3 tablespoons frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed + 2 teaspoons poppy seeds + 1 pinch salt + 1 slice lemon

name: Creamy Fruit Dip
summary: A sweet rich and creamy dip for prepared fruit. Try serving with bananas, strawberries, kiwi or your favorite type of melon. Use toothpicks to skewer the fruit slices.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (7 ounce) jar marshmallow creme + 3 drops vanilla extract

name: Easy Strawberry Fruit Dip
summary: Great with grapes, any berries, melon, and pineapple. I usually cut up only fruits that won't brown, if serving at parties. Kids and adults like this one!
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package strawberry-flavored cream cheese + 1 (13 ounce) jar marshmallow creme

name: Marshmallow Dip for Strawberries
summary: Makes lots, but you can alter the quantities to suit how many you are cooking for.
ingredient: 1 cup marshmallows + 1 tablespoon water + 1 cup cream cheese

name: Pink Fruit Dip
summary: This quick and easy dip for fruit was given to me by my aunt many years ago. It is a hit whenever I serve it.
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 32,Yield: 4 cups
ingredient: 2 (6 ounce) containers vanilla yogurt + 1 cup mayonnaise + 1 cup sour cream + ¼ cup white sugar + ¼ cup grenadine

name: Healthy Peanut Butter Fruit Dip
summary: A healthier, lower-fat and lower-calorie version of peanut butter fruit dip. Great with crisp apples! Use soon after prep, especially if using flax or chia seeds.
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) container vanilla Greek-style yogurt + 2 tablespoons peanut butter + 2 tablespoons honey + <U+215B> teaspoon ground cinnamon + 2 tablespoons chia seeds (Optional)

name: Simple Fruit Dip
summary: This is the best recipe to have around when there are people that may be dieting during the holidays, to make it lite just use reduced fat cream cheese.
ingredient: 8 ounces cream cheese + 2 tablespoons white sugar + <U+2153> cup packed brown sugar + 1 teaspoon caramelized sugar

name: Tequila Fruit Dip and Dressing
summary: Use this creamy and tangy dip for dipping fruit or as a fruit salad dressing. It's excellent for strawberries. Most people don't know there's tequila in it. They only know that it is really yummy!
ingredient: 1 cup sour cream + 2 tablespoons tequila + 2 tablespoons sweetened lime juice + ¼ cup sugar

name: Marshmallow-Peanut Butter-Banana Dip
summary: This creamy dip is a great snack with fresh fruit such as apples, strawberries, pears, bananas, but also a treat with small cookies such as mini Oreos® or graham crackers. Refrigerate any leftover dip.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese, softened + ½ cup creamy peanut butter + 1 (7 ounce) jar marshmallow cream + ½ ripe banana, mashed + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Simple Strawberry Salsa
summary: This is a perfect alternative to plain fruit or sugary snacks! Can be served with multi-grain or cinnamon-sugar tortilla chips.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons white sugar + 1 cup finely chopped strawberries + 1 (8 ounce) can unsweetened crushed pineapple, drained + 3 kiwis, peeled and finely chopped + 1 naval orange, peeled and cut into small pieces

name: Cheesecake Dip for Fruit
summary: If you are having trouble with kids eating fruit or just looking for a yummy dip, you'll love this easy recipe. Serve with any sliced fruit you like. My favorites are grapes, banana, apples, pineapple chunks, mango slices, strawberries, peach slices, etc.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (7 ounce) jar marshmallow fluff + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Fruit Dip III
summary: This creamy, marshmallowy, orangey dip is great for fruits!
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 2 tablespoons orange juice + ¼ cup confectioners' sugar + 1 (7 ounce) jar marshmallow creme

name: Poppy Seed Fruit Dip
summary: This is a decadent tasting fruit dip but is actually healthier than most fruit dips. It's especially delicious with strawberries, or even poured over a bowl of raspberries, blueberries, sliced peaches, etc.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) container Greek yogurt + 1 (1 ounce) package sugar free instant cheesecake-flavored pudding mix (such as Jell-O®) + ½ teaspoon poppy seeds + 6 tablespoons 1% milk

name: Brownie Batter Dip (aka Chocolate Hummus)
summary: At first I was skeptical of 'dessert' hummus. Then I tried some. I was hooked. It is awesome on apples, strawberries, pretzels and lots of other things.
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), rinsed and drained + ½ cup unsweetened dark cocoa powder + ½ cup white sugar + 3 tablespoons olive oil + 3 tablespoons creamy natural peanut butter + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon salt + 3 tablespoons water, or more if needed

name: Cheesecake Fruit Dip from Reddi-wip®
summary: An easy dessert recipe for a dip made of cream cheese, creamy vanilla pudding and Reddi-wip to serve with assorted fresh fruit.
ingredient: 4 ounces cream cheese + 1 (3.25 ounce) cup Snack Pack® Vanilla Pudding + 1<U+2009>¾ cups Reddi-wip® Original Dairy Whipped Topping + 2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar + 2 cups assorted fruit pieces for dipping (strawberries, grapes, cantaloupe, etc.)

name: Ruby Red Pretzel Dip
summary: Sweet cranberry sauce is spiced with holiday flavors in this festive dip for pretzels.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) can jellied cranberry sauce + ¾ cup white sugar + ¼ cup white vinegar + 1 teaspoon ground ginger + 1 teaspoon ground mustard + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon cold water + 1 dash red food coloring (Optional)

name: Apple Pie Dip
summary: Cream cheese, sweetened with brown sugar and spiked with apple pie spice, forms the base of this spread. Bits of red apple and pecans give it texture and add to the apple-pie-like flavor. Garnish as desired and serve with crackers.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese, softened + 1 tablespoon apple juice + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + ½ teaspoon apple pie spice + 1 red apple, chopped + ¼ cup chopped pecans

name: Vanilla-Maple Greek Yogurt Dip
summary: Incredibly simple, but incredibly appealing. Delicious dip for a variety of fresh fruit, but we also enjoy it as a dipping sauce for sweet potato fries.
ingredient: ½ cup low-fat vanilla Greek yogurt (such as Cabot®) + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons maple syrup + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Shelia's Dip
summary: Using cream cheese as a base, this dip is rounded out nicely with pineapple and crushed pecans. The recipe may be doubled. Serve this dip with vegetable slices or on bread.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 48,Yield: 61 cups
ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 2 (8 ounce) cans crushed pineapple, drained + ½ cup chopped green bell pepper + ½ cup chopped red bell pepper + 2 teaspoons garlic powder + 2 teaspoons seasoned salt + 2 tablespoons dried minced onion flakes + 1<U+2009>½ cups finely chopped pecans

name: Honey, Almond, and Citrus Fruit Dip
summary: Creamy, sweet, and slightly tangy dip for fruit--excellent for breakfast, brunch, dessert, or a snack. Serve with fruit of your choice for dipping such as apples, bananas, grapes, kiwi, mango, melon, oranges, pears, pineapples, or strawberries.
ingredient: 1 (5.3 ounce) container full-fat Greek yogurt + ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 2 tablespoons almond butter + 2 tablespoons orange juice + 1 tablespoon honey, or more to taste + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract (Optional)

name: Apple Almond Butter Dip
summary: A fruit and nut butter dip that gets a delicious caramel flavor from sweet dates.
ingredient: ¾ cup almond butter + ½ cup Almond Breeze Vanilla almondmilk + <U+2153> cup peeled, chopped apple + ½ teaspoon cinnamon + 4 large pitted Medjool dates

name: Amaretto Apple Dip
summary: Great flavorful amaretto dip. Perfect for fall apples.
ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 1<U+2009>½ cups brown sugar + 1 cup powdered sugar + 4 tablespoons amaretto liqueur + 2 tablespoons vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>¼ tablespoons milk

name: Guacamole
summary: You can make this avocado salad smooth or chunky depending on your tastes.
ingredient: 3 avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed + 1 lime, juiced + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup diced onion + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 pinch ground cayenne pepper (Optional)

name: Easy Guacamole
summary: Simply a quick recipe for tasty guacamole! Great with tortilla chips or as a topping for Mexican foods!
ingredient: 2 avocados + 1 small onion, finely chopped + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 ripe tomato, chopped + 1 lime, juiced + salt and pepper to taste

name: Chef John's Classic Guacamole
summary: There are few things as easy, healthy, and delicious as this ubiquitous dip. However, unless you're grinding your aromatic vegetation in a molcajete, or against a cutting board, you're really not tasting a classic guacamole. The flavors not only become more intense, but actually change in character. This is just what those bland, fatty, but delectable avocados need. That and a thoughtful seasoning of lime juice, and maybe some more salt.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons minced fresh serrano chili + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro, divided + ¼ cup finely diced white onion + ½ teaspoon kosher salt for grinding vegetables, plus more to taste + 4 large Hass avocados + 1 cup diced ripe tomatoes, drained (Optional) + 1 lime, juiced, or more to taste

name: LuvAnn's Guacamole
summary: This great dip is always the first to go at our barbeques. It's a simple guacamole, perfect for dipping tortilla chips or serving with tacos. To prevent browning, leave an avocado seed in it until serving.
ingredient: 2 avocados - peeled, pitted and diced + 2 teaspoons salt, or to taste + 1 large tomato, diced + 1 onion, diced + 2 jalapeno peppers, chopped + ½ tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro + 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice

name: Mango Guacamole
summary: A delicious guacamole that my mom used to make during the summer days when mangos were all over our hometown. It's sweet, tangy, and, like any good Mexican guacamole, spicy.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons minced white onion + 2 limes, juiced + 2 serrano chile peppers, or to taste + 2 limes, juiced + sea salt to taste + 4 ripe avocados, peeled and pitted + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 1 large mango - peeled, seeded, and chopped

name: Quick and Easy Guacamole
summary: I started making guacamole this way after eating at one of my student's mom's restaurant. I absolutely loved her guacamole, so I tried to recreate it.
ingredient: 2 avocados - peeled, pitted, and diced + 2 green onions, chopped + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro + 1 teaspoon seasoned salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon garlic, minced + ½ lime, juiced

name: Tomatillo Guacamole
summary: Not only does this dip have a kick, it's vibrant color will allure any adventurous taste buds. The first time I served this dip, it was gone in the 15 minutes.
ingredient: 3 avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed + 3 tomatillos, husked and chopped + 1 red onion, finely chopped + 3 roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and chopped + 1 tablespoon lime juice + 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes + 3 drops hot pepper sauce + salt and pepper to taste

name: Chunky Paleo Guacamole
summary: The recipe title pretty much sums it up! Very delicious!
ingredient: 2 ripe avocados, peeled and pitted + 1 lime, juiced + 1 jalapeno pepper, diced + 1 clove garlic, minced + ½ small onion, minced + 1 Roma tomato, seeded and diced + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Best Guacamole
summary: The real trick to great guacamole is to use good avocados. Make sure your avocados are ripe and of the Haas variety! Serve this dip with corn chips, or an array of fresh vegetables.
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 cups
ingredient: 2 avocados + ½ lemon, juiced + 2 tablespoons chopped onion + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 tablespoons olive oil

name: Easy Never Forgotten Guacamole
summary: This guacamole has been a hit at our house for years. Great for the Superbowl or any occasion. Sour cream and cream cheese make the guac extra creamy. Spice it up with crushed red pepper.
ingredient: 3 avocados - peeled, pitted and diced + 1 tablespoon sour cream + 2 (3 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 2 tablespoons salsa + 1 pinch salt + 1 dash ground black pepper + 1 dash garlic salt + 1 dash onion powder

name: Guacamole My Way
summary: Creamy avocados, onion and diced tomatoes combine to make the best dip for tortilla chips! This guacamole is also good as a condiment for sandwiches.
ingredient: 2 avocados from Mexico, peeled, pitted and diced + 2 Roma tomatoes, seeded and diced + 4 tablespoons finely diced onion + 3 cloves garlic, minced + ½ lime, juiced + ½ teaspoon salt, or to taste

name: Avocado-Spinach Dip
summary: Keep this creamy avocado spinach dip covered and chilled until ready to serve.
ingredient: 2 cups fresh spinach + 1 cup diced avocado + ½ cup reduced-fat sour cream + ¼ cup chopped red onion + 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice + 1 tablespoon chopped seeded jalapeno pepper + 1 large garlic clove + ½ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + hot sauce

name: Basic Guacamole Dip
summary: Serve this with tortilla or corn chips.
ingredient: 4 ripe avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed + 2 tomatoes, diced + 2 tablespoons minced onion + 1 tablespoon lemon juice

name: Corn and Black Bean Guacamole
summary: This is a hearty guacamole recipe that my friends request from me whenever we have a gathering! It's chunky and colorful and adds gusto to any Mexican dish! Serve with favorite tortilla chips and enjoy!
ingredient: ½ red bell pepper, minced + ½ red onion, minced + 2 cloves garlic, minced + ½ (15.25 ounce) can sweet corn, drained + ½ (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed + 3 medium (blank)s ripe avocados, peeled, pitted and sliced + 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste

name: Fall in Love (with) Guacamole
summary: I call this 'fall in love' guacamole because everyone I know who has tried it has fallen in love with guacamole. Quick, easy, and addictive! Add more salt, lime juice, or cilantro to your taste preference!
ingredient: 3 avocados, peeled and pitted + 1 teaspoon sea salt + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice + ½ cup diced onion + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + 3 tablespoons chopped cilantro + 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or more to taste (Optional)

name: Daddy's Guacamole Dip
summary: This is one of my dad's favorite recipes that he's handed down to my sisters and myself. It's a little different from traditional guacamole dip cause of the cottage cheese, but very delicious! Serve with chips or vegetables.
process: prep: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 3 cups
ingredient: 2 avocados, halved with pits removed + 2 tomatoes, diced + 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced + ½ cup diced sweet onion + 1 lemon, juiced + 2 cups cottage cheese + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + salt and pepper to taste

name: Chipotle Guacamole
summary: This is a great guacamole recipe which is very easy to customize to your own tastes. The addition of lime and chipotle puts a spin on this simple recipe and separate it from the pack.
ingredient: 2 avocados, peeled, seeded and cubed + 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice + 2 tablespoons sour cream + ¼ cup salsa, or to taste + ¼ teaspoon adobo sauce from canned chilies, or to taste + salt and pepper to taste

name: My Grandma's Guacamole
summary: My grandmother from Mexico taught me to make this. It has been passed down for many generations...
ingredient: 2 fresh chile de arbol peppers, or to taste + 3 medium avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed (one pit reserved) + 2 tablespoons finely chopped onion + ¼ cup chopped roma tomatoes + 1 (14.5 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped fresh cilantro + 2 pinches garlic powder, or to taste + salt to taste + 1 lime, juiced

name: Asparagus Guacamole
summary: Guacamole without the fatty avocado.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 24 spears fresh asparagus, trimmed and coarsely chopped + ½ cup salsa + 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro + 2 cloves garlic + 4 green onions, sliced

name: Guacamole with Corn
summary: This easy Mexican guacamole with corn (guacamole con elote) and tomatoes tastes great with corn chips. As with all guacamole recipes, make sure you are using ripe avocados. [Recipe originally submitted to Allrecipes.com.mx]
ingredient: 3 large avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed + 1 lime, juiced + salt to taste + 1 large plum tomato, seeded and chopped + ½ white onion, chopped + 1 serrano chile, seeded and finely chopped + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 (8.75 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained and rinsed

name: Guacamole
summary: You can make this avocado salad smooth or chunky depending on your tastes.
ingredient: 3 avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed + 1 lime, juiced + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup diced onion + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 pinch ground cayenne pepper (Optional)

name: Spicy Guacamole
summary: This party-time guacamole is spicy, quick, and relatively healthy. Refrigerate guacamole with plastic wrap against the surface of the dip to prolong shelf life. Serve with tortilla chips or your favorite dipping accompaniment.
ingredient: 3 ripe avocados, peeled and pitted + lemon, juiced + 3 Roma tomatoes, seeded and finely chopped + 4 scallions, white parts only, thinly sliced + 3 jalapeno peppers, finely chopped + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro + 1 teaspoon sea salt + ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper

name: Tasty Tomatillo Guacamole
summary: A flavorful guacamole that's easy to adjust to your heat or taste preferences. A little untraditional to make, but won't stay around long. Great with fresh tortilla chips or as a condiment on many Latin dishes.
ingredient: 6 fresh tomatillos, husks discarded and tomatillos rinsed + 1 white onion, quartered + 2 cloves garlic + 2 jalapeno peppers, seeded if desired + 1<U+2009>½ cups water, or amount to cover + salt to taste + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, or to taste + 3 ripe avocados, halved lengthwise and pitted

name: Fabulous and Easy Guacamole
summary: An easy and flexible guacamole recipe that gets raves! Adjust the garlic and taco sauce to taste.
ingredient: 2 avocados - peeled, pitted and diced + 1 tablespoon minced shallots + 2 cloves garlic, minced + ¾ cup taco sauce

name: Tzatziki Guacamole
summary: A yummy dip that can be used instead of traditional guacamole or tzatziki. I made it for a family dinner and served it with nacho chips and veggie chips. It would be great with pitas or in a sandwich. Something a little different to add to your table.
process: prep: 40 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 4 ripe avocados, peeled and pitted + ¼ cup minced garlic + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + <U+2153> cup plain yogurt + <U+2153> cup sour cream + 1 cup diced English cucumber + ¼ cup chopped fresh mint + ¼ cup chopped fresh dill + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons red pepper flakes + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Lite Brocamole
summary: This lite version of guacamole can be used as a delicious appetizer with tortilla chips, or add as a topping to your favorite Tex-Mex recipes. Use more lime juice to make this dip extra tangy.
ingredient: 1 avocado, peeled and pitted + 1 large head fresh broccoli + 2 tablespoons red onion, minced + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 2 tablespoons lime juice + 1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + salt to taste

name: Guacamole with Nopales (Mexican Cactus)
summary: Guacamole is served in many variations in Mexico - here it is combined with nopales, Mexican cactus paddles. [Recipe originally submitted to Allrecipes.com.mx]
ingredient: ½ cup diced nopales (Mexican cactus) + 1 large ripe avocado, halved and pitted + ½ lime, juiced + 1 tablespoon olive oil + salt to taste + 1 plum tomato, seeded and chopped + 1 fresh jalapeno pepper - seeded, deveined, and minced, or to taste + 4 sprigs fresh cilantro, chopped

name: Our Favorite Most Amazing Guacamole
summary: My husband and I tried a ridiculous amount of guacamole over our decades together, but no recipe ever hit home for us. After much experimenting, I finally created a recipe we can't get enough of. It even beats every restaurant we've ever been to.
