ingredient: ½ pound andouille sausage, sliced + 1 small yellow onion, diced + ½ red bell pepper, diced + ½ green bell pepper, diced + 1 celery rib, diced + 1 (12 ounce) bag tortilla chips + 12 ounces raw peeled and deveined shrimp + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 teaspoons seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®) + 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Colby Jack cheese

name: Chicken Enchilada Nachos
summary: I wanted to make chicken enchiladas but couldn't find a recipe that I had the ingredients for. So, I made this up using what I had on hand. It is mildly spicy. Add more peppers/cayenne or hot sauce to liven it up a bit.
ingredient: 3 tablespoons butter, divided + ¼ cup chopped onion + 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped + 1 chile pepper, seeded and chopped + 2 cloves garlic, chopped + ½ cup chicken broth + 1 skinless, boneless chicken breast half, cubed + ¼ teaspoon chili powder + ¼ teaspoon seasoned salt + ¼ teaspoon ground cumin + <U+215B> teaspoon cayenne pepper + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons sour cream + ½ cup shredded pepperjack cheese + 2 cups tortilla chips, or to taste + 2 tablespoons pico de gallo, or to taste (Optional)

name: Spicy Lentil Nachos
summary: Meatless nachos that come together easily when money and time are tight.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon coconut oil + 1 cup finely chopped onion + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 cup dried lentils + 2<U+2009>½ cups chicken broth + 1 tablespoon chili powder + 2 teaspoons ground cumin + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 cup cooked black beans + 1 cup corn kernels + 1 cup salsa + 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese + 1 (13.5 ounce) package tortilla chips

name: Copycat Triple Layer Nachos
summary: Last week at work there was some chatter about how it had been a year since Taco Bell® took the Triple Layer Nachos off their menu and how they were missed. I set out on a mission and this is what I came up with. Note: the restaurant chain sells their own line of refried beans, queso, and sauce so that makes it all the more easy to recreate this at home. This will dirty 4 pans but it is so worth it!
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) can fat-free refried beans + ¼ cup water + ½ (15.5 ounce) jar prepared salsa con queso + 2 tablespoons water + ½ cup red enchilada sauce + ¼ cup Taco Bell® mild sauce + ½ cup vegetable oil + 12 (6 inch) white corn tortillas, cut into chips + salt to taste

name: Pulled Pork Nachos with Sriracha Slaw
summary: Step up your nacho game this game day by turning leftover pulled pork into a sheet-full of goodness no one will be able to resist. Garnish with pickled jalapeno slices, if desired.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: ¾ cup water + ¼ cup apple cider vinegar + 2 tablespoons sriracha sauce + 2 teaspoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon oregano + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 (14 ounce) package classic coleslaw mix (such as Dole®) + ½ small red onion, thinly sliced + 1 (12 ounce) bag tortilla chips + 3 cups cooked pulled pork + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Nacho Pizza
summary: It is exactly what it sounds like - all the toppings you'd get on a plate of nachos on a thin pizza crust! Add your own favorites to customize the recipe, like guacamole, refried beans, etc.
ingredient: 1 pound lean ground beef + 1 (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix + 1 (12 inch) parbaked thin pizza crust + 5 tablespoons queso dip + 1 cup shredded aged Cheddar cheese + 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced + 4 green onions, diced + 4 tablespoons salsa + ½ cup crushed tortilla chips + 2 tablespoons sour cream, or to taste

name: Vegetarian Nachos Supreme for Two
summary: I eat this whenever I can if I'm short on time. For price and convenience, you can hardly do better!
ingredient: 3 ounces yellow corn tortilla chips + 2 teaspoons olive oil + ¼ (12 ounce) package ground beef vegetarian substitute (such as MorningStar®) + 2 tablespoons water + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons hot taco seasoning mix + ½ cup black beans, rinsed and drained + <U+2154> cup shredded mild Cheddar cheese + ½ cup shredded lettuce, or to taste + ¼ cup purchased salsa + 3 tablespoons purchased guacamole + 1 tablespoon sliced jalapeno peppers, or to taste

name: Baked BBQ Pulled Pork Nachos
summary: This recipe takes BBQ pork to a different setting in quick, tasty nachos baked in 5 minutes - perfect pulled pork nachos, rodeo-style.
ingredient: 12 ounces tortilla chips + 1<U+2009>½ cups shredded sharp Cheddar cheese + 2 cups cooked pulled pork + ¾ cup barbeque sauce + <U+215B> red onion, finely sliced + ½ cup diced bread-and-butter pickles

name: Reuben Nachos for Two
summary: Nachos and Reuben sandwiches are two of my favorite things so I came up with this to use up the leftover corned beef. This can easily be doubled and would be great to serve at a Super Bowl party.
ingredient: ½ cup leftover cubed corned beef + ½ (14.5 ounce) can sauerkraut, drained + ½ teaspoon caraway seed + 4 cups tortilla chips + ½ cup Thousand Island dressing + 6 ounces shredded Swiss cheese

name: Pico de Gallo
summary: Quick and easy pico de gallo that is a great appetizer or addition to dinner. Huge hit in my house! For more intense flavor, chill for up to 3 hours before serving.
ingredient: 6 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + ½ red onion, minced + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + ½ jalapeño pepper, seeded and minced + ½ lime, juiced + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 pinch garlic powder + 1 pinch ground cumin, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Peach Salsa with Cilantro and Lime
summary: A sweet and tangy side dish that makes a great side dish, garnish, or party treat. The sugar helps a lot to bring out the flavor in the peaches while refrigerating.
ingredient: 4 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and diced + ¼ red onion, finely chopped + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro + 1 lime, juiced + 1 teaspoon white sugar

name: Best Ever Cilantro Corn Salsa
summary: This is a recipe I have been making for years. It is the number one dish people ask me to bring to parties. It is great with tortilla chips or on top of grilled chicken or steak. It also makes a wonderful filling for vegetarian tacos.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 ears corn on the cob, husks and silk removed + 2 tomatoes, chopped + 2 avocados - peeled, pitted, and diced + ½ bunch cilantro, stems cut off and leaves chopped + 1 white onion, chopped + 3 tablespoons chopped garlic + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar + kosher salt to taste

name: Mean Green Guacamole Salsa
summary: This is a green salsa I learned while in Mexico. It is a green salsa with avocado and it is delicious! I always make it when we do carne asada. I am always begged for the recipe. Enjoy!
ingredient: 10 fresh tomatillos, husks removed + 2 fresh jalapeno peppers, stems removed + 1 bunch fresh cilantro, stems trimmed + 3 avocados, peeled and pitted + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + salt to taste

name: Ex-Girlfriend's Mom's Salsa Fresca (Pico de Gallo)
summary: My ex's mom had the best hand-chopped salsa fresca I have ever tasted back in college. Over the years, I have tweaked it to something my friends and family rave about. The trick for this salsa is marinating the onions and jalapenos in lime juice for about 5 minutes before adding the tomatoes and cilantro. There are two tricks to this recipe: 1. Hand-chop everything. It takes a while, but it is worth it. 2. The marinating is what makes this salsa special. Hope you enjoy.
ingredient: 1 cup finely chopped red onion + 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped - or more to taste + 2 limes, juiced + 2<U+2009>½ cups Roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and chopped + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Salsa de Tomatillos Como Las Asadas y Big Star
summary: A super-flavorful salsa inspired by the great taquerias in Bucktown and Wicker park, in Chicago. Restaurant-style tomatillo salsa, a good change of pace from standard tomato salsa. Includes roasted peppers and the unstoppable combination of garlic, lime and cilantro.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 15,Yield: 15 servings
ingredient: 10 fresh tomatillos, husks removed + 3 cloves garlic + 1 cup water + 4 serrano chiles, stemmed + 2 poblano chiles, stemmed + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 yellow onion, chopped + 1 teaspoon coarse salt + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 2 tablespoons minced red onion + 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice

name: Avocado-Mango Salsa
summary: This salsa is quick and easy to make, plus it's delicious! Once you taste it, you won't be able to stop eating it!
ingredient: 1 mango - peeled, seeded and diced + 1 red bell pepper, seeded and diced + ¾ cup chopped red onion + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 tablespoons white wine vinegar + 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Spicy Watermelon Salsa
summary: This is a spicy-sweet salsa that starts off cool and ends in heat. It's hot, but very refreshing. I keep the seeds in the peppers for maximum heat. This was a prize-winning recipe at our neighbor's classic Cinco de Mayo party.
ingredient: 6 cups cubed watermelon, divided + 1 serrano chile pepper + ½ cup salsa verde (such as Herdez®) + 1 serrano chile pepper, minced + 1 teaspoon taco seasoning mix + salt to taste

name: Annie's Fruit Salsa and Cinnamon Chips
summary: Easy to make, tasty fruit salsa and cinnamon tortilla chips. Great as an appetizer or a snack. Great for anytime!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 kiwis, peeled and diced + 2 Golden Delicious apples - peeled, cored and diced + 8 ounces raspberries + 1 pound strawberries + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 3 tablespoons fruit preserves, any flavor + 10 (10 inch) flour tortillas + butter flavored cooking spray + 2 tablespoons cinnamon sugar

name: The Best Fresh Tomato Salsa
summary: A fresh tomato salsa that goes great with your favorite chips. It gets even better as the flavors meld.
ingredient: 3 cups chopped tomatoes + 1 cup onion, diced + ½ cup chopped green bell pepper + ¼ cup minced fresh cilantro + 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice + 4 teaspoons chopped fresh jalapeno pepper (including seeds) + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon kosher salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Heather's Cilantro, Black Bean, and Corn Salsa
summary: This black bean and corn salsa is a fun summer recipe that can be served on its own or with tortilla chips. It is also beautiful, so make sure you have a clear bowl to put it in.
ingredient: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed + 1 (15 ounce) can yellow corn, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can white corn, drained + 1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes, drained + 1 bunch finely chopped cilantro + 5 green onions, finely sliced + 1 small red onion, finely chopped + 1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + ¼ cup lime juice + 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced + 2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste

name: How to Make Pico de Gallo
summary: Sometimes when you eat authentic Mexican food, they give you this salsa stuff made with tomatoes, onions, and jalapeños. You can add a squeeze of lime juice to pico de gallo, but I prefer this basic recipe. Once you serve this with your Mexican dish such as tacos, you will want it with all your Mexican dishes!
ingredient: 1 medium tomato, diced + 1 onion, finely chopped + ½ jalapeño pepper, seeded and chopped + 2 sprigs fresh cilantro, finely chopped + 1 green onion, finely chopped + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon pepper

name: The Best Canning Salsa
summary: This recipe for canning salsa makes great use of fresh garden tomatoes and bell peppers. Try your hand at canning salsa with this big-batch recipe that makes enough to last you through the winter, even if you share with friends. Nothing tastes better than homemade. Enjoy!
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 12 hrs 35 mins,total: 13 hrs 35 mins,Servings: 272,Yield: 17 pints
ingredient: 30 medium tomatoes, peeled and chopped + 10 cups chopped onions + 2 cups vinegar + 2 (8 ounce) cans tomato paste + ½ cup white sugar, or more to taste + 2 medium green bell peppers, chopped + 2 medium red bell peppers, chopped + 4 medium (4-1/2" long)s banana peppers, chopped + 10 cloves garlic, chopped + 8 teaspoons pickling salt + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + ½ bunch fresh cilantro, chopped

name: Best-Ever Texas Caviar
summary: This cowboy caviar recipe is a yummy Texas salad made with black beans and pinto beans instead of black-eyed peas. Serve with scoop-style tortilla chips as a great party appetizer.
ingredient: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained + 2 (15 ounce) cans pinto beans, rinsed and drained + 2 (15 ounce) cans white corn, rinsed and drained + 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chiles, undrained + 1 red bell pepper - cored, seeded and finely chopped + 1 green bell pepper - cored, seeded and finely chopped + 1 small red onion, finely chopped + 1 jalapeno chile pepper, seeded and finely chopped (Optional) + 1 bunch cilantro leaves, finely chopped + ½ cup rice vinegar + ½ cup olive oil + <U+2153> cup white sugar + ½ teaspoon garlic powder

name: Mango Salsa
summary: A very tasty mango salsa that is great served over fish. My favorite is any fish blackened with Cajun seasoning and then topped with this salsa. Also great for dipping chips.
ingredient: 1 mango - peeled, seeded, and chopped + ¼ cup finely chopped red bell pepper + 1 green onion, chopped + 1 fresh jalapeno chile pepper, finely chopped + 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro + 2 tablespoons lime juice + 1 tablespoon lemon juice

name: Fresh Homemade Salsa
summary: This homemade salsa is made with canned green chilies instead of jalapeños. It tastes great, so I'm sticking with it!
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 3 cups
ingredient: 2 cups chopped tomatoes + ¼ cup chopped red onion + ¼ cup chopped yellow onion + 2 tablespoons canned green chilies + 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + 2 cloves garlic, peeled + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Tomatillo Salsa Verde
summary: This authentic Mexican salsa verde has a fabulous flavor. Use it on chicken enchiladas or as a condiment for any dish that needs a little extra zip!
ingredient: 1 pound tomatillos, husked + ½ cup finely chopped onion + 1 serrano chile pepper, minced + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt, or to taste + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + 2 cups water

name: Shrimp Salsa
summary: This is an awesomely simple, light, and refreshing salsa that goes great with tortilla chips.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: ½ pound salad shrimp + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + ½ red onion, diced + ¼ cup minced cilantro + ¼ cup fresh lime juice + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 clove garlic, minced

name: Black Bean Avocado Salsa
summary: This has to be my favorite summer salsa. It's colorful and fresh tasting. It makes a bunch, so invite some friends over. I like to take the lime after it's been juiced and rub down the bowl I will be serving the salsa in. I also rub the lime on the plastic wrap this will help keep the avocados from turning brown. Don't forget the tortilla chips!
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans (such as Bush's®), rinsed and drained + 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel sweet corn, drained + 4 roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and chopped + 1 small red bell pepper, diced + 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced + <U+2153> cup chopped fresh cilantro + ¼ cup diced red onion + ¼ cup fresh lime juice + 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 avocados, diced

name: D's Famous Salsa
summary: This is a Texas recipe I've developed and refined over many years. It's very fast, easy, and I usually have everything on hand. I often give it as gifts to my family back East.
ingredient: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes + ½ onion, finely diced + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + ½ lime, juiced + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ cup canned sliced green chiles, or to taste + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro

name: Tangy Rhubarb Salsa
summary: This is a recipe I came up with while trying to figure out what to do with an over-abundance of rhubarb. I'm not fond of sugary, syrupy rhubarb sauces but I love rhubarb and I love salsa, so I figured why not put them together! Just grab a bag of tortilla chips, or better yet make your own, and enjoy! Feel free to adjust ingredients to your liking. Don't like jalapenos? Don't use them. Mix and match peppers however you like, just be sure to use 3 of them. Also, I prefer Nellie and Joe's® lime juice because it's a bit more tart than regular bottled or fresh-squeezed lime juice, but if you can't find it that's fine, just use what you have.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 35 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 2 cups thinly sliced rhubarb + 1 small red onion, coarsely chopped + 1 large green bell pepper, seeded and coarsely chopped + 1 large red bell pepper, seeded and coarsely chopped + 1 large yellow bell pepper, seeded and coarsely chopped + 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and coarsely chopped - or to taste + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 3 roma (plum) tomatoes, finely diced + 2 teaspoons brown sugar + 5 tablespoons Key lime juice + 2 teaspoons coarse salt + 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Easy Corn Salsa
summary: I had to make something QUICK for a Mexican themed birthday party, so I threw this together and got RAVE reviews. Some ate it separately most though added it to their burrito and/or fajita mixin's...As usual, I rarely measure, so these measurements are appproximate and by memory...sorry! TRY to make the night before, but it's still good when made on the fly!
ingredient: 1 (15.25 ounce) can sweet corn, drained + 1 orange bell pepper, chopped + 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced + 1 red onion, chopped + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste + 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, or to taste + ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper + 1 teaspoon honey + salt and black pepper to taste

name: Salsa
summary: This is a recipe I just throw together, but it is very popular. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredient: 4 large tomatoes, chopped + 1 onion, chopped + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon lime juice + 1 tomatillo, diced (Optional) + salt to taste + 1 jalapeno pepper, minced

name: Avocado Mango Salsa
summary: Yowzers! Sweet and hot salsa with tangy mangoes and habaneros. Great with pork, chicken or fish or just with chips. You can omit the habaneros and add red bell peppers for a non-spicy version, but then again, why would you want to? Remember, ALWAYS wear gloves when working with habaneros!
ingredient: 1 avocado - peeled, pitted and diced + 1 lime, juiced + 1 mango - peeled, seeded and diced + 1 small red onion, chopped + 1 habanero pepper, seeded and chopped + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro + salt to taste

name: Fresh Pineapple Salsa
summary: Fresh pineapple salsa that is perfect with fish or chicken! You can also try substituting papaya or mango for the pineapple.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 cup finely chopped fresh pineapple + ¼ cup finely chopped red onion + ¼ cup red bell pepper, chopped + 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced + 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh cilantro + 1 tablespoon lime juice + 1 clove garlic, minced (Optional) + ½ teaspoon white sugar + ½ teaspoon salt

name: Mango, Peach and Pineapple Salsa
summary: This fruity and spicy salsa is yummy on just about everything from chips to barbequed chicken, tacos, and even tofu! By the way, pineapple mojitos are a great accompaniment!
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 8 cups
ingredient: 2 mangos, peeled, seeded and chopped + 2 small peaches, halved, pitted, and cut into 1/2-inch dice + 1 cup diced fresh pineapple + 4 tomatoes, chopped + 1 white onion, diced + 1 red bell pepper, diced + 1 yellow bell pepper, diced + 1 cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 small jalapeno pepper, minced + 2 tablespoons lime juice + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste + ¾ cup water

name: Fresh Tomato Salsa
summary: This is a delicious homemade salsa.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 3 tomatoes, chopped + ½ cup finely diced onion + 5 serrano chiles, finely chopped + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons lime juice

name: Avocado Tomatillo Salsa
summary: This spectacularly simple green sauce may be the perfect summer condiment. It requires no cooking, only takes 10 to 15 minutes to make, looks gorgeous, and tastes amazing with anything grilled and most things that aren't. Spoon over grilled pork tacos, grilled meats, or serve with chips.
ingredient: 6 ounces fresh tomatillos - husked, rinsed, and halved + 1 tablespoon thinly sliced serrano chiles, or to taste + 1 large ripe avocado - halved, seeded, and flesh scooped out of peel + ¼ cup packed cilantro leaves + ½ lime, juiced + salt to taste

name: Jen's Fresh and Spicy Salsa
summary: This recipe is bursting with flavor! It is fresh and spicy, and did I mention easy? This is the closest thing to restaurant style salsa you will find. The jalapenos and hot pepper sauce (e.g., Tabasco) add spice to the mix and the cilantro, lime juice, and green onions create freshness.
ingredient: 5 roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and chopped + 10 green onions + 2 fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice + 2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Tomato Concasse
summary: The technique is relatively quick and easy; it will allow you enjoy those gorgeous summer tomatoes sans skin and seeds.
ingredient: 3 tomatoes, cored

name: Mouth-Watering Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These delicious mushrooms taste just like restaurant-style stuffed mushrooms and are my guy's absolute favorite.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 large mushrooms
ingredient: 12 whole fresh mushrooms + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper

name: Crab Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These tasty crab-stuffed mushrooms are seasoned with thyme, oregano, and savory. Choose good-sized mushrooms for this appetizer, about 2 inches across. When cleaning mushrooms, don't run them under water; they're like little sponges and will absorb it. Just wipe them clean with a damp towel instead.
ingredient: 7 ounces crabmeat + 5 green onions, thinly sliced + ¼ teaspoon dried thyme + ¼ teaspoon dried oregano + ¼ teaspoon ground savory + ground black pepper to taste + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + <U+2153> cup mayonnaise + 1 pound fresh mushrooms + 3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon paprika

name: Dinah's Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Delicious mushroom caps filled with a clam stuffing! Very easy, and even better than the stuffed mushrooms from that famous Italian restaurant chain.... Garnish with lemon wedges when serving.
ingredient: 20 fresh mushrooms, stems removed + 2 (6.5 ounce) cans minced clams, drained + 2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 small onion, finely chopped + ¾ cup dry bread crumbs + ½ cup chopped green bell pepper + 2 tablespoons dried parsley + 2 tablespoons Italian-style seasoning + ground black pepper to taste + 1<U+2009>½ cups butter, melted + ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Hot and Spicy Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Cheese, bacon, and peppers! I usually throw an habanero in when we are making it just for us. These are also great with a salad for dinner. This filling is also a good stuffing for jalapenos.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + ¼ cup minced onion + 5 slices cooked bacon, chopped + 5 jalapeno peppers, chopped + 1 teaspoon ground cumin, or more to taste + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 30 mushrooms, stems removed, or more as needed

name: Gary's Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Chicken flavored dry stuffing mix is the secret ingredient in these stuffed mushrooms created by my cousin Gary.
ingredient: 12 large fresh mushrooms, stems removed + 1 (6 ounce) package chicken flavored dry stuffing mix + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ pound imitation crabmeat, flaked + 2 cups butter + 2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced + salt and pepper to taste + garlic powder to taste + crushed red pepper to taste

name: Renaissance Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: I created this recipe for a vegetarian friend. It is based on my Italian sausage stuffed mushrooms, but this is more 'veggie' friendly! Enjoy it! If you don't have any garlic olive oil, just use regular olive oil and add an extra clove of garlic.
process: prep: 35 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 stuffed mushrooms
ingredient: 12 large mushrooms + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced + 3 tablespoons chopped green onions + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 3 tablespoons port wine + 1 teaspoon Italian-style seasoning + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ¾ cup shredded Cheddar cheese + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 dashes hot pepper sauce

name: Stuffed Mushrooms with Spinach
summary: Stuff large mushrooms with spinach, bacon and Parmesan cheese, and you have the perfect appetizer!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 5 slices bacon + 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach + 12 large mushrooms + 3 tablespoons butter + 2 tablespoons finely chopped onion + 2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced + .4 cup heavy cream + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + salt and pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons butter, melted

name: Bacon Rosemary Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Delectable stuffed mushrooms are a sure crowd pleaser, especially when stuffed with rosemary, bacon, and cheese!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 1 onion, chopped + 1 (8 ounce) package mushrooms, stems removed and chopped and caps reserved + 4 slices bacon, chopped + 1<U+2009>¼ cups shredded Edam cheese + 2 sprigs fresh rosemary, chopped

name: Savory Crab Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Baked mushroom caps filled with a deliciously cheesy crabmeat mixture. Serve hot with lemon wedges.
ingredient: 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 24 fresh mushrooms + 2 tablespoons butter + 2 tablespoons minced green onions + 1 teaspoon lemon juice + 1 cup diced cooked crabmeat + ½ cup soft bread crumbs + 1 egg, beaten + ½ teaspoon dried dill weed + ¾ cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese, divided + ¼ cup dry white wine

name: Stuffed Cream Cheese Mushrooms
summary: Delicious stuffed mushrooms with cream cheese — an appetizer with a kick. Always a party favorite when we make them. I usually double the recipe.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 12 stuffed mushrooms
ingredient: cooking spray + 12 whole fresh mushrooms, tough ends trimmed + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper

name: Air Fryer Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These low-carb mushrooms are easy to make and cook in under 10 minutes in your air fryer. They make the perfect game-day snack, but also impress as a first course when having friends over for an elegant dinner.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package whole white button mushrooms + 2 scallions + 4 ounces cream cheese, softened + ¼ cup finely shredded sharp Cheddar cheese + ¼ teaspoon ground paprika + 1 pinch salt + cooking spray

name: Bacon and Cheddar Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Crimini mushrooms (also known as portabellini mushrooms) are stuffed with Cheddar cheese and bacon. This appetizer is an impressive and irresistible accompaniment to any meal.
ingredient: 3 slices bacon + 8 crimini mushrooms + 1 tablespoon butter + 1 tablespoon chopped onion + ¾ cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Andie's Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: I made this recipe up for a party I had. Now I get calls all the time from people asking how to make it. The mushrooms are stuffed with hamburger meat, and are full of flavor.
ingredient: 1 pound lean ground beef + 2 pounds fresh mushrooms-stems removed, chopped and reserved + ¼ cup margarine + ½ cup chopped green bell peppers + 2 teaspoons minced garlic + 3 teaspoons dried parsley + 1 teaspoon dried basil leaves, crushed + <U+2154> cup dry bread crumbs + <U+2153> cup soft bread crumbs + 2 cups shredded sharp Cheddar cheese

name: The Best Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These mushrooms were created to impress my boyfriend when we first started dating. These are now his absolute favorite.
ingredient: 3 slices bacon + ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + 3 drops Worcestershire sauce + 2 dashes ground black pepper + 1 pound mushrooms, stems removed + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese

name: Stuffed Morel Mushrooms
summary: You know spring is here when the morel mushrooms start to pop up in the woods. These are awesome!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 8 fresh morels - trimmed, washed, and dried + butter-flavored cooking spray + 1 tablespoon butter + 1 tablespoon finely chopped red bell pepper + 1 tablespoon thinly sliced green onion, including green part + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (6 ounce) can lump crabmeat + 1 egg + 2 tablespoons finely chopped celery leaves + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 4 dashes hot sauce, or to taste + ½ teaspoon sea salt + ¼ cup bread crumbs + ¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese

name: Jalapeno Popper Mushrooms
summary: My husband loves stuffed jalapenos and I like stuffed mushrooms, so I came up with this recipe that combines the two. Leave some of the seeds or ribs in the jalapeno for more heat! I like to use Neufchatel cheese and turkey bacon for a lower fat version -- it's just as tasty!
ingredient: 2 slices bacon + cooking spray + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons olive oil + 8 mushrooms, stems removed and chopped and caps reserved + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 jalapeno pepper, ribs and seeds removed, finely chopped + 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 3 tablespoons shredded Cheddar cheese + sea salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Sausage Stuffed Mushrooms II
summary: FAST and taste great. Everyone is shocked to know there are only 3 ingredients. There are never any left over.
ingredient: ½ pound ground pork sausage + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, stems removed

name: Crab and Lobster Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: This is the result of trying to duplicate a seafood chain's recipe. Comes close enough, they're gone the minute they hit the table!
ingredient: ¾ cup melted butter, divided + 1 pound fresh mushrooms, stems removed + 1 cup crushed seasoned croutons + 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (Optional) + 1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained + 1 pound lobster tail, cleaned and chopped + 3 tablespoons minced garlic + ¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese (Optional)

name: Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms
summary: Stuffed with pork sausage, shredded and ricotta cheeses, onions and sun-dried tomatoes, these tasty mushroom caps are a sure crowd pleaser.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 stuffed mushrooms
ingredient: 1 (9.6 ounce) package Jimmy Dean® Original Hearty Pork Sausage Crumbles + 2 cups shredded Italian cheese blend, divided + ½ cup ricotta cheese + 2 green onions, thinly sliced + 3 tablespoons finely chopped sun-dried tomatoes, rehydrated + 12 medium portobello mushroom caps + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar (Optional)

name: Blue Bacon Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Mushrooms stuffed with blue cheese, bacon, caramelized onions and garlic make a delicious appetizer!
ingredient: 3 strips bacon + 6 large mushrooms + 1 tablespoon butter + ½ onion, diced + 1 clove garlic, sliced + 3 ounces cream cheese + 3 ounces blue cheese + <U+2153> cup bread crumbs

name: Stuffed Portobello Mushroom Caps
summary: I couldn't find a mushroom recipe that I liked, so I started playing around with my own creation. You can make these with salad shrimp, crab, sausage - practically anything you think would be a good meat filling.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 stuffed mushrooms
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups crabmeat + 1 cup Italian-style bread crumbs + 1 cup panko (Japanese bread crumbs) + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + 1 egg, beaten + 3 tablespoons milk + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 12 portobello mushroom caps

name: Spinach Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: A recipe I put together for a bridal shower. Everyone enjoyed them and I hope you will too
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 30,Yield: 30 stuffed mushrooms
ingredient: ¼ cup olive oil + 30 large whole fresh mushrooms, stems removed + 1 egg + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ cup shredded Gouda cheese + ¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + ¼ cup dry bread crumbs + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Stuffed Mushrooms IV
summary: An 18th Century recipe that I have altered slightly. Better make a double batch because these go fast. Sausage can be substituted for ground beef if you'd like.
ingredient: 12 fresh mushrooms + ½ pound ground beef + 1 tablespoon minced onion + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon butter + ¼ cup bread crumbs + salt and pepper to taste + ¼ cup heavy cream + ¼ cup butter, melted + 1 teaspoon chili powder

name: Shrimpcargot
summary: After having these shrimp as an appetizer at a restaurant I have been trying to duplicate them. Serve with bread to mop up the extra yummy garlic butter!
ingredient: ¼ cup butter + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 6 peeled and deveined large shrimp (21 to 25 per lb) + 6 mushrooms, stems removed + 2 tablespoons shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Giant Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These stuffed mushrooms are too big to serve as hors d'oeuvres.....just one of these enormous mushrooms can be dinner for a hungry person.
ingredient: 4 large portobello mushrooms + 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 cup chopped fresh cilantro + 1 large carrot, finely chopped + 1 stalk celery, finely chopped + <U+2154> cup kasha (toasted buckwheat groats) + 1<U+2009>¼ cups water + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley

name: Grilled Portobello Mushrooms with Mashed Cannellini Beans and Harissa Sauce
summary: This appetizer is loaded with so many flavors and it's vegetarian and healthy. Give it a shot if you want to impress! It may sound like a ton of work, but it really is simple. If you like bold flavors, you will love it!
ingredient: 1 roasted red pepper, peeled and minced + 2 tablespoons chopped shallot + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 teaspoon olive oil + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh mint + 1 teaspoon lime juice + ¾ teaspoon Dijon mustard + ½ teaspoon minced fresh cilantro + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes + 1 pinch ground coriander + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 2 cups canned cannellini beans + 2 cups water, or as needed + 2 teaspoons truffle oil + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 4 large portobello mushroom caps + 4 teaspoons olive oil + ½ cup vegetable broth + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Sausage Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: This Johnsonvillle recipe is a must for mushroom fans! The taste of Johnsonville Italian Sausage pairs well with cream cheese, Parmesan cheese, lemon and garlic to create a dish that's bound to please! These stuffed mushrooms are perfect for an appetizer when you're entertaining family and friends.
process: prep: 40 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 48,Yield: 48 stuffed mushrooms
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package Johnsonville® Ground Italian Sausage + 48 large fresh mushrooms + ½ cup dry bread crumbs + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 3 garlic cloves, minced + 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Stuffed Mushrooms with Sour Cream
summary: These are great stuffed mushrooms, the recipe uses sour cream and grated cheese to hold the stuffing together, it is far and away my favorite pre-dinner snack to serve at parties.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 stuffed mushrooms
ingredient: 24 mushrooms, caps and stems diced + ½ orange bell pepper, diced + ½ onion, diced + 1 small carrot, diced + 2 slices bacon, diced + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + ½ cup sour cream + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste

name: Portabella Nirvana
summary: Roasted portobello mushrooms are stuffed with a savory crab stuffing like a gigantic appetizer. If this isn't Heaven, your taste buds will be there anyway!
ingredient: 2 large portobello mushrooms + 1 (8 ounce) bottle Italian-style salad dressing + 1 tablespoon minced onion + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons minced garlic + ¼ cup butter + 1 stalk celery, diced + ½ cup crab meat, fresh or canned + 20 buttery round crackers, crushed + <U+2154> cup Italian blend shredded cheese, divided

name: Tuna-Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Creamy tuna tossed with Swiss cheese stuffed into button mushrooms and baked into perfection.
ingredient: 2 (3 ounce) cans white tuna in water, drained + 2 (1 ounce) slices Swiss cheese, diced + 2 tablespoons mayonnaise + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons sweet pickle relish + ¼ teaspoon dried minced onion + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 (8 ounce) package fresh white mushrooms, cleaned and stems removed

name: Easy Vegetarian Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These vegetarian stuffed mushrooms are quick and easy to make. You only need a handful of ingredients and your guests will love them.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 10 stuffed mushrooms
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter, divided, or more as needed + 10 medium brown mushrooms, stems removed and diced + 3 ounces garden vegetable cream cheese spread (such as Philadelphia(R) Garden Vegetable), or more to taste + 2 stalks green onions, chopped + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives, or to taste + ¼ cup panko bread crumbs

name: Chicken-Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Mushroom caps filled with a creamy onion, garlic, and diced chicken mixture are baked until piping hot for a crowd-pleasing party appetizer.
ingredient: 1 pound medium button or mini-bella mushrooms + 2 tablespoons unsalted butter + 1 large onion, finely chopped + 1 large clove garlic, minced + 1 cooked boneless chicken breast half, finely diced* + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons Diamond Crystal® Kosher Salt + ¾ teaspoon coarsely ground pepper + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + 1 cup whipping cream + 5 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, divided + 1 tablespoon finely shredded mozzarella or Parmesan cheese

name: Shrimp Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: This is a wonderful dish that can be served with almost any main course. These mushrooms stuffed with shrimp and topped with melted Cheddar cheese go really will with Italian food. I love them!
ingredient: 2 pounds large mushrooms + ¾ pound cooked baby shrimp + 1 cup crushed bacon flavored crackers + 1 cup cream cheese, softened + ½ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese

name: Spinach Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms with Avocado
summary: These mushrooms are delicious on their own, or put them on toasted sourdough bread with Dijon mustard for a great veggie sandwich. Use a mixture of chopped fresh Italian herbs (oregano, basil, thyme, and parsley).
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 6 sun-dried tomatoes + 4 large portobello mushrooms, stems reserved and gills removed + extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano + sea salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste + 1 large red bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces + 2 cloves garlic, coarsely chopped + 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil + 2 (10 ounce) bags fresh spinach leaves + 3 large avocados - peeled, pitted, and diced + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Amazing Shrimp Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: My mom makes these mushrooms every year for the holidays and there are NEVER any leftovers! They are the best stuffed mushrooms I have ever had. I now make them any time I go to a holiday party.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 3 hrs 15 mins,total: 3 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 20 stuffed mushrooms
ingredient: 20 large white mushrooms, stems removed + 1 (4 ounce) can small shrimp, rinsed, drained and broken up + ½ cup chive and onion flavored cream cheese + ½ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste + 1 dash Louisiana-style hot sauce, or to taste + ¾ cup grated Romano cheese

name: Sausage-Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: Just something a little different from the clam-based stuffing(s). Basic recipe you can change to suit your personal tastes. I usually cook and stir the mushrooms in butter before stuffing, but that's just my preference. The guys LOVE these during football/dart nights.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 40 mushrooms
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 40 mushrooms, stems removed + ½ pound Italian sausage + ¼ cup chopped onion + 2 cloves minced garlic + ½ cup dry bread crumbs + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + <U+2153> cup shredded mozzarella cheese + 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning + 1 teaspoon dried parsley

name: Banana Banana Bread
summary: Why compromise the banana flavor? This banana bread is moist and delicious with loads of banana flavor! Friends and family love my recipe and say it's by far the best! It's wonderful toasted!! Enjoy!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 5 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ¼ teaspoon salt + ½ cup butter + ¾ cup brown sugar + 2 eggs, beaten + 2<U+2009><U+2153> cups mashed overripe bananas

name: Janet's Rich Banana Bread
summary: This is the moistest banana bread that I have ever tasted. It's also very easy to make!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
ingredient: ½ cup butter, melted + 1 cup white sugar + 2 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup sour cream + ½ cup chopped walnuts + 2 medium bananas, sliced

name: Extreme Banana Nut Bread 'EBNB'
summary: This banana nut bread is my mom's recipe: dense, excellent, and definitely indulgent. It's always completely gone in minutes. This is great at parties, but never lasts long at home. Warning: EBNB may be impossible to resist!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 35 mins,total: 1 hr 50 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 9x5-inch loaves
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 cups white sugar + 1 cup butter, softened + 2 cups mashed overripe bananas + 4 large eggs, beaten + 1 cup chopped walnuts

name: Banana Chocolate Chip Bread
summary: Super amazing banana bread. Moist and tasty!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 3 ripe bananas, mashed + 1 tablespoon milk + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste + ½ cup butter, softened + 1 cup white sugar + 2 eggs + 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips

name: Banana Crumb Muffins
summary: The best banana muffin recipes have a sweet crumb topping which is what makes these banana muffins stand apart from the ordinary. They're scrumptious!
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 3 bananas, mashed + ¾ cup white sugar + <U+2153> cup butter, melted + 1 egg, lightly beaten + <U+2153> cup packed brown sugar + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + <U+215B> teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon butter

name: Joy's Easy Banana Bread
summary: This easy banana bread recipe is quick to prepare, and everyone always comes back for seconds!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
ingredient: 3 ripe bananas, mashed + 1 cup white sugar + 1 egg + ¼ cup melted butter + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Sarah's Banana Bread Muffins
summary: This is a recipe for people who like banana bread and muffins. These are great breakfast muffins! You may substitute coconut for some or all of the walnuts if you wish.
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup vegetable oil + 1 egg + 3 ripe bananas, mashed + ¼ cup chopped walnuts + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt

name: Almost No Fat Banana Bread
summary: This bread is surprising moist and has a wonderful flavor. For a little variation, you can add nuts or raisins.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 8x4 inch loaf
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + ¾ cup white sugar + 1<U+2009>¼ teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 2 egg whites + 1 cup banana, mashed + ¼ cup applesauce

name: Creamy Banana Bread
summary: I have been using this recipe for a few years now, and it remains my family's favorite for banana bread! The combination of bananas and cream cheese make this a very moist bread.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 8x4-inch loaves
ingredient: ½ cup margarine, softened + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1<U+2009>¼ cups white sugar + 2 eggs + 1 cup mashed bananas + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ¾ cup chopped pecans + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon

name: Banana Muffins II
summary: These delicious banana muffins are easy for kids to make.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 muffins, or 48 mini muffins
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 3 large bananas, mashed + ¾ cup white sugar + 1 egg + <U+2153> cup butter, melted

name: Banana Bread - Quick Bread for Machines
summary: A quick banana bread for the bread machine. Use the DOUGH setting for mixing, then BAKE with the control set to light.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 1-pound loaf
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ¾ cup white sugar + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 2 eggs + 2 bananas, peeled and halved lengthwise

name: Banana Oatmeal Bread
summary: This is an old family recipe, and it is very moist!
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
ingredient: ½ cup shortening + 1 cup white sugar + 2 eggs, beaten + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 cup quick cooking oats + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ cup milk + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1<U+2009>½ cups mashed bananas + ½ cup chopped raisins (Optional)

name: Brown Sugar Banana Bread
summary: Brown sugar and cinnamon add depth to this moist, sweet bread. The perfect present for friends and loved ones!
ingredient: 4 ripe bananas, cut into chunks + 1<U+2009>¼ cups light brown sugar + ½ cup butter, softened + 1 egg + 1 teaspoon cinnamon + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ¼ cup whole milk + 2 cups all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon kosher salt

name: Banana Bread - Quick Bread for Machines
summary: A quick banana bread for the bread machine. Use the DOUGH setting for mixing, then BAKE with the control set to light.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 1-pound loaf
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ¾ cup white sugar + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 2 eggs + 2 bananas, peeled and halved lengthwise

name: Almost No Fat Banana Bread
summary: This bread is surprising moist and has a wonderful flavor. For a little variation, you can add nuts or raisins.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 8x4 inch loaf
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + ¾ cup white sugar + 1<U+2009>¼ teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 2 egg whites + 1 cup banana, mashed + ¼ cup applesauce

name: Grandma's Banana Bread
summary: A super moist banana bread which uses six bananas!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 3 cups sugar + 1 cup margarine, softened + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 4 eggs + 3<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 cup buttermilk + 6 very ripe bananas, mashed

name: Cream Cheese Banana Bread
summary: Banana bread made with cream cheese.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
ingredient: cooking spray + ½ cup unsalted butter, melted + ½ cup light brown sugar + 1 egg + ¼ cup sour cream + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 ripe bananas + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 egg + ¼ cup white sugar + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour

name: Blueberry Banana Bread
summary: Combine blueberries and bananas in these tender, golden loaves. Whether you enjoy a slice as a snack or for breakfast, this bread is so flavorful, you won't need butter.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 3 small loaves
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup butter, softened + 1 cup white sugar + 2 eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 ripe bananas, mashed + 1 cup fresh blueberries

name: Easy Banana Bread
summary: My family lives for banana bread, and they all say this recipe is heaven!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 5 very ripe bananas + 4 eggs + 1 cup shortening + 2<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 1 tablespoon vanilla extract + 3<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Banana Loaf
summary: Moist banana loaf, delicious warmed with butter ... mmmmmmm ... This recipe can be easily doubled to make 2 loaves.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 9x5 inch loaf
ingredient: ½ cup butter + 1 cup white sugar + 2 eggs + 3 ripe bananas, mashed + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup chopped walnuts

name: Banana Bran Muffins
summary: Banana nut muffins are a classic. A good way to use overripe bananas. This is a family favorite!
ingredient: ½ cup butter, softened + ½ cup brown sugar + 3 bananas, mashed + ¼ cup milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + ½ cup wheat bran + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ¼ teaspoon salt + ½ cup chopped walnuts

name: Whole Wheat Strawberry Banana Bread
summary: Our family is eating healthier these days and I have been experimenting with whole wheat flour. My picky kids loved this moist bread!
ingredient: cooking spray (such as Baker's Joy®) + 2 large ripe bananas + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 2 eggs + ¼ cup whole milk + ½ (3 ounce) package strawberry-flavored gelatin (such as Jell-O®) + 2 cups whole wheat flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt

name: Chef John's Banana Bread
summary: Banana bread is one of those things people rarely make on purpose, only when those last three bananas are almost black. This scrumptious banana-walnut loaf, spiked with dark chocolate chips, is so good you'll want to make it well before the bananas get to that condition.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x4 inch loaf
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ cup butter, softened + 3 ripe bananas, mashed + 1 cup white sugar + 2 large eggs + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 tablespoon milk + 1 cup chopped walnuts + <U+2153> cup semisweet chocolate chips

name: Banana Oatmeal Bread
summary: This is an old family recipe, and it is very moist!
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
ingredient: ½ cup shortening + 1 cup white sugar + 2 eggs, beaten + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 cup quick cooking oats + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ cup milk + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1<U+2009>½ cups mashed bananas + ½ cup chopped raisins (Optional)

name: Simple Banana Bread
summary: I developed this recipe because I wanted a bread recipe, not cake-like, while living in a 10-foot trailer. This recipe is very low in fat.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 5 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 -8x4 inch loaf
ingredient: 4 ripe bananas, mashed + <U+2154> cup white sugar + 2 eggs + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup chopped walnuts

name: Grandma's Homemade Banana Bread
summary: This recipe is a number one family favorite!!! It's been handed down from generation to generation. You can get creative by adding nuts, raisins or anything else that you want to throw in the batter
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 1 8x4 inch loaf
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + ½ cup butter, softened + 3 bananas, mashed + 2 eggs + 2 cups all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon baking soda + <U+2153> cup sour milk + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Hawaiian Banana Nut Bread
summary: This is a recipe that I put together, out of several different ones. It's very easy and very good.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 30,Yield: 2 - 9x5 inch loaves
ingredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour + ¾ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 2 cups white sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 3 eggs, beaten + 1 cup vegetable oil + 2 cups mashed very ripe banana + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 cup flaked coconut + 1 cup maraschino cherries, diced

name: Banana Bread
summary: This banana bread recipe is our family favorite.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 7x3-inch loaves
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup white sugar + 2 eggs, beaten + ¼ cup butter, melted + 3 bananas, mashed

name: Spiced Banana Bread
summary: This is a very moist banana bread with a little kick of spice. Loved by my family and all who have tried it.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 - 8x4 inch loaf pans
ingredient: 2 cups flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 4 very ripe bananas + 2 eggs + 1 cup sugar + 1 teaspoon cinnamon + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon nutmeg + ¼ teaspoon ground cloves + ½ cup melted butter + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Banana-Zucchini Bread
summary: A combination of two favorites: banana nut bread and zucchini bread. The flavors combine and in each bite you get just a hint of both flavors.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 3 eggs + ¾ cup vegetable oil + <U+2154> cup packed brown sugar + 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup grated zucchini + 2 bananas, mashed + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 3<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup dried cranberries + ½ cup chopped walnuts

name: Whole Wheat Banana Nut Bread
summary: This is a moist banana bread recipe that I make fairly often with leftover, very ripe bananas.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9 x 5 inch loaf
ingredient: <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + ½ cup honey + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 eggs + 1 cup mashed bananas + 1<U+2009>¾ cups whole wheat flour + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ¼ cup hot water + ½ cup chopped walnuts

name: Chocolate Banana Bread
summary: This is a very different banana bread recipe; it has chocolate chips, cocoa, and a touch of sour cream. Delicious!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 - 9x5 inch loaves
ingredient: 1 cup margarine, softened + 2 cups white sugar + 4 eggs + 6 bananas, mashed + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 3 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + ¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder + 1 cup lite sour cream + 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips

name: Cathy's Banana Bread
summary: Moist and delicious. Once you make it you will always be asked for more banana bread. Just try it!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 - 7x3 inch loaves
ingredient: 1 cup mashed bananas + 1 cup sour cream + ¼ cup margarine + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups white sugar + 2 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Maple Banana Bread
summary: This is a different banana bread, sweetened with maple syrup. It's my absolute favorite banana bread. I'm sure you will love it this version.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: ½ cup butter, melted + ½ cup maple syrup + 1 egg + 2 ripe bananas + ½ teaspoon maple extract + 3 tablespoons milk + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon baking powder + ¼ cup chopped walnuts + 3 tablespoons white sugar

name: Classic Banana Bread
summary: This classic banana bread with sour cream bakes up light and moist.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: ¼ cup butter, softened + 1 cup sugar + 1 cup mashed fully ripe bananas + 1 cup BREAKSTONE'S Reduced Fat Sour Cream + 2 large eggs eggs + 2<U+2009>¼ cups flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons CALUMET Baking Powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup chopped PLANTERS Walnuts

name: Banana Pumpkin Bread
summary: This is a moist, tasty breakfast bread perfect with jam, margarine, or even cream cheese. Best of all, it's low in fat!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 9x5 inch loaf pan
ingredient: 2 ripe bananas, mashed + 2 eggs + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups canned pumpkin puree + ½ cup honey + ½ cup white sugar + 2<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¾ cup raisins (Optional) + ½ cup walnut pieces (Optional)

name: Basic Biscuits
summary: This is an easy homemade biscuit recipe with baking powder used as the leavening. The biscuits turn out perfectly soft and flaky on the inside every time.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup shortening + ¾ cup cold milk

name: Chef John's Buttermilk Biscuits
summary: This deceptively simple buttermilk biscuit recipe can come out a million different ways with some very minor variations on the ingredients and amounts. This one's my favorite — flaky, but not dry; chewy, but not tough; and crisp in just the right spots. Ice-cold butter and some extra dough folding are key to having lots of flaky layers in each golden brown buttermilk biscuit.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 7 tablespoons unsalted butter, chilled in freezer and cut into thin slices + ¾ cup cold buttermilk + 2 tablespoons buttermilk for brushing

name: Easy Mayonnaise Biscuits
summary: This recipe is amazing.
ingredient: 1 cup self-rising flour + ½ cup milk + ¼ cup mayonnaise

name: Two-Ingredient Cream Biscuits
summary: A small batch of biscuits ready in less than 20 minutes. And made with only 2 ingredients!
ingredient: 1 cup self-rising flour, plus more for kneading + ¾ cup heavy whipping cream

name: Red Lobster Cheddar Biscuits
summary: Red Lobster biscuits are loaded with Cheddar cheese and brushed with seasoned butter in this easy copycat recipe. No kneading is required — just drop the gently mixed batter directly onto a prepared baking sheet and your warm, freshly baked, bite-sized biscuits will be ready to enjoy with dinner in just 15 minutes.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 24 small biscuits
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 tablespoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + <U+2154> cup milk + <U+2153> cup butter, softened and cut into pieces + 1 large egg + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + 2 teaspoons dried parsley (Optional) + 1 teaspoon garlic powder (Optional)

name: J.P.'s Big Daddy Biscuits
summary: This recipe will produce the biggest biscuits in the history of the world! Serve these gems with butter, preserves, honey, gravy or they can also be used as dinner rolls...you get the picture. The dough can also be prepared several hours, and up to a day ahead of time. If so, turn dough out onto aluminum foil that has been either floured, lightly buttered or lightly sprayed with cooking spray. Roll up foil until it is sealed, and refrigerate. Don't be surprised if your biscuits rise even higher because the baking powder has had more time to act in the dough. You may have to make a few batches before you get desired results: desired results equals huge mongo biscuits.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 grand sized biscuits
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 tablespoon white sugar + <U+2153> cup shortening + 1 cup milk

name: Jamaican Fried Dumplings
summary: These fried dumplings are usually served with codfish in Jamaica as part of a big weekend breakfast.
ingredient: 4 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + ½ cup butter, cut into cubes and softened + ½ cup cold water + 1 cup vegetable oil for frying

name: Easy Baking Powder Drop Biscuits
summary: These are the best breakfast biscuits, easy and perfect for sausage gravy!
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 tablespoon white sugar + ½ cup chilled butter, diced + 1<U+2009>¼ cups whole milk

name: Cheddar Bay Biscuits
summary: These biscuits are cheesy and rich, and fairly close to the ones a famous seafood restaurant chain serves.
ingredient: 4 cups baking mix + 3 ounces Cheddar cheese, shredded + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups water + ½ cup melted butter + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon onion powder + <U+215B> teaspoon dried parsley

name: Tea Biscuits
summary: A quick tea time treat. Serve warm, buttered, and with jam or honey.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 4 teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup shortening + ¾ cup milk

name: Grandma's Baking Powder Biscuits
summary: This is my grandmother's biscuit recipe. It is my all-time favorite and has a really good flavor to it. Be sure not to roll out too thin, you want high biscuits! I usually just pat out the dough to the desired thickness, usually 1/2 inch.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen biscuits
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 4 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon cream of tartar + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup vegetable shortening + 1 egg + <U+2154> cup milk

name: Mayonnaise Biscuits
summary: This is a simple but tasty biscuit recipe. You don't taste the mayo, but it gives the biscuits a light and fluffy texture. For rolled and cut biscuits, use just enough milk to hold it together.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 12 mins,total: 22 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen biscuits
ingredient: 2 cups self-rising flour + 1 cup milk + 6 tablespoons mayonnaise

name: Never Fail Biscuits
summary: These biscuits are a never fail recipe, they're easy to make and everyone enjoys them.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + 4 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon cream of tartar + 2 teaspoons white sugar + ½ cup butter, chilled and diced + ¾ cup milk

name: Best Buttermilk Biscuits
summary: This recipe makes fluffy, light, and tasty biscuits.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen biscuits
ingredient: 2<U+2009>¼ cups self-rising flour + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + ½ cup butter-flavored shortening (such as Crisco®) + 1 cup buttermilk

name: E-Z Drop Biscuits
summary: These are a favorite of my boys. For an extra treat I drop a handful of shredded cheese in.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon baking powder + 2 teaspoons white sugar + ½ teaspoon cream of tartar + ¼ teaspoon salt + ½ cup melted butter + 1 cup milk

name: Mom's Baking Powder Biscuits
summary: This is the recipe my mom always made. I like to use the butter flavored shortening, but you can use regular. Amount of biscuits you get depends on how big around you make them and the thickness. My daughter likes me to make smaller ones.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ¾ teaspoon salt + 5 tablespoons shortening + ¾ cup milk

name: Super Easy Strawberry Shortcake Biscuits
summary: These strawberry shortcake biscuits have been in my husband's family for over 40 years. It is the best sweet biscuit to have under your strawberry and cream dessert. Delicious right out of the oven slathered with butter. They are also very good on their own with peanut butter.
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + ½ cup white sugar + 3 tablespoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup shortening + 2 large eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups milk

name: Easy Biscuits
summary: This three-ingredient recipe gets biscuits on your table in a quick and easy manner for when you need biscuits now!
ingredient: 2<U+2009>¼ cups self-rising flour + ¾ cup shortening + 1 cup milk

name: Easy 7-Up® Biscuits
summary: These biscuits are delicious and not as fattening as the recipe might lead you to believe. That stick of butter is allotted through the whole recipe and the biscuits are so tasty that you won't need any toppings!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: ½ cup butter + 4<U+2009>½ cups baking mix (such as Bisquick ®) + 1 cup lemon-lime soda (such as 7-Up®) + 1 cup sour cream

name: How to Make Cream Biscuits
summary: Not only is this one of America's greatest biscuit recipes, it's also by far the easiest. If you can stir, you can make cream biscuits. They are so light, moist, flaky, and perfect, you're going to be shocked.
ingredient: 2 cups self-rising flour + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups heavy whipping cream + 2 tablespoons butter, melted, or as needed

name: Blueberry-Lemon Breakfast Biscuits
summary: With only 4 ingredients, these biscuits are so tasty that you could serve them for dessert.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 5 biscuits
ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated buttermilk biscuit dough (such as Pillsbury®) + 1 cup blueberries + ½ cup powdered sugar + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + ½ teaspoon lemon zest

name: Greg's Southern Biscuits
summary: Light and fluffy and the closest thing I've found to my grandmother's biscuits. Delicious for jams, butter, honey, corn syrup, or just great bread for any meal. My grandmother used to make them pretty much every day.
ingredient: ½ teaspoon lard + 2 cups all-purpose flour + ¾ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 2 tablespoons butter, frozen + 2 tablespoons lard, frozen + 1 teaspoon bacon drippings + 1 cup buttermilk

name: Best Bread Machine Bread
summary: This recipe is easy and foolproof. It makes a very soft and tasty loaf of bread with a flaky crust.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 2 hrs 10 mins,total: 3 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 1 1/2 pound loaf
ingredient: 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 (.25 ounce) package bread machine yeast + ¼ cup vegetable oil + 3 cups bread flour + 1 teaspoon salt

name: White Bread For The Bread Machine
summary: Bread machine white bread. Plain, simple, gets the job done, and tastes great.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 3 cups bread flour + 2<U+2009>¼ teaspoons active dry yeast

name: Bread Machine Rolls
summary: These are the BEST dinner rolls I've ever made. They also make great buns for sandwiches. For a festive presentation, sprinkle with poppy or sesame seeds before baking.
process: prep: 1 hr 20 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen rolls
ingredient: 3 cups bread flour + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ cup dry milk powder + 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 2 tablespoons butter, softened + 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 1 egg white + 2 tablespoons water

name: Bread Machine Focaccia
summary: This is fantastic with olive oil and balsamic vinegar with a little grated Parmesan cheese.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 2 hrs 30 mins,total: 3 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 cup lukewarm water + 2 tablespoons olive oil + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons chopped garlic + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary + 3 cups bread flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons active dry yeast + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chopped fresh rosemary

name: Clone of a Cinnabon
summary: You have got to try this Cinnabon recipe. The first time I made these rolls, I thought of how much money I could save by making my own!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 2 hrs 25 mins,total: 3 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 rolls
ingredient: 1 cup warm milk (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 2 eggs, room temperature + <U+2153> cup margarine, melted + 4<U+2009>½ cups bread flour + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup white sugar + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons bread machine yeast + 1 cup brown sugar, packed + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons ground cinnamon + <U+2153> cup butter, softened + 1<U+2009>½ cups confectioners' sugar + ¼ cup butter, softened + 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + <U+215B> teaspoon salt

name: Plain and Simple Sourdough Bread
summary: Simple sourdough bread for the bread machine.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 -1/2 pound loaf
ingredient: ¾ cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1 cup sourdough starter + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 2<U+2009><U+2154> cups bread flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons active dry yeast

name: Bread Machine Bagels
summary: Quick and easy bagels you can make with your bread machine! You can use whatever topping that you wish, many like poppy seeds.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 3 hrs 25 mins,total: 3 hrs 55 mins,Servings: 9,Yield: 9 bagels
ingredient: 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 3 cups bread flour + 2<U+2009>¼ teaspoons active dry yeast + 3 quarts boiling water + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon cornmeal + 1 egg white + 3 tablespoons poppy seeds

name: French Baguettes
summary: Great eaten fresh from oven. Used to make sub sandwiches, etc.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 1 hr 50 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 2 baguettes
ingredient: 1 cup water + 2<U+2009>½ cups bread flour + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons bread machine yeast + 1 egg yolk + 1 tablespoon water

name: World's Easiest Bread Machine Pizza Dough
summary: Borrowed from a handful of other pizza dough recipes and tweaked to yield a tasty, thick crust using a bread machine. If you use a pizza stone, sprinkle it with cornmeal before placing the pizza on it to help keep it from sticking. Feel free to try different spices if you don't like any of the ones in this recipe.
process: prep: 2 hrs,additional: 5 mins,total: 2 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 1 crust
ingredient: 1 cup warm water + 3 tablespoons olive oil + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon sea salt + 3 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + ¼ teaspoon dried oregano + ¼ teaspoon dried basil + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon dried cilantro + ¼ teaspoon paprika + 2<U+2009>¼ teaspoons active dry yeast

name: Banana Bread - Quick Bread for Machines
summary: A quick banana bread for the bread machine. Use the DOUGH setting for mixing, then BAKE with the control set to light.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 1-pound loaf
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ¾ cup white sugar + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 2 eggs + 2 bananas, peeled and halved lengthwise

name: Caraway Rye Bread (for the bread machine)
summary: A nice-flavored light rye loaf with lots of caraway seeds. Sweetened with both brown sugar and molasses. Allow to cool before slicing.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ cups lukewarm water (100 degrees F/38 degrees C) + 2 tablespoons dry milk powder + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 tablespoons molasses + 2 tablespoons butter + ¾ cup whole wheat flour + 1<U+2009>¾ cups bread flour + ¾ cup rye flour + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons caraway seeds + 1<U+2009>¾ teaspoons active dry yeast

name: Honey Wheat Oat Flour Bread Machine Bread
summary: After getting our bread machine, we were searching for our perfect daily loaf of bread. After some experimenting we found it! This blend of flours gave us a light, sweet bread perfect for soft sandwiches, toast, or just eating straight out of the pan.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 3 hrs 20 mins,total: 3 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 1/2-pound loaf
ingredient: ¾ cup water (80 degrees F/27 degrees C) + ¾ cup milk (80 degrees F/27 degrees C) + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons vegetable oil + 6 tablespoons honey + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + ¾ cup oats + 1 cup oat flour + 1<U+2009>¼ cups wheat flour + 1<U+2009>¼ cups bread flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons active dry yeast

name: Gluten-Free Bread in a Bread Machine
summary: Make this gluten-free bread in your bread maker. It's not as good as normal bread, but it's pretty good if you must avoid gluten. The mixture will look more like cake batter than bread dough in your machine, don't worry, it will be okay. The loaf may sink while it's baking, leaving a crusty, crunchy bowl on the exposed end, which you will want to slice off and discard. The finished bread will be quite firm and heavy, and I recommend slicing it thin. It makes good toast, but it toasts slowly. I use my darkest toaster setting and have to run that twice to get golden brown toast.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr 45 mins,total: 1 hr 55 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups warm water + 2 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon cider vinegar + 2<U+2009>½ cups gluten-free all-purpose baking flour + 2 teaspoons xanthan gum + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 tablespoon active dry yeast

name: Cinnamon Swirl Bread for the Bread Machine
summary: This bread is probably the best thing I make. Just finished making it and half a loaf is gone already while it was cooling. Using the bread machine to make the dough makes it so easy!
process: prep: 1 hr 15 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 1 cup milk + 2 eggs + ¼ cup butter + 4 cups bread flour + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons active dry yeast + ½ cup chopped walnuts + ½ cup packed brown sugar + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 2 tablespoons softened butter, divided + 2 teaspoons sifted confectioners' sugar, divided (Optional)

name: Soft, Moist and Gooey Cinnamon Buns

name: Ciabatta Bread

But if you let it cool a bit, it shouldn't be a problem. Toasted with a little butter and jam, it is a slice of heaven!

name: Bread Machine Almond Bread
summary: I wanted a bread with some extra protein for breakfast, so I came up with this. This is an excellent very faintly sweet breakfast bread with an unusual but satisfyingly 'bread' texture. The crust has a great flaky/chewy consistency while remaining soft. It is dense but not heavy and the extra protein from the almond flour keeps the mid-morning munchies away. It is very good with a slice of cheese and some fruit on the side. This is not (nor was it intended to be) a gluten-free recipe; the addition of vital gluten is critical to maintain cell structure for the rise. The xanthan gum is only in there because I like the ability to slice my homemade bread and use it for sandwiches.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: pound loaf
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ cups water + 4 teaspoons almond oil + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ cup honey + 1 cup almond flour + 2 cups whole wheat flour + ¼ cup vital wheat gluten + 1 teaspoon xanthan gum + 1 (.25 ounce) package dry yeast

name: Dark Rye Bread
