summary: A moist zucchini bread with lemon and pistachio for a unique flavor.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 2 9x5-inch loaves
ingredient: cooking spray + 3<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 4 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 1 cup vegetable oil + ½ cup plain yogurt + 1 small lemon, zested + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups grated zucchini + 1 cup chopped pistachio nuts

name: Addictive Pumpkin Muffins
summary: This is my lower fat version of a pumpkin bread recipe using extra pumpkin and no oil. You can also substitute artificial sweetener for half of the sugar, and some whole wheat flour for nutrition, and they still taste great. They freeze very well; just microwave a frozen muffin for 20 to 30 seconds and it's ready.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 36,Yield: 36 muffins
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups raisins + 4<U+2009>¾ cups all-purpose flour + 4 cups white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons nutmeg + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons cinnamon + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cloves + 6 eggs + 1 (29 ounce) can pumpkin + 1 cup unsweetened applesauce + 1 cup chopped walnuts

name: Cream Cheese Filled Pumpkin Muffins
summary: There's nothing I like better than a certain coffee chain's 'Pumpkin Spice Latte' and one of their 'Pumpkin Cream Cheese Muffins.' I don't like paying the price, so I cloned them to the best of my ability at home.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 muffins
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ¼ teaspoon ground allspice + ¼ teaspoon ground cloves + 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice + ¼ teaspoon ground cardamom + ½ teaspoon ground ginger + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon baking soda + 1 cup packed dark brown sugar + 2 eggs + ½ cup vegetable oil + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 (15 ounce) can cooked pumpkin + 4 ounces cream cheese + 2 tablespoons sunflower seeds, as garnish

name: Pumpkin Cheese Bread II
summary: This is the best pumpkin bread you'll ever eat. I have been making this recipe for years and I always get asked for the recipe. It has a yummy cream cheese filling in the middle of the loaf.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 20 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 2 - 8x4 inch loaves
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + ½ cup white sugar + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon orange zest + 1.666 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground cloves + ½ teaspoon pumpkin pie spice + 1 cup pumpkin puree + ½ cup vegetable oil + 2 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar

name: Glazed Pumpkin Donuts
summary: Pumpkin + donuts = awesome! These cake donuts are baked and then glazed lightly or covered in cinnamon-sugar.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen donuts
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + ½ cup packed brown sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons pumpkin pie spice + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + 1 cup pumpkin puree + 2 eggs + ¼ cup milk + ¼ cup butter, softened + 1<U+2009>½ cups confectioners' sugar + ¼ cup butter, melted + 2 tablespoons water + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Strawberry Bread
summary: This is wonderful hot or cold, for breakfast or as a dessert. A definite family favorite!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 9-inch loaves
ingredient: 2 cups fresh strawberries + 3<U+2009><U+215B> cups all-purpose flour + 2 cups white sugar + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1<U+2009>¼ cups vegetable oil + 4 eggs, beaten + 1<U+2009>¼ cups chopped pecans

name: Navajo Fry Bread II
summary: As far as I know this is the original recipe for Navajo Bread. It's is great with honey and butter. The Navajo put chiles, cheese, onion, lettuce and beans on it, and call them Nava Tacos.
ingredient: 2 cups oil for frying + 4 cups all-purpose flour + 3 tablespoons baking powder + 2 tablespoons salt + 2<U+2009>½ cups warm milk

name: Jalapeno Green Onion Ale Corn Bread
summary: This sweet and spicy corn bread is perfect for a Mexican meal or grilled food.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 1 cup cornmeal + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup buttermilk + ½ cup beer (brown ale- or pilsner-style) + ½ cup butter, melted + 2 eggs, beaten + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 4 green onions, chopped + 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, chopped

name: Extreme Banana Nut Bread 'EBNB'
summary: This banana nut bread is my mom's recipe: dense, excellent, and definitely indulgent. It's always completely gone in minutes. This is great at parties, but never lasts long at home. Warning: EBNB may be impossible to resist!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 35 mins,total: 1 hr 50 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 9x5-inch loaves
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 cups white sugar + 1 cup butter, softened + 2 cups mashed overripe bananas + 4 large eggs, beaten + 1 cup chopped walnuts

name: Copycat of Starbucks® Lemon Bread
summary: A Starbucks® favorite that you can copycat in your own kitchen. Recipe shared with me by a friend. Delicious with a cup of fresh-brewed coffee.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 55 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix + 2 (2.9 ounce) packages non-instant lemon pudding mix + ½ cup vegetable oil + 4 large eggs + 8 ounces sour cream + ½ cup milk + 6 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice + 2<U+2009>½ cups confectioners' sugar + 3 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, or more to taste

name: Chocolate-Cherry Scones
summary: These scones are made with Amarena cherries, which refers to a variety of dark wild cherry from the Bologna and Modena regions of Italy. They are typically sold preserved in a sweet syrup. They have an intense sweet cherry flavor, and pair perfectly with chocolate.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + ¼ teaspoon salt + ½ cup cold butter, cubed + 1 cup Amarena cherries in syrup, drained and halved (syrup reserved) + ¼ cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips + ½ cup heavy cream + 1 large egg + 1 tablespoon heavy cream + ¼ cup powdered sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons milk

name: Chef John's Banana Bread
summary: Banana bread is one of those things people rarely make on purpose, only when those last three bananas are almost black. This scrumptious banana-walnut loaf, spiked with dark chocolate chips, is so good you'll want to make it well before the bananas get to that condition.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x4 inch loaf
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ cup butter, softened + 3 ripe bananas, mashed + 1 cup white sugar + 2 large eggs + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 tablespoon milk + 1 cup chopped walnuts + <U+2153> cup semisweet chocolate chips

name: Plain Cake Doughnuts
summary: A cake donut recipe that's simple to make and lightly spiced with cinnamon and nutmeg. Coat with cinnamon sugar or a confectioners' sugar glaze.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + ½ cup white sugar + 1 tablespoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 dash ground nutmeg + 2 tablespoons melted butter + ½ cup milk + 1 egg, beaten + 1 quart oil for frying

name: High-Fiber Breakfast Muffins
summary: This delicious muffin makes wholesome eating fun. This muffin is low in fat, and has good carbs and lots of fiber. It's great for heart health and wonderful for diabetics because of the oats, fiber, and low fat. It's also not too heavy like most high-fiber muffins and it tastes great. It just uses one bowl, which make everyone's life easier!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen muffins
ingredient: 1 cup old-fashioned oats + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ½ cup whole wheat flour + ¾ teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ¾ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ½ teaspoon sea salt + 1 cup unsweetened applesauce + 2 egg whites + ½ cup skim milk + ½ cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons canola oil + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + ½ cup fresh raspberries + ¼ cup fresh blueberries + ¼ cup fresh blackberries

name: Homemade Arepas
summary: I first tasted arepas at a New York City hole-in-the-wall eatery and I fell in love with this stuffed white corn cake. Halfway through my first arepa — one stuffed with black beans, beef, plantains, and salty cheese — I vowed to learn how to make these at home. It's a truly magnificent delivery system for any number of your favorite fillings. I went with some spicy pork and avocado, but I made a version a few days later stuffed with caramelized plantains and salty goat feta.
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups lukewarm water + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 cups pre-cooked white cornmeal (such as P.A.N.®) + ¼ cup vegetable oil, or as needed

name: Air Fryer Apple Fritters
summary: These yummy apple fritters can be made in under 30 minutes with the help of an air fryer! Serve with vanilla ice cream if desired.
ingredient: cooking spray + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ¼ cup white sugar + ¼ cup milk + 1 egg + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1 pinch salt + 2 tablespoons white sugar + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 apple - peeled, cored, and chopped + ½ cup confectioners' sugar + 1 tablespoon milk + ½ teaspoon caramel extract (such as Watkins™) + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Janet's Rich Banana Bread
summary: This is the moistest banana bread that I have ever tasted. It's also very easy to make!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf
ingredient: ½ cup butter, melted + 1 cup white sugar + 2 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup sour cream + ½ cup chopped walnuts + 2 medium bananas, sliced

name: Golden Sweet Cornbread
summary: If you like sweet cornbread, this is the recipe for you! My mom made this for me as a child, and now it's my family's favorite.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 9 inch round pan
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 cup yellow cornmeal + <U+2154> cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon salt + 3<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1 egg + 1 cup milk + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil

name: Aunt Norma's Rhubarb Muffins
summary: These fabulous muffins have a crunchy sweet sugar topping and are great with no extra added butter or jam.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 dozen muffins
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>¼ cups brown sugar + ½ cup vegetable oil + 1 egg + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup buttermilk + 1<U+2009>½ cups diced rhubarb + ½ cup chopped walnuts + 1 tablespoon melted butter + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: World's Best Lemon Blueberry Muffins
summary: If you're looking for a lemon blueberry muffin recipe that is moist and not overly sweet, this is the one for you. I swear by this recipe!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 muffins
ingredient: 3<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 4 teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups white sugar + 1<U+2009>¼ cups milk + 1 cup sour cream + ½ cup melted butter + 2 large eggs + 1 tablespoon lemon zest + 1<U+2009>½ cups frozen blueberries

name: Chocolate Chip Muffins
summary: You won't believe how easily and quickly you can have chocolate chip muffins on the table using this recipe.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + ½ cup white sugar + 3 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ¾ cup milk + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 1 egg + ¾ cup mini semi-sweet chocolate chips + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 2 tablespoons brown sugar

name: Homemade Flour Tortillas
summary: Traditional flour tortillas - homemade and much better than store bought. Do not substitute vegetable oil or shortening for the lard.
ingredient: 4 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 2 tablespoons lard + 1<U+2009>½ cups water

name: Simple Scones
summary: A scone recipe for sweet bakery treats that will make a holiday breakfast or afternoon tea special.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 scones
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + <U+2153> cup sugar + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + 8 tablespoons unsalted butter, frozen + ½ cup raisins (or dried currants) + ½ cup sour cream + 1 large egg + 1 teaspoon white sugar

name: Basic Biscuits
summary: This is an easy homemade biscuit recipe with baking powder used as the leavening. The biscuits turn out perfectly soft and flaky on the inside every time.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup shortening + ¾ cup cold milk

name: Scones
summary: This is a very simple recipe for scones. You can customize them by adding dried fruit or nuts. Half and half can also be substituted for milk if you wish.
ingredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour + ½ cup white sugar + 5 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ¾ cup butter + 1 egg, beaten + 1 cup milk

name: Best Ever Muffins
summary: Start with this basic recipe, and add one of several different ingredients for a variety of different muffins.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 3 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ¾ cup white sugar + 1 egg + 1 cup milk + ¼ cup vegetable oil

name: Chef John's Buttermilk Biscuits
summary: This deceptively simple buttermilk biscuit recipe can come out a million different ways with some very minor variations on the ingredients and amounts. This one's my favorite — flaky, but not dry; chewy, but not tough; and crisp in just the right spots. Ice-cold butter and some extra dough folding are key to having lots of flaky layers in each golden brown buttermilk biscuit.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 7 tablespoons unsalted butter, chilled in freezer and cut into thin slices + ¾ cup cold buttermilk + 2 tablespoons buttermilk for brushing

name: Funnel Cakes
summary: This funnel cake recipe will let you enjoy a delicious old-fashioned treat without going to a county fair. You'll need a funnel with a 1/2-inch opening that can hold a cup of batter.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 3 large cakes
ingredient: 1 quart vegetable oil for frying, or as needed + 1<U+2009>½ cups milk + 2 large eggs + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon salt + ¾ cup confectioners' sugar

name: Grandmother's Buttermilk Cornbread
summary: The best cornbread recipe is my grandmother's, and this is it—sweet and moist!
ingredient: ½ cup butter + <U+2154> cup white sugar + 2 large eggs + 1 cup buttermilk + ½ teaspoon baking soda + 1 cup cornmeal + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Classic Bran Muffins
summary: These bran muffins are a delicious source of fiber! My family has them almost every morning. They're great! You may substitute dates for the raisins if you wish.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups wheat bran + 1 cup buttermilk + <U+2154> cup brown sugar + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 1 egg + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup raisins

name: Banana Oat Muffins
summary: An oatmeal banana muffin that's a healthy and delicious morning treat!
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups unbleached all-purpose flour + 1 cup rolled oats + ½ cup white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 egg + ¾ cup milk + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup mashed bananas

name: Banana Sour Cream Bread
summary: This banana bread recipe with sour cream is just wonderful! I know, you're probably thinking, "Oh no! Another banana bread recipe!" But this one is a little different: the sour cream makes this one so moist it melts in your mouth. This one is great for gift giving and holidays. Loaves freeze well.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 32,Yield: 4 7x3-inch loaves
ingredient: 3<U+2009>¼ cups white sugar, divided + 3 teaspoons ground cinnamon, divided + ¾ cup butter + 6 very ripe bananas, mashed + 1 (16 ounce) container sour cream + 3 eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 4<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 3 teaspoons baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup chopped walnuts (Optional)

name: Rhubarb Bread I
summary: Rhubarb is one of the wonderful gifts of spring. This bread will turn it into a delicious treat for the whole family.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 40 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 2 - 9x5 inch loaves
ingredient: 1 cup milk + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups brown sugar + <U+2154> cup vegetable oil + 1 egg + 2<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped rhubarb + ½ cup chopped walnuts + ¼ cup brown sugar + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon butter, melted

name: Bannock
summary: Bannock bread was made by our ancestors when on the trail. Try throwing in blueberries or raisins for added flavor.
ingredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + ¼ cup butter, melted

name: Banana Crumb Muffins
summary: The best banana muffin recipes have a sweet crumb topping which is what makes these banana muffins stand apart from the ordinary. They're scrumptious!
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 3 bananas, mashed + ¾ cup white sugar + <U+2153> cup butter, melted + 1 egg, lightly beaten + <U+2153> cup packed brown sugar + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + <U+215B> teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon butter

name: Moist Chocolate Muffins
summary: These tasty chocolate muffins are scrumptious! Yogurt in the batter keeps them super moist while cocoa powder and chocolate chips add a huge dose of chocolaty goodness. They're even better the next day.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips, divided + ½ cup unsweetened cocoa powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 cup plain yogurt + ½ cup milk + ½ cup vegetable oil + 1 large egg + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Donut Muffins
summary: Mini muffins that taste just like cinnamon sugar doughnut holes! The secret ingredient is nutmeg.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 mini muffins
ingredient: ½ cup white sugar + ¼ cup margarine, melted + ¾ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ½ cup milk + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ¼ cup margarine, melted + ½ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Easy Mayonnaise Biscuits
summary: This recipe is amazing.
ingredient: 1 cup self-rising flour + ½ cup milk + ¼ cup mayonnaise

name: Two-Ingredient Cream Biscuits
summary: A small batch of biscuits ready in less than 20 minutes. And made with only 2 ingredients!
ingredient: 1 cup self-rising flour, plus more for kneading + ¾ cup heavy whipping cream

name: Amazingly Easy Irish Soda Bread
summary: A good old fashioned soda bread with just the basic ingredients. Buttermilk gives this crusty loaf a good flavor. The best Irish soda bread around!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 1 1 1/2 pound loaf
ingredient: 4 cups all-purpose flour + 4 tablespoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 tablespoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup margarine, softened + 1 cup buttermilk + 1 egg + ¼ cup butter, melted + ¼ cup buttermilk

name: Sourdough Starter
summary: Make your starter in a glass container and store in the refrigerator after fermentation has occurred.
ingredient: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 2 cups warm water + 2 cups all-purpose flour

name: Chef John's Sourdough Bread
summary: Making your own sourdough bread does take a while, but the amount of actual work is minimal--and the bread you'll get is spectacular! See the footnote link to how to make the sourdough starter.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 21 hrs,total: 21 hrs 35 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 100 grams sourdough starter + 250 grams water + 8 grams kosher salt + 394 grams bread flour + rice flour for bread form (banneton) + 1 10-inch banneton (proofing basket)

name: Ekmek Turkish Bread
summary: Ekmek is a light and slightly sour flatbread that tastes wonderful with Havarti cheese. It uses a starter which ferments for 4 days. I recommend using a pizza stone to bake the loaves on. If you've no pizza stone, cookie sheets will work also. The recipe seems complicated, but it's a lot easier than it appears.
process: prep: 1 hr,cook: 40 mins,additional: 4 days 2 hrs 20 mins,total: 4 days 4 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups bread flour, divided + ¾ cup water, divided + 5 teaspoons active dry yeast + 1 teaspoon white sugar + 2 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 6 cups bread flour + 2 teaspoons salt

name: French Country Bread
summary: A simple European-style country bread. Just enough whole wheat to give it some flavor but not so much that it's heavy. I use an overnight starter to give it extra flavor.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 1 day 1 hr 45 mins,total: 1 day 2 hrs 55 mins,Servings: 30,Yield: 2 9x5-inch loaves
ingredient: ½ teaspoon active dry yeast + 1 cup warm water + 1<U+2009>½ cups bread flour + 2 teaspoons active dry yeast + 2 cups warm water + 1 cup whole wheat flour + 4<U+2009>½ cups bread flour, divided + 2 teaspoons salt

name: Sourdough Rosemary Crackers
summary: If you love making your own sourdough bread, don't toss out the discard every time you feed and refresh your starter. Turn this flavorful, but unused, product into amazingly delicious (and amazingly easy to make) homemade crackers. With just the right amount of crunch and flavor, you won't be able to stop snacking. Fully cooled crackers can be stored in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 1 week.
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 cup sourdough starter discard + ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil + 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh rosemary + 1 teaspoon kosher salt + olive oil cooking spray + ½ teaspoon flaked sea salt

name: Gluten-Free Sourdough Starter
summary: This is a step-by-step guide on how to begin a gluten-free sourdough starter without yeast. The amounts here are for getting the mother dough started. You will need to keep extra flour mix on-hand to continue feeding as long as you want to keep the starter. Once it begins to have a sponge-like consistency, it is ready to use and should be kept in the fridge or else it will grow wild all over the counter. Add a bit of the starter in your favorite recipes calling for yeast or baking powder for a unique flavor and texture.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 4 days,total: 4 days 10 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 sourdough starter
ingredient: 3 cups brown rice flour + 3 cups buckwheat flour + filtered water, at room temperature, as needed

name: Sourdough Scones
summary: While trying to use up some excess sourdough starter, I developed this recipe. The scones come out really tender and moist and my kids love the cinnamon-y taste from the apple pie spice.
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups bread flour + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon cream of tartar + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon apple pie spice + <U+2153> cup cold butter + 1<U+2009>¼ cups sourdough starter + 2 tablespoons milk (Optional) + 2 tablespoons coarse sugar, for garnish

name: San Francisco Sourdough Bread
summary: Use a good sourdough starter, one you have tended to, for best flavor.
ingredient: 4<U+2009>¾ cups bread flour + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 1 cup warm milk + 2 tablespoons margarine, softened + 1<U+2009>½ cups sourdough starter + 1 extra large egg + 1 tablespoon water + ¼ cup chopped onion

name: Sourdough Soft Pretzels
summary: Soft, buttery hand-rolled and twisted soft pretzels made with the tang of sourdough. For more tried and true recipes, please visit my blog: Jennifer Cooks.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 1 hr 5 mins,total: 1 hr 55 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 large pretzels
ingredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup unfed sourdough starter + ¾ cup lukewarm water, or more as needed + ¼ cup powdered milk + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 tablespoon instant yeast + 1 teaspoon salt + 3 cups water + 3 tablespoons baking soda + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon water + 1 tablespoon coarse sea salt + 4 tablespoons butter, melted

name: Amish Friendship Bread III
summary: A delicious way to use your Amish Friendship Starter. It's packed with apples, nuts and spices.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 cup Amish Friendship Bread Starter + 3 eggs + <U+2154> cup vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon vanilla extract + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 2 apples - peeled, cored and finely chopped

name: Salt Rising Bread
summary: THIS IS NOT AN EASY BREAD TO MAKE! It is tricky, but worth the effort for one who loves that very different, pungent smell of salt-rising bread. The cornmeal used for the starter must contain the inner germ of the corn and a constant warm temperature must be maintained.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 1 day 10 mins,total: 1 day 1 hr,Servings: 36,Yield: 3 -9x5 inch loaves
ingredient: 1 cup milk + ½ cup cornmeal + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 3 tablespoons shortening + ½ teaspoon baking soda + 1 tablespoon warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 6 cups all-purpose flour

name: Sourdough Pizza Crust Dough
summary: Great sourdough pizza dough to top with your favorites.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 7 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 47 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 1 pizza crust
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups sourdough starter + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Chef John's Sourdough Starter
summary: Here's part 1 of my 2-part recipe for sourdough bread. It takes 4 days to make the starter, but there's really not much to it other than 'feeding' the starter once a day for about 10 days.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 week 3 days,total: 1 week 3 days 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 700 grams bread flour + 700 grams filtered water, divided

name: Herman Sourdough Starter
summary: This is a recipe for a sweet sourdough starter known as Herman. There are a number of things that can be made from it. It's very important to NOT use metal utensils or bowls! It will take 15 days for the starter to mature and be ready to use the first time you make it. After that it can be ready for use every 10 days.
process: prep: 30 mins,additional: 6 days 22 hrs 10 mins,total: 6 days 22 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 4 cups
ingredient: 2<U+2009>¼ teaspoons active dry yeast + 2 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 2 cups all-purpose flour + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 cup white sugar, divided + 2 cups all-purpose flour, divided + 2 cups milk, divided

name: Sourdough Starter II
summary: Prepare the starter in a glass container. Store the covered container in the refrigerator when the starter is done. The starter dough may smell very sour and liquid may form on its surface, but this is normal. Stir the starter before each use. After using some of the starter, be sure 1 cup of starter is left in the container.
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 2 days 1 hr 55 mins,total: 2 days 2 hrs,Servings: 3,Yield: 3 cups starter
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast

name: Air Fryer Sourdough Bread
summary: Fragrant sourdough bread made in an air fryer. This method is perfect for the hot months when you don't want to heat up the kitchen but still want fresh homemade sourdough. The bread should be stored wrapped in a clean cloth inside a plastic bag. It will keep for about 3 days.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 hrs,total: 5 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 small loaf
ingredient: 1 cup bread flour + ½ cup spelt flour + ½ cup sourdough starter + 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil + ½ teaspoon fine sea salt + ½ cup water

name: Sourdough Bread III
summary: This recipe won 1st place in the sourdough category of the Michigan State Fair 3 years in a row! Best if baked in a cloche, a covered stoneware baking stone.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr 40 mins,total: 2 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 2 pound loaf
ingredient: 1 tablespoon active dry yeast + 3 tablespoons wheat germ + 3 tablespoons sugar + 1 tablespoon salt + 4 cups bread flour + 1<U+2009>½ cups sourdough starter + 3 tablespoons margarine, softened + 1 cup milk + 1 tablespoon cornmeal

name: Long-Fermentation Sourdough Bread
summary: Tangy and soft, this sourdough bread is one of the most basic recipes you can make. This recipe makes one loaf, but feel free to multiply the ingredient ratios for a larger batch. You won't be disappointed!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 12 hrs,total: 12 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup water + <U+2153> cup sourdough starter + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 1 tablespoon white sugar + ¾ teaspoon sea salt + 1 teaspoon oil, or as needed + ½ cup all-purpose flour, or more as needed + 1 teaspoon butter, or as needed + 1 egg, beaten

name: Biga
summary: A biga, or 'starter', adds flavor and extra leavening power to bread dough.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 1 day,total: 1 day 20 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 5 cups
ingredient: ¾ teaspoon active dry yeast + ½ cup warm water + 3<U+2009>½ cups unbleached bread flour + 1<U+2009>¼ cups cold water

name: Sourdough Rye
summary: This bread takes a bit of time, but your effort is repaid with two chewy, flavorful loaves.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 1 day 30 mins,total: 1 day 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 1 cup sourdough starter + 1 cup rye flour + ½ cup bread flour + <U+2154> cup water (Optional) + ¼ cup water (Optional) + 1 cup rye flour + 1 cup bread flour + ½ tablespoon salt (Optional) + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 tablespoon caraway seed + ½ cup water (Optional) + 1 teaspoon salt (Optional)

name: Sourdough Soft Pretzels
summary: Soft, buttery hand-rolled and twisted soft pretzels made with the tang of sourdough. For more tried and true recipes, please visit my blog: Jennifer Cooks.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 1 hr 5 mins,total: 1 hr 55 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 large pretzels
ingredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup unfed sourdough starter + ¾ cup lukewarm water, or more as needed + ¼ cup powdered milk + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 tablespoon instant yeast + 1 teaspoon salt + 3 cups water + 3 tablespoons baking soda + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon water + 1 tablespoon coarse sea salt + 4 tablespoons butter, melted

name: Amish Cinnamon Bread
summary: This bread can be frozen and is very easy to make.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 36,Yield: 3 loaves
ingredient: 1 cup Amish Friendship Bread Starter + 1 cup vegetable oil + 1 cup white sugar + 4 eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 (3 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 cup chopped pecans + 1 cup peeled, cored and chopped apple + 1 cup raisins

name: Rory's Guaranteed Rise Sourdough Cinnamon Rolls
summary: This is my go-to recipe for cinnamon rolls, sticky buns, etc. The sourdough starter we use has been passed down for generations in my husband's family. It gives the rolls the characteristic sourdough punch that contrasts well with the sweet filling and frosting.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 2 hrs 10 mins,total: 3 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 4 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup fed sourdough starter + ¾ cup lukewarm milk + ¾ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon instant yeast + ½ cup butter, melted and cooled + 1 egg, at room temperature + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup butter, melted and cooled + 1 cup brown sugar, or more to taste + 3 tablespoons ground cinnamon + ½ pound confectioners' sugar + 1 (4 ounce) package softened cream cheese + ¼ cup softened butter + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: The French Bread
summary: This French bread recipe has been perfected to my satisfaction - crunchy on the outside, and soft airiness on the inside. I hope you enjoy these stunning loaves!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 2 cups sourdough starter + 10 tablespoons water + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons olive oil + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 tablespoon active dry yeast + 4 cups all-purpose flour, or more if needed + 2 teaspoons cornmeal + 2 cups boiling water + 1 egg yolk + 1 tablespoon milk

name: Amish Friendship Chocolate Bread
summary: This is a great variation to the traditional Amish Friendship Bread. My family says it's like eating chocolate cake. This bread freezes well and makes a great gift.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 - 9x5 inch loaf pans
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 (5.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix + 1 cup Amish Friendship Bread Starter + 1 cup vegetable oil + ½ cup milk + 3 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Herman Bread
summary: A simple way to use your extra Herman Starter. Add one half cup of cheddar cheese for a totally different flavor.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 3 hrs,Servings: 15,Yield: 1 - 9x5 inch loaf
ingredient: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 1 cup lukewarm water + 1 cup Herman Sourdough Starter + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 3 cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon salt

name: Sourdough Discard Bread
summary: Like many people, I have been learning how to make sourdough. The biggest problem I have stumbled upon in my sourdough journey is the wastefulness of the discard part of all recipes, and with the lack of resources recently it's more important than ever to reuse the discard starter. In the spirit of zero waste, tonight I am testing a sourdough discard recipe.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 4 hrs 40 mins,total: 6 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups warm water (98 to 115 degrees F/37 to 46 degrees C) + 7 tablespoons sourdough starter discard + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons active dry yeast + 2 cups whole wheat flour + 4 teaspoons whole wheat flour + 2 cups bread flour + 4 teaspoons bread flour + 1<U+2009>¾ teaspoons salt + ¼ cup bread flour, or as needed

name: Sourdough Buckwheat Pancakes
summary: Buckwheat pancakes are the best! I love them with a fresh blueberry syrup and loads of sweet cream butter!
ingredient: 2 cups sourdough starter + 2 eggs, beaten + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 3 tablespoons white sugar + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 cup buckwheat flour + ½ cup all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon ground ginger

name: Chef Filip's Sourbread
summary: This recipe for sour starter is original and can not be found in any book. Follow the recipe step by step and allow yourself to make this unique recipe to a tasty end.
process: prep: 5 days,cook: 45 mins,total: 5 days 45 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + ½ teaspoon malt powder + ½ teaspoon honey + 7<U+2009>½ cups bread flour + 4<U+2009>¼ cups water + 2 teaspoons malt powder + 2<U+2009>½ cups sourdough starter + 5<U+2009><U+215B> cups bread flour + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + ¼ cup gluten + 2 teaspoons malt powder + 4 teaspoons salt

name: Sourdough Bread II
summary: Takes 3 to 5 days to make this wonderful tasting bread. It rivals San Francisco's Sourdough!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr 40 mins,additional: 2 hrs 30 mins,total: 4 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 30,Yield: 1 large or 2 medium loaves
ingredient: 2<U+2009>¼ teaspoons active dry yeast + ½ cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 2 cups bread flour + 2 cups warm water + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 teaspoon salt + 2<U+2009>¼ teaspoons active dry yeast + ½ cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1<U+2009>½ cups sourdough starter + 2 teaspoons white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + 5<U+2009>½ cups bread flour + 1 tablespoon butter, melted

name: Mock Sourdough Bread
summary: This mock version contains the best of sourdough combined with bread.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 1 hr 25 mins,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 8 mini loaves
ingredient: 3 (6 ounce) containers plain yogurt + 2 tablespoons active dry yeast + ½ cup warm water + 4 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed, divided + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 teaspoons salt + cold water as needed

name: Sourdough Baguettes
summary: This is a very tasty recipe that I make with my potato-based sourdough starter. Makes a lot, but never too much!
process: prep: 35 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 10 hrs,total: 11 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 2 baguettes
ingredient: 1 cup sourdough starter + 1<U+2009>½ cups warm water + 1 tablespoon active dry yeast + 5 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed, divided + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 2 teaspoons salt + ½ teaspoon baking soda + 2 tablespoons cornmeal, or as needed + cold water, as needed + 1 tablespoon melted butter, or as needed, divided

name: Danish Rye Bread
summary: This popular bread (Smørbrøds Brød) is used in Denmark for open-face sandwiches; it should be sliced about an inch thick. It can be made without the wheat flour; the wheat flour helps the loaf rise more quickly.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 16 hrs,total: 17 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 1 cup warm water + 1 tablespoon yeast + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 cup rye flour + 1 teaspoon yeast + 1 teaspoon white sugar + ½ cup warm water + 1 cup rye flour + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 1 cup warm water + 2 cups rye flour + 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour (Optional)

name: Gluten-Free Sourdough Sandwich Bread
summary: True sourdough flavor in a hearty, gluten-free bread ready for your sandwich fixings. I love the taste of this bread with butter and jam or toasted and served with soup, even though it is delicious on its own. It will hold up to spreading peanut butter or avocado.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 8 hrs 5 mins,total: 8 hrs 55 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: ½ cup gluten-free sourdough starter discard + 1 cup gluten-free all-purpose baking flour + ½ teaspoon fine sea salt + 10 tablespoons non-chlorinated water, or more if needed + 1 teaspoon vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon water + 2 teaspoons sesame seeds

name: Gluten-Free Sourdough Raisin Bread
summary: Cinnamon raisin bread made with gluten-free sourdough starter discard instead of commercial yeast. I made this recipe during the Covid-19 lockdown when yeast had disappeared from the supermarkets. This light and fluffy loaf is very easy to make because there is no kneading; it is more of a batter than a dough. This bread is delicious toasted.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 2 hrs 5 mins,total: 3 hrs,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: ¾ cup raisins + 2 cups gluten-free bread flour mix + ½ cup buckwheat flour + ¼ cup coconut sugar + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + 1 pinch cream of tartar + 1 pinch baking soda + ¾ cup whole milk, at room temperature + ½ cup gluten-free sourdough starter + 1 teaspoon agave nectar + 3 eggs, lightly beaten + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Honey Wheat Sourdough Bread with Quinoa
summary: A nutritious artisan bread with Old World taste and texture.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 4 hrs 5 mins,total: 5 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: 1 cup water (Optional) + ½ cup quinoa + 1<U+2009>½ cups sourdough starter + 1 cup milk + 3 tablespoons honey + 3 tablespoons olive oil + 1 tablespoon active dry yeast + 1 tablespoon salt + 2 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed + 1 teaspoon water, or as needed (Optional) + <U+215B> cup rolled oats (Optional)

name: Angie's Dilly Casserole Bread
summary: This super rich bread bakes up high and is full of flavor. It's a family recipe. It's even better toasted with lots of butter.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + ¼ cup warm water + 1 cup cottage cheese, room temperature + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon butter, room temperature, plus more as needed + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + 2 teaspoons dill seed + 1 tablespoon dried minced onion + 1 egg + 2<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour, or more if needed + 1 pinch salt

name: Basic Babka
summary: This Jewish treat is a hybrid of sweet roll, swirl bread, and coffee cake. It's a sweet yeast dough that you roll out, fill, and roll up like a jelly roll, then cut, twist, and bake in a loaf pan. Don't worry: It looks fancy (and it IS a little messy), but it's seriously easy to do. And once you get the dough down, you can try it with other fillings.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 3 hrs 20 mins,total: 4 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 3 loaves
ingredient: ½ cup white sugar + ¼ cup butter + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 cup hot milk (185 degrees F (85 degrees C)) + 2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast + ¼ cup warm water (110 degrees F (43 degrees C)) + 2 eggs + 4<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 3 eggs + 1 cup packed light brown sugar + <U+2153> cup butter, melted + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 4 cups walnuts, chopped + 2 tablespoons butter, melted

name: Asian Water Roux White Bread
summary: Secret to homemade bread that will stay soft for days! If you enjoy the silky, cotton-soft but expensive loaves from Chinese bakeries, then you will love these! My kids can't rave enough about them. It might be more work than the usual white bread, but trust me, this is so worth it! Water roux works best refrigerated overnight; however, if you don't want to wait, make sure it's room temperature when you add it to the dough! The dough is quite moist to work with. It is easier to do the kneading in a mixer.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 10 hrs,total: 10 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 2 loaves
ingredient: ½ cup water + 1 tablespoon white sugar + ¼ cup butter + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons active dry yeast + ¾ cup warm water + 3 cups all-purpose flour + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 3 tablespoons instant dry milk powder + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 egg + 2 teaspoons melted butter, divided

name: Lebanese Mountain Bread
summary: This flatbread brings me back to my early childhood when the Syrian lady across the street from my grandmother made it and always gave us some. It's my first food memory. The bread has a unique texture, gorgeous appearance, and fun-to-make technique.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 9 hrs 18 mins,total: 9 hrs 38 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 portions
ingredient: ½ cup bread flour + 1 teaspoon active dry yeast + 1 teaspoon white sugar + ½ cup warm water + ¾ teaspoon kosher salt + 1 tablespoon olive oil, plus extra to coat bowl + 1 cup bread flour, or more as needed

name: Mustard Wheat Rye Sandwich Bread
summary: This is a great sandwich bread. Makes a great grilled cheese or Rueben sandwich! I like to form this bread in a round circle, and bake free form in the la cloche!
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 1 1/2 pound loaf
ingredient: 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + ½ cup Dijon-style prepared mustard + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons molasses + 2 cups unbleached all-purpose flour + <U+2154> cup rye flour + <U+2154> cup whole wheat flour + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons vital wheat gluten + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons active dry yeast

name: Tiger Bread (Dutch Crunch Rolls)
summary: It recently came to my attention that outside of San Francisco, these rolls aren't really well known, which I think is a real shame since this combines a nice, soft, tender white bread roll with a slightly sweet, beautifully crunchy, and gorgeous crust that (depending on how things go) may or may not look like a tiger's skin.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 1 hr 45 mins,total: 2 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 rolls
ingredient: ½ cup milk + <U+2153> cup water + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 2<U+2009><U+2154> cups all-purpose flour + ¾ teaspoon kosher salt + 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, melted + 1 teaspoon unsalted butter, melted + <U+2153> cup rice flour + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 teaspoon white sugar + 1 pinch salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons vegetable oil + ½ teaspoon sesame oil + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons active dry yeast + ¼ cup warm water, or as needed

name: Dutch Oven Caraway Rye Bread
summary: No-fail and easy to make, no kneading, no double-rise. Caraway rye bread the way you like it! Perfect every time.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 18 hrs 15 mins,total: 19 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 2 cups light rye flour (such as Bob's Red Mill®) + 2 cups bread flour + ¼ cup buttermilk + 2 tablespoons caraway seeds + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons vital wheat gluten (Optional) + 2 teaspoons flaked kosher salt, crushed + 1<U+2009>¾ cups warm water + 2 teaspoons white sugar + <U+215C> teaspoon active dry yeast

name: Thin-Crust Pizza Dough
summary: A thin crust pizza dough recipe that's quick, easy, and delicious.
ingredient: ¾ cup lukewarm water + 1 teaspoon active dry yeast + ¼ teaspoon white sugar + 2 cups all-purpose flour, divided + ½ teaspoon salt

name: Wool Roll Bread
summary: I've spun quite a few yarns but one thing I've never done is make a bread that looks like a bunch of rolls of wool yarn. If this looks like it's going to be super hard and complicated, that's good-that's exactly what we want people to think. It'll be our little secret how simple and easy this technique is. Although it's great with a dark chocolate filling, this is really a technique recipe and video-this will work with just about any filling you can think of, like dried fruit, jams, custard, or go savory with cheese, meats, etc.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 2 hrs 40 mins,total: 3 hrs 55 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: ½ cup water + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + ½ cup whole milk, warmed + 2 teaspoons active dry yeast + 3 tablespoons white sugar + ¾ teaspoon kosher salt + 1 large egg, beaten + 2<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature + ½ cup dark chocolate chunks + 2 tablespoons whole milk

name: Traditional Layered French Croissants
summary: Crisp buttery outer layers and a soft, delicate interior make these delectable croissants melt in your mouth.
process: prep: 2 hrs 20 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 1 day 4 hrs,total: 1 day 6 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 dozen croissants
ingredient: 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>½ cups unsalted butter, at room temperature + 4 cups all-purpose flour, divided + ½ teaspoon salt + 3 tablespoons sugar + 2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast + ¼ cup lukewarm water + 1 cup milk + ½ cup heavy cream + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon water

name: Old World Poppy Seed Roll
summary: Tender, soft, sweet yeast bread swirled with a creamy homemade poppy seed filling. Growing up, my mother and aunts always made this Eastern European bread for Easter and Christmas. Looks complicated, but is easy enough to make for an Old-World treat. I like it best after the second day.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 filled loaves
ingredient: ½ pound poppy seeds + ¾ cup white sugar + 1 tablespoon butter, melted + 1 teaspoon lemon juice + ½ cup hot milk + 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + ½ cup warm water (100 degrees F/38 degrees C) + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 2 cups all-purpose flour, or more if needed + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ cup butter + 1 egg, separated - white reserved

name: Homemade Hamburger Buns
summary: These soft hamburger buns are perfect for burgers, pulled pork, or your favorite sandwich filling. I've gotten a thousand requests for these! Not only are these the perfect shape, but they taste way better than anything that comes out of a plastic bag. The total time takes almost 4 hours, but the actual amount of work involved is maybe 10 minutes.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 3 hrs 10 mins,total: 3 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 buns
ingredient: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast (such as Fleischmann's ActiveDry Yeast®) + 1 pound all-purpose flour, or as needed - divided + 1 cup warm water (105 degrees F/41 degrees C) + 2 large eggs, divided + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1<U+2009>¼ teaspoons salt + 1 teaspoon olive oil + 1 tablespoon milk + 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, or as needed

name: Simple Whole Wheat Bread
summary: A great-tasting whole wheat bread recipe, easy to make with simple ingredients.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 36,Yield: 3 loaves
ingredient: 3 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast + <U+2154> cup honey, divided + 5 cups bread flour + 5 tablespoons butter, melted, divided + 1 tablespoon salt + 4 cups whole wheat flour, or more as needed

name: Monkey Bread
summary: Refrigerated biscuits with cinnamon bake in a tube pan. My 7-year-old daughter, Leah, loves her monkey bread. Enjoy!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 1 tube pan
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 3 (12 ounce) packages refrigerated biscuit dough + ½ cup chopped walnuts (Optional) + ½ cup raisins (Optional) + ½ cup margarine + 1 cup packed brown sugar

name: Classic Dinner Rolls
summary: Soft, fluffy dinner rolls are simple to make from scratch and perfect to serve alongside any meal. Who can resist warm yeast rolls, fresh from the oven? Brush warm rolls with melted butter just before serving.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 40 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 rolls
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour, divided, or as needed + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 (.25 ounce) envelope Fleischmann's® RapidRise Yeast + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup milk + ¼ cup water + 2 tablespoons butter

name: Amish White Bread
summary: I got this white bread recipe from a friend. It is very easy and doesn't take long to make.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr 35 mins,total: 2 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 9x5-inch loaves
ingredient: 2 cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + <U+2154> cup white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons active dry yeast + ¼ cup vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 6 cups bread flour

name: Air Fryer Pretzel Bites
summary: These pretzel bites take minimal ingredients and minimal time to prepare. Serve salted, with mustard, cheese sauce, or with seasoning like cinnamon sugar, ranch seasoning, etc.,
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups self-rising flour + 1 cup full-fat Greek yogurt + 4 cups water + 1 tablespoon baking soda + cooking spray + 1 tablespoon coarse kosher salt, or to taste

name: White Bread For The Bread Machine
summary: Bread machine white bread. Plain, simple, gets the job done, and tastes great.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 loaf
ingredient: 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 3 cups bread flour + 2<U+2009>¼ teaspoons active dry yeast

name: Buttermilk Cinnamon Rolls
summary: Easy, yeasted cinnamon rolls. A crowd always gathers when they come out of the oven. Favorite activity: scraping the goo off the bottom of the pan.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 1 - 10x15 inch pan
ingredient: 2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast + ¼ cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1<U+2009>½ cups buttermilk + ½ cup vegetable oil + 4<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ cup butter, melted + 1<U+2009>¼ cups brown sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon

name: Beignets
summary: A traditional New Orleans–style beignet recipe. Grab a café au lait and you're set!
ingredient: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 1<U+2009>½ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1 cup evaporated milk + ½ cup white sugar + 2 eggs + 1 teaspoon salt + 7 cups all-purpose flour, divided + ¼ cup shortening + 1 quart vegetable oil for frying + ¼ cup confectioners' sugar

name: English Muffins
summary: This English muffin recipe has been made in my family for decades. They are very good and taste much better than store-bought English muffins. They're great with orange butter or cream cheese and jam.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 18
ingredient: 1 cup milk + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 6 cups all-purpose flour + ¼ cup melted shortening + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ cup cornmeal, or more as needed

name: South African Traditional Vetkoek (Fried Bread)
summary: Tasty vetkoek (fat cake) makes a lovely dinner or snack. You can make them any size you wish; they're a great party snack when made small. They can be filled with meat, tuna and mayo, syrup, curried minced meat, cheese, or basically anything you feel like using. They're fast, easy, and very tasty.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 6 mins,additional: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 16 mins,Servings: 12
ingredient: 2 cups lukewarm water + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 7 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons salt + 3 cups oil for frying

name: Two-Ingredient Air Fryer Bagels
summary: The base for these homemade bagels is a popular 2-ingredient pizza dough recipe. No yeast, no waiting for dough to rise, no boiling necessary. In and out of the air fryer in about 15 minutes. Optional toppings are everything bagel seasoning, poppy seeds, sesame seeds, or dried onion flakes.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,cool: 15 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 bagels
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ cups self-rising flour + 1 cup full-fat plain Greek yogurt + 1 large egg white, beaten + 3 teaspoons everything bagel seasoning

name: Ninety Minute Cinnamon Rolls
summary: Delicious cinnamon rolls made with a soft, quick rising dough.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 rolls
ingredient: ¾ cup milk + ¼ cup margarine, softened + 3<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 1 (.25 ounce) package instant yeast + ¼ cup white sugar + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ cup water + 1 egg + 1 cup brown sugar, packed + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + ½ cup margarine, softened + ½ cup raisins (Optional)

name: 2-Ingredient Dough Bagels
summary: Homemade bagels have never been easier. With this "magic" two-ingredient dough, you can have fresh and fluffy bagels, hot out of the oven, in as much time as it takes to make a batch of pancakes. While not as dense as the traditional New York-style, these chewy, golden bagels, garnished with your favorite cream cheese and flavorful toppings, will satisfy any bagel craving.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups self-rising flour, plus more for kneading + 1 cup plain Greek yogurt + 1 large egg + 2 teaspoons everything bagel seasoning, or to taste

name: Traditional White Bread
summary: A delicious white bread recipe with a very light center with crunchy crust. You may substitute butter or vegetable oil for the lard if you wish.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr 40 mins,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 2 9x5-inch loaves
ingredient: 2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 2<U+2009>½ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 6<U+2009>½ cups bread flour + 3 tablespoons lard, softened + 1 tablespoon salt

name: Quick Yeast Rolls
summary: This yeast rolls recipe was given to me by my great-great-grandmother. I made these easy rolls for a state fair competition and received first place.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 rolls
ingredient: 1 cup hot water + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 2 tablespoons shortening + 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 2<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 1 egg, beaten + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Plain and Simple Sourdough Bread
summary: Simple sourdough bread for the bread machine.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 -1/2 pound loaf
ingredient: ¾ cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1 cup sourdough starter + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 2<U+2009><U+2154> cups bread flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons active dry yeast

name: Chinese Steamed Buns
summary: These steamed buns are yummy Chinese dim sum that can be made with or without meat filling. To make these tasty buns, you'll need a wok equipped with a stainless steel steam plate. After steaming the buns, make sure to remove the lid carefully so condensation doesn't drip onto the buns, as this will produce yellowish blisters on the bun surface. You may use milk in place of the warm water if you wish.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 3 hrs 30 mins,total: 4 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 buns
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¾ cups all-purpose flour, divided + ¾ cup warm water, divided + 1 tablespoon active dry yeast + 1 teaspoon white sugar + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + ¼ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon baking powder

name: Two-Ingredient Dough Soft Pretzels
summary: You won't believe how easy it is to make homemade pretzels. With this 2-ingredient dough, you can have fresh, warm, and golden soft pretzels on your table in no time. Keep the toppings simple with melted butter and coarse salt, or take things over the top with cinnamon sugar or Parmesan Cheese. A quick bath in a baking soda solution will create the iconic, chewy crust you love from a soft pretzel.
ingredient: 2 teaspoons baking soda + 1 cup self-rising flour, plus more for kneading + 1 cup plain Greek yogurt + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 1 teaspoon coarse salt, or as needed

name: Chef John's Pita Bread
summary: This pita bread recipe is superior to the stuff you get at the grocery store; it's not even close. In addition to being delicious to eat, it's also extremely easy to make!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs 35 mins,total: 3 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 pita breads
ingredient: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 1 cup warm water (90 to 100 degrees F/32 to 38 degrees C) + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons olive oil + 1<U+2009>¾ teaspoons salt + 1<U+2009>¾ cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed + 1 teaspoon olive oil, divided

name: Chocolate Zucchini Bread I

name: Lemon Pistachio Zucchini Bread
summary: A moist zucchini bread with lemon and pistachio for a unique flavor.

ingredient: cooking spray + 3<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 4 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 1 cup vegetable oil + ½ cup plain yogurt + 1 small lemon, zested + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups grated zucchini + 1 cup chopped pistachio nuts

name: Mom's Zucchini Bread
summary: Really, really good and moist- my kids eat it as quickly as I can make it. Bread will freeze well, and keep in refrigerator for weeks.

name: Zucchini Bread with Coconut
summary: My favorite recipe for a zucchini bread with a hint of coconut. Make sure to squeeze out as much liquid from the zucchini as possible after grating, otherwise the cake can get too mushy.

name: Chef John's Zucchini Bread
summary: We're making cake out of zucchini and calling it bread. This is an extremely beautiful and delicious loaf; not to mention super fast and easy to make. In fact, in the business, this is what is referred to as a quick bread.

name: Pineapple Coconut Zucchini Bread
summary: A very moist flavorful zucchini bread. A great way to use up all that zucchini in the garden.

name: Banana-Zucchini Bread
summary: A combination of two favorites: banana nut bread and zucchini bread. The flavors combine and in each bite you get just a hint of both flavors.

ingredient: 3 eggs + ¾ cup vegetable oil + <U+2154> cup packed brown sugar + 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup grated zucchini + 2 bananas, mashed + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 3<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup dried cranberries + ½ cup chopped walnuts

name: Mom's Spiced Zucchini Bread
summary: This zucchini bread recipe is super moist and super spicy, loaded with cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves. I tried several recipes before I asked my mom for her recipe. I go to the farmers market every Saturday and get these huge zucchinis, and this is the perfect use for them. It reminds me of my childhood. The loaves can be frozen and are great as gifts. People love them.

ingredient: 2 cups white sugar + 1 cup vegetable oil + 3 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, or more to taste + 2 cups shredded zucchini + 3 cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg + ¼ teaspoon baking powder + ¼ teaspoon ground cloves + ½ cup chopped walnuts (Optional) + ½ cup raisins (Optional)

summary: Although I love zucchini bread, I wanted a new way to prepare it. After some thought I decided to try preparing it pumpkin bread style, since they are both in the squash family. I boiled my zucchini (skins attached), and then pureed it. It is so similar to pumpkin bread in texture, and the taste... it is out of this world.

summary: Delicious vegan zucchini bread. Fluffy. Mmm-hmmm.

summary: This top-secret family recipe for spicy, moist bread uses dates for a delicious change from ordinary zucchini bread. We like to spread warm slices with softened cream cheese for an extra-special treat!

summary: Makes great gifts around holidays. You may substitute raisins for the chocolate if you wish.

name: Kingman's Vegan Zucchini Bread
summary: Delicious vegan zucchini bread. Fluffy. Mmm-hmmm.

summary: I tried finding a recipe to get my picky toddler to eat her vegetables. Since I couldn't find a healthy one, I came up with this. Any type of nuts, raisins, etc. may be used in the recipe -- whatever is on hand and toddler approved.

name: Applesauce Zucchini Bread
summary: This is my first try at making this applesauce zucchini bread and I have to admit, it's a winner. I loved having a breakfast bread for my coffee. I had an extra loaf and took it into church to give to my ladies group...they loved too!

summary: A delicious, moist, bread which may be glazed with confectioners' sugar; tastes even better after it's been frozen.

summary: These are deliciously moist muffins that that'll disappear quickly! Use carrot or zucchini, or both if you prefer. I make a batch of each, then put some in the freezer (in Ziploc bags) for later, which usually isn't very long! My entire family just loves them!

After I made it the first time I can understand why. If I don't put this in the freezer right away, it is gone!!! Butter is really good on this bread if you aren't worried about the calories, fat, etc.

name: Carrot, Apple, and Zucchini Muffins

summary: This is a rich and moist one bowl chocolate cake. It only takes a few minutes to prepare the batter. Frost with your favorite chocolate frosting.

summary: This red velvet cake is constantly requested by friends and family...it has the best flavor, and features real cooked frosting for a delicious, yet light finish.

summary: Depending on where you're from, this hummingbird cake is either your favorite cake, or you've either never heard of it! But it only takes making it one time to love it.
