name: Lemon-Blueberry Cupcakes with Blueberry-Lemon Buttercream Frosting
summary: Zesty and bright, these cupcakes are sure to wow! A vibrant frosting (flavored with a quick homemade jam) sits atop a lemony, moist cupcake studded with colorful berries. Using frozen blueberries makes these cupcakes accessible any time of year, too!
process: prep: 2 hrs 50 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 55 mins,total: 4 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 18,Yield: 18 cupcakes
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups frozen blueberries + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon lemon juice + 1<U+2009>¾ cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup unsalted butter, softened + 2 large eggs, at room temperature + 3 tablespoons lemon juice + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons lemon zest + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + <U+2154> cup buttermilk, at room temperature + 1<U+2009>½ cups frozen blueberries + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + 1 cup unsalted butter, softened + 2 teaspoons lemon zest + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons lemon juice + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + 3<U+2009>½ cups powdered sugar + 1 tablespoon heavy cream

name: Old-Fashioned Lemon Pound Cake
summary: This is an old recipe that my grandmother always made. It goes great with coffee and is quick and easy to make. Light lemon flavor that can be accompanied with a lemon glaze if desired.
ingredient: 2 cups white sugar + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 5 eggs + 1 cup shortening (such as Crisco®) + 5 tablespoons whole milk + 1 tablespoon vanilla extract + 2 teaspoons lemon extract + ¼ teaspoon baking powder

name: Walnut-Cream Roll
summary: A wonderful walnut cream roll dessert that is a perfect follow-up to any main course.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 roll
ingredient: 4 egg whites + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup white sugar + 4 egg yolks + ¼ cup sifted enriched flour + ½ cup chopped walnuts + 1 tablespoon sifted confectioners' sugar, or as needed + 1 cup cold heavy cream + 1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste + 1 tablespoon walnut halves, or as needed

name: Simple White Cake
summary: This cake was sent home from our children's school. It is the simplest, best-tasting cake I've ever made. Great to make with the kids, especially for cupcakes.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 9-inch square cake
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup unsalted butter + 2 large eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>¾ teaspoons baking powder + ½ cup milk

name: Peach Dump Cake
summary: This peach dump cake is made with yellow cake mix and canned peaches in heavy syrup, and it's so simple to make.
ingredient: 2 (16 ounce) cans peaches in heavy syrup + 1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix + ½ cup butter + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste

name: White Almond Wedding Cake
summary: A secret ingredient of sour cream makes this cake so moist, dense, and delicious! I use this recipe for my kids' birthdays, but it's a favorite for wedding cakes, too! This recipe can easily be doubled.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 1 -11x13 inch cake
ingredient: 1 (18.25 ounce) package white cake mix + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 cup white sugar + ¾ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups water + 1 cup sour cream + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon almond extract + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 4 egg whites

name: Gooey Butter Cake
summary: This gooey butter cake has a rich cake mix crust topped with a luscious baked cream cheese layer. It's super easy to make.
ingredient: 1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix + ½ cup butter, melted + 4 large eggs, divided + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, divided + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 4 cups confectioners' sugar

name: Dirt Cake
summary: This dirt cake recipe is a great conversation piece at parties — adults love it as much as children do. Garnish the flower pot cake with gummy worms; display it with a new garden trowel and artificial flowers for the full effect.
process: prep: 20 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 medium flower pot
ingredient: 32 ounces chocolate sandwich cookies with creme filling + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup butter, softened + ½ cup confectioners' sugar + 3<U+2009>½ cups milk + 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed + 2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix

name: Better Than Sex Cake
summary: A better than sex cake made with rich chocolate cake, caramel, toffee, and whipped topping... Need I say more?
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 1 9x13-inch cake
ingredient: 1 (15.25 ounce) package devil's food cake mix + 1<U+2009>¼ cups water + ½ cup vegetable oil + 3 large eggs + ½ (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk + 8 ounces caramel ice cream topping, divided + 3<U+2009>¼ (1.4 ounce) bars chocolate covered toffee, chopped + 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: 2-Ingredient Pineapple Angel Food Cake
summary: This angel food cake is easy and delicious and only requires 2 ingredients! Cover and store leftovers in the refrigerator.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 10-inch cake
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package angel food cake mix + 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple, in juice

name: Cream Cheese Pound Cake
summary: This cream cheese pound cake is a heavy, dense, and extremely delicious dessert.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 20 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 14,Yield: 1 10-inch cake
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups butter + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 3 cups white sugar + 6 eggs + 3 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Chocolate Cupcakes
summary: Chocolate cupcakes are the ultimate party food. These are super moist and bursting with rich, chocolaty flavor — and they're so easy to make. Frost these delicious chocolate cupcakes with buttercream or cream cheese frosting, or try royal icing or even whipped cream.
ingredient: 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups all-purpose flour + ¾ cup unsweetened cocoa powder + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 3 tablespoons butter, softened + 2 large eggs + ¾ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup milk

name: Strawberry Shortcake
summary: This strawberry shortcake recipe is the classic, sweet biscuit-style shortcake - not the pound cake variety. The cake is sliced in half and layered with juicy strawberries and whipped cream for a sensational summertime treat.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 8-inch round cake
ingredient: 3 pints fresh strawberries + ½ cup white sugar + 2<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 4 teaspoons baking powder + 2 tablespoons white sugar + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+2153> cup shortening + 1 egg + <U+2154> cup milk + 2 cups whipped heavy cream

name: Southern Style Banana Split Cake
summary: This great recipe belonged to my Grandma and requires no cooking.
process: prep: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 2 cups graham cracker crumbs + ¾ cup white sugar + ¼ pound butter, melted + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese + 1<U+2009>½ cups confectioners' sugar + 4 bananas, sliced + 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained + 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed + 1 (16 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained + 12 ounces crushed peanuts

name: The Best Unbaked Cherry Cheesecake Ever
summary: This no-bake cherry cheesecake has a graham cracker crust and an easy cherry pie filling spread over top. It's delicious and will delight everyone in the family! It's so quick and easy to make. My husband refuses to eat baked cheesecake after eating this.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch cheesecake
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ cups graham cracker crumbs + ¼ cup unsalted butter, melted + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 cup powdered sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup heavy whipping cream + 1 (12.5 ounce) can cherry pie filling (or other filling of your choice)

name: Éclair Cake
summary: This éclair cake is a very quick and simple no-bake dessert. It uses graham crackers and a pudding mixture. It tastes just like an éclair, but there is enough for a crowd! It is a great recipe for children who are learning to cook, there is no baking involved or any power kitchen tools. Just a bowl and a spoon!
process: prep: 25 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 14,Yield: 1 9x13-inch pan
ingredient: 3 cups milk + 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed + 2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix + 1 (16 ounce) package graham cracker squares + 1 (16 ounce) package prepared chocolate frosting

name: Pineapple Upside Down Cupcakes
summary: These pineapple upside down cupcakes are great to make for family gatherings or as treats to pack into lunches. It's an easy recipe; adaptations can be made to make this completely from scratch. This is just a yummy simplified version!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 cupcakes
ingredient: cooking spray + ½ cup butter, melted + 1<U+2009>½ cups brown sugar + 24 maraschino cherries + 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple + 1 (18.25 ounce) package pineapple cake mix (such as Duncan Hines® Pineapple Supreme) + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups pineapple juice + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 3 eggs + 1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar for dusting, or as needed

name: Simple Cake Pops
summary: This cake pop recipe is perfect for birthdays, baby showers, weddings, or any special occasion where sweet treats are needed! Everyone loves cake pops and this versatile recipe is simple to make with any flavor cake mix or frosting. Cake pops are nice small bites of dessert instead of large slices of cake or pie.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 18,Yield: 18 cake pops
ingredient: 1 (15.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix (such as Betty Crocker®) + 1 cup water + 3 large eggs + ½ cup vegetable oil + 1 (16 ounce) container prepared chocolate frosting + 18 lollipop sticks + 1 (14 ounce) bag chocolate candy melts + 1 (.75 ounce) tube decorating icing + 1 tablespoon multicolored candy sprinkles, or as needed (Optional)

name: Lemon-Buttermilk Pound Cake with Aunt Evelyn's Lemon Glaze
summary: My mother's blue-ribbon pound cake recipe. It always gets rave reviews.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 pound cake
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups butter, softened + 4 eggs + 3<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon baking soda + 1 cup buttermilk + 1 teaspoon lemon extract + 2 cups confectioners' sugar + ¼ cup lemon juice + 2 tablespoons butter, softened + 1 tablespoon lemon zest

name: Sock it to Me Cake III
summary: A butter cake mix helps make this cake with cinnamon, brown sugar, and pecans fairly quick and easy to achieve.
ingredient: 1 (18.25 ounce) package butter cake mix + 1 cup sour cream + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 cup chopped pecans + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 cup confectioners' sugar + 2 tablespoons milk + 4 eggs + ¼ cup water

name: Banana Cake
summary: This banana cake was made for me by a friend while I was visiting her after she had delivered her 11th child. I told her, "I should have baked for you!"
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 45 mins,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 18,Yield: 1 9x13-inch cake
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups mashed bananas + 2 teaspoons lemon juice + 3 cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + ¼ teaspoon salt + 2<U+2009><U+215B> cups white sugar + ¾ cup butter + 3 eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups buttermilk + ½ cup butter, softened + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 3<U+2009>½ cups confectioners' sugar

name: Carrot Cake III
summary: I've tried many carrot cakes, and this is my favorite recipe. If you don't like pecans, feel free to leave them out.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 30 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 18,Yield: 1 - 9x13 inch cake
ingredient: 4 eggs + 1<U+2009>¼ cups vegetable oil + 2 cups white sugar + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 3 cups grated carrots + 1 cup chopped pecans + ½ cup butter, softened + 8 ounces cream cheese, softened + 4 cups confectioners' sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup chopped pecans

name: Cream Cheese Frosting II
summary: This is a wonderfully creamy frosting that goes well with pumpkin bread, carrot cake, chocolate cake, on cookies, or between cookies. If you want chocolate frosting, add 1/4 to 1/2 cup cocoa, according to how rich you want it.
ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + ½ cup butter, softened + 2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Carrot Cake with Pineapple Cream Cheese Frosting
summary: This rich, moist cake has all the flavor, without all the fat and calories. Because it is so full of carrots, pineapple, and nuts it is similar to a fruit bread. For the best flavor, bake the cake one day ahead.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 9 hrs,total: 10 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + ¾ cup buttermilk + ¾ cup unsweetened applesauce + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2<U+2009>½ cups grated carrots + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped pecans + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple in juice, drained and juice reserved + 1 (8 ounce) package Neufchatel cheese, softened + 1 tablespoon reserved pineapple juice + 1 (16 ounce) package confectioners' sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 pinch salt

name: Carrot Cake
summary: Here's an old-fashioned carrot cake that's got more carrots than spice. Pecans can be substituted for walnuts.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 55 mins,additional: 35 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 15,Yield: 15 to 18 servings
ingredient: 2 cups white sugar + ¾ cup vegetable oil + 3 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ¾ cup buttermilk + 2 cups grated carrots + 1 cup flaked coconut + 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1 cup chopped walnuts + ½ cup butter + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 4 cups confectioners' sugar

name: Isaac's Carrot Cake
summary: A less-dense and wonderfully moist carrot cake with canned mandarin oranges rather than pineapple. A friend shared the recipe with me and I made it to celebrate the birth of my son (a birthday cake). It tastes best if you let it sit in the refrigerator overnight.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 40 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 carrot cake
ingredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour + 2 cups white sugar + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg + 2 cups shredded carrots + 1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained + 1<U+2009>¼ cups vegetable oil + 3 eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon grated orange zest

name: Royal Icing II
summary: This recipe is the 'glue' that holds gingerbread houses together, and makes it still edible.
ingredient: 3 tablespoons meringue powder + 4 cups sifted confectioners' sugar + 6 tablespoons water

name: Chef John's Carrot Cake
summary: I finally added a video to my old and trusty recipe for carrot cake, revamped with coconut oil this time. If you want to decorate it with candied carrots, simply slice them thinly and boil for a couple minutes in a syrup made from equal parts sugar and water.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 40 mins,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x13-inch cake
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon ground ginger + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 2 cups white sugar + 4 large eggs + ¼ cup unsalted butter + 1 cup coconut oil + 2 cups finely grated carrots, or more to taste + 1 (8 ounce) can finely crushed pineapple, drained + ½ cup finely chopped pecans (Optional) + ½ cup finely chopped walnuts (Optional) + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ¼ cup unsalted butter, softened + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons vanilla extract, or to taste + 3 cups confectioners' sugar, or to taste

name: Moist Carrot Cake
summary: This cake was made and brought to me at work. It is the moistest carrot cake I have ever had. Decorate with Cream Cheese Frosting.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 9x13 inch pan
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + 4 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups vegetable oil + 2 cups white sugar + 2<U+2009>¾ cups shredded carrots + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained + ¾ cup chopped walnuts + 1 cup flaked coconut

name: Sister Beth's Carrot Cake
summary: One of my sisters, Beth, learned how to make carrot cake in home economics class in 1978. A few years ago I asked her to write down what she remembered from the recipe. Only remembering two-thirds of the ingredients, I completed the recipe by trial and error. It was worth all the effort. Simply delicious.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 cup vegetable oil + 2 cups white sugar + 3 eggs, beaten + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 cups shredded carrots + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained + 1 cup shredded coconut + 1 cup chopped walnuts (Optional) + 1 cup confectioners' sugar + 1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 5 tablespoons butter, softened + 1 dash vanilla extract

name: Lite Carrot Cake
summary: An alternative to the usually high fat carrot cake. Moist and delicious.
ingredient: 1 cup cake flour + 1 cup whole wheat flour + 1 cup packed brown sugar + ½ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + 3 eggs + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + <U+2154> cup buttermilk + 1<U+2009>½ cups grated carrots

name: Carrot Cake XI
summary: Everyone tells me this is the best carrot cake ever! Frost with your favorite Cream Cheese Frosting.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 24,Yield: 1 - 9x13 inch pan
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 2 teaspoons baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 2 cups white sugar + 4 eggs + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups vegetable oil + 4 cups grated carrots + ¾ cup chopped walnuts

name: Best Carrot Cake Ever
summary: The best carrot cake recipe that's moist and flavorful and makes a large quantity of cake. I have been hounded to make this cake time and time again. Frost with cream cheese frosting.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 10-inch round cake layers
ingredient: 6 cups grated carrots + 1 cup brown sugar + 1 cup raisins + 4 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 1 cup vegetable oil + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 cup crushed pineapple, drained + 3 cups all-purpose flour + 4 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 cup chopped walnuts

name: Carrot Cupcakes with White Chocolate Cream Cheese Icing
summary: This is a very moist and light carrot muffin. It's not too sweet and not greasy like other carrot muffins/cakes. The White Chocolate Cream Cheese Icing adds just enough sweetness to round it off.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 55 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 muffins
ingredient: 2 ounces white chocolate + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup unsalted butter, softened + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon orange extract + 4 cups confectioners' sugar + 2 tablespoons heavy cream + 2 eggs, lightly beaten + 1<U+2009><U+215B> cups white sugar + <U+2153> cup brown sugar + ½ cup vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 cups shredded carrots + ½ cup crushed pineapple + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>¼ teaspoons baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ¼ teaspoon ground ginger + 1 cup chopped walnuts

name: Lite Carrot Cake
summary: An alternative to the usually high fat carrot cake. Moist and delicious.
ingredient: 1 cup cake flour + 1 cup whole wheat flour + 1 cup packed brown sugar + ½ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + 3 eggs + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + <U+2154> cup buttermilk + 1<U+2009>½ cups grated carrots

name: Easy Gluten-Free Carrot Cake
summary: I have had many people try this and couldn't believe how moist and delicious it was for gluten free.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x13-inch baking pan
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup vegetable oil + 3 eggs + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups gluten-free all-purpose baking flour (such as Cup4Cup™) + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking soda + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 cups grated carrots + ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese + ¼ cup butter, softened + 2 cups confectioners' sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Carrot Cake IV
summary: Easy carrot cake from a cake mix. Also makes good cupcakes.
ingredient: 1 (18.5 ounce) package carrot cake mix + ½ cup water + ½ cup vegetable oil + 3 eggs + ½ cup finely chopped walnuts + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice

name: Brazilian Carrot Cake
summary: A traditional favorite in my family, Brazilian carrot cake is very different from the American version. The popular cake is topped with homemade chocolate frosting, and perfect to serve with a glass of milk or tea.
ingredient: 3 large carrots, peeled and thinly sliced + 4 eggs + 1 cup cooking oil + 2 cups white sugar + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon baking powder + 2 tablespoons butter or margarine + 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup instant hot chocolate mix + ¾ cup milk

name: Cranberry Carrot Cake
summary: Moist and delicious. The cranberries are a nice change from the raisins most people use. Use your favorite cream cheese frosting to ice this cake.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 8 inch cake
ingredient: 2 cups flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 1 tablespoon baking powder + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground ginger + 1 pinch salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups sugar + 1 cup mayonnaise + 3 eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups grated carrots + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, with juice + ½ cup chopped toasted pecans + ¾ cup dried cranberries

name: Carrot Cake Bars
summary: This is a very moist carrot cake using baby food carrots. I frost it with a Cream Cheese Frosting, then cut into bars.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 14,Yield: 1 - 10x15 inch jelly roll pan
ingredient: 2 cups white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups vegetable oil + 4 eggs + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon salt + 3 (4 ounce) jars carrot baby food

name: Healthier Carrot Cake III
summary: We made it with a little less oil and a little less sugar, so this carrot cake recipe is now healthier but still sure to be a favorite.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 18,Yield: 1 9x13-inch cake
ingredient: 4 eggs + ¾ cup vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups whole wheat pastry flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 3 cups grated carrots + 1 cup chopped pecans + ¼ cup butter, softened + 1 (8 ounce) package Neufchatel cheese, softened + 2 cups confectioners' sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup chopped pecans

name: Carrot-Zucchini Cake
summary: Using both carrots and zucchini gives this cake a unique flavor. Very moist and very tasty! Decorate with maraschino cherries.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 3-layer cake
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 cup whole wheat flour + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1<U+2009>½ cups vegetable oil + 4 large eggs eggs + 1 cup grated carrot + 1 cup grated zucchini + ½ cup honey + 1 (16 ounce) package confectioners' sugar + 1 cup crushed pineapple, well drained + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup chopped walnuts + ¼ cup butter, softened + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract

name: Carrot Cake Cheesecake
summary: A great carrot cake and a traditional cheesecake all in one bite.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,additional: 9 hrs,total: 10 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 1 9-inch springform pan
ingredient: cooking spray + 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, at room temperature + 1 cup white sugar + 4 eggs + 1 cup sour cream + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + ¾ cup packed dark brown sugar + <U+2154> cup canola oil + 1 egg + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ¾ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup grated carrots + <U+2153> cup chopped walnuts + 2 cups confectioners' sugar + 4 ounces cream cheese + 1 teaspoon almond extract

name: A Plus Carrot Cake
summary: Tired of the same old, boring carrot cake? THIS is the Carrot cake you'll love forever! A little different because some of the ingredients aren't what you'd find in a 'normal' carrot cake. My own MOTHER, who despises anything coconut, had two helpings for dessert and took some home!! Don't knock it until you try it!! You'll never go back to that boring recipe again.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 servings
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ½ teaspoon allspice + 4 eggs + 2 cups white sugar + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>¼ cups vegetable oil + 2 cups grated carrots + 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained + ½ cup sweetened flaked coconut + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 1 cup raisins

name: Honey Carrot Cake
summary: This moist and delicious honey sweetened carrot cake is a favorite with my family. The honey cream cheese frosting really adds a nice touch.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 servings
ingredient: 3 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ¼ teaspoon ground ginger + 1<U+2009>½ cups honey + ¾ cup buttermilk + 3 eggs + ½ cup vegetable oil + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups finely grated carrot + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + <U+2153> cup honey + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Carrot Cake Cupcakes with Cream Cheese Icing
summary: A moist carrot cake is topped with creamy cream cheese frosting.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen cupcakes
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 cups white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground ginger + 2 tablespoons canola oil + 4 large eggs + 4 large carrots, grated + 1 cup unsalted butter, softened + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 1 tablespoon vanilla extract + 2 cups confectioners' sugar

name: Vegan Carrot Cake
summary: This is a luscious carrot cake, free of any animal products! Follow up with my vegan 'cream cheese' frosting recipe!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 3 hrs,Servings: 24,Yield: 1 9x13-inch baking dish
ingredient: 2 cups whole wheat flour + ¼ cup soy flour (Optional) + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon ground cloves + 4 teaspoons baking soda + 2 teaspoons tapioca starch (Optional) + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups hot water + ¼ cup flax seed meal + 2 cups packed brown sugar + 4 teaspoons vanilla extract + ¾ cup dried currants (Optional) + 6 carrots, grated + ½ cup blanched slivered almonds (Optional)

name: Pat's Award Winning Carrot Cake
summary: You will enjoy this delicious and moist cake made with carrot baby food. I'm very proud to share this recipe with everyone because I won an award ribbon at our county fair. Decorate with cream cheese frosting and chopped pecans.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 10-inch Bundt pan
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 3 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups vegetable oil + 2 cups white sugar + 4 eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 cup chopped pecans + 3 (4 ounce) jars carrot baby food + ½ cup grated carrot + 1 cup flaked coconut

name: Carrot Cake with Bourbon Cheesecake Swirl
summary: The all-in-one carrot cake. No need to make extra cream cheese frosting, because the frosting is inside!
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings

name: Carrot Cake Cupcakes with Lemon Cream Cheese Frosting
summary: The classic carrot cake in a smaller cupcake form. Topped with a lemony cream cheese frosting, they make a special treat for Easter celebrations, bake sales, backyard cookouts and potlucks.
ingredient: 2 cups flour + 2 cups granulated sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 2 teaspoons McCormick® Cinnamon, Ground + ½ teaspoon McCormick® Nutmeg, Ground + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>¼ cups vegetable oil + 4 eggs, lightly beaten + 1 tablespoon McCormick® Pure Vanilla Extract + 3 cups finely grated carrots + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup butter, softened + ½ teaspoon McCormick® Pure Lemon Extract + 1 (16 ounce) box confectioners' sugar + 1 tablespoon milk, or as needed

name: Flax Seed Carrot Cake
summary: A sin-free, delicious, and fruity version of the ever-popular carrot cake. The flax seed meal may be omitted, but it can easily be found in health food stores. This cake is best served chilled because of its moist quality.

name: Carrot Sheet Cake
summary: This carrot cake is such a well loved recipe in my family. It's delicious, moist, and unlike most recipes I've ever tried. My younger sister loves this carrot cake so much she hired a baker to use our family recipe for her wedding cake.

name: Carrot Cake of My Dreams!
summary: Very dense, moist carrot cake, full of fruit. In a taste test against a more traditional butter-based carrot cake, my co-workers thought mine must be the more sinful! But no, it's practically VIRTUOUS!

name: Simple Carrot Cake Cupcakes with Cream Cheese Frosting
summary: Super moist carrot cake starts with freshly grated carrots! These carrot cake cupcakes are tender, lightly spiced, and full of flavor. Paired with a sweet and slightly tangy cream cheese frosting, they're a guaranteed crowd-pleaser that will take any spring celebration from good to great! Customize your mix-ins and decorate as desired.

name: Carrot Cake with Crushed Pineapple and Pecans
summary: This recipe for carrot cake with crushed pineapple and pecans was given to my mother in 1976. This takes quite a bit of prep, but is well worth the time and effort. Ice with your favorite cream cheese frosting.

ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 3 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 cups white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups canola oil + 3 large eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups finely grated carrots, or more to taste + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained + 1 cup sweetened flaked coconut + 1 cup chopped pecans

summary: My favorite carrot cake recipe! It is so good, and the mini loaf pans are perfect for holidays and gifts. Best if frosted with Cream Cheese Frosting II by Janni, from this site.

ingredient: 3 cups grated carrots + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>¾ cups white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped walnuts + 1<U+2009>¼ cups oil + 4 eggs + 2 teaspoons baking soda + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon salt

name: The Ultimate Carrot Cake
summary: A culmination of all the tweaks and advice I've found for the ultimate carrot cake.

name: Chantal's New York Cheesecake
summary: This New York cheesecake recipe is easy to make, and it's so delicious. Everyone that's tried it has said it tastes just like the ones you'd get in a deli! You'll love it!

ingredient: 15 graham crackers, crushed + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + 4 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + ¾ cup milk + 4 eggs + 1 cup sour cream + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon vanilla extract

name: Lemon Meringue Cheesecake
summary: Love lemon meringue pie and cheesecake? Well this is the best of both worlds. Great any time of year and sure to impress your guests.

name: New York Italian Style Cheesecake
summary: This recipe was given to me by my Italian mother-in-law. It is the type of crustless cheesecake that is sold in Italian bakeries in New York. I usually make it with whole-milk ricotta which is creamier than low fat. This is not a diet item! You can add fresh fruit topping if you desire.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 3 hrs,total: 4 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 10-inch cheesecake
ingredient: 1 pound cream cheese, softened + 1 pound ricotta cheese + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 4 eggs + ¼ cup butter, melted and cooled + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 3 tablespoons cornstarch + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups sour cream + 2 tablespoons lemon juice (Optional)

name: Tiramisu Cheesecake
summary: Tiramisu-flavored cheesecake combines the flavors and richness of tiramisu and NY Cheesecake. Just before serving, grate some semisweet chocolate on the top.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 3 hrs 50 mins,total: 5 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 8-inch cheesecake
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package ladyfingers + ¼ cup butter, melted + ¼ cup coffee-flavored liqueur, divided + 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese + 1 (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese + 1 cup white sugar + 2 eggs + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 (1 ounce) square semisweet chocolate

name: Instant Pot® Cheesecake
summary: Cheesecake? In a pressure cooker? You bet. A creamy cheesecake relies on beating lots of air into the batter before cooking it. It also requires steaming. When you bake a cheesecake in the oven, you also need to put a pot of hot water underneath the springform pan to ensure the top of the cheesecake does not crack. In an Instant Pot®, all you need is a little water and the trivet. The result is a decadent cheesecake with no fuss. Serve with fruit on top, such as ripe blackberries.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 2 hrs 38 mins,total: 3 hrs 48 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 6-inch cheesecake
ingredient: ¾ cup crushed graham crackers + 2 teaspoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 3 tablespoons melted butter + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, at room temperature + <U+2154> cup white sugar + ¼ teaspoon kosher salt + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 lemon, zested + 2 eggs, at room temperature + <U+2154> cup sour cream

name: "Burnt" Basque Cheesecake
summary: I rarely post a trendy recipe while it's still trendy. But this 'burnt' cheesecake method deserved the hype; baking it in a very hot oven delivers a beautiful, dark exterior full of bittersweet notes that make the light, creamy cheesecake interior seem even more rich and flavorful. Plus, this method is just plain easier--just remember the parchment paper. So, if you've not had much luck with traditional cheesecake methods, you should stop trying and make this exclusively.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 4 hrs 25 mins,total: 5 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 9-inch cheesecake
ingredient: 1 tablespoon soft unsalted butter, or as needed + 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 1 cup white sugar + ½ teaspoon fine salt + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 4 extra large eggs, at room temperature + 1<U+2009>¼ cups heavy cream

name: Coconut-Lime Cheesecake with Mango Coulis

I like to make coconut cream by adding coconut extract to whipped cream for topping the cheesecake. Top with a whipped cream dollop and toasted coconut sprinkle for even more flavor.

name: Very, Very, Very Good Cheesecake
summary: I first made this cheesecake for dinner guests about two years ago. I haven't stopped getting requests for it since. Though it's made with extremely rich ingredients, the cake turns out wonderfully light. I never liked cheesecake much before I tried this recipe - but boy, have I been reformed! It's quite easy to make too!

ingredient: 1 cup butter, room temperature + 4 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 5 eggs, room temperature + 2 cups heavy cream + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons cornstarch + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Chocolate Cappuccino Cheesecake

name: Very, Very, Very Good Cheesecake
summary: I first made this cheesecake for dinner guests about two years ago. I haven't stopped getting requests for it since. I make it fairly thin, as I 'paint' the icing on the cookies with a pastry brush. Thin enough to spread easily but not so thin that it just makes your cookies wet and runs off.
