ingredient: 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese + 1 cup white sugar + 5 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 8 ounces sour cream + 1 cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Lemon Cupcake with Blackberry Buttercream
summary: A simple from-scratch lemon cupcake has blackberry buttercream frosting. This cupcake is a refreshing hit! Garnish each cupcake with a blackberry or a pinch of lemon zest.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 dozen cupcakes
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup butter + 2 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>¾ teaspoons baking powder + ½ cup low-fat milk + 1 lemon, juice and zest + 1 cup butter, softened + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ¼ teaspoon salt + 4 cups confectioners' sugar + ½ cup seedless blackberry jam

name: Easy Chocolate Cupcakes
summary: These chocolate cupcakes are easy to make and very tasty. You can also bake them as a cake.
ingredient: 10 tablespoons butter + 1<U+2009>¼ cups white sugar + 4 eggs + ¼ teaspoon almond extract + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + ¾ cup unsweetened cocoa powder + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¾ cup milk

name: Quick and Almost-Professional Buttercream Icing
summary: After failing to find the perfect recipe for buttercream frosting, I found one that worked for me and then added my own two cents.
ingredient: ½ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature + 2 cups confectioners' sugar, sifted + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons pure vanilla extract + 2 tablespoons milk + 3 drops food coloring, or as needed (Optional)

name: Whipped Cream
summary: How to make basic whipped cream. For best results make sure whisk and bowl are ice cold.
ingredient: 1 cup heavy cream + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar

name: Basic Cream Cheese Frosting
summary: This recipe delivers a basic cream cheese frosting using just butter, cream cheese, confectioners' sugar, and vanilla.
ingredient: ½ cup butter, softened + 8 ounces cream cheese + 4 cups confectioners' sugar + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract

name: Chocolate Ganache
summary: Chocolate ganache is a mixture of cream and chocolate that has lots of uses with homemade baked goods. Perfect for cakes, truffles, and pastries, this deliciously rich topping can be used as a filling, frosting, or glaze.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 cups
ingredient: 9 ounces bittersweet chocolate, roughly chopped + 1 cup heavy cream + 1 tablespoon dark rum (Optional)

name: Fluffy Peanut Butter Frosting
summary: This peanut butter frosting is light and fluffy — the perfect topping for brownies or chocolate cake. Sweet but not too sweet; peanut buttery but not greasy. This creamy frosting tastes wonderful and won't overpower your brownies!
ingredient: 1 cup creamy peanut butter + ½ cup butter, softened + 2 cups confectioners' sugar + 3 tablespoons milk, or as needed

name: Homemade Chocolate Frosting
summary: This is a simple recipe and makes a perfect homemade chocolate frosting every time!
ingredient: 3 cups confectioners' sugar + <U+2154> cup cocoa powder + ½ cup butter, softened + 7 tablespoons milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Perfect Lemon Curd
summary: Classic lemon curd that's wonderfully tart... Perfect with scones and tea.
ingredient: ¾ cup fresh lemon juice + ¾ cup white sugar + ½ cup unsalted butter, cubed + 3 large eggs + 1 tablespoon grated lemon zest

name: Creamy Chocolate Frosting
summary: This milk chocolate frosting is smooth, creamy, and not too dark. I've been using this chocolate frosting recipe forever, and several friends now use it as their "favorite frosting!" I just wanted to share it with chocolate lovers everywhere! It will frost, but not fill, an 8- or 9-inch cake.
ingredient: 2<U+2009>¾ cups confectioners' sugar + 6 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder + 6 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature + 5 tablespoons evaporated milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: The Perfect Cinnamon Roll Icing
summary: This cinnamon roll icing can make any homemade cinnamon roll taste good. I tested many recipes for cinnamon rolls and found that having the right icing makes all the difference. In too many recipes, the cream cheese flavor is overpowering. Use this recipe for decadent cream cheese icing on your favorite cinnamon roll, and you won't be disappointed!
ingredient: 7 tablespoons butter, softened + 2 ounces cream cheese, softened + 2 tablespoons milk + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups confectioners' sugar, sifted + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Best Chocolate Frosting
summary: Best chocolate frosting recipe I've found!
ingredient: ½ cup butter, melted + <U+2154> cup unsweetened cocoa powder + 3 cups confectioners' sugar + <U+2153> cup milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Sugar Cookie Icing
summary: This sugar cookie icing dries hard and shiny and the colors stay bright. Choose as many different food colorings as you desire.
process: prep: 10 mins,total: 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen cookies' worth
ingredient: 1 cup confectioners' sugar + 2 teaspoons milk + 2 teaspoons light corn syrup + ¼ teaspoon almond extract + assorted food coloring

name: German Chocolate Cake Frosting
summary: This German chocolate frosting is a classic coconut pecan topping for German chocolate cake.
ingredient: 1 cup evaporated milk + 1 cup brown sugar + ½ cup butter + 3 egg yolks + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups flaked coconut + 1 cup chopped pecans

name: One Minute Chocolate Icing
summary: This is a boiled fudge-like icing
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup unsweetened cocoa powder + ¼ cup milk + ¼ cup butter + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Buttercream Icing
summary: An easy to make egg-free frosting that works great for decorating cookies for holidays, birthdays and parties. When you need to add coloring to icing, use color paste. If you use liquid coloring, you may need to add more confectioner's sugar.
ingredient: ½ cup butter, softened + ½ cup shortening + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 4 cups confectioners' sugar + 2 tablespoons milk

name: Creamy Frosting
summary: Make frosting without powdered sugar with this easy recipe. This quick frosting is light and fluffy and looks like whipped cream. The recipe makes about 3 1/2 cups, enough to fill and frost a 2-layer cake.
ingredient: 1 cup milk + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 cup butter, softened + 1 cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Eclair Cake with Chocolate Ganache
summary: A delicious, creamy filling on top of a light choux pastry gets glazed with a rich chocolate ganache. This dessert sounds fancy but it is so easy to make and it's a definite crowd-pleaser!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 1 hr 45 mins,total: 2 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9 x 13-inch dish
ingredient: 1 cup water + ½ cup butter + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 4 eggs + 2 cups cold heavy whipping cream + 2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix + 2 cups cold milk + 1 cup bittersweet chocolate, chopped + 1 cup heavy cream

name: Sturdy Whipped Cream Frosting
summary: This whipped cream frosting is yummy and very stable. It does not melt at room temperature like many standard whipped cream frostings. It also makes a great dip for fresh fruit — not too sweet, just right! This recipe is great for a stand mixer but any good mixer will work.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese, softened + ½ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon almond extract + 2 cups heavy cream

name: Satiny Chocolate Glaze
summary: Satiny chocolate drizzle for a Bundt cake. It's also great on cookies and doughnuts.
ingredient: ¾ cup semisweet chocolate chips + 3 tablespoons butter + 1 tablespoon light corn syrup + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Cool Whipped Frosting
summary: A light and cool topping vaguely resembling Bavarian cream.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed + 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix + 1 cup milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Easy Chocolate Bundt Cake Glaze
summary: Simple to make with only three ingredients with a variety of uses. Great to use over Bundt cake because it sets up nicely. The extra sauce may be refrigerated and reheated to serve over ice cream or your favorite dessert. I came up with this once when I didn't have any confectioner's sugar to make a glaze for a Bundt cake.
ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk + 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Microwave Lemon Curd
summary: This is a delectable lemon curd recipe with the added attraction of being quick and easy to make. It is particularly useful when entertaining and short on time.
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + 3 eggs + 1 cup fresh lemon juice + 3 lemons, zested + ½ cup unsalted butter, melted

name: Fluffy White Frosting
summary: This is the type of frosting that is cooked over the stove, then whipped. This goes well on almost any type of cake.
process: Servings: 12,Yield: 1 frosting for two layer 8 or 9 inch round cake
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + <U+2153> cup water + ¼ teaspoon cream of tartar + 2 egg whites + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Fresh Lime Curd
summary: When life gives you a bunch of limes, make lime curd! This twist on traditional lemon curd uses limes instead. Use it as a cake filling, or any other way you desire.
ingredient: 1 cup sugar + ¼ cup butter + ¾ cup fresh lime juice + 1 tablespoon lime zest + 2 eggs, beaten

name: Caramel Frosting
summary: This caramel frosting is delicious. I have had this recipe for over 30 years. Cream may be substituted for the milk to add richness.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + ½ cup packed brown sugar + 3 tablespoons milk, or more as needed + 1 cup confectioners' sugar + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Lemon Cream Cheese Frosting
summary: Great flavor and so creamy. Great on Daffodil cake.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ¼ cup butter + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 2 teaspoons lemon zest + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 5 cups confectioners' sugar

name: Strawberry Glaze
summary: Sick of the fake, overly sweet strawberry glaze sold at the grocery store? Give this easy recipe a try, you'll never go back to that artificial stuff again! Serve over pound cake with cut strawberries and whipped cream, or over vanilla ice cream.
ingredient: 2 cups fresh strawberries, hulled + 2<U+2009>¼ teaspoons cornstarch + 2 tablespoons cold water + ¼ cup white sugar + ½ tablespoon unsalted butter + 1 teaspoon lemon juice

name: Marshmallow Fondant
summary: This is a very easy (and a little sticky at times) way to make a delicious fondant. It's great on cakes, cookies, or just for your little ones to play with! Leftovers will save in a tightly sealed container for a few weeks.
process: prep: 29 mins,cook: 1 min,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 2 1/4 pounds of fondant
ingredient: ¼ cup butter + 1 (16 ounce) package miniature marshmallows + ¼ cup water + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 pounds confectioners' sugar, divided

name: Homemade Whipped Cream
summary: This is about the most amazing thing you will ever taste!
ingredient: 1 pint heavy cream + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Sugar Cookie Frosting
summary: Add food coloring to decorate your favorite sugar cookies.
ingredient: 4 cups confectioners' sugar + ½ cup shortening + 5 tablespoons milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + food coloring (Optional)

name: Best White Icing Ever
summary: This icing recipe is #1! It's quick and easy to make, bright white for cake decorating, and you can easily change it's consistency! This is the most important icing recipe you'll ever have. It's so basic, it makes the hassle of cake decorating so much easier! If you wish, use half shortening and half unsalted butter.
ingredient: 4 cups confectioners' sugar + 1 cup shortening + 2 tablespoons water + 1 teaspoon clear imitation vanilla extract

name: Dairy-Free Vanilla Frosting
summary: This is an easy frosting recipe I have tweaked to my liking after a few tries. It is very tasty and is pretty easy to make.
ingredient: 2 cups confectioners' sugar + 6 tablespoons dairy-free margarine + ¼ teaspoon water (Optional) + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Smooth Buttercream Frosting
summary: This flavorful icing is ideal for decorating. It may be refrigerated in an airtight container for up to a week. Re-whip before using.
ingredient: ½ cup vegetable shortening + ½ cup butter + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons vanilla extract + 5 cups confectioners' sugar + 3 tablespoons milk

name: Anko (Sweet Red Bean Paste)
summary: The paste is used to hold together pastries, cakes, and other dishes that come from Japan, most commonly desserts.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 cup dried red beans + 4 cups water, divided, or as needed + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar

name: Special Buttercream Frosting
summary: This recipe makes an ideal buttercream for frosting cakes and decorating them with borders.
ingredient: 2 cups shortening + 8 cups confectioners' sugar + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons clear imitation vanilla extract + 6 fluid ounces heavy cream

name: Mascarpone Frosting
summary: This lovely mascarpone icing is incredibly versatile and can be used to decorate a variety of different cakes.
ingredient: 1 cup heavy whipping cream + ½ (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, or more to taste + 2 tablespoons white sugar

name: Holland Cream (White Cream Filling)
summary: This is the white cream filling used in Smear Faces, Cream Horns, etc. I have looked forever for the Holland cream recipe for donuts. I have never had any luck. I have worked on this recipe for a long time. I use this in my donuts at my cake shop.
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup water + 1 cup vegetable oil + 2 cups vegetable shortening + 1 teaspoon clear vanilla extract + 8 cups confectioners' sugar

name: Vanilla Ice Cream V
summary: No-cook, no eggs, made with half-and-half and cream. Great, simple, classic vanilla ice cream! This is designed for an old-fashioned ice cream maker that yields 1 gallon; be sure to scale recipe down if you have a countertop model.
ingredient: 2 quarts half-and-half cream + ½ pint heavy cream + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 4 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 pinch salt

name: How to Make Vanilla Ice Cream
summary: Vanilla is the king of ice cream flavors. This version without eggs ('American' or 'Philadelphia-style') has a brighter, more pronounced vanilla flavor.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 35 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ¾ cup white sugar + 1 cup heavy whipping cream + 2<U+2009>¼ cups milk + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract

name: Easy, Eggless Strawberry Ice Cream
summary: Use your ice cream maker to create this rich and creamy strawberry ice cream. There are no eggs in this recipe.
ingredient: 2 cups whole milk + 2 cups heavy cream + 1 cup white sugar + ¼ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups mashed fresh strawberries + 2 drops red food coloring (Optional)

name: Ice Cream Base
summary: A custard-style ice cream base -- from my favorite chef -- that any number of flavors can be added to. We have used chocolate, banana, strawberry, cookie dough, and blueberries, and all were wonderful!
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 10 hrs 30 mins,total: 10 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 cup heavy cream + 3 cups half-and-half cream + 8 egg yolks + 1 cup white sugar + <U+215B> teaspoon salt

name: Vegan Horchata Ice Cream
summary: Flavorful rice milk is mixed with coconut milk and coconut cream then churned to give you a frozen version of the Mexican drink horchata. An optional splash of dark rum adds a slight kick. This makes approximately 1 quart of frozen dessert.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 10 hrs 15 mins,total: 10 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 quart
ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can full-fat coconut milk + ½ cup unsweetened coconut cream + 2 cups water + ¾ cup long-grain rice + 1 vanilla bean, split lengthwise + 1 cinnamon stick, broken into pieces + ½ cup brown rice syrup + 2 tablespoons dark rum (Optional)

name: How to Make Vanilla Ice Cream
summary: Vanilla is the king of ice cream flavors. This version without eggs ('American' or 'Philadelphia-style') has a brighter, more pronounced vanilla flavor.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 35 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ¾ cup white sugar + 1 cup heavy whipping cream + 2<U+2009>¼ cups milk + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract

name: Easy Homemade Vanilla Ice Cream
summary: Use this easy recipe to make vanilla ice cream, or add your favorite flavors to it.
ingredient: 4 cups half-and-half or light cream + 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk + 2 tablespoons vanilla extract

name: Georgia Peach Homemade Ice Cream
summary: This is the best peach ice cream you'll ever eat!!!
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ pounds fresh peaches - peeled, pitted and chopped + ½ cup white sugar + 1 pint half-and-half cream + 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 cups whole milk, or as needed

name: Fried Ice Cream
summary: This fried ice cream is crunchy outside and smooth and creamy inside. Serve with whipped cream, honey, and cherries.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 balls
ingredient: 1 quart vanilla ice cream + 3 cups crushed cornflakes cereal + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 3 egg whites + 2 quarts oil for frying

name: Easy, Eggless Strawberry Ice Cream
summary: Use your ice cream maker to create this rich and creamy strawberry ice cream. There are no eggs in this recipe.
ingredient: 2 cups whole milk + 2 cups heavy cream + 1 cup white sugar + ¼ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 2 cups mashed fresh strawberries + 2 drops red food coloring (Optional)

name: 2-Ingredient Ice Cream
summary: This is the easiest recipe for ice cream I have found. Add any extra ingredients (chocolate chips, caramel, vanilla bean, etc.) before freezing!
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 pint heavy whipping cream + 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk

name: Crisp Peach Cobbler
summary: This recipe was inspired by one from Renee Erickson's in cookbook, 'A Boat, a Whale, and a Walrus.' It's a lot crispier than a regular cobbler, and you can use the technique for other fruit cobblers. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 6 large fresh peaches, pitted and cut into eighths + 1 lemon, zested and juiced + ½ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature + 1<U+2009>¼ cups white sugar + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups self-rising flour + <U+2153> cup rolled oats + <U+2154> cup whole milk + ¼ cup white sugar + 2 tablespoons cold water, or as needed to wet topping sugar

name: Old Fashioned Peach Cobbler
summary: I was searching for a peach cobbler recipe that reminded me of the yummy dessert I ate as a young girl in Southeast Missouri. No shortcuts here. Fresh peaches and homemade crust...but worth every minute! Absolutely delicious served warm with vanilla ice cream! Never any leftovers with this dessert!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 18,Yield: 18 servings
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 cup shortening + 1 egg + ¼ cup cold water + 3 pounds fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced + ¼ cup lemon juice + ¾ cup orange juice + ½ cup butter + 2 cups white sugar + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon cornstarch + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 tablespoon butter, melted

name: Too Easy Peach Cobbler
summary: This cobbler is made with slices of white bread instead of the traditional biscuit dough.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 35 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 8-inch square cobbler
ingredient: 6 fresh peaches - pitted, skinned, and sliced + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 egg + ½ cup butter, melted + 5 slices white bread

name: Southern Peach Cobbler
summary: Everybody loves this recipe, even my friends who do not like sweets. Excellent with fresh whipped cream or vanilla ice cream.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: ½ cup butter + 1 cup white sugar + ¾ cup self-rising flour + ¾ cup milk + 1 (29 ounce) can sliced peaches in light syrup

name: Peach and Blackberry Cobbler
summary: A delicious recipe filled with sweet and juicy peaches and blackberries. It's perfect for any occasion; once you make this you will be asked for it again and again.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x13-inch dish
ingredient: 4 cups peeled and sliced fresh peaches + 1 cup fresh blackberries + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + ½ cup butter, melted + 1<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup milk

name: Peach Raspberry Cobbler
summary: A warm cobbler made with fresh peaches and raspberries for a tasty summertime treat!
ingredient: 4 cups sliced fresh peaches + ½ cup fresh raspberries + ¼ cup sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice + ½ cup butter + 1<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup sugar + 1 cup milk

name: Basil Peach Pepper Parmesan Cobbler
summary: I know it sounds completely wacky, but it is unbelievably delicious. If you've ever enjoyed a fruit-and-cheese Danish, you know that mixing cheese with fruit really isn't that crazy. It works so well together. These are time-tested flavor combinations.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: 4 teaspoons butter, melted + <U+2154> cup self-rising flour + ½ cup white sugar + <U+2154> cup cold milk + 1 tablespoon finely shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese + 1 pinch freshly ground black pepper + 1 large fresh peach - peeled, pitted, and sliced + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 2 leaves fresh basil, torn + ½ teaspoon balsamic vinegar + 1 teaspoon water

name: Cookie-Crusted Peach Cobbler
summary: This recipe makes a very rich peach cobbler. The crust is very sweet and cookie-like. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream. Definitely not for those watching their weight!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x13-inch baking pan
ingredient: 8 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced + ½ cup butter, cut into pieces + ½ cup brown sugar + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 2 cups white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 eggs, lightly beaten + 1 cup vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Fresh Southern Peach Cobbler
summary: I've been experimenting with fresh peach cobbler for some time and this recipe is the final result. Loved by all. Use fresh Georgia peaches, of course!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 40 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 4,Yield: 1 peach cobbler
ingredient: 8 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted and sliced into thin wedges + ¼ cup white sugar + ¼ cup brown sugar + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + <U+215B> teaspoon ground nutmeg + 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice + 2 teaspoons cornstarch + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ¼ cup white sugar + ¼ cup brown sugar + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 6 tablespoons unsalted butter, chilled and cut into small pieces + ¼ cup boiling water + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Peach Dump Cake
summary: This peach dump cake is made with yellow cake mix and canned peaches in heavy syrup, and it's so simple to make.
ingredient: 2 (16 ounce) cans peaches in heavy syrup + 1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix + ½ cup butter + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste

name: Easy Batter Fruit Cobbler
summary: Short of serving store-bought ice cream, you won't find a simpler, more delicious dessert than this fruit cobbler. Use any juicy summer fruit: peaches, nectarines, blueberries, blackberries, strawberries, raspberries. And if you use frozen berries, this dessert can be assembled in less than 10 minutes.
ingredient: 4 tablespoons butter + ¾ cup all-purpose flour + ¾ cup sugar + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¾ cup milk + 2 cups of sliced fresh peaches or nectarines, or whole blueberries, strawberries, raspberries, blackberries or a combination of fruits (or a 12-ounce package of frozen berries) + 1 tablespoon sugar

name: Easy Peach Cobbler with Cake Mix
summary: This is a quick but company-worthy cobbler. So simple, yet wins rave reviews. If desired, use 2 (32 ounce) cans of peaches in place of fresh peaches. If doing this, use peach syrup instead of water and then omit the white sugar from recipe. Also, yellow cake mix can be substituted for the white.
ingredient: 12 fresh peaches, pitted and sliced + 1 cup water + 1 cup white sugar + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 (18.25 ounce) package white cake mix + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + ½ cup butter

name: 3-Ingredient Cake Mix Cobbler
summary: Yummy peach cobbler made with cake mix. It makes you feel as though you are in the South on a warm sunny day. This recipe is inexpensive, easy, and surprisingly delicious!
ingredient: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans peaches in light syrup + 1 (18.25 ounce) box yellow cake mix + ½ cup butter, melted

name: Classic Bisquick™ Peach Cobbler
summary: Whether you use canned, fresh or frozen peaches will probably depend on the time of year. Whatever the season, this homey dessert will bring you praises. Try this favorite from the Betty Crocker Kitchens tonight.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 cup Original Bisquick® mix + 1 cup milk + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ½ cup butter or margarine, melted + 1 cup sugar + 1 (29 ounce) can sliced peaches, drained

name: Huckleberry Peach Cobbler
summary: This cobbler combines huckleberries and peaches. Blueberries can be substituted if huckleberries aren't available. It's great served warm with vanilla ice cream. This cobbler works great with either fresh or frozen fruits.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 - 2 quart casserole dish
ingredient: 2 cups huckleberries + 3 cups sliced peaches + ¼ cup cornstarch + <U+2154> cup white sugar + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¼ cup white sugar + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ cup rolled oats + 1 teaspoon grated lemon zest + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ cup butter + ½ cup milk

name: Easy Peach Cobbler
summary: This is a great peach cobbler--so easy a child can make it! It is great right out of the oven served with vanilla ice cream.
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup butter, room temperature + 1 cup self-rising flour + 1 cup milk + 1 (15 ounce) can peaches

name: Peach Cobbler VI
summary: This is a wonderful Southern recipe...very easy and tastes great!
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + ½ cup brown sugar + ½ cup white sugar + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ¾ cup milk + ½ cup margarine, melted + 1 (29 ounce) can sliced canned peaches, drained + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Great Grandma's Peach Cobbler
summary: This was my great grandma's peach cobbler recipe from the 1940s and earlier. It's so easy to make. I remember this being my favorite dessert from when I was a child. This is delicious when hot and served with ice cream or I enjoy it cold by itself. Enjoy!
ingredient: 1 (29 ounce) can sliced peaches in juice, drained, reserving juice + 1 cup self-rising flour + 1 cup white sugar + 1 egg + ½ cup butter, melted

name: Old-Fashioned Peach Cobbler
summary: Old-fashioned warm cobbler. If you like, add blueberries. Serve with ice cream or sweetened whipped cream.
ingredient: 9 fresh peaches + 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice + ½ cup white sugar + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups all-purpose flour + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ¼ cup butter, chilled + <U+2154> cup buttermilk + 2 teaspoons white sugar + ¼ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg

name: Easy Fruit Cobbler
summary: This cobbler can be made with peaches, apples, cherries, or berries.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 9 inch cobbler
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¾ cup white sugar + ¾ cup milk + ¼ cup butter + 2 cups sliced fresh peaches

name: Easy Peach Cobbler with Canned Peaches
summary: Simply delicious and easy Southern peach cobbler. Serve with vanilla ice cream or whipped topping and drizzle with caramel topping.
ingredient: 2 (29 ounce) cans sliced peaches in juice + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup sugar + ¾ cup unsalted butter, softened + 1 cup chopped pecans

name: Jackie's Fresh Peach Cobbler
summary: An old fashion recipe from a collection of my mother's favorites. With a dash of nutmeg the aroma will take you back to grandma's kitchen.
ingredient: ½ cup butter, melted + 2 large peaches, peeled and sliced + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar, divided + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 pinch ground nutmeg + ¾ cup milk

name: Chef John's Peach Cobbler
summary: There was a time when being called a shoemaker was the ultimate kitchen insult. It meant that your cooking skills were so weak, the cobbler down the street could have come into the kitchen and done just as well. This beautiful peach cobbler recipe is so easy, any shoemaker could master it.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 cobbler
ingredient: 5 cups fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced + <U+215B> teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder + 1 teaspoon grated lemon zest + 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup water + ½ cup butter, melted + 1 cup white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups self-rising flour + 1<U+2009>½ cups milk

name: Butter Biscuit Peach Cobbler
summary: This is my grandmother's Southern homemade peach cobbler recipe, handed down to my mother in Louisiana. It's made with cinnamon, nutmeg, and buttery morsels of biscuit bits. It tastes great on its own, but even better with vanilla ice cream, a la mode.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 (29 ounce) cans peaches + ¾ cup white sugar + ½ cup brown sugar + ½ cup unsalted butter + 1 tablespoon cornstarch + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon nutmeg + 1 pinch salt + 1 (16 ounce) can refrigerated buttermilk biscuit dough (such as Pillsbury Grands!®) + 1 pinch ground cinnamon + 1 pinch white sugar + 1 pinch ground nutmeg + 1 pastry for a 9-inch pie crust

name: Peach Cobbler
summary: This recipe is very old and was my grandmother's. This is a very delicious cobbler and can also be used with blueberries. Hope you enjoy this as our family has all these years.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 10x10-inch dish
ingredient: 3 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + ½ cup shortening + 1 cup white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup milk + 2 cups boiling water + 3 tablespoons butter

name: Peach Cobbler IV
summary: This peach cobbler is extremely easy to make, and can be enjoyed any time of year!
ingredient: ½ cup butter + 1 cup self-rising flour + 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup milk + 1 (16 ounce) can sliced peaches in heavy syrup

name: Fresh Peach Cobbler I
summary: Serve warm with whipped cream, whipped topping, or vanilla ice cream!
ingredient: ½ cup white sugar + 1 tablespoon cornstarch + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 4 cups sliced fresh peaches + 1 teaspoon lemon juice + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 3 tablespoons shortening + ½ cup milk

name: Quick and Easy Peach Cobbler
summary: An easy peach cobbler made with just 5 common ingredients you probably always have on hand? That's right! This simple dessert comes together in minutes and bakes to sweet perfection in a cast iron skillet. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream and whipped cream.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 cobbler
ingredient: ½ cup unsalted butter, melted + 1 cup self-rising flour + 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup milk + 2 (16 ounce) cans sliced peaches in heavy syrup

name: Easy Stovetop Peach Cobbler
summary: Got a sweet tooth but not much cash? This recipe is so easy and yummy, and you can use almost any kind of canned fruit to make it. You can't mess this one up; it's great for the beginner!
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (29 ounce) can sliced peaches + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon (Optional) + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 (9 ounce) package yellow cake mix + 4 teaspoons margarine

name: Favorite Peach Cobbler
summary: This is a yummy, easy peach cobbler recipe that is a favorite with our family of eight. You may use up to 5 cups of peaches.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 9x13-inch cobbler
ingredient: ½ cup butter, melted + 4 cups fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 cup white sugar + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ cup milk

name: Grandma's Peach Cobbler
summary: Yummy dessert the whole family can enjoy.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: ¾ cup unsalted butter, softened + 1 (15 ounce) can peaches in heavy syrup + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar, divided + ½ cup brown sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup milk + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon baking powder + 1 pinch salt

name: Kelley's Peach Cobbler
summary: Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream to put this over-the-top!
ingredient: ½ cup butter, melted + 1 (16 ounce) package frozen peach slices + <U+2154> cup white sugar + ½ cup water + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup milk + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Key Lime Pie I
summary: This pie is always well received whenever served - it is light and refreshing and very attractive, too. An all-time favorite! You may substitute the key lime juice with a mixture of 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice and 1/4 cup fresh lime juice.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 9 inch pie
ingredient: 1 cup graham cracker crumbs + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 5 tablespoons butter, melted + 3 eggs + ½ cup key lime juice + 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk + 1 pinch salt + 1 pinch cream of tartar + 1 cup heavy whipping cream + 1 lime, sliced

name: Banana Cream Pie
summary: This banana cream pie recipe makes a great pie. This pie is one of the yummiest things on earth.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: ¾ cup white sugar + <U+2153> cup all-purpose flour + ¼ teaspoon salt + 2 cups milk + 3 egg yolks, beaten + 2 tablespoons butter + 1<U+2009>¼ teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 (9 inch) baked pastry shell, cooled + 4 bananas, sliced

name: Butter Flaky Pie Crust
summary: This pie crust with butter is crisp and flaky — the perfect pastry for your single crust pie!
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch single pie crust
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + ¼ teaspoon salt + ½ cup butter, chilled and diced + ¼ cup ice water

name: Grandma's Lemon Meringue Pie
summary: This is a very fun recipe to follow, because Grandma makes it sweet and simple. This pie is thickened with cornstarch and flour in addition to egg yolks, and contains no milk.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 9 inch pie
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 3 tablespoons cornstarch + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + 2 lemons, juiced and zested + 2 tablespoons butter + 4 egg yolks, beaten + 1 (9 inch) pie crust, baked + 4 egg whites + 6 tablespoons white sugar

name: Baked Fresh Cherry Pie
summary: YUMMY--uses fresh cherries!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 3 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie + 4 tablespoons quick-cooking tapioca + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + 1 cup white sugar + 4 cups pitted cherries + ¼ teaspoon almond extract + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons butter

name: Out of this World Pie
summary: A light, fruity pie packed with the goodness of pineapple, bananas, cherry pie filling, and raspberry Jell-O.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 9-inch pies
ingredient: 2 (9 inch) pie shells, baked + 1 (21 ounce) can cherry pie filling + 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple, with juice + 1 teaspoon red food color (Optional) + ¾ cup white sugar + 1 tablespoon cornstarch + 1 (3 ounce) package raspberry flavored Jell-O® mix + 6 bananas, peeled and sliced + 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed (Optional)

name: Bev's Chocolate Pie
summary: This recipe was given to me by a dear friend at a church dinner. This pie never is runny. If you opt to use a frozen prepared pie crust, use the deep dish kind.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 40 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 9 inch pie
ingredient: 2 cups white sugar + 5 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 4 egg yolks + ¼ cup butter + 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie + 4 egg whites + ¼ cup white sugar

name: Orange Meringue Pie
summary: A nice change from lemon meringue. A unique flavor.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (9 inch) unbaked pie crust + ¾ cup sugar + <U+2153> cup cornstarch + 1 pinch salt + 1 cup orange juice + ½ cup lemon juice + ¼ cup water + 4 eggs, separated + 4 tablespoons butter or margarine, cut into pieces + 2 teaspoons grated orange zest + ½ cup diced orange segments + ½ cup white sugar + ¼ teaspoon cream of tartar

name: Old Fashioned Coconut Cream Pie
summary: Coconut cream pie recipe that's tried and true. It took many years of searching and baking to find the right one, and this is it. Enjoy!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 1 cup sweetened flaked coconut + 3 cups half-and-half + ¾ cup white sugar + ½ cup all-purpose flour + 2 large eggs, beaten + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 (9 inch) pie shell, baked + 1 cup frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: Mini Air Fryer Cherry Hand Pies
summary: These delicious little pie bites are great for snacking or for parties. They are quick and easy to make using prepared pie dough and pie filling, and come out delightfully crisp and flaky in your air fryer.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 16 mini pies
ingredient: 1 (14.1 ounce) package refrigerated pie dough + ½ (21 ounce) can cherry pie filling + butter-flavored cooking spray + 1 teaspoon coarse sugar crystals for sprinkling

name: Chef John's Buttermilk Pie
summary: Not only is this buttermilk pie easy to make and beautiful to look at, it's also bursting with the kind of bright, tangy flavor that no other custard-style pie can touch. This is sort of like a vanilla custard, meets lemon meringue pie, meets very light cheesecake. Except better.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 1 prepared dough for 1 (9-inch) single crust pie + ½ cup unsalted butter, room temperature + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + ¼ teaspoon kosher salt + 3 large eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + <U+215B> teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg + Zest from 1 lemon + Juice from 1 lemon + 1 cup buttermilk

name: Sweet Potato Pie
summary: This sweet potato pie recipe was shared with me by a special friend in Atlanta, GA. It has long been a favorite, and everyone who tastes it says it is the best they've ever had.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 40 mins,total: 1 hr 55 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 1 (1 pound) sweet potato, with skin + ½ cup butter, softened + 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup milk + 2 large eggs + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 (9 inch) unbaked pie crust

name: Blueberry Pie
summary: Blueberry pie is the best when made with fresh-picked berries! It is a beautiful sight with a lattice top.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 pie
ingredient: ¾ cup white sugar + 3 tablespoons cornstarch + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon salt + 4 cups fresh blueberries + 1 (14.1 ounce) package double-crust pie pastry, thawed + 1 tablespoon butter

name: Portuguese Custard Tarts (Pasteis de Nata)
summary: Pasteis de nata, or Portuguese custard tarts, with their signature flaky crust and sweet custard filling are world-famous, and incredibly delicious. This recipe shows you how to make them from scratch, using basic ingredients. Yes, it requires numerous steps and a certain amount of finesse, but the results are so worth it.
process: prep: 1 hr,cook: 25 mins,additional: 2 hrs 35 mins,total: 4 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 tarts
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + ¼ teaspoon kosher salt + <U+2153> cup cold water + 1 stick high-quality unsalted butter, fully softened, divided + ¾ cup white sugar + ¼ cup water + 1 tablespoon water + 1 cinnamon stick (Optional) + 1 lemon, zested in large strips (Optional) + <U+2153> cup all-purpose flour + ¼ teaspoon kosher salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups milk + 6 large egg yolks + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract (Optional)

name: Award Winning Peaches and Cream Pie
summary: I am always asked for the recipe when I take this anywhere. Plus I won 5 blue ribbons and Best Pie of Show for this pie. It's a great pie.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 2 hrs 20 mins,total: 3 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 10 inch pie
ingredient: ¾ cup all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 (3 ounce) package non-instant vanilla pudding mix + 3 tablespoons butter, softened + 1 egg + ½ cup milk + 1 (29 ounce) can sliced peaches, drained and syrup reserved + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup white sugar + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Peanut Butter Pie
summary: Peanut butter refrigerator pie, very easy to make.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup creamy peanut butter + ½ cup confectioners' sugar + 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed, divided + 1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust + 15 miniature chocolate-covered peanut butter cups (such as Reese's®), unwrapped

name: Perfect Pumpkin Pie
summary: The one and only pumpkin pie! EAGLE BRAND® makes this traditional dessert the perfect ending to a Thanksgiving feast. Garnish as desired. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree + 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk + 2 large eggs + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground ginger + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 (9 inch) unbaked pie crust

name: Peach Pie the Old Fashioned Two Crust Way
summary: Old-fashioned peach pie made with two crusts, fresh peaches, and simple ingredients. It's great during the summer peach season.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 1 (14.1 ounce) package pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie + 1 egg, beaten + 5 cups sliced peeled peaches + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ¼ teaspoon salt + 2 tablespoons butter

name: Fruit Pizza I
summary: A cookie dough crust, cream cheese filling, and fruit topping. Tip: For a quick crust, use one package of ready made sugar cookie dough rolled out to fit a pizza pan. Use an assortment of fresh fruit such as bananas, peaches, blueberries, kiwi, pineapple, and strawberries.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 fruit pizza
ingredient: ½ cup butter, softened + ¾ cup white sugar + 1 egg + 1<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon cream of tartar + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + ½ cup white sugar + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract

name: Easy Swedish Apple Pie
summary: Apple pie baked with a cinnamon crust.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 9 inch pie
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ pounds Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced + 1 tablespoon sugar + 1 cup sugar + 1 cup flour + 1 teaspoon cinnamon + ¾ cup melted butter + 1 egg

name: Easy Key Lime Pie
summary: This easy key lime pie recipe is the 1999 American Pie Council's National Pie Championship's 1st place winner in the Quick and Easy Category. If you like, garnish each piece with a slice of lime and a dollop of whipped cream or whipped topping.
ingredient: 5 egg yolks, beaten + 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk + ½ cup key lime juice + 1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust

name: Lemon Icebox Pie III
summary: A family favorite when a no-bake, fast pie is needed. (And family members too small to use the oven can make dessert!) Very pretty when garnished with whipped cream and mint leaves.
ingredient: 1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk + 2 lemons, juiced + 1 teaspoon lemon zest

name: Lemon Chiffon Pie
summary: Light, fluffy lemon chiffon pie. This recipe is also good using lime juice. Garnish each slice with sweetened whipped cream.
ingredient: 1 (.25 ounce) package unflavored gelatin + ¼ cup cold water + 4 egg yolks + 4 egg whites + 1 cup white sugar + ½ cup fresh lemon juice + 1 teaspoon lemon zest + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust

name: Summer Fruit Tart from Almond Breeze®
summary: Bring summertime flavor anywhere with this easy mixed berry tart with almondmilk vanilla custard.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 egg + 1 tablespoon cornstarch + 1 tablespoon maple syrup + 1 cup Unsweetened Vanilla Almond Breeze Almondmilk + 1 prepared tart shell + ½ cup sliced fresh strawberries + ½ cup fresh raspberries + ½ cup fresh blueberries + ½ cup fresh blackberries

name: Blackberry Pie
summary: I've been using this blackberry pie recipe for years and have always succeeded with it! Frozen or fresh blackberries can be used. Serve with vanilla ice cream.
process: prep: 40 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 4 cups fresh blackberries + ¾ cup white sugar, divided + ½ cup all-purpose flour + 1 (9 inch) double crust ready-to-use pie crust + 2 tablespoons milk

name: Strawberry Rhubarb Custard Pie
summary: One of the most delicious and easiest pie recipes I know. I got this wonderful recipe from my mother Pauline, who I believe got it from my Aunt Angela. I love all their pies, but this might be my favorite.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 1 (9 inch) unbaked pie crust (see footnote for recipe link) + 3 cups rhubarb, sliced 1/4-inch thick + 1 cup fresh strawberries, quartered + 3 large eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + 3 tablespoons milk + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + ¼ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg + 1 tablespoon butter, diced + 2 tablespoons strawberry jam + ¼ teaspoon water

name: Lemon Cloud Pie I
summary: A light, refreshing, and easy to make pie. It's one of my summer favorites.
process: prep: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 9 inch pie
ingredient: 1 (9 inch) pie crust, baked + ¾ cup white sugar + 3 tablespoons cornstarch + 1 cup water + 1 teaspoon lemon zest + ¼ cup lemon juice + 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese + 2 eggs + ¼ cup white sugar

name: No Bake Peanut Butter Pie
summary: Creamy and delicious--melts in your mouth. This pie is a real crowd-pleaser and it can be made with reduced-fat ingredients.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 9-inch pies
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 1<U+2009>½ cups confectioners' sugar + 1 cup peanut butter + 1 cup milk + 1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed + 2 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crusts

name: No Bake Sugar Free Strawberry Cheesecake
summary: I have a grandmother who is diabetic, and I wanted to create a cheesecake with no added sugar. My whole family loved it, it's now the only one I make
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 8-inch pie
ingredient: ¾ cup graham cracker crumbs + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1<U+2009>½ cups milk + 1 (1 ounce) package cheesecake flavor sugar-free instant pudding mix + 2 pints fresh strawberries, sliced

name: Coconut Cream Pie I
summary: Being a nurse, I have little time to put into fancy recipes. This coconut cream pie is so easy and quick. It is so good, it is sinful. Use any pie crust you like.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 9 inch pie
ingredient: 1 (9 inch) pie shell, baked + 1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix + 1<U+2009>½ cups milk + 1<U+2009>½ cups flaked coconut + 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: Buttermilk Pie
summary: This old-fashioned buttermilk pie is wonderful to freeze and to have on hand for unexpected guests!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 3 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + ½ cup butter, softened + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 cup buttermilk + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + <U+215B> teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg + 1 (9 inch) unbaked pie crust

name: Old Fashioned Strawberry Pie
summary: This is a two crust strawberry pie that has a thick juice. Any fresh berries can be substituted.
ingredient: 2 (9 inch) unbaked pie crusts + 1<U+2009>¼ cups white sugar + <U+2153> cup all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 4 cups fresh strawberries + 2 tablespoons butter

name: Strawberry Glazed Pie
summary: This is a restaurant style strawberry glazed pie. Fresh berries are tossed with a glaze, and then chilled until serving time. This is also good made with peaches, using peach gelatin instead of strawberry.
ingredient: 6 cups sliced fresh strawberries + <U+2154> cup white sugar + 1 cup water + 4 tablespoons strawberry flavored Jell-O® + 4 tablespoons cornstarch + 1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust

name: Mulberry Pie
summary: I experimented with this and found it was well liked in my house. I have mulberries by the ton. Serve with ice cream.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 9 inch pie
ingredient: 3 cups mulberries + 1<U+2009>¼ cups white sugar + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 tablespoon milk

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Pound Cake
summary: This is one of my favorite pound cakes, made in a Bundt® pan. I specialize in all kind of pound cakes. You can add pieces of pineapple to the cake batter.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 14,Yield: 1 cake
ingredient: cooking spray + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 1 cup butter + 2 cups white sugar + 6 extra large eggs + 2 cups self-rising flour + 1 teaspoon almond extract + 1 teaspoon pineapple extract + 3 drops yellow food coloring + 2 cups brown sugar + 7 pineapple rings + 7 maraschino cherries

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cheesecake
summary: Fruity and creamy! Just oh so delicious!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 55 mins,additional: 3 hrs 30 mins,total: 4 hrs 55 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 5 tablespoons butter, melted, divided + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 (8 ounce) cans pineapple slices, drained well + 7 maraschino cherries, drained and stemmed + 1 cup graham cracker crumbs + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + ¾ cup white sugar + ¾ cup sour cream + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 3 eggs

name: Cottage Pudding - Upside Down Cake
summary: This is my husband's favorite. I first made it over thirty years ago. You can use canned peaches or pineapple in place of the sliced apples.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 1 - 8 inch square pan
ingredient: 3 tablespoons butter, melted + ½ cup packed brown sugar + 3 apples - peeled, cored and sliced + ½ cup shortening + 1 cup white sugar + 1 egg + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 cup milk

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake IV
summary: Bottoms up and there's the topping! No need to make frosting. The cake's ready as soon as it pops out of the oven. Use 8 to 12 cherries and walnuts, depending on how many servings you want.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9-inch round pan
ingredient: 3 tablespoons butter + 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice + 8 maraschino cherries + ¼ cup walnut halves + <U+2154> cup packed brown sugar + <U+2153> cup shortening + ½ cup white sugar + 1 egg + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>¼ cups sifted cake flour + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup reserved pineapple juice

name: Pineapple Upside Down Cupcakes
summary: These pineapple upside down cupcakes are great to make for family gatherings or as treats to pack into lunches. It's an easy recipe; adaptations can be made to make this completely from scratch. This is just a yummy simplified version!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 cupcakes
ingredient: cooking spray + ½ cup butter, melted + 1<U+2009>½ cups brown sugar + 24 maraschino cherries + 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple + 1 (18.25 ounce) package pineapple cake mix (such as Duncan Hines® Pineapple Supreme) + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups pineapple juice + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 3 eggs + 1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar for dusting, or as needed

name: Old Fashioned Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
summary: This old-fashioned cake recipe delivers a really good take on the dessert classic: pineapple upside-down cake.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 10-inch round cake
ingredient: 4 eggs + ½ cup butter + 1 cup packed light brown sugar + 1 (20 ounce) can sliced pineapple + 10 maraschino cherries, halved + 1 cup sifted cake flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 cup white sugar + 1 tablespoon butter, melted + 1 teaspoon almond extract

name: Grandma's Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
summary: My gramma used to bake cakes and pies during the Depression and my grampa would sell them door-to-door and on the street corners to support them during that awful time. This is one of my favorites.
ingredient: <U+2153> cup butter + ½ cup brown sugar, packed + 8 pineapple rings + 8 pecan halves + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+2154> cup white sugar + 2 eggs + ¼ cup pineapple juice

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake V
summary: This recipe makes a two-layer pineapple upside-down cake using cake mix and canned pineapple.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 2-layer 9-inch cake
ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained + ¼ cup butter + ½ cup packed brown sugar + ½ cup flaked coconut + 1 (8 ounce) can sliced pineapple, drained with juice reserved + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved + 1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake VII
summary: This pineapple upside down cake is made in an iron skillet. It's quick, easy and so beautiful.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 -9 or 10 inch round cake
ingredient: ½ cup butter + 1<U+2009>½ cups brown sugar + 1 (20 ounce) can sliced pineapple + 10 maraschino cherries + 1 (18.25 ounce) package white cake mix

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Bundt® Cake
summary: A moist twist on the original pineapple upside-down cake.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 fluted tube cake
ingredient: cooking spray with flour + ½ cup melted butter + ½ cup packed brown sugar + 1 (8 ounce) can pineapple rings + 1 (4 ounce) jar maraschino cherries + 1 (18.25 ounce) box yellow cake mix + 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix + ¼ cup whole milk, or more as needed + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 3 eggs

name: Grandma's Skillet Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
summary: This skillet pineapple upside-down cake is baked in a cast iron skillet and served warm. It is wonderful!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 cake
ingredient: 1 stick butter + 1<U+2009>½ cups packed brown sugar + 1 (20 ounce) can sliced pineapple + 1 (4 ounce) jar cherries + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups white sugar + ½ cup butter + 2 eggs + 1 cup milk + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract

name: Easy Pineapple Upside Down Cake
summary: Here's a quick and easy recipe using any brand of biscuit baking mix for a delicious old favorite. Top with whipped topping and you've got a lovely dessert for family or company.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9-inch cake
ingredient: ¼ cup butter + ¼ cup packed brown sugar + 1 (15 ounce) can pineapple chunks, drained + 2 tablespoons chopped pecans (Optional) + 1<U+2009>½ cups biscuit baking mix (such as Bisquick®) + ½ cup white sugar + ½ cup milk + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 egg

name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake with Rum

name: Vegan Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
summary: Best ever! Adapted from Baypuppy's recipe. This makes a pretty sweet, moist vegan pineapple upside-down cake.

Her secret to a toothsome crumb and a not-too-sweet cake? Almond flour and sour cream in the batter. Serve with unsweetened whipped cream, if desired.

summary: This is a hybrid pineapple upside-down cake which I've developed over the years. Instead of pineapple rings, I use crushed pineapple, coconut, and honey. It is very important to cool the mixture of butter and brown sugar before covering it with the rest of the ingredients, preventing the layer of pineapple and the cake mix from mixing prematurely. Makes one 9x13 baking pan.

summary: This is the recipe my Grandmother would make every year during the holidays. I found the recipe tucked in her Bible when she passed, and it was written in her Grandmother's handwriting. It's been in my family for at least 7 generations, and in 2012, I won a Blue Ribbon at the Kentucky State fair by following her exact instructions. Tastes like pure love!

name: Sour Cream Pound Cake
summary: Much better than the standard pound cake, I got the recipe from a great-aunt, over 40 years ago.

summary: This is a really rich pound cake recipe that is delicious plain, with ice cream or a fruit topping such as peaches.

ingredient: 1 (9 inch) deep dish pie crust, baked and cooled + 1 (1.4 ounce) package instant sugar-free chocolate pudding mix + ½ cup frozen reduced-calorie whipped topping, thawed

name: No Bake Sugar Free Strawberry Cheesecake
summary: I have a grandmother who is diabetic, and I wanted to create a cheesecake with no added sugar. My whole family loved it, it's now the only one I make
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 8-inch pie
ingredient: ¾ cup graham cracker crumbs + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1<U+2009>½ cups milk + 1 (1 ounce) package cheesecake flavor sugar-free instant pudding mix + 2 pints fresh strawberries, sliced

name: Sugar-Free Peanut Butter Cookies
summary: My Dad is diabetic, but loves peanut butter cookies. I was playing around with some recipes to make a sugar-free version. This is what I came up with.
ingredient: 2 cups smooth natural peanut butter + 2 cups granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (e.g., Splenda ®) + 2 large eggs

name: Cottage Cheese Fluff
summary: Low-fat cottage cheese is mixed with Cool Whip Lite® and dry sugar-free gelatin to create a delightful dessert. You can use any flavor Jell-O; I prefer lemon or orange.
ingredient: 3 cups low-fat cottage cheese + 2 (0.3 ounce) packages sugar-free lemon flavored Jell-O® mix + 1 (8 ounce) container lite frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: Berry Burst Sorbet
summary: This berry-ful sorbet is made in your ice-cream machine and is a naturally sweet way to end the day! I use Splenda to save on the carbs.
ingredient: 1 cup SPLENDA® Granular + 1 cup water + 1<U+2009>½ cups frozen blueberries, thawed + 1<U+2009>½ cups frozen blackberries, thawed + ½ cup frozen raspberries, thawed + ½ cup heavy cream (Optional)

name: No Bake Sugar Free Cheese Cake
summary: This recipe has no added sugar so it is great for Diabetics. It is a favorite in our house. I first tried this recipe as a regular dessert and later tried it without sugar and found it to be just as good.
process: prep: 15 mins,total: 15 mins,Servings: 9,Yield: 1 - 9 inch square pan
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¾ cups graham cracker crumbs + ½ cup butter + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 (.6 ounce) package sugar free lemon flavored Jell-O® + 1 cup boiling water + 1 (8 ounce) package reduced fat cream cheese + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 cup frozen light whipped topping, thawed

name: Sugarless Bars
summary: A fruity and flavorful bar without the sugar.
ingredient: ½ cup pitted dates + ½ cup pitted prunes + ½ cup chopped raisins + 1 cup water + ½ cup margarine + 2 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ cup chopped walnuts + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Special Oatmeal Cookies
summary: This oatmeal cookie is sugar-free.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups rolled oats + .666 cup butter, melted + 4 egg whites + 1 cup granulated artificial sweetener + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ cup milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ cup raisins + ½ cup chopped walnuts

name: Sugar-Free Date Cookies
summary: Enjoy the natural sweetness from the dates, the crunch from the pecans, the moisture from the banana, and the satisfaction that you're serving your family a healthier cookie.
ingredient: 1 cup chopped dates + ¼ cup chopped pecans + ¼ cup water + ½ very ripe banana, mashed + 1 large egg, lightly beaten + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: No Bake Bumpy Peanut Butter Nuggets
summary: Kids love to make (and eat) these sugar free cookies.

summary: Be sure to use a heat-stable sugar substitute. Since the substitutes vary in strength, use an amount equal to 3/4 cup regular sugar according to the package.

name: 4-Ingredient Keto Peanut Butter Cookies
summary: These keto peanut butter cookies are made with just 4 ingredients: peanut butter, vanilla extract, an egg, and some sugar substitute. Kids love these scrumptious low-carb keto cookies.
ingredient: 1 cup peanut butter + ½ cup low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®) + 1 egg + 1 teaspoon sugar-free vanilla extract

name: Sugar Free Cake
summary: Really good with the added plus of being sugar free.
process: Servings: 12,Yield: 1 -10 inch bundt or tube pan
ingredient: 2 cups raisins + 3 cups water + 2 eggs + 3 tablespoons liquid sweetener + ¾ cup vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 1 cup unsweetened applesauce

name: No Bake Bumpy Peanut Butter Nuggets
summary: Kids love to make (and eat) these sugar free cookies.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 30,Yield: 30 small balls
ingredient: ½ cup natural peanut butter + ¼ cup nonfat dry milk powder + ¼ cup unsweetened flaked coconut + <U+2153> cup rolled oats + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ cup wheat germ + ¼ cup unsweetened apple juice concentrate, thawed

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies for Special Diets
summary: Be sure to use a heat-stable sugar substitute. Since the substitutes vary in strength, use an amount equal to 3/4 cup regular sugar according to the package.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 12 mins,additional: 23 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 48,Yield: 4 dozen
ingredient: ½ cup butter, softened + ¾ cup granulated artificial sweetener + 2 tablespoons water + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 egg, beaten + 1<U+2009><U+215B> cups all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup semisweet chocolate chips + ½ cup chopped pecans

name: Chewy Keto Chocolate Cookies
summary: I have tried many different low-carb chocolate cookie recipes, and these are my favorite keto cookies; moist, chewy, and so decadent!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 12 mins,additional: 1 min,total: 23 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 15 cookies
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups almond butter + 2 eggs + ½ cup low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®) + <U+2153> cup unsweetened cocoa powder, sifted + 1 teaspoon sugar-free vanilla extract + 1 pinch salt

name: Lemon Cake
summary: This is a wonderful easy recipe that is truly delicious. Lemon sheet cake with a cool lemony cream topping. Everyone who has tried it absolutely loves it.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 28 mins,total: 43 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 1 - 10x15 inch pan
ingredient: 1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix + 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant lemon pudding mix + 1<U+2009>¾ cups water + 3 egg whites + ¾ cup nonfat milk + ½ teaspoon lemon extract + 1 (1 ounce) package instant sugar-free vanilla pudding mix + 1 (8 ounce) container frozen light whipped topping, thawed

name: Sugar-Free Date Cookies
summary: Enjoy the natural sweetness from the dates, the crunch from the pecans, the moisture from the banana, and the satisfaction that you're serving your family a healthier cookie.
ingredient: 1 cup chopped dates + ¼ cup chopped pecans + ¼ cup water + ½ very ripe banana, mashed + 1 large egg, lightly beaten + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Sugar Free Brownies
summary: These are just what a diabetic needs to fill a sweet tooth but no sugar is added!
ingredient: ½ cup margarine + ¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder + 2 eggs + 1 cup granular sucrolose sweetener (such as Splenda®) + ¾ cup all-purpose flour + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + ¼ cup skim milk + ½ cup chopped walnuts (Optional) + 1 (1.4 ounce) package sugar free, chocolate fudge flavored instant pudding + 1 cup skim milk

name: Key Lime Pie - Low Carb Version
summary: A delicious, low-carb pie that actually tastes great! You, your family and friends will love this one.
process: prep: 35 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 35 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 cup ground pecans + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 2 (1 gram) packets Splenda® no calorie sweetener + ½ teaspoon coconut extract + ½ cup heavy cream + 2 (1 gram) packets Splenda® no calorie sweetener + 1 (.6 ounce) package sugar-free lime-flavor Jell-O® + <U+2153> cup boiling water + <U+2153> cup cold water + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, cut into pieces and softened + ½ teaspoon coconut extract + 2 tablespoons ground pecans

name: No Crust Strawberry Pie
summary: This is a low calorie, no crust strawberry pie. It is made with sugar-free strawberry flavored gelatin and sugar-free vanilla pudding. It is very good! I've had the recipe for years, and to be honest, I don't remember where I got it. Garnish with light whipped topping if you like.
ingredient: 24 ounces fresh strawberries + 1 (2.1 ounce) package sugar-free cook and serve vanilla pudding mix + 1 (.6 ounce) package sugar-free strawberry flavored Jell-O® + 2 cups water

name: Lime Pear Gelatin Salad
summary: Great and green, this light gelatin salad made with pears and reduced fat cream cheese and whipped topping is a staple at any holiday meal in our family.

ingredient: 1 (.6 ounce) package sugar-free lime Jell-O® + 1 cup boiling water + 1 (15.25 ounce) can pear halves in juice + 1 (3 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese, softened + 1<U+2009>½ cups reduced-fat frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: Sugar Free Peach and Banana Cobbler
summary: My own creation! This recipe is good for diabetics, but can easily be made as a non-diabetic dessert by using real sugar instead of a sugar substitute. This dessert is not super sweet, allowing the natural sweetness of the fruit to come through. If you like sweeter desserts, double the amount of the sugar substitute or sugar. You can use whatever sugar substitute is your preference.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 8x8-inch cobbler
ingredient: 8 white peaches, pitted and sliced + 2 bananas, sliced + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon sugar substitute + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ cup skim milk + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon corn oil + 2 teaspoons sugar substitute + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Low-Carb Sugar-Free Instant Pot® Cheesecake
summary: A crustless Instant Pot® cheesecake. Garnish with strawberry syrup or whipped cream, if desired.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 3 hrs 5 mins,total: 3 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, at room temperature + <U+2154> cup sucralose sugar substitute (such as Splenda® Granulated) + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 eggs, room temperature + 1 cup sliced fresh strawberries

name: No Sugar Added Cookies
summary: Sugarless fruity cookie, great for those watching their sugar intake.
ingredient: ¾ cup butter + 2 ripe bananas + 1 egg + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ¾ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 cup rolled oats + ½ cup chopped walnuts

name: Pumpkin Protein Cookies
summary: Great for breakfast, these cookies are like those in the stores. Not only are they delicious, but they are sugar free have extra protein in them to help keep you full longer.
ingredient: ¾ cup SPLENDA® Granular + 1 cup rolled oats + 1 cup whole wheat flour + ½ cup soy flour + 1<U+2009>¾ teaspoons baking soda + ½ teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg + ½ cup pumpkin puree + 1 tablespoon canola oil + 2 teaspoons water + 2 egg whites + 1 teaspoon molasses + 1 tablespoon flax seeds (Optional)

name: Gummy Candy
summary: Feel like a kid again with this gummy candy recipe. Fun to make with the kids or just for yourself. If you don't have candy molds, pour the mixture onto a pizza pan and after it cools in the freezer use a cookie cutter to make fun shapes.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 (.6 ounce) package sugar-free fruit flavored gelatin mix + 6 (.25 ounce) envelopes unflavored gelatin + ½ cup water

name: No-Added-Sugar Apple Pie
summary: My aunt is a nurse and would bake this pie for my 99 year old grandmother who was diabetic.
ingredient: 3 tablespoons cornstarch + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + 12 ounces unsweetened apple juice concentrate + 6 cups thinly sliced apples + 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie

name: Sugarless Applesauce Cake
summary: Applesauce and an artificial brown sugar replacement pair to make this raisin-studded cake.
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups unsweetened applesauce + ¾ cup brown sugar twin + 2 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ cup raisins

name: Apple Cake II
summary: A nice no-added-sugar apple cake sweetened with fruit juice.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9x5-inch loaf pan
ingredient: 1 cup self-rising flour + ½ cup butter, cut into 1-inch chunks + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg + <U+215D> cup chopped walnuts + 1 cup chopped raisins + 1<U+2009>½ cups grated apple + 3 eggs + ¼ cup pineapple juice + 1 tablespoon grated lime zest

name: Sugarless Pumpkin Pie II
summary: A good pie for the diabetic and doesn't have an aftertaste.
ingredient: 1 (9 inch) pie shell + 1 egg + 6 packets granulated artificial sweetener + 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice + 1 cup pumpkin puree + 1 cup evaporated milk

name: Pumpkin Pie for Dieters
summary: If you want to stay on your diet this is a terrific crustless pumpkin pie recipe you will love.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree + ½ cup skim milk + 1 (1 ounce) package instant sugar-free vanilla pudding mix + 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice + 1 (8 ounce) container fat free frozen whipped topping

name: Chocolate Date Cookies
summary: While these chocolate cookies are not completely sugar-free, they have no added sugar and only use dates for sweetness.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 17,Yield: 17 cookies
ingredient: 8 ounces pitted Deglet Noor dates + hot water as needed + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 egg + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons vanilla extract + ¼ cup rolled oats + ¼ cup dark cocoa powder (such as Hershey's® Special Dark) + ¾ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon salt + ½ cup dark chocolate chips

name: Reduced Fat and Cholesterol Red Velvet Cake
summary: I made some alterations for this wonderful and rich Southern favorite! This cake has all the flavor and richness of a traditional red velvet cake, but you won't feel guilty while enjoying it! With the use of whole wheat flour instead of all-purpose, you are getting fiber and dessert in one! The frosting that goes with this cake is equally delicious and almost guilt free! This cake is delicious!
process: prep: 40 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 3 hrs,Servings: 16,Yield: 1 9-inch layer cake
ingredient: Cooking spray + 2<U+2009>¼ cups whole wheat flour + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup unsweetened applesauce + ¾ cup sugar and sucralose blend for baking (such as SPLENDA® Sugar Blend) + 1 tablespoon sugar and sucralose blend for baking (such as SPLENDA® Sugar Blend) + ½ cup liquid egg substitute + 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder + 1 fluid ounce red food coloring + 1 cup reduced-fat buttermilk + 1<U+2009>¼ teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 tablespoon white vinegar + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ¾ cup fat-free vanilla yogurt + ¾ cup fat-free cottage cheese + 2 (8 ounce) packages fat-free cream cheese at room temperature, cubed + 1 cup confectioners' sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon skim milk, or as needed (Optional)

name: Sugarless Pumpkin Pie
summary: A yummy pumpkin pie with NO sugar added. If eggs are not part of your diet, substituted 1/2 cup egg substitute for 2 eggs. Originally submitted to ThanksgivingRecipe.com.
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree + 2 eggs + <U+2153> cup artificial sweetener + ¼ teaspoon salt + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons pumpkin pie spice + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + ½ cup dry milk powder + ¼ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg + 1 (9 inch) pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie

name: Special Grapes
summary: Absolutely wonderful, refreshing, creamy grape salad. A must try. To serve, I put a scoop in a small dessert cup and sprinkle with brown sugar substitute.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 cup heavy whipping cream + 1 cup granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®) + 1 cup plain yogurt + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 teaspoon almond extract + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ pounds seedless green grapes + 1<U+2009>½ pounds seedless red grapes

name: Blast-Off Blood Mary
summary: This is the ultimate bloody mary! After several tries and a few not-so-good-next-mornings, I perfected this yummy concoction! Serve chilled with big green olives and/or celery stalks and a smile! Try pepper-infused vodka for an even spicier concoction.
ingredient: 4 cups chilled tomato juice + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups vodka + 3 lemons, juiced + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons prepared horseradish, drained + ¾ teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®) + ½ teaspoon celery salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Dani's Butt Kickin' Bloody Mary Mix
summary: When a crazy old lady hits you in the head with her purse...and she's carrying a Colt 45 in it...that's the kind of kick you want when you drink a bloody mary. I like it spicy, and I hope you do too. Add vodka and whatever garnishes you prefer. Allow to chill for at least 8 hours so that the evil inside can mature. Drink it down, enjoy the heat, and be nice to your grandma.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (46 fluid ounce) bottle tomato-vegetable juice cocktail + 1 (8 ounce) bottle clam juice + 6 tablespoons low-salt Worcestershire sauce + 6 tablespoons prepared horseradish + 2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®) + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 1 tablespoon concentrated beef base (paste) + 1 tablespoon celery salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Classic Canadian Caesar
