ingredient: ¾ cup superfine sugar + 1 cup tap water + 1 orange, sliced + 1 lime, sliced + 5 (750 milliliter) bottles red wine + 12 cubes ice cubes + 6 fluid ounces sparkling water + 1 cup fresh raspberries, blackberries, blueberries, or halved strawberries

name: Pretty in Pink Sangria
summary: This fun and yummy pink sangria is great for brunch or a shower. I always get tons of requests for this recipe, and the pink color along with the strawberries is so festively fun! Serve with lime wedges or wheels. Feel free to eyeball ingredient measurements or adjust to taste.
ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen sliced strawberries, thawed + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed + 2 (750 milliliter) bottles chilled rose wine, such as white Zinfandel + 2 cups pineapple juice + 1 liter ginger ale

name: Lemonade
summary: A cool refreshing summer drink that can be made at any time you have lemons... or limes!
ingredient: 4 lemons, juiced + 1 quart water + ½ cup white sugar

name: Lime Sherbet Punch
summary: A holiday favorite that everyone looks for year after year. You'll learn to buy the lime sherbet in advance since the stores sell out around the holidays.
ingredient: 2 quarts lime sherbet + 2 (2 liter) bottles ginger ale + 1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice + 1 (4 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained + 1 lemon, sliced + 1 lime, sliced

name: Easy Raspberry Lemonade
summary: We came up with this recipe for my brother's wedding reception. We wanted to serve something that was easy and quick to fix, yet good at the same time. After a few tries, we ended up with this recipe...and a lot of compliments.
ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen raspberry lemonade concentrate + 3 cups water + ¾ teaspoon lime juice + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage + 1 cup crushed ice + 1 cup fresh raspberries, garnish + 18 Mint leaves, for garnish

name: Brandy Slush I
summary: Graciously cold, wonderful, refreshing summer treat! This recipe is good even without the brandy!
ingredient: 5 cups boiling water + 4 (2 g) bags green tea + 1 cup white sugar + 1 (16 ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate + 1 (16 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate + 2 cups brandy + 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

name: Caribbean Rum Punch
summary: This delicious concoction is the traditional rum punch recipe used in the West Indies, passed down for years. The old rhyme goes, 'One of sour, two of sweet, three of strong, four of weak.' Any fruit juice can be used. Serve chilled over ice, with fruit garnishes and a sprinkling of grated nutmeg.
ingredient: 1 cup fresh lime juice + 2 cups simple syrup + 3 cups amber rum + 4 cups orange juice + 4 dashes bitters + freshly grated nutmeg

name: Sunset Sangria
summary: This tropical sangria is great at any party, or on a hot day!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs 20 mins,total: 2 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle rose wine + 1 cup pineapple juice + ½ cup vodka + ¼ cup triple sec + ½ cup simple syrup + 1 orange, sliced into rounds + 1 lemon, sliced into rounds + 1 lime, sliced into rounds + 1 (6 ounce) container fresh raspberries

name: Party Punch VI
summary: This punch is easy to make, and is great for parties of all kinds.
ingredient: ½ gallon strawberry sherbet + 2 (64 fluid ounce) bottles fruit punch + 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage, chilled

name: Old-Fashioned Swedish Glogg
summary: My grandfather brought this recipe over from Sweden in 1921. We still use it today. God Jul.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 60,Yield: 7 750-milliliter bottles
ingredient: 5 (750 milliliter) bottles port wine + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle 100 proof bourbon whiskey + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle white rum + 3 whole cardamom pods, cracked + 1 small cinnamon stick + 4 whole cloves + 1 (3 inch) strip of orange peel + 1 (8 inch) square of cheesecloth + ¾ cup white sugar + 1 (15 ounce) package dark raisins + 1 (6 ounce) package blanched slivered almonds

name: Easy Berry Sangria
summary: I love berries and put as many as I can in this easy and refreshing summer sangria!
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle chilled mild red wine (such as Lambrusco) + 1 apple, cubed + 1 cup sliced strawberries + 1 cup raspberries + 1 cup pitted and sliced cherries + 1 cup blueberries + 1 cup blackberries + ¾ cup brandy + 2 cups lemon-lime soda

name: Sangria! Sangria!
summary: The best sangria recipe I've been able to hone to perfection for summer parties! I like to use a fruity Spanish red wine, such as Garnacha.
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry red wine + ½ cup brandy + ½ cup triple sec + <U+2153> cup frozen lemonade concentrate + <U+2153> cup orange juice + ¼ cup lemon juice + ¼ cup white sugar (Optional) + 1 medium orange, sliced into rounds + 1 medium lemon, sliced into rounds + 1 medium lime, sliced into rounds + 8 maraschino cherries + 2 cups carbonated water (Optional)

name: Sunset Sangria
summary: This tropical sangria is great at any party, or on a hot day!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs 20 mins,total: 2 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle rose wine + 1 cup pineapple juice + ½ cup vodka + ¼ cup triple sec + ½ cup simple syrup + 1 orange, sliced into rounds + 1 lemon, sliced into rounds + 1 lime, sliced into rounds + 1 (6 ounce) container fresh raspberries

name: White Peach Sangria
summary: A refreshing white wine sangria that is always a hit at parties.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry white wine + ¾ cup peach flavored vodka + 6 tablespoons frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 pound white peaches, pitted and sliced + ¾ cup seedless red grapes, halved + ¾ cup seedless green grapes, halved

name: Sassy Sangria
summary: This is a sassy red wine punch that has tropical fruit floating in it. May be served with ice if desired.
ingredient: 1 gallon dry red wine + ½ cup white sugar + 1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice + 1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks + 1 orange, sliced into rounds + 1 lime, sliced into rounds

name: Amanda's Sangria
summary: This is a wonderfully flavorful summertime (or anytime) beverage. Most any fruit you would like to use (except bananas) will probably work with this recipe. You can even use frozen fruit like peaches and berries (but thaw them, first).
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 23 hrs 50 mins,total: 1 day,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle red wine + ½ cup rum + 1 lemon, sliced + 1 orange, sliced in rounds + 1 lime, sliced + 1 pint strawberries, hulled and sliced + 1 apple, cored and sliced + 9 whole cloves + 1 liter lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

name: Pretty in Pink Sangria
summary: This fun and yummy pink sangria is great for brunch or a shower. I always get tons of requests for this recipe, and the pink color along with the strawberries is so festively fun! Serve with lime wedges or wheels. Feel free to eyeball ingredient measurements or adjust to taste.
ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen sliced strawberries, thawed + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed + 2 (750 milliliter) bottles chilled rose wine, such as white Zinfandel + 2 cups pineapple juice + 1 liter ginger ale

name: Sangria Melon Chiller
summary: Juicy melon and crisp white wine make for the perfect cooler to sip during the summer.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 min,additional: 1 hr 4 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: ¼ cup sugar + <U+2153> cup water + ¼ cup packed torn fresh mint leaves + 8 sprigs fresh mint for garnish + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle Sauvignon Blanc, chilled + 1 cup fresh orange juice, chilled + ½ cup Triple Sec or other orange-flavored liqueur + 3 cups bite-size wedges of cantaloupe + 1<U+2009>½ cups bite-size wedges of seedless watermelon

name: World's Best Evil Sangria
summary: Best sangria I've ever had. The evil is in how tipsy it'll make you because you want to drink so much of it.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 1 min,additional: 12 hrs,total: 12 hrs 26 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + ¼ cup water + 2 (750 milliliter) bottles Cabernet Sauvignon + 4 fluid ounces brandy + 1 fluid ounce triple sec + 2 apples - peeled, cored, and coarsely chopped + 1 orange, cut into thin wedges + 1 orange, juiced + 1 lemon, cut into thin wedges + 1 (12 ounce) can citrus-flavored soda (such as Fresca®)

name: White Sangria
summary: WONDERFUL!!! A wonderful punch made with white wine, mango and orange slices. Peach schnapps, cognac and ginger ale round out this summer party drink.
process: prep: 30 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 32,Yield: 1 gallon
ingredient: ½ cup peach schnapps + ½ cup cognac + ¼ cup white sugar + 4 oranges, sliced into rounds + 2 mangos, peeled and sliced + 4 (750 milliliter) bottles dry white wine, chilled + 1 liter ginger ale, chilled

name: Orange Sangria
summary: Light and crisp.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 2 (750 milliliter) bottles dry white wine (such as Pinot Grigio) + ¾ cup brandy + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle ginger ale + 1 lemon, sliced + 1 orange, halved and sliced + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle club soda

name: Hibiscus Sangria
summary: I'm a big fan of sangrias and was experimenting with edible flowers. The tangy flavor of hibiscus blends very well with the sweet wine and fruit flavors in this drink! I love to eat the fruit in sangria, so the fruit to liquid ratio in this recipe is high. Feel free to reduce the fruit if you'd prefer!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 9 hrs,total: 9 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 16 servings
ingredient: 6 cups water + ¾ cup dried hibiscus petals + ½ cup honey + 2 cinnamon sticks + 1 teaspoon ground cardamom + 2 (750 milliliter) bottles rose wine + ¾ cup brandy + ½ cup brown sugar + ½ cup elderflower syrup + ¼ cup triple sec + ½ fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks + 2 Granny Smith apples, cut into chunks + 1 pint strawberries, cut into chunks + 2 oranges, cut into small chunks + 1 lemon, cut into small chunks

name: Wedding Sangria
summary: People won't believe it when you tell them what is in this simple sangria. We served it at our wedding and everyone loved it--hence the name 'Wedding Sangria.'
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle rose wine + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle Burgundy wine + 1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice (such as Dole®) + 1 (2 liter) bottle fruit punch (such as Hawaiian Punch®) + 1 lemon, juiced + 1 lime, juiced + 1 orange, juiced + 1 lemon, thinly sliced + 1 lime, thinly sliced + 1 orange, thinly sliced

name: Easy Berry Sangria
summary: I love berries and put as many as I can in this easy and refreshing summer sangria!
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle chilled mild red wine (such as Lambrusco) + 1 apple, cubed + 1 cup sliced strawberries + 1 cup raspberries + 1 cup pitted and sliced cherries + 1 cup blueberries + 1 cup blackberries + ¾ cup brandy + 2 cups lemon-lime soda

name: Sangria by the Pros
summary: I found a good sangria recipe and headed to the liquor store to purchase the alcohol. In line, ahead of me, was a man who said he has been a bartender for twenty years now, and that the recipe needed a few touch-ups if I wanted to make it like the Pros. So, here is what he professed to me, muchos thanks to the other submitters for their delicious versions.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 orange + 1 lemon + 1 lime + 1 medium all purpose apples, pared, cored and sliced + 1 cup pitted cherries + 1 cup fresh pineapple chunks + ¾ cup brandy + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry red wine + 1 (12 ounce) can lemon-lime soda to taste + 1 cup orange juice to taste

name: Sangria (White)
summary: Red sangria is refreshing, but white just seems even better for those ridiculously hot Texas summer days!
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle white wine + ¾ cup rum + ½ cup orange juice + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 1 lemon, sliced + 1 lime, sliced + 1 green apple, cored and sliced + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime soda + 1 cup seedless green grapes, or to taste, frozen

name: Sheila's Perfect Sangria
summary: I've been looking for a good sangria recipe for some time. I checked out several recipes, combined the best of everything and came up with the perfect mix that would easily rival my favorite local lounge's sangria! Measurements are approximate and to taste but don't scrimp on any of the flavors. Add more juice or rum until it knocks your socks off....then it's your perfect sangria.
process: prep: 30 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 2 navel oranges, thinly sliced + 2 lemons, thinly sliced + 2 limes, thinly sliced + 1 pear, cored and chopped + 1 kiwi, peeled and sliced + 1 cup fresh strawberries, sliced + 1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice + ½ cup white sugar + ½ cup Cointreau or other orange liqueur + 1 cup white rum + <U+2153> cup coconut-flavored rum + 2 cups orange juice + 2 (750 milliliter) bottles dry red wine, chilled + ½ (12 fluid ounce) can frozen pink lemonade concentrate, thawed + ¼ cup lemon juice + 2 tablespoons lime juice + 1 cup lemon-lime soda, chilled

name: Sangria Barcelona Style
summary: I live in Barcelona and was able to watch a bartender make sangria in a local sangria bar one night. I hope you enjoy this recipe as much as I do!
ingredient: 1 lemon, sliced + 1 orange, sliced + 3 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger vodka + 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger cointreau or triple sec + 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger gin + ¼ cup orange soda + ¼ cup lemon-lime soda + ¾ cup pineapple juice + ¾ cup orange juice + 1 cup ice cubes + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry red wine

name: Blackberry Sangria
summary: Delicious beverage to sip while enjoying a nice spring or summer day.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle Spanish red wine + 12 fluid ounces blackberry brandy + ½ cup triple sec + ½ cup orange juice + ¼ cup white sugar + ½ cup blackberries, or to taste + ½ cup hulled strawberries, or to taste + ½ cup chopped fresh pineapple + 1 apple, chopped + ice cubes

name: Cranberry Sangria
summary: I came up with this while playing around with sangria recipes. It has now become a traditional beverage at Thanksgiving and Christmas; my family actually got upset the one time I didn't make it!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 day,total: 1 day 25 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + 4 cranberry-flavored tea bags + 4 slices fresh lemon + 6 whole cloves + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + ¼ teaspoon ground ginger + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + 2 (750 milliliter) bottles white wine + 4 apples, cored and cut into chunks + 1<U+2009>½ cups dried cranberries + 2 fluid ounces apple brandy

name: Indian Summer Raspberry Peach Sangria
summary: Love at first sip!
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle red wine + 24 fluid ounces raspberry-flavored soda water + ½ cup peach schnapps + ½ cup pomegranate juice + ½ cup fresh lemon juice + 1 cup fresh raspberries + 2 peaches, sliced + 2 lemons, sliced + 1 orange, sliced + 4 cups ice cubes, or as desired

name: Peach Sangria
summary: I love this homemade sangria that my Grandfather taught me to make when I was young wife. He told me he had learn to make when he was working down in Mexico in his younger days. It is easy but it does takes time to cure between steps. We have had mango sangria, peach-mango sangria, or pear-pineapple sangria. You can garnish with blueberries, mint leaves, or fresh peach slices if you would like.
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 4 large fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced + 1 cup hot water + ½ cup light brown sugar + 1 pinch ground cinnamon + 2<U+2009>½ cups dry white wine + ½ cup triple sec liqueur + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle sparkling white wine, chilled

name: Sangria (Red)
summary: Like most of my recipes this is a combination of several others because I couldn't find one that was exactly what I wanted. This has been a big hit every time I've served it.
ingredient: ¾ cup rum + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 1 green apple, cored and sliced + 1 orange, sliced + 1 lemon, sliced + 1 lime, sliced + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle red wine + 1 cup orange juice + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

name: White Sangria with Frozen Fruit
summary: Delicious white peach sangria made with frozen fruit!
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle white wine + ½ cup peach schnapps + ¼ cup white sugar + ¼ cup frozen sliced peaches, or to taste + ¼ cup frozen sliced mango, or to taste + ¼ cup frozen raspberries, or to taste

name: Game Day Sangria
summary: This very refreshing and light sangria is perfect for hot game days. I use 'Real Sangria' from the wine section at the local grocer. It's a dark bottle with an orange label.
ingredient: 2 cups lemon juice + 2 cups orange juice + 2 cups white sugar + 2 cups brandy + 4 cups red wine + 4 cups club soda + ice cubes, for serving

name: White Wine and Apple Sangria
summary: Make sangria your way with red, white, or rosé! This easy formula lets you pick your favorite wine and punch it up with juice, brandy, and fresh fruit and herbs.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 5 1/2 cups
ingredient: ½ cup apple juice + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry white wine + 1 cup apple slices + ½ cup sliced peaches + 2 medium lemons, sliced + ¼ cup brandy + 1<U+2009>½ cups club soda + 3 cups ice, or as needed + 8 sprigs fresh thyme

name: Peach-Basil Sangria
summary: The best, easiest Sangria!! The basil seems strange, but is the perfect touch. You'll love this guaranteed!
ingredient: ¾ cup white sugar + 1 cup loosely packed fresh basil leaves + 3<U+2009>½ cups peach nectar + ¼ cup fresh lemon juice + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle white wine such as Pinot Grigio

name: Most Amazing Sangria Recipe Ever!
summary: This is a delicious red wine-based sangria that a Portuguese bartender shared with my sweetheart and me. We love it for Cinco de Mayo, on hot summer nights and in the dead of winter too. Cheers!
ingredient: 4<U+2009>½ cups red wine + ¾ cup ginger ale + ½ cup orange juice + 2 fluid ounces brandy + 1 fluid ounce triple sec (orange-flavored liqueur) + 1 teaspoon white sugar + 1 pinch ground cinnamon + 2 cups crushed ice + ½ Granny Smith apple, diced

name: Amazing Peach Sangria
summary: This peach white wine sangria is light and refreshing and so easy to make. I've tried many and I keep coming back to this one. The frozen strawberries and grapes keep the sangria cold without diluting it.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ½ cup triple sec + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 lemon, juiced + 4 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and diced + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle Prosecco, chilled + 1 cup frozen seedless grapes + 1 cup frozen strawberries

name: Monica's Baptist Sangria
summary: This fresh, sweet nonalcoholic drink is beautiful in a punch bowl and will have your guests coming back for more and more!
ingredient: 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage + 3 tablespoons lemon iced tea mix + 2 oranges, sliced into rounds + 1 lemon, sliced into rounds + 3 cups ice

name: White Wine Sangria
summary: Delicious, fresh, and super easy! Any combination of fruit will do. Also delicious are peaches and cantaloupe!
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle white wine + ½ cup cubed watermelon + ½ cup cubed honeydew + ½ cup sliced strawberries + ½ cup fresh raspberries + 6 splashes ginger ale, or to taste

name: Conchi's Sangria
summary: This is the sangria that my friends taught me to make in Spain. It's quick and easy and makes a great drink to mix up for a summer party.
ingredient: 4 (750 milliliter) bottles red wine + 1<U+2009>¼ cups white sugar + 2 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced + 4 sliced fresh peaches + 2 bananas, peeled and sliced + 2 cinnamon sticks, crushed + 3 liters lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

name: Rosé Wine and Berry Sangria
summary: Make sangria your way with red, white, or rosé! This easy formula lets you pick your favorite wine and punch it up with juice, brandy, and fresh fruit and herbs.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 5 1/2 cups
ingredient: ½ cup grapefruit juice + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry rosé + 1 cup fresh raspberries + ½ cup fresh blackberries + 2 medium limes, sliced + ¼ cup brandy + 1<U+2009>½ cups club soda + 3 cups ice, or as needed + 8 sprigs fresh rosemary

name: Sangria On The Light Side
summary: Lots of citrus flavors and sliced fresh fruit make a refreshing red-wine sangria, and this recipe makes enough for a crowd.
ingredient: 1 large Juice of 1 orange + 1 large Juice of 1 lemon + ¼ cup lime juice + 1 (1.5 liter) bottle Burgundy or other red wine + ½ teaspoon Sweet'N Low granulated sugar substitute + 3<U+2009>½ cups seltzer + 1 orange, chilled and cut into wedges + 1 lemon, chilled and sliced + ½ cup fresh strawberry slices

name: Cha Cha Cha Sangria
summary: This recipe comes from a Caribbean restaurant (the Cha Cha Cha Restaurant) on Haight Street in San Francisco renowned for its sangria. Enjoy!
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 to 10 glasses
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry white wine + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry red wine + 1 orange, sliced + 1 lemon, sliced + 1 cup sliced fresh peaches + 1 cup sliced fresh strawberries + 1 cup seedless red grapes, halved

name: Jill's Summer Sangria
summary: Wonderful drink for the summer or for a holiday party!
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 20 servings
ingredient: 2 (750 milliliter) bottles red wine + 2 cups rum + 2 cups orange juice + 1 cup white sugar + 1 pint fresh strawberries, sliced + 1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice + 1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries, drained + 2 cups rum + 2 cups orange juice

name: Perfect Peach White Sangria
summary: I started with Bobby Flay's Peach Sangria recipe, and made it a little better, I think, and easier! My husband, who doesn't even like white wine, loves this.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 2 quarts
ingredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio + 1 (11 ounce) can peach nectar + 1 cup triple sec + 1 cup orange juice + 1 cup pineapple juice + ½ cup peach schnapps + ice as needed + 2 cups club soda, or as needed (Optional) + 1 fresh peach, sliced, or to taste (Optional) + 1 cup chopped fresh pineapple, or to taste (Optional)

name: B and L's Strawberry Smoothie
summary: You'll love this strawberry smoothie recipe. It's an icy-cold treat!
ingredient: 8 strawberries, hulled + ½ cup skim milk + ½ cup plain yogurt + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 6 cubes ice, crushed

name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
summary: This peanut butter banana smoothie is so refreshing, and it's sweet and tasty.
ingredient: 2 bananas, broken into chunks + 2 cups milk + ½ cup peanut butter + 2 tablespoons honey, or to taste + 2 cups ice cubes

name: Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
summary: This vegan oatmeal smoothie has a deep pink color and a rich, creamy texture. It's very filling, and perfect for people in a rush in the morning. You don't have to give up a good breakfast when it's this fast to make! I use vitamin fortified soy milk.
ingredient: 1 cup soy milk + ½ cup rolled oats + 14 frozen strawberries + 1 banana, broken into chunks + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons white sugar (Optional) + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract (Optional)

name: Avocado Smoothie
summary: Thick, creamy,and delicious. Makes a great summertime smoothie.
ingredient: 1 ripe avocado, halved and pitted + 1 cup milk + ½ cup vanilla yogurt + 3 tablespoons honey + 8 ice cubes

name: Mango-Banana Smoothie
summary: I love mangoes and fresh fruit. This is awesome to make and pack to have with you around town in a bottle, or just have for breakfast anytime.
ingredient: 1 banana + ½ cup frozen mango pieces + <U+2153> cup plain yogurt + ½ cup orange-mango juice blend

name: Fruit and Yogurt Smoothie
summary: This yogurt smoothie recipe is delicious! You may substitute the strawberries for any other berries or fruit.
ingredient: 1 cup strawberries + 1 banana + ½ cup yogurt + ¼ cup pineapple juice + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon orange juice + 1 teaspoon milk

name: Razzy Blue Smoothie
summary: This naturally sweet and creamy, frosty cold smoothie packs a lot of flavor and a nutritious punch.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 3,Yield: 3 smoothies
ingredient: 1 banana + 16 whole almonds + ¼ cup rolled oats + 1 tablespoon flaxseed meal + 1 cup frozen blueberries + 1 cup raspberry yogurt + ¼ cup Concord grape juice + 1 cup 1% buttermilk

name: Kale Banana Smoothie
summary: So good! Great flavor and not too sweet. Very filling!
ingredient: 16 fluid ounces coconut water, chilled + 1 banana + ½ avocado, peeled and pitted + ½ cup packed kale + <U+215B> lemon, juiced + 1 pinch cayenne pepper

name: Almond Berry Smoothie
summary: Almond milk and almond butter are the star ingredients in this berry smoothie with almond milk for a nutritious, on-the-go meal that is vegan and paleo-friendly.
ingredient: 1 cup frozen blueberries + 1 banana + ½ cup almond milk + 1 tablespoon almond butter + water as needed

name: Chocolate Banana Peanut Butter Protein Shake
summary: This chocolate protein shake is high in protein and tasty.
ingredient: 6 ice cubes + 1 cup milk + 1 banana + 1 scoop chocolate-flavored protein powder + 2 tablespoons peanut butter + 1 tablespoon honey + 1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder, or more to taste

name: Blueberry Smoothie
summary: Blueberry smoothie recipes are a great way to use fresh or frozen berries, and this is a delicious one!
ingredient: 1 cup blueberries (frozen or fresh) + 1 (8 ounce) container plain yogurt + ¾ cup 2% reduced-fat milk + 2 tablespoons white sugar + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + <U+215B> teaspoon ground nutmeg

name: Pineapple Cleanser Smoothie
summary: This is great for a detox cleanse.
ingredient: 1 cup coconut water, or to taste + 1 cup chopped fresh pineapple + 1 stalk celery + ½ cucumber, peeled + <U+2153> bunch fresh parsley + ½ lemon, peeled + 1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger root

name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
summary: This peanut butter banana smoothie is so refreshing, and it's sweet and tasty.
ingredient: 2 bananas, broken into chunks + 2 cups milk + ½ cup peanut butter + 2 tablespoons honey, or to taste + 2 cups ice cubes

name: Strawberry Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
summary: This vegan oatmeal smoothie has a deep pink color and a rich, creamy texture. It's very filling, and perfect for people in a rush in the morning. You don't have to give up a good breakfast when it's this fast to make! I use vitamin fortified soy milk.
ingredient: 1 cup soy milk + ½ cup rolled oats + 14 frozen strawberries + 1 banana, broken into chunks + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons white sugar (Optional) + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract (Optional)

name: CJ's Epic Strawberry Banana Smoothie
summary: This is my 13-year-old son's creation. It's perfect on a hot summer day or as an after school treat.
ingredient: 2 cups ice + 3 frozen bananas, cut into small chunks + 1 cup skim milk + ¼ cup white sugar, or to taste + 6 fresh strawberries, sliced + 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract + 2 tablespoons whipped dairy topping, or to taste

name: Basic Fruit Smoothie
summary: This is a great fruit smoothie recipe consisting of fruit, fruit juice, and ice. I like to use whatever fresh fruits I crave that day... Berries, mangos, papayas, kiwi fruit, etc. Experiment with your favorites!
ingredient: 1 quart strawberries, hulled + 2 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced + 1 banana, broken into chunks + 2 cups ice + 1 cup orange-peach-mango juice

name: Chocolate Banana Peanut Butter Protein Shake
summary: This chocolate protein shake is high in protein and tasty.
ingredient: 6 ice cubes + 1 cup milk + 1 banana + 1 scoop chocolate-flavored protein powder + 2 tablespoons peanut butter + 1 tablespoon honey + 1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa powder, or more to taste

name: Easy Orange Cream Slush
summary: This is a simple and delicious recipe for a cool and creamy orange drink.
ingredient: ½ cup orange juice + ¼ cup milk + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 8 ice cubes

name: Pineapple and Banana Smoothie
summary: A gorgeous indulgent pineapple smoothie with banana — simple, easy, and delicious!
ingredient: 4 ice cubes + ¼ fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and cubed + 1 large banana, cut into chunks + 1 cup pineapple or apple juice

name: Easy Mango Banana Smoothie
summary: As a babysitter, I always look for quick, easy, healthy, and delicious recipes. Here is a great one!
ingredient: 2 mangos - peeled, seeded, and sliced + 2 bananas + 2 cups vanilla yogurt + 2 cups milk

name: Strawberry Banana Protein Smoothie
summary: This balanced smoothie is great for a meal replacement or after a workout.
ingredient: 1 banana + 1<U+2009>¼ cups sliced fresh strawberries + 10 whole almonds + 2 tablespoons water + 1 cup ice cubes + 3 tablespoons chocolate flavored protein powder

name: Spinach and Banana Power Smoothie
summary: A vegan banana spinach smoothie that is quick, easy, and surprisingly delicious. I make one of these tasty treats for myself every morning for breakfast, and it powers me all the way until lunch. I love the mild sweetness of the banana, but if you want it sweeter you could add sugar. I've also added different flavors like ginger, cinnamon, apple, or any number of ingredients. Raw vegans can substitute raw almond milk for the soy. Feel free to experiment with different versions, and enjoy the pure energy that comes from eating fresh, good-for-you food!
ingredient: 1 cup plain soy milk + ¾ cup packed fresh spinach leaves + 1 large banana, sliced

name: Spinach and Kale Smoothie
summary: A delicious way to add more veggies to your diet! This recipe is very versatile. You can change out the greens with whatever you want. Chia seeds give you added protein and energy. Hemp seeds will give you a boost of omegas!
ingredient: 2 cups fresh spinach + 1 cup almond milk + 1 tablespoon peanut butter + 1 tablespoon chia seeds (Optional) + 1 leaf kale + 1 sliced frozen banana

name: Strawberry Orange Banana Smoothie
summary: Orange, banana, and strawberries make up this refreshing smoothie!
ingredient: ¾ cup orange juice + 1 cup fresh strawberries + 1 ripe banana + ice cubes

name: Healthy Chocolate Smoothie
summary: The sweetness of the bananas in this smoothie means you don't need to add any sugar to sweeten the cocoa. This is my go-to for a midday energy boost and kids love it too.
ingredient: 2 very ripe bananas + 6 ice cubes + 1 cup milk + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder + 1 tablespoon peanut butter + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Kale and Banana Smoothie
summary: Nutrient-rich kale is hidden in this delicious banana smoothie. . . perfect for those of us who have a hard time getting our daily dose of veggies!
ingredient: 1 banana + 2 cups chopped kale + ½ cup light unsweetened soy milk + 1 tablespoon flax seeds + 1 teaspoon maple syrup

name: Healthy Berry and Spinach Smoothie
summary: This is an easy way to get kids to eat their veggies. If you want a more fruity taste, exclude the yogurt.
ingredient: 2 cups frozen berries + 1 cup plain yogurt + ½ cup orange juice + ¼ cup fresh spinach, or to taste + 5 strawberries

name: Kiwi Strawberry Smoothie
summary: Fruity goodness for smoothie lovers!
ingredient: 1 banana + 6 strawberries + 1 kiwi + ½ cup vanilla frozen yogurt + ¾ cup pineapple and orange juice blend

name: Simple Cantaloupe Smoothie
summary: This is a very simple recipe! A sweet, healthy way to start your day with a delicious, unique flavor.
ingredient: 1 cup vanilla yogurt (such as Dannon® Light and Fit®) + ½ cup orange juice + ½ cup sliced cantaloupe + 4 ice cubes, crushed, or as needed

name: Simple Summer Smoothie
summary: I just gathered together my favorite fruits and added what else was needed. If you like, use a multigrain bar (I use Entenmann's strawberry flavored), crumble it, and sprinkle some on top of each smoothie.
ingredient: 1 banana + 1 cup frozen strawberries + 1 cup frozen blueberries + 1 cup frozen cherries + 4 ice cubes + ½ cup orange juice + ¾ cup vanilla yogurt + ½ teaspoon honey (Optional)

name: Healthy Blueberry Breakfast Smoothie
summary: A quick recipe I thought up while trying to decide what to eat for breakfast. Great if you are trying to figure out what to do with those blueberries in the fridge or freezer! Also great on-the-go! Delicious and includes many foods that are a great way to start your day! Many of the ingredients, except for the blueberries and yogurt, are optional and vary depending on your own taste. I love cinnamon and a thick, super-cold smoothie. This recipe is super versatile, and you can change it depending on dietary needs or personal preference. Have fun with it!
ingredient: 1 cup fresh blueberries + ½ cup Greek yogurt + ¼ cup orange juice + 1 tablespoon white sugar, or to taste + ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste + 3 ice cubes

name: Strawberry Banana Protein Shake
summary: This is a healthy, versatile protein milk shake perfect for a post-workout meal, or healthy alternative to an ice cream shake for the kids. Strawberries and banana could be substituted with kiwi, pineapple, pears, mango, blueberries, etc. Get creative and enjoy!
ingredient: 1 cup skim milk + 1 scoop vanilla-flavored whey protein powder + 2 cups ice + 1 cup strawberries + 1 large banana + 1 tablespoon natural peanut butter

name: Delicious Healthy Strawberry Shake
summary: My Mom used to make this for me when I was a kid. I loved it then and I still love it! Especially on hot days!
ingredient: 2 cups milk + 1 tablespoon honey + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup frozen strawberries

name: Mangonada
summary: Mangonadas are similar to smoothies. They are sweet, salty, tart, and fruity. A definite cool-down drink for those hot summer days. And a great way to use up fresh ripe mangos.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon chamoy (Mexican chili fruit condiment) + 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning (such as Tajin®) + 1 cup Mango chunks, frozen + ¾ cup water + ½ medium lime, juiced + 1 tablespoon chamoy (Mexican chili fruit condiment) + 1 teaspoon chili-lime seasoning (such as Tajin®) + 2 tablespoons diced fresh mango

name: Strawberry Banana Breeze Smoothie
summary: Pineapple adds a bit of tropical flavor to this classic strawberry banana smoothie. Use frozen fruit for a frostier smoothie.
ingredient: 1 medium banana + 1<U+2009>½ cups fresh strawberries + 1 cup Almond Breeze Original or Unsweetened Original almondmilk + ½ cup fresh or juice packed pineapple + 1 tablespoon slivered or sliced almonds (Optional) + 1 teaspoon flax seeds (Optional)

name: Banana, Avocado, and Spinach Smoothie
summary: Quick and delicious smoothie that can be used as a breakfast or snack!
ingredient: 1 banana, sliced + ½ avocado, peeled and sliced + ½ cup fresh spinach + ½ cup 1% milk + 6 ice cubes + 2 teaspoons honey + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Beef Stroganoff III
summary: I have been making this recipe for over 20 years. This can be served over either rice or noodles. A little work but worth the effort.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 6 to 8 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds beef chuck roast + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 4 ounces butter + 4 green onions, sliced (white parts only) + 4 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed beef broth + 1 teaspoon prepared mustard + 1 (6 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained + <U+2153> cup sour cream + <U+2153> cup white wine + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Simple Beef Stroganoff
summary: This rich and creamy ground beef stroganoff with egg noodles is super simple to prepare, and ready to serve in under 30 minutes making it a great choice for busy weeknights. Garnish with freshly chopped parsley for added color and flavor.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package egg noodles + 1 pound ground beef + 1 (10.5 ounce) can fat-free condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + ½ cup sour cream + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Simple Hamburger Stroganoff
summary: I've always loved the taste of a good Stroganoff, but I hated the expense and preparation of beef tips or steak or roast beef to make it. So I created my own creamy Stroganoff.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package egg noodles + 1 pound lean ground beef + 1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 1 (6 ounce) can chopped mushrooms, with liquid + ½ cup milk + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup

name: Daria's Slow Cooker Beef Stroganoff
summary: This is a delicious stroganoff recipe. It's very easy and very tasty, using round steak along with mushrooms, onions, and chives. Try serving it over hot, buttered noodles.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ pounds top round steak, cut into strips + salt and pepper to taste + ½ onion, chopped + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 (8 ounce) can canned mushrooms + ¼ cup water + 1 tablespoon dried chives + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 cube beef bouillon + ¼ cup white wine + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + 1 (16 ounce) container sour cream + ½ cup chopped fresh parsley

name: Chef John's Classic Beef Stroganoff
summary: This is a fairly lean version of beef stroganoff, as most recipes call for more cream. This is something you can easily adjust to your tastes. I like a little thicker version, with just enough sauce to coat the meat and noodles.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 2 pounds beef chuck roast, cut into 1/2-inch thick strips + salt and pepper to taste + 1 tablespoon butter + ½ medium onion, sliced or diced + 8 ounces sliced mushrooms + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons all-purpose flour + ½ cup white wine + 2 cups beef broth, divided + ¾ cup creme fraiche + 1 tablespoon fresh chopped chives + salt and pepper to taste

name: Easy Beef Stroganoff in the Slow Cooker
summary: I make my beef stroganoff in the slow cooker with cream of mushroom soup and cream cheese with garlic and herbs. Serve over noodles to your liking.
ingredient: 1<U+2009><U+2153> pounds cubed beef stew meat + 2 cups fresh mushrooms, thickly sliced + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 cup milk + 2 onions, chopped + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 6 ounces herb and garlic-flavored cream cheese + 1 cup fusilli pasta + ¼ cup sour cream (Optional)

name: Beef Stroganoff III
summary: I have been making this recipe for over 20 years. This can be served over either rice or noodles. A little work but worth the effort.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 6 to 8 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds beef chuck roast + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 4 ounces butter + 4 green onions, sliced (white parts only) + 4 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed beef broth + 1 teaspoon prepared mustard + 1 (6 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained + <U+2153> cup sour cream + <U+2153> cup white wine + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Rich and Creamy Beef Stroganoff
summary: A rich, creamy beef stroganoff. This recipe uses a roux to create a beef gravy that is then thickened with sour cream AND cream cheese. A little bit of zip is added using pepper flakes. Serve this over egg noodles.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 25 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 (2 pound) beef chuck roast, cut into 1/2-inch thick strips + ½ cup red wine + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 large onion, diced + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 cup sliced mushrooms + ¼ cup butter + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups beef stock + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard + 2 teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes + <U+2153> cup sour cream + 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened

name: Easy Slow Cooker Beef Stroganoff
summary: A deliciously rich and creamy beef stroganoff that's easy to prep in a slow cooker with little-to-no fuss. It smells wonderful and is tasty like no other stroganoff you've had before thanks to the addition of cream cheese along with the sour cream. Serve over hot, buttered flat noodles.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ pounds cubed beef stew meat + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 onion, chopped + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + ¼ cup water + 1 tablespoon dried chives + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 cube beef bouillon + ½ cup red wine + 1 tablespoon cornstarch + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + 1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms + 4 ounces cream cheese + ½ cup chopped fresh parsley

name: Simple Hamburger Stroganoff
summary: I've always loved the taste of a good Stroganoff, but I hated the expense and preparation of beef tips or steak or roast beef to make it. So I created my own creamy Stroganoff.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package egg noodles + 1 pound lean ground beef + 1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 1 (6 ounce) can chopped mushrooms, with liquid + ½ cup milk + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup

name: Poor Man's Stroganoff
summary: This is a recipe I came up with when I was helping to raise 6 kids. Every penny counted. You can add onions if desired.
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package egg noodles + 1 pound ground beef + 1 teaspoon Greek seasoning (such as Cavender's®) + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 teaspoon vegetable oil + 1 (16 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms + 1 pint sour cream

name: Easy Stroganoff
summary: Valentine's Day is special for us because it is our wedding anniversary as well! Though this isn't a standard 'romantic' recipe, every time I prepare this dish the love flows freely! It is a way to show my husband I love him -- it is his favorite, but not mine. Every time I serve it my husband showers me with compliments, affection, and love because he knows it's my way of saying I love you any day of the week, not just Valentine's Day.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package wide egg noodles + 1 pound lean ground beef + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon seasoned salt + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 (8 ounce) can sliced mushrooms + 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup + 10<U+2009>¾ fluid ounces milk + 1 cup sour cream

name: Hamburger Stroganoff
summary: This is one hamburger stroganoff that my whole family will eat! The flavors blend together to make a rich, tangy, delicious sauce, and a hearty meal. Garnish with additional sour cream and fresh parsley.
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef chuck + 1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms + 1 onion, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 (14 ounce) can beef broth + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 (12 ounce) package egg noodles + 1 cup sour cream + 2 teaspoons finely grated raw horseradish (Optional)

name: Beef Stroganoff with Ground Beef
summary: Ground beef makes this stroganoff sauce a quick, tasty comfort food served over noodles or mashed spuds.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms + <U+2153> cup chopped onion + 1 pound lean ground beef + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon seasoning salt + ½ teaspoon ground paprika + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + ¾ cup sour cream, or more to taste + 1 tablespoon liquid smoke, or to taste (Optional) + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce

name: Nana's Beef Stroganoff
summary: This is a delicious Stroganoff that my Nana made all the time. My husband's favorite meal is Stroganoff, and before we met he never had homemade Stroganoff sauce. Once my mom made this for him, he has never eaten any other! Serve over rice or egg noodles.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 2 hrs 20 mins,total: 2 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ pounds beef sirloin, cut into 1/4-inch wide strips + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 cup mushrooms + ½ cup chopped onion + 1 clove garlic, crushed + 2 tablespoons butter + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons tomato paste + 1<U+2009>¼ cups chilled beef stock + 1 cup sour cream + ¼ cup dry white wine

name: Ground Beef Stroganoff
summary: This easy, fast, and economical recipe sure to please. It is equally good over rice. Serve this family favorite with a green salad and a light dessert.
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + ½ cup chopped onion + 1 (4.5 ounce) can mushrooms, drained + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon mustard powder + ½ cup sour cream + ½ cup mayonnaise + ½ cup beef broth + 1 (8 ounce) package wide egg noodles

name: One-Pot Ground Beef Stroganoff
summary: This one-pot ground beef stroganoff is creamy and delicious! My family loved the boxed version of ground beef stroganoff, but we have done away with processed foods. I created this out of necessity, and they don't miss the box at all!
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons cornstarch + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons dried parsley + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon onion powder + 1<U+2009>¾ cups milk + 1<U+2009>¼ cups beef stock + 1 (8 ounce) package egg noodles + ½ cup sour cream + ¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese

name: Instant Pot® Ground Beef Stroganoff
summary: This is a guaranteed crowd-pleasing meal made in an Instant Pot®! Homemade, delicious food instantly.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + 16 ounces chopped fresh mushrooms + 2 each onions, minced + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 4 cups water + 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 (16 ounce) package egg noodles + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix + 1 cup sour cream

name: Classic Beef Stroganoff in a Slow Cooker
summary: This classic beef stroganoff recipe uses ingredients commonly kept on hand for an easy and delicious family meal.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 hrs,additional: 10 mins,total: 8 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 3 quarts
ingredient: 1 pound top round steak, trimmed + 1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms + 1 cup chopped onion + 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley + 3 cloves garlic, minced + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon dried dill + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + <U+2153> cup all-purpose flour (spooned and leveled) + 1 cup fat-free reduced-sodium beef broth + 1 (8 ounce) container reduced-fat sour cream + 2 cups hot cooked egg noodles

name: Beef Stroganoff with White Wine
summary: Based on a dish I had a pub in Scotland, this beef stroganoff is best served with rice instead of noodles. The sauce is not very thick, so it coats the rice nicely.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 40 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons butter + 1 (8 ounce) package sliced mushrooms + 1 large onion, diced + 4 cloves garlic, diced + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1<U+2009>½ pounds beef sirloin steak, cut into 1 inch cubes + 1 cup white wine + 2 cups beef bouillon + 1 teaspoon crumbled dried thyme + 1 teaspoon dried basil + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + 2 bay leaves + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 2 cups half-and-half cream

name: Best Ever Russian Beef Stroganoff
summary: Being of Norwegian descent, I really don't know how this Russian beef stroganoff came into the family. My grandma has made this recipe for 50 years that I know of and it is truly my favorite. Serve over noodles. For a wintertime comfort food this is the best. I actually like it so much that my wife and I will have this for dinner and the next morning we will eat the leftovers with a couple of eggs on the side for brunch. You can't beat it!
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons all-purpose flour + ¾ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 pound beef sirloin, cut into 1/4-inch wide strips + 3 tablespoons butter + 1 cup thinly sliced mushrooms + ½ cup chopped onion + 1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste + 3 tablespoons butter + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon tomato paste + 1<U+2009>¼ cups cold beef stock + 1 cup sour cream + 3 tablespoons cooking sherry

name: Stroganoff
summary: Here's a simple way to prepare a Stroganoff. Just a few ingredients combined with beef and you have a whole meal in about thirty minutes.
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + ½ cup chopped onion + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon paprika + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 cup sour cream + 8 ounces macaroni

name: Best Beef Stroganoff
summary: Thinly sliced beef in a rich creamy sour cream sauce. This beef stroganoff recipe is how Count Stroganoff intended the dish to be made!
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package egg noodles + 2 tablespoons butter, softened + 2 onions, finely chopped + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, thinly sliced + 1 pound beef loin steak, cut into thin strips + 1 (14 ounce) can beef consomme + ¼ cup Burgundy wine (Optional) + 3 tablespoons lemon juice + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons cold water, or as needed + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream

name: Slow Cooker Beef Stroganoff II
summary: A delicious beef stroganoff recipe for the slow cooker. This one uses round steak and golden mushroom soup mixed with egg noodles and sour cream. Very simple to assemble and the slow cooker does the work for you.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 hrs 40 mins,total: 8 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>½ pounds round steak, cubed + ¼ cup all-purpose flour for coating + 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed golden mushroom soup + 3<U+2009>½ cups water + 3 cubes beef bouillon + 1 cup sour cream + 1 (16 ounce) package egg noodles

name: Simple Ground Beef Stroganoff
summary: A very simple ground beef stroganoff recipe. Serve with green beans and bread. The leftovers are great too.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons butter, divided + 1 tablespoon olive oil + ½ onion, diced + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + 1 pound ground beef + 1 (12 ounce) package egg noodles + 2 tablespoons sour cream + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup + ½ teaspoon paprika + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Campbell's Kitchen Beef Stroganoff
summary: Always a family favorite, this classic dish of quickly sauteed beef and onion in a creamy mushroom sauce is perfect over hot cooked noodles. Garnish with fresh parsley for a colorful table presence and serve with a family favorite green vegetable.
ingredient: 1 pound boneless beef sirloin steak or beef top round steak + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 medium onion, chopped + 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup or Campbell's® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Mushroom Soup + ½ teaspoon paprika + ½ cup sour cream or yogurt + 4 cups hot cooked medium egg noodles + Chopped fresh parsley

name: Easy Beef Stroganoff
summary: Light and flaky Pepperidge Farm® Puff Pastry Shells are the perfect base for this satisfying beef stroganoff featuring beef sirloin in a delicious sauce featuring mushrooms, onion, seasonings, sour cream and Campbell's® Slow Roast Beef Gravy.
ingredient: 1 (17.3 ounce) package Pepperidge Farm® Puff Pastry Shells + 1 pound boneless beef sirloin steak + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>½ cups sliced mushrooms + 1 medium onion, chopped + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon dried thyme leaves, crushed + 1 (12 ounce) jar Campbell's® Slow Roast Beef Gravy + ½ cup sour cream + 1 teaspoon Chopped fresh parsley

name: Beef Stroganoff Casserole
summary: With this incredibly rich beef stroganoff casserole, all you need is a crisp green salad. Garnish with more dill sprigs if desired.
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package penne pasta + 1 (17 ounce) package refrigerated beef roast au jus + 2 tablespoons butter + 2 large fresh Portobello mushrooms, stems removed, coarsely chopped + 1 sweet onion, cut into thin wedges + 2 garlic cloves, minced + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons tomato paste + 1 (14 ounce) can beef broth + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon smoked paprika + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 (8 ounce) carton sour cream, divided + 1 tablespoon prepared horseradish + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh dill

name: Healthier Beef Stroganoff III
summary: Fresh mushrooms, light sour cream and less butter give Donna's classic stroganoff recipe a healthier twist. Be sure to serve over whole wheat noodles!
process: prep: 35 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds beef chuck roast + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon butter + ½ pound white mushrooms, sliced + 4 green onions, sliced (white and green parts) + 2 tablespoons butter, divided + <U+2153> cup white wine + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>¼ cups reduced-sodium beef stock, divided + 1 teaspoon prepared mustard + <U+2153> cup light sour cream + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Cream Cheese Steak Stroganoff
summary: I created this recipe as a way to use leftover filet mignon steak from a New Year's dinner. Hubby really liked it and said I needed to write it down so he could have it again sometime. I hope you will enjoy this great comfort food!
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package farfalle (bow-tie) pasta + 2 teaspoons olive oil + 1 teaspoon butter + 1 (6 ounce) package sliced white mushrooms + ¼ cup French-fried onions + 1 clove garlic, minced + ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, cubed + <U+2153> cup white wine + 2 tablespoons tomato paste + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 1 tablespoon cornstarch + 1 beef bouillon cube + ½ teaspoon dried parsley + ½ teaspoon seasoned salt + ¼ teaspoon smoked paprika + ¾ pound cooked steak, thinly sliced + ¼ cup milk, or as needed + freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Hybrid Hamburger Stroganoff
summary: I created this hamburger stroganoff as an amalgamation of about a half-dozen stroganoff recipes. Really hits the spot on a cold day, served over egg noodles with peas and carrots.
ingredient: 1 pound lean ground beef + 1 (8 ounce) package sliced white mushrooms + 1 onion, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon vegetable oil + 1 cup red wine + 1 cup beef stock + 1 cup sour cream + 2 tablespoons cornstarch + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste

name: Beef Stroganoff with Noodles
summary: This recipe is our family favorite. The sauce is very rich and creamy and is great served over egg noodles. It does take a little longer to make, but it is well worth it!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>½ pounds beef stew meat, cut into 1/2 inch pieces + ½ pound bacon, cut into 1/4 inch pieces + ½ onion, diced + 3 strips celery, diced + 2 tablespoons seasoning salt + ¼ cup Worcestershire sauce + 3 (14 ounce) cans beef broth + 1 (8 ounce) package dry egg noodles + 1 teaspoon butter + 2 (4 ounce) cans sliced mushrooms + ¼ cup cornstarch + <U+2153> cup cold water + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream

name: Mitzie's Beef Stroganoff
summary: I couldn't find a beef stroganoff recipe using ground beef that I liked anywhere, so I asked on Facebook, and one of my friends messaged me her personal recipe, which I tried and loved! Serve over egg noodles.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon butter + 1 onion, diced + 2 teaspoons minced garlic + 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 cup beef broth + 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce + ¾ teaspoon prepared mustard + ¼ cup light sour cream + ¼ cup light cream cheese, softened

name: One-Dish Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef sirloin are quickly sauteed and combined with beef broth, mushrooms, egg noodles and sour cream for a simple, one-skillet dish that's ready in just 45 minutes.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 pound boneless beef sirloin steak, 3/4-inch thick, cut into very thin strips + 1 medium onion, chopped + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon dried parsley flakes + 1<U+2009>¾ cups Swanson® Beef Broth or Swanson® Beef Stock + 6 ounces sliced mushrooms + 3 cups uncooked medium egg noodles + ½ cup sour cream + 1 teaspoon Chopped fresh parsley

name: Instant Pot® Beef and Noodles
summary: On those nippy nights, this brings all the warmth home. Plan ahead, the frozen noodles need to thaw in the fridge overnight. This recipe is exclusively for those individuals who may find their only method of cooking is with an Instant Pot®.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 8 hrs 15 mins,total: 9 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 5 servings
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen egg noodles + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon granulated onion + ½ teaspoon granulated garlic + ½ teaspoon salt-free seasoning blend + 1 pound beef stew meat + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 tablespoon butter + 6 ounces portobello mushrooms, quartered + 1 medium onion, halved and thinly sliced + 1 cup beef broth + 2 cups water + 1 (1.8 ounce) package dry onion and mushroom soup mix

name: Instant Pot® Beef Stroganoff
summary: This Instant Pot® beef stroganoff is savory, creamy, and has lots of tender beef! Tastes like it's been slow-cooking for hours but ready in a little over an hour.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 small onion, diced + 2 pounds beef steak, cubed or cut into 1/2-inch to 1-inch strips + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh thyme + 4 cups beef broth, divided + 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, or more to taste + 3 cups chopped fresh mushrooms + 1 (16 ounce) package egg noodles + 1 (24 ounce) container sour cream + 2 tablespoons cornstarch, or more as needed (Optional) + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Chili Rellenos Casserole
summary: This Chili Rellenos Casserole is very easy to prepare and is loaded with flavor. Great for a busy week night, and good enough for company.
ingredient: 2 (7 ounce) cans whole green chile peppers, drained + 8 ounces Monterey Jack cheese, shredded + 8 ounces Longhorn or Cheddar cheese, shredded + 2 large eggs, or more to taste + 1 (5 ounce) can evaporated milk + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + ½ cup milk (Optional) + 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce

name: Easy Tuna Casserole
summary: Tuna, macaroni, creamy soup, cheese and fried onions are all you need to make this super easy tuna casserole that I learned from my roommate. It's great as leftovers, too.
ingredient: 3 cups cooked macaroni + 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 1<U+2009>½ cups French fried onions

name: Mamaw's Chicken and Rice Casserole
summary: I grew up with this chicken and rice casserole recipe. My Grandmother got it from a lady from church at a pot luck a long time ago! She passed it down to my mom and it's always been a family favorite. Quick and easy for school nights, and the leftovers are just as good! You can use less butter on top of course, my Momma and Mamaw always put the full stick on top (gotta love Southern ladies and their butter!)
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 chicken breasts, cut into cubes + 2 cups water + 2 cups instant white rice + 1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of chicken soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of celery soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup + salt and ground black pepper to taste + ½ cup butter, sliced into pats

name: Mama's Oh-So-Savory Lamb and Eggplant Casserole
summary: The basis of this recipe came from my 4th grade teacher's mother who was Armenian, and I've been making it for over 50 years. It is easy to put together, but the longer the stovetop step simmers, the better the casserole will be when served. Leftovers are yummy! You could serve this over rice, if you like, with a green salad. I just serve it in pasta bowls with crusty bread, butter, and a nice glass of red wine. Enjoy!
process: prep: 35 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs 35 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 (1 pound) eggplant, cut into 1-inch cubes + salt + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 large sweet onion, coarsely chopped + 2 large stalks celery, sliced + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + 2 pinches dried oregano + 2 pinches ground dried rosemary + 2 pinches paprika + <U+215B> teaspoon dried mint + 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons garlic, minced + 3 tomatoes, coarsely chopped + 1 cup chicken broth + 1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce + 1 pound ground lamb + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 lemon, juiced, or to taste

name: Chicken Divan
summary: This is a recipe to serve your mother-in-law; we call it a 'bride basic'. It differs from some Chicken Divan recipes because of the curry. Men love this. Wonderful! The ingredients can be 'assembled' and frozen, then baked when you're ready. Serve with rice and a fruit salad, if desired.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 to 8 servings
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups cooked chopped broccoli + 2 cups shredded, cooked chicken meat + 2 (4.5 ounce) cans mushrooms, drained + 1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained (Optional) + 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 cup mayonnaise + 1 teaspoon lemon juice + ¼ teaspoon curry powder + 1 tablespoon melted butter + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Firehouse Chili and Cornbread Casserole
summary: Everyone knows that firefighters make the best chili--many using a recipe very similar to this--and the only way I know how to make that chili even better is by topping it with a cheesy cornbread crust. The cornbread crust is relatively sweet, which of course pairs perfectly with that spicy, meaty, savory chili.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 45 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 yellow onion, diced + 2 teaspoons kosher salt, or more to taste + 2 pounds ground beef + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + ½ cup diced poblano pepper + 3 cloves garlic, crushed + 3 tablespoons chili powder + 2 teaspoons ground cumin + 2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + 1 (15 ounce) can fire-roasted diced tomatoes + 1 (15 ounce) can fire-roasted crushed tomatoes + 2 cups water, or as needed + 1 (16 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained + 2 (7.5 ounce) packages corn muffin mix (such as Jiffy®) + 1 cup grated white Cheddar cheese, divided + 2 large eggs + 1 cup milk + ¼ cup sour cream, or to taste + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste

name: A Minnesotan's Beef and Macaroni Hotdish
summary: My grandpa's recipe. Old-school and traditional Minnesota staple.
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + 2 cups elbow macaroni + ½ large green bell pepper, coarsely chopped + ½ large onion, chopped + 1 (16 ounce) can tomato sauce + 1 pound tomatoes, coarsely chopped + 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon soy sauce + 1 teaspoon salt + ¾ teaspoon dried basil + ¾ teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon chili powder + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®) + 1 cup beef broth

name: Salsa Chicken Rice Casserole
summary: Layers of rice, chicken breast, a creamy soup and salsa mixture and two kinds of cheese add up to a simply yummy salsa casserole! This recipe is a family favorite because it's delicious and easily made with ingredients found in the pantry.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups uncooked white rice + 2<U+2009><U+2154> cups water + 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 onion, chopped + 1<U+2009>½ cups mild salsa

name: Grandma's Ground Beef Casserole
summary: My grandmother's old-fashioned hamburger casserole is comfort food at its best! Featuring ground beef, noodles, and a creamy cheese sauce, this simple recipe dates back to the 1940's. I've tweaked the amount of cheese and sour cream depending on what I've got in the fridge and it always turns out great! My mother has suggested this was made up as a way to use up ingredients in the fridge.
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + 2 (15 ounce) cans tomato sauce + 1 teaspoon white sugar + 1 teaspoon garlic salt + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 (8 ounce) package egg noodles + 1 cup sour cream + 3 ounces cream cheese, softened + 1 large white onion, diced + ½ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, or more to taste

name: Chicken Parmesan Pasta Casserole
summary: Perfect for potluck meals, family gatherings, or in a smaller batch, for a winter comfort food meal for the family. Just my take on traditional Chicken Parmesan. I came up with this for my wife's corporate potluck lunch. She wanted Chicken Parmesan, but it was too difficult to feed 20 people the conventional way. Figured a casserole would work just as well. It did!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 55 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package uncooked rotini pasta + 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces + 2 cups vegetable oil for frying + 2 cups flour + 4 eggs, beaten + 2 cups Italian seasoned bread crumbs + 2 tablespoons garlic powder + 1 (16 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese, divided + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1<U+2009>½ (32 ounce) jars marinara sauce + ½ cup dry red wine (such as Sangiovese) + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Baked Spaghetti with Chicken
summary: This is a wonderful chicken recipe that kids and adults love. To make ahead of time, leave off the cheese and refrigerate. Then bake for 20 minutes to heat, add the cheese and bake for 10 more minutes.
process: prep: 1 hr,cook: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil + 2 bay leaves + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons Italian seasoning + 1 teaspoon chopped garlic + salt and pepper to taste + 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + ½ onion, chopped + 1 head broccoli, cut into florets + 8 fresh mushrooms, sliced + 1 pound uncooked spaghetti + 5 ounces shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese + 1 (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce, or more to taste

name: Fisherman's Pie
summary: It's almost like a shepherd's pie but with fish and spinach. Great dish for a cold gloomy day. It's Irish comfort food at its best.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 pound cod fillets, cut into chunks + 3 tablespoons butter + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>½ cups warm milk, or more as needed + 1 cup shredded sharp white Cheddar cheese + 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained + ½ cup minced onion + 1 teaspoon salt, or to taste + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste + 1 clove garlic, pressed + 2 cups mashed potatoes + 1 cup shredded yellow Cheddar cheese

name: Taco Tuesday Casserole
summary: This is a great Mexican dish for our bigger family. Could be made ahead for potlucks too! This recipe I threw together with what I had on had one night that sounded good together! Could be done with chicken as alternative too. I served this with cooked spinach and put my portion of casserole over the spinach.
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 pounds ground beef + ½ cup diced onion + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + 9 tablespoons taco seasoning mix + 5 flour tortillas + 1 (10 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 8 corn tortilla chips, or more to taste + ¼ cup diced tomatoes, or to taste (Optional) + 2 tablespoons chopped olives, or to taste (Optional)

name: Campbell's® Tuna Noodle Casserole
summary: Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup flavors a creamy sauce that is mixed with tuna, egg noodles and peas, topped with a crunchy bread crumb topping and baked to perfection.
ingredient: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (regular or 25% Lower Sodium) + 1 cup milk + 2 cups frozen peas + 2 (10 ounce) cans tuna, drained + 4 cups hot cooked medium egg noodles + 2 tablespoons dry bread crumbs + 1 tablespoon butter, melted

name: King Ranch Chicken Casserole
summary: This classic King Ranch chicken casserole is bursting with chicken, corn tortillas, tomatoes, peppers, and cheesy goodness. From what I hear, it's impossible to go to any sort of potluck in Texas and not see one of these.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9x13-inch casserole
ingredient: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 medium white onion, diced + 1 medium red bell pepper, diced + 1 medium green bell pepper, diced + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®) + 1 cup chicken broth + 2 tablespoons sour cream + 2 teaspoons ground cumin + 1 teaspoon ancho chile powder + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + ¼ teaspoon chipotle chile powder + 1 (3 pound) cooked chicken, torn into shreds or cut into chunks + 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Cheddar cheese + 10 (6 inch) corn tortillas, cut into quarters

name: Super Easy Egg Casserole
summary: Tasty egg casserole that husband approves! I frequently make this dish because it's so easy to make. This recipe can be easily doubled or tripled, but you may have to cook it longer.
ingredient: 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 6 eggs, whisked + 6 slices bacon, diced + 2 slices bread, cubed + <U+2153> red bell pepper, diced + 2 green onions, chopped + 3 tablespoons milk + ½ teaspoon minced garlic, or to taste (Optional) + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Broccoli, Rice, Cheese, and Chicken Casserole
summary: This is a delicious twist to broccoli, rice, and cheese casserole, and is VERY easy to make. You can also cut this in half. I use the 1 can cream of mushroom soup when I make half. You can also leave out the onion. It just gives it a little added flavor, but is still very good without it.
ingredient: 2 cups water + 2 cups uncooked instant rice + 2 (10 ounce) cans chunk chicken, drained + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + ¼ cup butter + 1 cup milk + 1 (16 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli + 1 small white onion, chopped + 1 pound processed cheese food

name: Easy Mexican Casserole
summary: This Mexican casserole is easy to make and very tasty. I often substitute with ground turkey and low-fat dairy products, and it's still delicious! Serve this casserole with chips, salsa, and green salad.
ingredient: 1 pound lean ground beef + 2 cups salsa + 1 (16 ounce) can chili beans, drained + 3 cups tortilla chips, crushed + 2 cups sour cream + 1 (2 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained + ½ cup chopped green onion + ½ cup chopped fresh tomato + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Poblano Chicken Enchilada Casserole
summary: I've begun making my enchiladas casserole style, which saves a lot time, not to mention burned fingers. :) However, everyone still raves over my enchiladas, and this recipe recently earned a round of applause when I made them on a skiing holiday. The sauce is actually a modified Alfredo recipe and is also great over fajitas.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 6 tablespoons butter, divided + 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 2 fresh poblano peppers, seeded and sliced into strips + 4 fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and diced + 2 cloves garlic, chopped + 1 lime, halved + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 pint half-and-half + 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped + 1 (8 ounce) package fresh mushrooms, sliced + 2 ounces sour cream + 12 (6 inch) corn tortillas + 4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Pizza Casserole
summary: This recipe takes all the good things we love on pizza and combines them with egg noodles to form a great, one-dish casserole to feed your family.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 7,Yield: 6 to 8 servings
ingredient: 2 cups uncooked egg noodles + ½ pound lean ground beef + 1 onion, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 1 cup sliced pepperoni sausage + 16 ounces pizza sauce + 4 tablespoons milk + 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Easy French Toast Casserole
summary: Delicious and decadent, simple spin on French toast. Got the idea from a bed and breakfast in the south. Add additional ingredients; we like blueberries and cream cheese, cinnamon apples, nuts, and dried fruit!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 French toast casserole
ingredient: 1 cup brown sugar + ½ cup butter + 1 (8 ounce) loaf crusty French bread, cut into bite-size pieces, or as needed + 2 cups milk + 6 eggs + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste + 1 tablespoon brown sugar, or as needed

name: Best Beef Enchiladas
summary: These enchiladas are absolutely amazing! Truly a recipe your family will love.
ingredient: 2 pounds ground beef + ¼ medium onion, finely chopped + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + ½ cup sour cream + 1 tablespoon dried parsley + 1 tablespoon taco seasoning + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2<U+2009>½ cups enchilada sauce + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chili powder + 1 clove garlic, minced + ½ teaspoon salt + 8 flour tortillas + 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained + 1 (4 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained + ¼ cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Unstuffed Cabbage Roll
summary: This is an easy casserole made with ground beef, cabbage, garlic, and tomatoes. My kids don't even like cabbage, but they love this. Serve with rice for a comforting weeknight dinner. Also, the longer it stands the better it tastes!
ingredient: 2 pounds ground beef + 1 large onion, chopped + 1 small head cabbage, chopped + 2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes + 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce + ½ cup water + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 2 teaspoons salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Chicken Noodle Casserole
summary: Creamy chicken noodle casserole topped with crushed crackers. Wonderful as leftovers topped with melted cheese!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 2-quart casserole
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 6 ounces egg noodles + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1 cup sour cream + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste + ½ cup butter + 1 cup crumbled buttery round crackers

name: Grandma's Hash Brown Casserole
summary: This hash brown casserole recipe is from my friend's grandma, and it is absolutely the best hash brown dish I've ever had. Kentucky grandmas sure know how to cook!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x13-inch casserole
ingredient: 1 (2 pound) package frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + 1 cup butter, melted, divided + ½ cup chopped onion + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 cup crushed cornflakes

name: Cabbage Roll Casserole
summary: My cabbage roll casserole has all the ingredients of stuffed cabbage rolls but is a lot easier to make! This basic recipe will appeal to everyone but if you prefer more flavor, consider adding crushed garlic, paprika, thyme, or cayenne pepper.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 20 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 9x13-inch caserole
ingredient: 2 pounds ground beef + 3<U+2009>½ pounds chopped cabbage + 1 (29 ounce) can tomato sauce + 1 cup chopped onion + 1 cup uncooked white rice + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 (14 ounce) cans beef broth

name: Broccoli Chicken Divan
summary: Chicken Divan with broccoli is a quick and easy casserole that's sure to be a hit with the family!
ingredient: 1 pound chopped fresh broccoli + 1<U+2009>½ cups cubed, cooked chicken meat + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of broccoli soup + <U+2153> cup milk + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 2 tablespoons dried bread crumbs + 1 tablespoon butter, melted

name: Overnight Blueberry French Toast
summary: This blueberry French toast casserole is a very unique breakfast dish. Good for any holiday breakfast or brunch, it's filled with the fresh taste of blueberries, and covered with a rich blueberry sauce to make it one-of-a-kind!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 55 mins,additional: 8 hrs 30 mins,total: 9 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 9x13-inch casserole
ingredient: 12 slices day-old bread, cut into 1-inch cubes + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, cut into 1 inch cubes + 1 cup fresh blueberries + 12 eggs, beaten + 2 cups milk + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + <U+2153> cup maple syrup + 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup water + 2 tablespoons cornstarch + 1 cup fresh blueberries + 1 tablespoon butter
