ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package uncooked orzo pasta + 1 (10 ounce) package baby spinach leaves, finely chopped + ½ pound crumbled feta cheese + ½ red onion, finely chopped + ¾ cup pine nuts + ½ teaspoon dried basil + ¼ teaspoon ground white pepper + ½ cup olive oil + ½ cup balsamic vinegar

name: Sugar Toasted Almond Spinach Salad
summary: This recipe is easy to make, but tastes impressive and is always a big hit at barbecues. You can swap the mandarin oranges for dried cranberries depending on your personal preference.
ingredient: ½ cup slivered almonds + 3 tablespoons white sugar + ¾ cup red wine vinegar + <U+2153> cup salad oil + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 2 tablespoons yellow mustard + ¾ tablespoon poppy seeds + ¾ teaspoon salt + 1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite sized pieces + 1 (6 ounce) bag baby spinach leaves + ¾ pound sliced mushrooms + ¾ pound shredded Swiss cheese + 1 red onion, chopped + 1 cup mandarin oranges

name: Spinach Salad with Peaches and Pecans
summary: A perfect summer salad with ripe peaches, baby spinach, and roasted pecans
ingredient: ¾ cup pecans + 2 ripe peaches + 4 cups baby spinach, rinsed and dried + ¼ cup poppyseed salad dressing

name: Super Easy Spinach and Red Pepper Salad
summary: This is a delicious salad that takes no time at all to prepare, and it goes with almost any entree.
ingredient: 1 (6 ounce) package baby spinach + 1 red bell pepper, chopped + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ cup olive oil + ¼ cup rice vinegar

name: Strawberry Romaine Salad I
summary: For my wedding shower everyone brought a few recipes and this is one of my favorites. It is refreshing and pretty. This salad also travels well, just save the dressing and use it just before serving.
ingredient: 1 head romaine lettuce - rinsed, dried, and chopped + 2 bunches fresh spinach - chopped, washed and dried + 1 pint fresh strawberries, sliced + 1 Bermuda onion, sliced + ½ cup mayonnaise + 2 tablespoons white wine vinegar + <U+2153> cup white sugar + ¼ cup milk + 2 tablespoons poppy seeds

name: Wilted Spinach Salad
summary: An interesting salad that is definitely not low cal! Very popular as a side dish or a meal with my family and friends.
ingredient: 6 eggs + 1 pound bacon + 2 bunches fresh spinach, rinsed and dried + 4 green onions, thinly sliced + 2 eggs + ¼ cup white sugar + ¼ cup white vinegar + ¼ cup red wine vinegar

name: My Favorite Beet Salad
summary: Fresh roasted beets over a bed of baby spinach with tomatoes, avocados, onions and feta cheese drizzled with a balsamic dressing. You can cut this recipe in half for 4 servings, though it so good the next day too that I always make plenty.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 6 large beets, trimmed + ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 (8 ounce) package baby spinach leaves + 2 tomatoes, cut into bite-sized pieces + 2 avocados - peeled, pitted, and cut into bite-sized pieces + ½ red onion, chopped, or to taste + 1 (4 ounce) container crumbled feta cheese + ½ cup balsamic vinegar + ½ cup extra-virgin olive oil + 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, or more to taste

name: Watermelon and Feta Salad with Arugula and Spinach
summary: Sweet, salty, and refreshing salad with a little bite.
ingredient: 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil + 2 teaspoons white balsamic vinegar + ½ teaspoon kosher salt + 2 cups arugula + 2 cups baby spinach leaves + 1 cup thinly sliced red onion + 1 cup grape tomatoes, halved + ½ cup crumbled feta cheese + 2 cups bite sized watermelon chunks

name: The Perfect Sunday Brunch Spinach Salad
summary: My coworker Lori makes this salad whenever she is in charge of Friday breakfast and we all absolutely love it...and it's so easy. Absolutely no cooking required, so it's great during the warm summer months.
ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) bags baby spinach + 2 bananas, sliced + 12 fresh strawberries, sliced + 1 (10 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained + ½ cup dried cranberries + ½ cup pine nuts + 1 cup poppy seed salad dressing

name: Spring Strawberry Spinach Salad
summary: This fresh strawberry and spinach salad is tossed with a sweet poppy seed dressing.
ingredient: 1 bunch spinach, rinsed + 10 large strawberries, sliced + ½ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon salt + <U+2153> cup white wine vinegar + 1 cup vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon poppy seeds

name: Spinach Pomegranate Salad
summary: A very quick and nutritious salad made with pomegranate seeds and feta cheese.
ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach leaves, rinsed and drained + ¼ red onion, sliced very thin + ½ cup walnut pieces + ½ cup crumbled feta + ¼ cup alfalfa sprouts (Optional) + 1 pomegranate, peeled and seeds separated + 4 tablespoons balsamic vinaigrette

name: Missy's Candied Walnut Gorgonzola Salad
summary: A yummy, easy salad with candied walnuts, cranberries, Gorgonzola cheese, mixed greens, and a raspberry vinaigrette. It's always a big hit and is requested by my friends and family constantly! Even my picky fiance!
ingredient: ½ cup walnut halves + ¼ cup sugar + 3 cups mixed greens + ½ cup dried cranberries + ½ cup crumbled Gorgonzola cheese + 1 tablespoon raspberry vinaigrette + 1 tablespoon white vinegar + 1 tablespoon olive oil

name: Harvest Salad
summary: Spinach salad with blue cheese, walnuts, and dried cranberries. If you can't find walnut oil, olive oil may be substituted.
ingredient: ½ cup chopped walnuts + 1 bunch spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces + ½ cup dried cranberries + ½ cup crumbled blue cheese + 2 tomatoes, chopped + 1 avocado - peeled, pitted and diced + ½ red onion, thinly sliced + 2 tablespoons red raspberry jam (with seeds) + 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar + <U+2153> cup walnut oil + freshly ground black pepper to taste + salt to taste

name: Spinach and Strawberry Salad with Feta Cheese
summary: Besides the variations on the dressing, I added feta cheese to the salad. It was scrumptious! Even spinach haters ate it up! I made this for a party and there were a lot more servings as a buffet item than 8.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package fresh strawberries, hulled and quartered + 1 (10 ounce) package fresh spinach + 1 (8 ounce) package feta cheese, cut into squares + ½ cup olive oil + ½ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup white balsamic vinegar + 2 tablespoons sesame seeds + 1 tablespoon poppy seeds + ¼ teaspoon paprika

name: Easy and Awesome Spinach Salad
summary: This is a very easy spinach salad to make. The dressing has some unusual ingredients but is very delicious. I never have leftovers at potlucks when I take this salad.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 tossed salad
ingredient: 4 slices bacon, or more to taste + 1 (16 ounce) bag fresh spinach, stems removed + 2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped + 1 small red onion, finely chopped + ½ cup white sugar + <U+2153> cup ketchup + ¼ cup vegetable oil + ¼ cup vinegar + 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce

name: Strawberry, Kiwi, and Spinach Salad
summary: My aunt makes this salad for my family and I every time we visit.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons raspberry vinegar + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons raspberry jam + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 8 cups spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces + ½ cup chopped walnuts + 8 strawberries, quartered + 2 kiwis, peeled and sliced

name: Spinach Salad with Peaches and Pecans
summary: A perfect summer salad with ripe peaches, baby spinach, and roasted pecans
ingredient: ¾ cup pecans + 2 ripe peaches + 4 cups baby spinach, rinsed and dried + ¼ cup poppyseed salad dressing

name: Simple Cranberry Spinach Salad
summary: This is a simple salad that can be made in minutes. It works well at Thanksgiving or anytime you're just looking for something a little different.
ingredient: 1 (6 ounce) package fresh spinach + <U+2153> cup dried cranberries + <U+2153> cup chopped walnuts + <U+2153> cup raspberry walnut vinaigrette + 1 tablespoon finely shredded Romano cheese

name: Spinach Salad with Poppy Seed Dressing
summary: A colorful mix of baby greens, mandarin oranges, and almonds is topped with a sweet and tangy poppy seed dressing.
ingredient: ½ cup creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle Whip®) + <U+2153> cup white vinegar + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon poppy seeds + 4 cups baby spinach + 4 cups mixed salad greens + 1 (10 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained + <U+2153> cup thinly sliced red onion + ½ cup slivered almonds

name: Spinach Salad with Hot Bacon Dressing
summary: This spinach salad with black-eyed peas is a twist on one of my favorite culinary traditions: serving beans and greens on New Year's Day. Greens represent paper money and beans symbolize coins. Here I present these ingredients in salad form, which is a great delivery system for hot bacon dressing.
ingredient: ½ pound sliced bacon, cut crosswise into 1/2-inch strips + ¼ cup vegetable oil + ½ cup minced onion + 1 pinch salt + 2 cloves garlic, minced + <U+2153> cup apple cider vinegar + ¼ cup rice vinegar + ½ cup water + ½ cup white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons Dijon mustard + <U+2153> cup bacon drippings + 2 teaspoons water + 1 teaspoon cornstarch + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 pound baby spinach leaves + 1 (15 ounce) can black-eyed peas, rinsed and drained + 12 white button mushrooms, thinly sliced + 1 cup sliced cherry tomatoes

name: Strawberry Summer Salad
summary: I stopped at a deli and ordered a meal that came with this salad. The salad was so different that I didn't even want to try it. I did try it and loved it! I created my own version at home. Everyone loves it! You can use spinach leaves entirely if you prefer, or mix in any kind of greens you like.
ingredient: 1 cup mayonnaise + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 tablespoon white vinegar + 1 tablespoon poppy seeds + 1 head iceberg lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces + 1 bunch fresh spinach, washed, stems removed + ½ cup diced red onion + 1 (16 ounce) package fresh strawberries, hulled and sliced

name: Blueberry Spinach Salad
summary: A lovely salad with fresh blueberries, candied pecans, and blue cheese. The homemade salad dressing is the best and brings the flavors together nicely!
ingredient: 3 tablespoons red wine vinegar + ½ cup olive oil + 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard + 1 teaspoon white sugar + 1 pound fresh spinach + 1 pint fresh blueberries + 4 ounces crumbled blue cheese + 4 ounces candied pecans

name: The Best Spinach Salad Ever
summary: Fresh spinach with a creamy dressing that all my friends rave over. The dressing also makes a great vegetable dip.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 cup slivered almonds + 1 cup mayonnaise + ½ cup milk + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 (3 ounce) jar bacon bits + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach leaves + ½ head cauliflower, chopped

name: Strawberry Spinach Salad With Feta and Bacon
summary: Strawberry spinach salad has feta cheese, sweet onion, and crumbled bacon all tossed with a raspberry vinaigrette dressing.
ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach leaves + 1 quart fresh strawberries + 4 ounces crumbled feta cheese + 1 small sweet onion (such as Vidalia®), sliced + 1 (2 ounce) package bacon bits + ½ (16 ounce) bottle reduced-fat raspberry vinaigrette salad dressing (such as Kraft® Raspberry Vinaigrette Lite)

name: Blackberry Spinach Salad
summary: This is an excellent brunch salad that's very easy to throw together. This tastes great without a dressing, but some people like a bacon dressing or a nice balsamic vinegar.
ingredient: 3 cups baby spinach, rinsed and dried + 1 pint fresh blackberries + 6 ounces crumbled feta cheese + 1 pint cherry tomatoes, halved + 1 green onion, sliced + ¼ cup finely chopped walnuts (Optional) + ½ cup edible flowers (Optional)

name: Fresh Spinach Salad
summary: A wonderful salad with a homemade dressing to pour over at time of serving. Everybody likes this!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 7,Yield: 6 to 7 servings
ingredient: ½ cup white sugar + ½ cup white vinegar + 1 cup vegetable oil + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + <U+2153> cup ketchup + 1 small onion, chopped + 5 slices bacon + 3 eggs + 1 pound fresh spinach - rinsed, dried and torn into bite size pieces + 1 (4 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained

name: Spinach and Mushroom Salad
summary: This salad has a warm and slightly tangy bacon dressing. It's one of my family's favorite ways to enjoy a spinach salad.
ingredient: 4 slices bacon + 2 eggs + 2 teaspoons white sugar + 2 tablespoons cider vinegar + 2 tablespoons water + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 pound spinach + ¼ pound fresh mushrooms, sliced

name: Strawberry Romaine Salad II
summary: This is a great summer salad that utilizes fresh romaine, onions, strawberries, and a sweet poppy seed dressing.
ingredient: 1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces + 1 red onion, sliced + 1 pint fresh strawberries, sliced + 1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges + 1 cup mayonnaise + 2 tablespoons maraschino cherry juice + 2 tablespoons honey + 1 tablespoon poppy seeds + <U+215B> teaspoon lemon juice

name: Barbie's Tuna Salad
summary: This is a really great tuna salad recipe I got from a friend who used it in her catering service business many years ago. The secret ingredients are the curry and Parmesan cheese! Odd combinations but this makes a terrific tuna sandwich! She used it for an appetizer with gourmet crackers and people always wanted her recipe. I have never tasted another tuna salad quite like this one, and it has been my favorite recipe for tuna salad for many, many years.
ingredient: 1 (7 ounce) can white tuna, drained and flaked + 6 tablespoons mayonnaise or salad dressing + 3 tablespoons sweet pickle relish + 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese + <U+215B> teaspoon dried minced onion flakes + 1 tablespoon dried parsley + 1 teaspoon dried dill weed + ¼ teaspoon curry powder + 1 pinch garlic powder

name: Ahi Poke Salad
summary: You can find this appetizer all over Hawaii, it is a raw tuna salad that my aunt makes. During the hot summer months, it is especially refreshing as a mini entree! Cold, tasty and good for you!
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 appetizer servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ pounds ahi tuna, cut into 1/2 inch cubes + ¼ cup minced onion + ¼ cup minced green onion + 1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger + 2 tablespoons lightly crumbled wakame seaweed + 1 tablespoon ground roasted macadamia nuts + 2 teaspoons sesame oil + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes + 8 leaves iceberg lettuce + 2 tablespoons cilantro leaves, for garnish

name: Spicy Mexican Tuna Salad
summary: Spice up your tuna fish with this easy modified recipe that one of my student's families made for me - authentic Mexican! Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained + 1 cup frozen peas, thawed and drained + 2 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, or more to taste - chopped + 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, or to taste + ¼ teaspoon dried minced onion, or to taste + 1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste + 1 pinch ground black pepper, or to taste

name: Best Ever Tuna Salad
summary: This is my best-ever tuna salad recipe. It's creamy and delicious with a surprise ingredient!
ingredient: 2 eggs + 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained + 1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, shredded + ½ cup mayonnaise + 1 teaspoon sour cream + 1 teaspoon yellow mustard + ½ teaspoon dried dill weed + <U+215B> teaspoon lemon pepper + 2 tablespoons dill pickle relish + 2 tablespoons sweet pickle relish + ¾ cup finely chopped onion

name: Refreshing Mint and Tuna Salad
summary: This super easy salad is a refreshing blend of fresh herbs, tuna, and greens. Substitute diced chicken for the tuna if you like. It's a great summer meal.
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna in water, drained + 1 (6 ounce) package crumbled garlic and herb feta cheese + 3 hearts of romaine lettuce, torn into pieces + 1 cucumber, peeled and chopped + 4 green onions, chopped + ¼ cup olive oil + ¼ cup lemon juice + 4 cloves garlic, minced + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + ¼ cup chopped fresh mint leaves + salt and pepper to taste

name: Zesty Tuna Salad
summary: This takes boring canned tuna and adds a little zing to it. Dill pickle relish works great, too.
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained + 1 teaspoon mayonnaise + 1 teaspoon sweet pickle relish + 1 teaspoon Dijon-style prepared mustard + 1 stalk celery, chopped + ¼ cup chopped onion + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Tuna Salad with Cranberries
summary: This simple, unusual recipe will yield the best tuna sandwiches you've ever had! Try on potato bread for a comforting, yummy treat!
ingredient: 2 (5 ounce) cans solid white tuna packed in water, drained + 2 tablespoons mayonnaise + <U+2153> teaspoon dried dill weed + 3 tablespoons dried cranberries + salt

name: Whole Wheat Tuna Treat
summary: A succulent whole wheat tuna dish with bacon and avocado. Serve as a meal or as a salad.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¾ cups dry bulgur wheat + 1 avocado - peeled, pitted and diced + salt and pepper to taste + ½ pound bacon + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained

name: Southern Tuna Macaroni Salad
summary: Creamy from eggs and mayonnaise, tangy and acidic from mustard, pickles and chow chow, with a nice crunch from celery and onion. The Cajun spice just rounds it out with a blend of spices, the pimentos add a pop of color and sweetness, and tuna complements and ties all the flavors together in this Southern macaroni salad. Could top with some parsley for added color! Put this in a tortilla or melt some cheese on toast and make an open-faced sandwich!
ingredient: ½ cup diced red onion + 1 (16 ounce) package elbow macaroni + 1 cup mayonnaise + ½ cup chopped pimento peppers + 5 tablespoons dill pickle relish + 2 tablespoons chow-chow (optional) + 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard + 1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning + 1 teaspoon kosher salt + 3 ribs celery, diced + 2 large hard-boiled eggs, chopped + 2 (6.5 ounce) jars tuna packed in oil

name: Tuna Fish Salad
summary: Serve a scoop on top of a green salad, or between two pieces of bread with fresh lettuce. Sprinkle a little paprika on top to add a little flavor and color.
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley + ¼ cup chopped celery + ½ cup mayonnaise + ½ teaspoon lemon juice + ¼ cup chopped onion + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + paprika to taste

name: Italian-Style Tuna Salad
summary: Italian bread, tomato cubes, capers, tuna, olive oil, olives, onion, and cucumber make this an extravagant and exotic salad!
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil + 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 2 slices Italian bread, cubed + 3 tomatoes, cut into small pieces + 1 medium cucumber, peeled and thinly sliced + 1 small onion, thinly sliced + 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained + 20 black olives + 1 tablespoon capers

name: Tuna and Chickpea Salad
summary: Light and refreshing chickpea and tuna salad that can be eaten as a main dish or served with pita chips as an appetizer. For a meatier salad, add one more can of undrained tuna. You can also add drained, chopped artichoke hearts.
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can Italian tuna packed in olive oil, undrained + 1 (16 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained + 1 (2.25 ounce) can black olives, chopped + ¼ cup chopped Italian (flat-leaf) parsley + ½ red onion, chopped + lemon, juiced + ¼ cup crumbled reduced-fat feta cheese, or more to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Tuna Salad with Hard-Boiled Eggs
summary: After trying a lot of complicated tuna salad recipes and not liking any of them, I finally created my own. Just the basics. Serve on bread, tortillas, or lettuce.
ingredient: 2 (12 ounce) cans tuna, drained + ½ cup light creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip Light®) + 3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped + 1 stalk celery, diced (Optional) + 2 tablespoons sweet pickle relish + 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard + 1 dash Worcestershire sauce

name: Keto Tuna Salad
summary: Enjoy on a sandwich or on its own for a low-carb quick meal!
ingredient: 2 (6 ounce) cans water-packed tuna, drained + 2 (6 ounce) cans olive oil-packed tuna, drained + ¾ cup reduced-fat olive oil mayonnaise + 2 stalks celery, chopped + ½ lime, juiced + ¼ red onion, chopped + 2 tablespoons mustard + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Southern Apple Tuna Salad
summary: I grew up eating a similar tuna salad, I have since adjusted it to be a little healthier than before. The apples make it fresh and delicious! Serve on bread of your choice with lettuce. Yum!
ingredient: 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, or more if needed + 1 small apple - peeled, cored, and chopped + ¼ small onion, minced + 1 tablespoon sweet pickle relish + ½ teaspoon dill weed + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: The BEST Macaroni Salad You Will EVER Have!!
summary: This macaroni salad has been in my family for generations. and I have never had anyone say they don't love it! I have friends who constantly ask me for the recipe, yet I have never given it out....until now. This salad is the BEST macaroni salad in the world, you just gotta try it to believe me! Please rate if you like it! I love to serve this with hamburgers or bratwurst on a summer day! This goes very well at any party and even at Thanksgiving!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 14,Yield: 14 servings
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package elbow macaroni + 1 (12 ounce) can tuna in water, drained and flaked + 6 hard-cooked eggs, chopped + 2 large tomatoes, finely chopped + 1 large white onion, finely chopped + 1 cucumber, finely chopped + 3 cups creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®) + ½ cup 2% milk + ¼ cup white sugar, or to taste + 3 tablespoons prepared yellow mustard + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons ground black pepper, or to taste + ½ tablespoon salt, or to taste

name: Macaroni Tuna Salad
summary: This macaroni salad is great for lunch on its own, if you don't feel like cooking on those hot summer days. It's also a wonderful side for grilled food. I have perfected it -- after making many different types of macaroni salad, this one is my favorite. Enjoy!!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr 20 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package elbow macaroni + 2 (5 ounce) cans white tuna, drained and flaked + 2 stalks celery, minced + 1 onion, minced + 2 cups mayonnaise + 1 (5 ounce) jar pimento-stuffed green olives, drained + 1 pint grape tomatoes + salt and pepper to taste

name: Tuna Pasta Salad with Dill
summary: Great tuna pasta salad with dill, perfect for summer parties and potlucks.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package small uncooked seashell pasta + 1<U+2009>½ cups mayonnaise + ½ cup milk + 2 tablespoons pickle juice + 2 teaspoons dried dill weed + 1 teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna packed in water, drained + ½ cup chopped onion (Optional)

name: Easy Tuna Pasta Salad
summary: A simple tuna pasta salad with bright flavors.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package cavatappi (corkscrew macaroni) + 1 cup mayonnaise + 3 tablespoons lemon juice + 2 tablespoons honey + ½ tablespoon garlic powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 2 (8 ounce) cans tuna, drained + 3 stalks celery, sliced + 1 red onion, diced + 1 cup peas + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + ½ cup chopped green olives + 1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste + 4 hard-boiled eggs, halved

name: Healthier Mediterranean Tuna Salad
summary: A very refreshing and light snack or meal! This dish makes a great Mediterranean alternative to your stereotypical tuna salad made with mayonnaise. Serve with whole grain crackers.
ingredient: 2 (5 ounce) cans chunk light tuna in water, drained + ¼ cup finely chopped red onion + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + 3 tablespoons olive oil + 2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice + ½ teaspoon lemon zest + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Tuna Fish Pea Salad
summary: An easy, QUICK, but absolutely delicious recipe that's great on sandwiches, with crackers, or even on its own. Kids love it too!
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) can chunk light tuna in water, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can peas, drained + ¼ cup reduced-fat mayonnaise, or as needed + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Tuna and Chickpea Salad
summary: Light and refreshing chickpea and tuna salad that can be eaten as a main dish or served with pita chips as an appetizer. For a meatier salad, add one more can of undrained tuna. You can also add drained, chopped artichoke hearts.
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can Italian tuna packed in olive oil, undrained + 1 (16 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained + 1 (2.25 ounce) can black olives, chopped + ¼ cup chopped Italian (flat-leaf) parsley + ½ red onion, chopped + lemon, juiced + ¼ cup crumbled reduced-fat feta cheese, or more to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Tuna Salad With Fresh Dill
summary: An easy to make tuna salad. Can be served inside of hollowed out tomatoes or papayas.
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna + ¼ cup diced celery + ¼ cup chopped fresh dill weed + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley + 2 tablespoons thinly sliced green onion + 2 tablespoons fat-free mayonnaise + 2 tablespoons plain low-fat yogurt + ½ teaspoon prepared Dijon-style mustard

name: Tuna and Macaroni Salad
summary: This tuna and macaroni salad is a family favorite throughout the year. I like to make this the night before, refrigerate, and let the flavors blend together. Serve over lettuce or as a side dish.
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package bow-tie pasta + 1 cup frozen peas + 2 (6 ounce) cans flaked tuna, drained + 1 cup diced celery + ½ cup chopped green onions + <U+2153> cup chopped fresh dill + ¼ cup grated carrot + 1 cup mayonnaise + 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, or more to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Virgina's Tuna Salad
summary: Virgina's tuna salad was always a summer Saturday favorite for my grandparents and me. Great served on a large lettuce leaf. You may also add grapes or chopped apples if you wish.
ingredient: 1 egg + 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked + 3 tablespoons mayonnaise + 2 stalks celery, chopped + 2 tablespoons sweet pickle relish + 1 pinch ground black pepper

name: Tuna, Noodles, Pickles and Cheese
summary: This recipe came from my grandmother, who used peas in her version instead of pickles. My mother changed the recipe and I have altered it even more. The flavors of these ingredients blended together in what is reminiscent of a cold macaroni or potato salad will be your family's new favorite!
ingredient: 8 ounces uncooked elbow macaroni + 2 dill pickles, chopped + 6 ounces Colby-Jack cheese, cubed + 1 (5 ounce) can albacore tuna in water, drained and flaked + ½ cup light mayonnaise + ½ teaspoon prepared yellow mustard + 1 teaspoon dill pickle juice

name: Amazingly Good and Healthy Tuna Salad
summary: This tuna salad recipe is tweaked from one I found. It is so good, my husband, who is a very picky eater, often requests this! Enjoy and pat yourself on the back for eating a healthy meal.
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna in water, drained + <U+2153> cup dried cranberries + ½ sweet apple, cut into 1/4-inch pieces + 2 tablespoons light mayonnaise + 1 green onion, chopped + sea salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste + 4 cups chopped fresh spinach

name: Tuna Avocado Salad
summary: This tuna avocado salad recipe is really quick and easy to make — not to mention that it is loaded with benefits and nutrients that are perfect for a daily snack. It's best served cold.
ingredient: 2 medium avocados + 1 (5 ounce) can light tuna (such as Century®) + 2 small tomatoes, chopped + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste + ½ tablespoon ground black pepper + 1 pinch chili powder, or more to taste + salt to taste

name: Tuna Pasta Salad
summary: A pasta salad that is sure to please every time!
ingredient: 1 cup seashell pasta + 1 bunch green onions, chopped + ½ cup iceberg lettuce, rinsed and chopped + 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can peas, drained + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese + ½ cup creamy Italian salad dressing, or more to taste

name: Cold Macaroni and Tuna Salad
summary: This is a simple and good recipe that is great served on those hot summer days and can even be prepared the night before so that it is ready and cold when you come home from work the next day. My husband never ate this until we got married and in the summer he requests it every other week. You can substitute chicken for the tuna and it is great that way also. I serve it on a leaf of lettuce, for looks, with an assortment of crackers. Happy eating!
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 18 mins,additional: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 58 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 3 eggs + 2<U+2009>¾ cups macaroni + ½ (10 ounce) package frozen English peas + 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained + 3 tablespoons mayonnaise + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Asian Tuna Salad
summary: It's spicy and super-addictive! Serve with lettuce as lettuce wraps. Great with crackers and pita bread, too.
ingredient: 5 (5 ounce) cans chunk light tuna in water, drained and flaked + ½ cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Craisins®) + ½ cup finely chopped carrot + ¼ cup chopped green onions + ¼ cup finely chopped cilantro + 1 tablespoon sesame seeds + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground ginger + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground red chile pepper + ¾ teaspoon kosher salt + ½ cup light mayonnaise + ¼ cup Asian chile paste (such as sambal oelek) + 2 tablespoons sesame oil + 1 tablespoon light soy sauce + 1 tablespoon honey

name: New Wife Tuna Salad
summary: My husband says this tuna salad is even better than his mother's. Not too pickly tasting, mild with a nice blend of flavor. You can add more mayo for a creamier salad.
ingredient: 4 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained + 5 hard-boiled eggs, chopped + ½ cup chopped sweet onion + 1 stalk celery, chopped + ¾ cup mayonnaise + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons dill pickle relish + 2 teaspoons honey mustard + ½ teaspoon celery seed + ½ teaspoon seasoned salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Gourmet Tuna Salad
summary: The combination of green olives, almonds and capers in addition to the usual ingredients in tuna salad makes this recipe exceptionally good.
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) can albacore tuna in water, drained and flaked + 2 green onions, chopped + 1 stalk celery, diced + ¼ cup pimento-stuffed green olives, chopped + 2 tablespoons capers, chopped + ¼ cup blanched slivered almonds + 1 dash Worcestershire sauce + ½ cup mayonnaise + ¼ cup sour cream

name: Drop Dead Delicious Tuna Salad
summary: This is the BEST tuna salad ever! The last recipe you'll try. This has been in my family for generations, now it can be in yours!
process: prep: 5 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 4 to 6 servings
ingredient: 4 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained + 1 lemon, juiced + 2 cups mayonnaise + 4 stalks celery, diced + ½ cup sweet pickle relish

name: Greek-Style Tuna Salad
summary: I had this in a restaurant once and it was so good I had to go home and recreate it. I have it with spinach stuffed in a pita or sandwich. I've cut back on the dressing to keep the calorie count low but adding more is yummy!
ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can chunk light tuna in water, drained + 1 tablespoon chopped red onion + 2 teaspoons prepared Greek vinaigrette salad dressing (such as Kraft®) + 3 pitted Kalamata olives, chopped + 1 tablespoon crumbled feta cheese

name: Creamy and Crunchy Tuna Salad Supreme
summary: This tuna and cream cheese salad is made special with the addition of cream cheese and chopped raw carrots. Red peppers make it pretty, and one or two other vegetables, fruits, or nuts keep it changing and interesting. I developed this recipe after tasting cream cheese in a salmon salad sandwich at a funeral lunch in Canada many years ago. Add baby spinach or lettuce leaves, and serve on your favorite bread or as a wrap in a tortilla.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons mayonnaise + 2 ounces cream cheese, softened, or as needed + 2 (5 ounce) cans solid white tuna packed in water, drained and flaked + ½ carrot, finely chopped + ¼ cup diced red bell pepper + freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Bourbon and DP Baked Beans
summary: I came up with this recipe after having made some bourbon baked beans and seeing a recipe for cola baked beans and I thought: Why not combine the two?
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 hrs 22 mins,total: 3 hrs 37 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 2 cups
ingredient: ½ cup brown sugar + 1 tablespoon ground paprika + 1 teaspoon dry mustard + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + 1 (12 fl oz) can caffeinated pepper-type soda (such as Dr Pepper®) + ¾ cup ketchup + ¼ cup Worcestershire sauce + 8 slices bacon + 1 large onion, finely chopped + 1 clove garlic, minced + ¼ cup bourbon + 2 (16 ounce) cans baked beans with pork

name: Boston Baked Beans
summary: Baked beans are the perfect addition to any outdoor cookout or barbecue. These baked beans are slow-cooked in the oven with bacon, onions, and a sweet, syrupy sauce, resulting in an old-fashioned taste that everyone will enjoy. This easy recipe has been served by my family for over 29 years and originally came from my mother-in-law. It tastes great served with fresh cornbread or biscuits and honey.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 4 hrs 10 mins,total: 4 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 6
ingredient: 2 cups dry navy beans, soaked overnight + ½ pound uncooked bacon strips + 1 medium onion, diced + ½ cup ketchup + 3 tablespoons molasses + ¼ cup brown sugar + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 2 teaspoons salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon dry mustard

name: Pat's Baked Beans
summary: My step mom gave me this tasty recipe when I was lamenting over what to bring to a barbecue. I've taken this dish to several parties and there's NEVER been any left over!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 6 slices bacon + 1 cup chopped onion + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 (16 ounce) can pinto beans + 1 (16 ounce) can great Northern beans, drained + 1 (16 ounce) can baked beans + 1 (16 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained + ¾ cup ketchup + ½ cup molasses + ¼ cup packed brown sugar + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 1 tablespoon yellow mustard + ½ teaspoon pepper

name: Instant Pot® Baked Beans
summary: This recipe was passed down through my French Canadian family from my grandmother, to my mother and then to me many years ago. It traditionally takes hours to make, as we let the beans slow cook overnight in the oven on low heat. I decided to try and transform it into a much quicker Instant Pot® recipe with great success! With this method, you don't even have to presoak the beans. These are even better the next day, and they freeze well, too.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,additional: 40 mins,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 8 cups water + 1 pound dry navy beans, rinsed and picked through + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 6 ounces salt pork, diced + 6 ounces bacon, cut into small pieces + 1 small onion, minced + 1<U+2009>½ cups water, divided + ¼ cup ketchup + <U+2153> cup molasses + ¼ cup brown sugar + 1 tablespoon yellow mustard

name: Slow Cooker BBQ Baked Beans
summary: These baked beans made in the slow cooker are slightly sweet and tangy, with a smoky, meaty flavor that everyone will love. The best part? They're very easy to make.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 5 hrs,total: 5 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 servings
ingredient: 1 pound mild pork sausage + 1 (15 ounce) can wax beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can cut green beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can lima beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained + ½ (28 ounce) can barbeque baked beans, with liquid + 1 (15 ounce) can chili beans, with liquid + 1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste + 1 cup packed light brown sugar + ¼ cup barbeque sauce + 1 small green bell pepper, diced + 1 small yellow onion, diced + 1 teaspoon fennel seed

name: Apple Baked Beans
summary: Don't let the title or ingredients scare you away from this recipe. These are the greatest baked beans I have ever had. This recipe came from my oldest daughter's sister-in-law's father. Great for BBQs. I never have any leftovers. I hope you like them and leave your feedback.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 4 (16 ounce) cans pork and beans + 8 slices cooked bacon, crumbled + 2 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored, and diced + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups barbeque sauce + 1 cup brown sugar + ¼ cup raisins (Optional)

name: Instant Pot® Smoky Korean BBQ Baked Beans
summary: These baked beans are made with Korean BBQ sauce and cooked long enough under pressure, with bacon, to develop a lovely smoky flavor.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr 20 mins,additional: 12 hrs,total: 13 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: ½ pound dry pinto beans, rinsed + 5 slices bacon, cut into 1-inch pieces + 3 shallots, chopped + 1 cup chicken broth + 1 teaspoon paprika + 1 teaspoon ground mustard + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 bay leaf + ½ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup ketchup + 2 tablespoons maple syrup + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + ¾ cup Korean barbecue sauce

name: My Big Fat Greek Baked Beans
summary: I used to believe the best baked beans came from Boston or Texas, but ever since I discovered this very hearty giant bean casserole, I have to give it to the Greeks. 'Big Fat' refers not only to size of the beans, but also to the huge flavor of this dish. Use the largest beans you can find: Gigante beans are the best, but Corona and lima beans also work great. Serve alongside grilled meat or simply with extra feta for a great vegetarian main.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 50 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 10 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 casserole
ingredient: 1 pound dried Corona beans + 3 quarts cold water + 2 bay leaves + 1 large red onion, diced + 3 cloves garlic, sliced + 2 cups tomato sauce + 2 tablespoons tomato paste + 3 tablespoons honey + ½ cup chopped fresh dill + ½ cup extra-virgin olive oil + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste + ¼ cup red wine vinegar + 2 cups water, or more as needed + 4 ounces feta cheese + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill

name: Chef John's Boston Baked Beans
summary: This is a great side dish with anything!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 2 hrs 30 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 10 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 pound dry navy beans + 6 cups water + 1 pinch baking soda + 1 bay leaf + 6 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces + 1 yellow onion, diced + <U+2153> cup molasses + ¼ cup packed dark brown sugar + 1 teaspoon dry mustard powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste

name: Simple Baked Beans
summary: This baked bean recipe uses canned beans instead of the dry type so it is quick and easy to prepare.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 (16 ounce) cans baked beans with pork + ¼ cup molasses + ¼ cup chopped onions + 4 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 tablespoon prepared mustard + 2 tablespoons ketchup + 2 slices bacon, chopped

name: Baked Beans from Scratch
summary: Navy beans, molasses, and maple syrup combine to make this classic dish at home.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 hrs,additional: 7 hrs 20 mins,total: 15 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 5 cups
ingredient: 1 cup dried navy beans + 4 cups water + ¼ cup ketchup + ¼ cup maple syrup + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 tablespoons molasses + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + ½ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon chili powder + 1 small onion, chopped

name: Slow Cooker Homemade Beans
summary: A delicious taste of homemade beans which can be served as a main course or as a side dish. Especially great for football Sundays, or frozen for a later occasion.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 hrs,total: 10 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 3 cups dry navy beans, soaked overnight or boiled for one hour + 1<U+2009>½ cups ketchup + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + ¼ cup molasses + 1 large onion, chopped + 1 tablespoon dry mustard + 1 tablespoon salt + 6 slices thick cut bacon, cut into 1 inch pieces + 1 cup brown sugar

name: Texas-Style Baked Beans
summary: Take the time to make up a batch of these authentic Texas baked beans the next time you have an outdoor cookout. They are sure to be a hit! These are great if you don't have a smoker, but if you have access to a good hickory or pecan fire, take advantage. For a real Texas experience, enjoy a bottle of Lone Star® beer for yourself and one for the beans while you make them.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter, or as needed + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 red onion, diced + 2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste + 1 tablespoon butter, or as needed + 1 pound bacon, diced + 1 red bell pepper, diced + 3 jalapeno peppers, minced, or to taste + 1 cup beer, or more to taste + 1 cup barbeque sauce + 1 cup brown sugar + ¼ cup molasses + 6 cups cooked pinto beans + 1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste + cracked black pepper to taste

name: Chef John's Boston Baked Beans
summary: This is a great side dish with anything!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 2 hrs 30 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 10 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 pound dry navy beans + 6 cups water + 1 pinch baking soda + 1 bay leaf + 6 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces + 1 yellow onion, diced + <U+2153> cup molasses + ¼ cup packed dark brown sugar + 1 teaspoon dry mustard powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste

name: Baked Beans I
summary: You could almost say that these baked beans with a kick have been double-baked!
ingredient: 1 (29 ounce) can baked beans with pork + ½ cup packed brown sugar + ½ cup ketchup + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce

name: Baked Beans II
summary: A quick and easy way to dress up ordinary pork and beans. The measurements are estimates, but really you can adjust anything to personal taste.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 2 (15 ounce) cans baked beans with pork + ½ cup packed brown sugar + ½ onion, chopped + ½ cup ketchup + 1 tablespoon prepared mustard + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon red wine vinegar + salt and pepper to taste + 2 slices bacon

name: Pat's Baked Beans
summary: My step mom gave me this tasty recipe when I was lamenting over what to bring to a barbecue. I've taken this dish to several parties and there's NEVER been any left over!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 6 slices bacon + 1 cup chopped onion + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 (16 ounce) can pinto beans + 1 (16 ounce) can great Northern beans, drained + 1 (16 ounce) can baked beans + 1 (16 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained + ¾ cup ketchup + ½ cup molasses + ¼ cup packed brown sugar + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 1 tablespoon yellow mustard + ½ teaspoon pepper

name: Old Fashioned Baked Beans
summary: This one is great for impressing non-cookers because it is really easy to make.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 6 hrs 20 mins,total: 6 hrs 35 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 10 cups water + 2 cups dried navy beans + 8 slices crisply cooked bacon, crumbled + ½ cup chopped onion + ½ cup packed brown sugar + ¼ cup molasses + 1 teaspoon salt + 3 cups water

name: Calico Bean Casserole
summary: Kidney beans, baked beans and butter beans are combined with ground beef, bacon and onion and baked. It's thick, hearty, and pretty tasty too! This can also be done in a slow cooker.
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained + 1 (16 ounce) can baked beans with pork + 1 (15 ounce) can butter beans, undrained + ½ cup ketchup + 2 teaspoons white vinegar + 1 tablespoon dry mustard + ¾ cup packed brown sugar + 1 pound lean ground beef + 4 ounces bacon, chopped + ½ cup chopped onion + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Bacon Baked Beans
summary: I doctor up canned baked beans with apple and brown sugar to make them sticky and sweet. This is the easiest recipe to make.
ingredient: 6 slices bacon + 2 (16 ounce) cans baked beans + 1 onion, diced + ¼ cup yellow mustard + ¾ cup ketchup + 1 cup packed brown sugar + 1 Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and diced

name: Betty's 3-Bean Hot Dish (a la Minnesota)
summary: My dearest 80-something friend Betty gave me this sensational, hearty recipe for a 3-bean hot dish. She's Finnish, I believe this has roots to home, and it's really tasty! My hubby, who hates beans, demanded I get the recipe. We first devoured it at Betty and Jim's 60th wedding anniversary! Perfect for potlucks.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr 20 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 pot
ingredient: ¼ pound bacon + 1 pound ground beef + 1 onion, diced + 1 (15 ounce) can pork and beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can butter beans, drained + ½ cup ketchup + ½ cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons white vinegar + 1 tablespoon yellow mustard

name: Down Home Baked Beans
summary: This is a simple recipe for baked beans, and oh so good.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 11,Yield: 10 to 12 servings
ingredient: 1 pound bacon + 2 (28 ounce) cans baked beans + 1 (12 ounce) bottle chili sauce + 1 large sweet onion, chopped + 2 cups packed brown sugar

name: Cola Beans
summary: This is a favorite at potlucks and barbeques! I've often wondered if I get invited for my company or my Cola Beans! I've tried several different brands of colas, but have found that Coke® works best. I like to pre-cook the bacon about half-way so it doesn't make the beans too greasy, but it's not necessary. This recipe can also be baked in a conventional oven at 350 degrees F for about 1 hour.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 hrs,total: 10 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 servings
ingredient: 4 (28 ounce) cans baked beans, drained + ½ pound bacon + 1 cup brown sugar + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can cola soft drink (such as Coke®)

name: Harissa Bacon Baked Beans
summary: Harissa is a Tunisian chile sauce. Its heat level can vary depending on the brand and/or recipe. (Consider adding less than 3/4 cup, knowing you can always add more.) Look for a bottled harissa with minimal added sugars.
ingredient: 3 slices bacon, coarsely chopped + 1 cup chopped onion + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 3 (15 ounce) cans navy beans, rinsed and drained + ¾ cup mild harissa paste or sauce + ½ cup water + <U+2153> cup golden raisins + 2 dates, pitted and finely chopped + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste + 1 tablespoon sliced jalapeno pepper, or to taste

name: Texas Cowboy Baked Beans
summary: Not your usual baked beans! Green chiles and hot pepper sauce give zest to these eat-'em up sweet-and-hot baked beans.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + 4 (16 ounce) cans baked beans with pork + 1 (4 ounce) can canned chopped green chile peppers + 1 small Vidalia onion, peeled and chopped + 1 cup barbeque sauce + ½ cup brown sugar + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + 1 tablespoon chili powder + 3 tablespoons hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™), or to taste

name: Spicy Baked Beans
summary: Tangy and sweet old-fashioned baked beans with a little jalapeno. They're easy to make and great at a BBQ, hamburger night, a picnic, etc. My husband's favorite semi-homemade recipe. Says the sweetness and fire create a super depth of flavor. It's not strong enough to overwhelm the sweet home-style of baked beans.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 4 slices bacon, or more to taste, cut into bite-size pieces + 1 small onion, chopped + 2 (28 ounce) cans baked beans + ½ cup ketchup + ½ cup brown sugar + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 2 tablespoons prepared yellow mustard + 2 tablespoons minced jalapeno pepper + 1 tablespoon chili powder + 1 tablespoon mustard powder

name: 3BC (Best Baked Bean Casserole)
summary: An awesome traditional favorite to have at every cookout or holiday table. These smokey, sweet beans are great with a variety of meats and are a wonderful addition to any meal. This is a great side dish your sure to love!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter + 1 small onion, diced + ½ pound bacon + 1 (28 ounce) can baked beans (such as Bush's Original®) + 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce + 1 tablespoon ketchup + 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard + 1 cup brown sugar, divided

name: Bar-B-Q Baked Beans
summary: I have been serving this recipe to my extended family every Christmas, Thanksgiving and Easter for over 20 years. It is always a big hit but I have never told the children that there are lima beans in it! This is especially good with a baked ham or spareribs, and is easily doubled. Enjoy!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 14,Yield: 14 servings
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained (Optional) + 1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can lima beans, drained + 1 (16 ounce) can great Northern beans, drained + 1 (12 ounce) bottle chili sauce + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 2 tablespoons molasses + 3 slices bacon, cut in half

name: Simple Baked Beans II
summary: Has been described as soul food.
ingredient: ½ pound bacon, chopped + 1 onion, finely chopped + 2 (15 ounce) cans baked beans + ¼ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup ketchup + ¼ cup prepared mustard

name: Erika's Baked Beans
summary: Delicious baked beans with bacon.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 1 hr 40 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 4 slices bacon + 1 (16 ounce) can pork and beans + ½ cup chopped onion + 2 tablespoons brown sugar, or more to taste + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon prepared mustard

name: Sweet Barbeque Beans
summary: Sweet barbeque beans loaded with bacon and ground beef and a surprisingly sweet flavor. The taste of these beans is to die for!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr 20 mins,total: 1 hr 50 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 6 slices bacon, chopped + 1 pound ground beef + 2 (16 ounce) cans baked beans with pork + 1 (15.5 ounce) can navy beans, rinsed and drained + 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained + ¾ cup ketchup + ¾ cup packed brown sugar + 3 tablespoons distilled white vinegar + 2 tablespoons honey garlic sauce + 2 tablespoons sweet and sour sauce + 1 teaspoon onion powder + 1 teaspoon garlic salt + 1 teaspoon ground mustard + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce

name: Baked Beans with Beef
summary: This is the best baked beans with beef recipe I've ever known. Great with any main dish but especially with barbeque beef, pork, or chicken. The slow cooker does an amazing job with these beans.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 4 hrs 15 mins,total: 4 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 20
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + 1 large onion, finely chopped + 1 pound peppered bacon + 7 (28 ounce) cans baked beans (such as Bush's® Original) + 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can light red kidney beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can dark red kidney beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can great northern beans, drained + ½ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup prepared yellow mustard + ¼ cup soy sauce

name: Easy Baked Beans
summary: I have been making this for almost 40 years. The original recipe calls for all ketchup; it was my idea to make that half ketchup and half barbeque sauce. I do love spicy. I have never had a baked bean recipe that was this good and also this easy. Nobody will know you didn't spend all day on it.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 2 hrs 15 mins,total: 2 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 (16 ounce) cans pork and beans + ¾ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup ketchup + ¼ cup barbeque sauce + 4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces + 1 teaspoon dry mustard

name: Bean-Hole Beans
summary: Beans Cooked Maine Style (in the ground)
process: prep: 55 mins,cook: 12 hrs,additional: 15 mins,total: 13 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 30,Yield: 30 servings
ingredient: 10 cups dried great Northern beans + 1 pound salt pork + 2 onions + 2<U+2009>½ cups molasses + 1 teaspoon black pepper + 4 teaspoons dry hot mustard + ½ cup butter

name: Slow Cooker Baked Beans with Ham Hock
summary: A good, homemade recipe for baked beans. Serve with your favorite entree, or as a meal in itself.
ingredient: 24 ounces dry white beans + 1 pound ham hocks + 1 onion, chopped + ½ cup packed brown sugar + ½ cup maple syrup + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 cup water + ½ cup ketchup + 2 tablespoons prepared mustard

name: Bodacious Broccoli Salad
summary: This broccoli salad with bacon and cheese is requested at every family gathering. Let it be your next dish that they crave! I like this dish to be prepared at least two hours before serving. Be sure to have copies of the recipe on hand, as everyone will ask for it!
ingredient: 8 slices bacon + 2 heads fresh broccoli, chopped + 1<U+2009>½ cups sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded + ½ large red onion, chopped + <U+2154> cup mayonnaise + ¼ cup red wine vinegar + <U+215B> cup white sugar + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice

name: Cheese Sauce for Broccoli and Cauliflower
summary: The basic white sauce that your mother probably taught you, with cheese thrown in for yumminess. Definitely helps to convinces kids to eat their vegetables!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 cup milk + 1<U+2009>½ cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Roasted Garlic Lemon Broccoli
summary: I decided to give lemon roasted broccoli a try when I was looking for a unique way to prepare broccoli. Florets are roasted after being tossed in olive oil and sprinkled with sea salt, freshly ground black pepper, and minced garlic. A squeeze of lemon juice before serving seals the deal.
ingredient: 2 heads broccoli, separated into florets + 2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil + 1 teaspoon sea salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 clove garlic, minced + ½ teaspoon lemon juice

name: Broccoli Cheese Bake
summary: This is a great casserole that I threw together one day when a friend requested Broccoli au Gratin for her birthday dinner. This is a great idea for those who aren't big fans of bread crumbs. Also, the eggs can be taken out for a great sauce and using skim milk and fat-free cheese works well, too. It's basically a great recipe that can be easily altered according to taste. Enjoy!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 7,Yield: 6 to 8 servings
ingredient: 8 cups fresh broccoli + ½ cup butter + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 small onion, chopped + 1<U+2009>¼ cups milk + salt and pepper to taste + 4 cups shredded Swiss cheese + 2 eggs, beaten

name: Fresh Broccoli Salad
summary: Fresh broccoli, mushrooms, parsley, scallions and peppers are tossed in Marzetti® Roasted Garlic Italian Vinaigrette Dressing.
ingredient: <U+2154> cup Marzetti® Roasted Garlic Italian Vinaigrette Dressing + 4 cups broccoli flowerets + 1 (6 ounce) package sliced button mushrooms + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + 3 each scallions, 4-inch green and white parts, cut into 1/4-inch pieces + ½ red pepper, cut into 1/4-inch pieces + ½ yellow pepper, cut into 1/4-inch pieces

name: Broccoli Casserole
summary: Broccoli casserole enriched with cheese, mayonnaise, and cream of mushroom soup - delicious and EASY to make!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons butter + 1 onion, chopped + 2 (10 ounce) packages chopped frozen broccoli, thawed + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese + 1 cup mayonnaise + 2 eggs, beaten + ½ teaspoon garlic salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon seasoned salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons lemon juice + 12 buttery round crackers, crushed fine + 2 tablespoons butter

name: Broccoli Salad
summary: This is a yummy summer broccoli salad that uses an interesting combination of fruits, vegetables, and meats. Before you decide you won't like it, try it. You'll be pleasantly surprised.
ingredient: ½ pound bacon + 2 heads fresh broccoli + 1 small red onion + ¾ cup raisins + ¾ cup sliced almonds + 1 cup mayonnaise + ½ cup white sugar + 2 tablespoons white wine vinegar

name: Easy Roasted Broccoli
summary: Easy roasted broccoli. My favorite part is the roasted sliced stem pieces.
ingredient: 14 ounces broccoli + 1 tablespoon olive oil + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Awesome Broccoli-Cheese Casserole
summary: My mom used to make this easy recipe every Thanksgiving when I was little. We kids could never get enough! It was our very favorite Thanksgiving vegetable. If you have children, or have some coming to visit you as guests this Thanksgiving, I guarantee that they will eat (and enjoy) this veggie dish! Even though I rarely cook with canned condensed soups, I still make this yummy broccoli casserole during the holiday season. It's fabulous with a Christmas ham and potatoes au gratin too. Mmmmmmm!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 cup mayonnaise + 1 egg, beaten + ¼ cup onions, chopped + 3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped broccoli + 8 ounces shredded sharp Cheddar cheese + salt and pepper to taste + 1 dash paprika

name: Easy Broccoli Salad I
summary: A healthy, bright salad.
ingredient: 4 cups fresh broccoli florets + ¼ cup red onion, finely diced + 3 tablespoons raisins + 2 tablespoons dry roasted sunflower seeds + ¼ cup plain yogurt + 2 tablespoons orange juice + 1 tablespoon fat-free mayonnaise

name: Broccoli Rice Casserole
summary: Creamy broccoli rice casserole baked in a delicious cheese sauce. This is the best broccoli rice casserole you will ever eat!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 9x13-inch casserole
ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped broccoli + 3 cups instant rice + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 1<U+2009>¼ cups water + 1 (16 ounce) package processed American cheese, cubed + 1 tablespoon butter + 1 bunch celery, chopped + 1 large onion, chopped + salt and pepper to taste

name: Roasted Garlic Lemon Broccoli
summary: I decided to give lemon roasted broccoli a try when I was looking for a unique way to prepare broccoli. Florets are roasted after being tossed in olive oil and sprinkled with sea salt, freshly ground black pepper, and minced garlic. A squeeze of lemon juice before serving seals the deal.
ingredient: 2 heads broccoli, separated into florets + 2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil + 1 teaspoon sea salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 clove garlic, minced + ½ teaspoon lemon juice

name: Quick and Simple Broccoli and Cheese
summary: This recipe is great for just-getting-started-cooks.
ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen broccoli florets, thawed + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + salt and pepper to taste + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Cavatelli and Broccoli
summary: This is quick meal to make. Serve with garlic bread.
ingredient: 3 heads fresh broccoli, cut into florets + ½ cup olive oil + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1<U+2009>½ pounds cavatelli pasta + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese

name: Broccoli Rice Casserole
summary: What makes this quick-cooking side dish really tasty is coating the broccoli and rice in a creamy cheese sauce . . . yum!
ingredient: ½ cup butter + 1 large onion, chopped + 1 (16 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli + <U+2153> cup milk + 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup (Regular or 98% Fat Free) + 1 (8 fl oz) jar pasteurized process cheese sauce (like Cheez Whiz®) + 1<U+2009>½ cups cooked regular long-grain white rice

name: Broccoli with Garlic Butter and Cashews
summary: A new recipe a neighbor gave us. What a hit with my family. Just the right mixture of garlic and cashews with our favorite side dish, broccoli. And, so very easy to make!! If in a pinch, you could probably use frozen broccoli too, but I haven't tried.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ pounds fresh broccoli, cut into bite size pieces + <U+2153> cup butter + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 3 tablespoons soy sauce + 2 teaspoons white vinegar + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 cloves garlic, minced + <U+2153> cup chopped salted cashews

name: Broccoli Garlic Angel Hair Pasta
summary: If you've got to eat your broccoli, this is a great way to do it. A beautiful side dish of broccoli and angel hair pasta with red pepper flakes is so delicious and so aromatic.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ pounds broccoli + 2 tablespoons olive oil + ¼ cup butter + 6 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon red pepper flakes + 3 cups chicken stock + salt to taste + 1 pound angel hair pasta + ½ cup freshly shredded Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, plus a little more for garnish + 1 pinch red pepper flakes for garnish, or to taste

name: Broccoli Cauliflower Casserole
summary: Great broccoli cauliflower recipe that everyone will love! The croutons on top give it that crunchy flavor everyone will love.
ingredient: 2 cups broccoli + 2 cups cauliflower + 2 eggs + ½ cup mayonnaise + ½ cup chopped onion + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, divided + ½ cup butter, melted + 1 (15 ounce) package seasoned croutons, crushed

name: Broccoli Potato Bake
summary: Excellent for a potluck, company dish, or just a heart-warming family dinner. This casserole is a delicious blend of cheese, potatoes, and broccoli.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 cups milk + 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, diced + <U+2153> cup shredded Swiss cheese + 1 (12 ounce) package frozen hash brown potatoes + 1 (12 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli + ½ cup bread crumbs + 1 tablespoon butter, melted

name: Baked Broccoli
summary: A delicious and rich alternative to bland steamed broccoli! It caramelizes perfectly, and the spices give it a great flavor that kids and parents will love.
ingredient: ¼ cup olive oil + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons lemon juice + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon dried oregano (Optional) + ½ teaspoon dried thyme (Optional) + 1 pinch salt + 1 pinch fresh ground black pepper + 1 pound broccoli florets

name: Broccoli with Lemon Butter Sauce
summary: A fast and zesty take on frozen broccoli. Can also use fresh broccoli. Great summer dish. Can be served hot or cold.
ingredient: ¼ cup butter or margarine + ¼ cup water + 1 lemon, juiced + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + salt and pepper to taste + 1 (16 ounce) package frozen broccoli florets

name: Steamed Broccoli and Carrots with Lemon
summary: This side dish adds lots of color and vitamins and minerals to your meal.
ingredient: 1 cup broccoli florets + ½ cup julienne-cut carrots + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 1 teaspoon seasoned salt, or to taste

name: Fried Broccoli
summary: This is a recipe I came up with when I was on the South Beach Diet. It is a very healthy recipe and my husband asks for it almost all the time.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen broccoli, thawed + 1 tablespoon olive oil + ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes + salt, to taste

name: Broccoli Casserole with Rice
summary: I get a lot of requests for this dish.
ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped broccoli + 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup + 2 cups instant rice + ¾ cup chopped onion + ¼ cup butter + 1 (16 ounce) jar process cheese sauce + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Lemon-Roasted Broccoli and Asparagus
summary: Simple lemon-flavored roasted broccoli and asparagus. An easy side dish that great served over rice with beef, chicken, pork, or fish.
ingredient: ½ pound broccoli florets + 3 teaspoons olive oil, divided + 1 teaspoon lemon pepper, divided + 1 large lemon, sliced + ½ pound fresh asparagus, trimmed

name: Air Fryer Broccoli
summary: Have you tried making air fryer broccoli? All you need is olive oil, salt, and pepper, and the broccoli turns out wonderfully crispy and tasty.
ingredient: 1 head fresh broccoli, cut into florets + ¼ cup olive oil + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Broccoli and Rice Stir Fry
summary: A quick and tasty side dish, or can be served as a meal. You can modify this recipe to include any veggies you choose.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups uncooked long-grain rice + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 (16 ounce) package frozen broccoli florets, thawed + 3 green onions, diced + 2 eggs, beaten + 2 tablespoons soy sauce + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Creamy Broccoli and Cheese Casserole
summary: Creamy broccoli casserole that is a great way to get kids to eat their vegetables! If you are going to freeze or refrigerate until later, do not add the crumbs until you are about to cook it.
ingredient: 2 pounds fresh broccoli, coarsely chopped + 1 large onion, coarsely chopped + ½ cup water + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 (14 ounce) can evaporated milk, divided + salt to taste + 1 cup cubed sharp Cheddar cheese + 2 tablespoons dry bread crumbs, or to taste + 1 tablespoon butter, or to taste

name: Steamed Broccoli
summary: A quick and simple broccoli recipe. Skip the bacon, swap olive oil for butter, toss in some cheese; whatever you like.
ingredient: 1 head broccoli, cut into florets + 1 slice cooked bacon, chopped + 1 tablespoon butter + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Veggie Quinoa
summary: I blundered into this delicious mix of ingredients while trying to use up leftover vegetables in the fridge. Even friends who 'don't like vegetarian cooking' have enjoyed it. I like the slightly bitter taste of unwashed quinoa (just check for unwanted debris before you use it), but most recipes call for rinsed quinoa.
ingredient: 1 cup vegetable broth + ½ cup uncooked quinoa + 2 teaspoons olive oil + 2 teaspoons minced garlic + ½ cup broccoli florets + ½ cup diced firm tofu + ¼ cup vegetable broth + ¼ cup sliced mushrooms + 1 cup chopped fresh spinach

name: Broccoli and Cauliflower Casserole
summary: This is a favorite family recipe that I ate quite a bit of when I was pregnant. It's just one of those things that you can't get enough of!
process: prep: 40 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 7,Yield: 6 to 8 servings
ingredient: ½ cup uncooked white rice + 10 ounces broccoli florets + 10 ounces cauliflower florets + ½ cup butter + 1 onion, chopped + 1 pound processed cheese food, cubed + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup + 5<U+2009><U+215C> fluid ounces milk + 1<U+2009>½ cups crushed buttery round crackers

name: Maria's Broccoli Rabe
summary: This is a nice side dish served with baked chicken or fish. Virtually not fattening and very healthy for you.
ingredient: 1 pound broccoli rabe, trimmed + 5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese

name: Awesome Broccoli Marinara
summary: This is a great quick version of an Italian traditional side dish in our family all the way from Italy. You can use fresh tomatoes and basil. However, as a mother of four, I opt for the quick method as I'm sure other parents of small ones can appreciate. The kids really love this dish too. Buon Appetito!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with balsamic vinegar, basil and olive oil + 1 pound broccoli florets + 2 cloves garlic, chopped + salt and pepper to taste

name: Rach's Broccoli Casserole
summary: Broccoli dish mixed with cream of mushroom soup, cheese, and other various ingredients topped with crushed Ritz® crackers.
ingredient: 2 eggs + 1 cup mayonnaise + 1 cup condensed cream of mushroom soup + 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped broccoli, thawed + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 onion, chopped + ½ cup butter, cut into pieces + ¾ cup crushed buttery round crackers (such as Ritz®)

name: Aunt Millie's Broccoli Casserole
summary: This fresh broccoli casserole is a family favorite for holidays and get-togethers! This recipe has been passed down in our family for years because it's so cheesy and delicious!
ingredient: 4 heads fresh broccoli, chopped + 1<U+2009>½ cups shredded American cheese + 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + 3 tablespoons butter + 2 cups crushed, seasoned croutons

name: Cheesy Broccoli Quinoa
summary: The classic Cheddar cheese and broccoli combo served in quinoa.
ingredient: 2 cups chopped broccoli + 1<U+2009>¾ cups vegetable broth + 1 cup quinoa + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Basic Mashed Potatoes
summary: If you love good, old fashioned mashed potatoes this is the perfect recipe. Simple and delicious.
ingredient: 2 pounds baking potatoes, peeled and quartered + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 cup milk + salt and pepper to taste

name: The Best Mashed Potatoes
summary: This best mashed potato recipe is often requested during Thanksgiving. It's totally tasty, and everyone will rave! For a variation, spread in a casserole dish and refrigerate overnight; the next day, sprinkle with extra Parmesan cheese and butter and reheat in the oven.
ingredient: 5 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes + 2 cups Parmesan cheese + 1<U+2009>½ cups cream cheese + 1 cup chopped fresh chives + ½ cup butter + ½ medium head garlic, peeled and minced + 1 pinch salt and pepper to taste

name: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
summary: This mashed potato recipe with garlic is rich and very tasty! For a creamier texture, use heavy cream in place of the milk. These are also terrific topped with green onions.
ingredient: 8 potatoes, peeled and quartered + ½ cup milk + ¼ cup butter + 2 cloves garlic, minced + salt to taste + 1 pinch ground white pepper + 2 tablespoons sesame seeds

name: Make-Ahead Mashed Potatoes
summary: These make-ahead mashed potatoes can be made several days ahead and stored in the fridge.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,additional: 45 mins,total: 2 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 12
ingredient: 5 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, cubed + 8 ounces sour cream + 2 (3 ounce) packages cream cheese + ½ cup milk + 2 teaspoons onion salt + ground black pepper to taste

name: Slow Cooker Mashed Potatoes
summary: These are melt in your mouth mashed potatoes, and what could be better than potatoes in the slow cooker?
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 hrs 15 mins,total: 3 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 5 pounds red potatoes, cut into chunks + 1 tablespoon minced garlic, or to taste + 3 cubes chicken bouillon + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup butter + salt and pepper to taste

name: Loaded Mash Potatoes
summary: Swanson® Unsalted Chicken Stock is combined with potatoes, low-fat sour cream and a low-sodium ranch mix and topped with turkey bacon. You won't miss any of the flavor in this healthier version of mashed potatoes.
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package turkey bacon + 5 pounds russet potatoes, peeled and diced + 1 (32 ounce) carton Swanson® Unsalted Chicken Stock + ¼ cup low-fat sour cream + ¼ cup low-sodium dry ranch dressing mix + ¾ cup shredded nonfat Cheddar cheese + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives

name: Vegan Mashed Potatoes (Low-Fat)
summary: I have recently gone vegan, which I love, but I missed one of my favorite things, mashed potatoes. I decided to create a simple vegan and soy-free recipe for the non-chef - me! So here it is - a nice base recipe if you are lactose intolerant (like my son) and/or vegan. Hope you like!
ingredient: 6 baby red potatoes, halved, or more to taste + ¼ cup unsweetened almond milk, or more to taste + ½ lemon, juiced, or more to taste + 1 tablespoon soy-free buttery spread (such as Earth Balance®), melted, or more to taste + 1 teaspoon minced garlic, or more to taste + ½ teaspoon salt, or to taste

name: Simple Instant Pot® Mashed Potatoes
summary: This is an easy take on mashed potatoes. The potatoes pressure cook away while you focus on other things. This is a basic but tasty recipe; feel free to update with your own ingredients. You can peel the skins if you prefer. Once you mash it up, you can return insert back to the pot, reattach the lid, and place it on the Keep Warm function until you are ready to serve.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ pounds Yukon Gold potatoes + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + 2 cubes chicken bouillon + ½ cup sour cream + ½ cup unsalted butter, cubed + 2 tablespoons milk

name: Chef John's Perfect Mashed Potatoes
summary: This mashed potatoes recipe will give you the proper technique to make perfect mashed potatoes every time — light, fluffy, and lump-free.
ingredient: 3 large russet potatoes, peeled and cut in half lengthwise + ½ cup whole milk + ¼ cup butter + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Suzy's Mashed Red Potatoes
summary: These red mashed potatoes are the best I've ever had! Red potato skins are full of flavor.
ingredient: 2 pounds small red potatoes, quartered + ½ cup butter + ½ cup milk + ¼ cup sour cream + salt and pepper to taste

name: Jen's Creamy Garlic Mashed Potatoes
summary: These potatoes are full of creamy sour cream, cream cheese, and buttery goodness contrasted with rich roast garlic. The texture is as delightful as the flavor combination.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 whole heads garlic, top third sliced off and discarded + olive oil + 1 tablespoon sea salt + 5 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cubed + 1 cup sour cream + 1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese + 1 cup butter + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Instant Pot® Leek Mashed Potatoes
summary: A little something different from traditional mashed potatoes, for the Instant Pot®. The leeks add a very mild oniony flavor. Enjoy!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 pound potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes + 1 leek, white parts only, quartered lengthwise and finely sliced + ½ teaspoon coarse salt + water to cover + <U+2153> cup milk, warmed + 2 tablespoons butter + salt to taste

name: Creamy Make-Ahead Mashed Potatoes
summary: Mashed potatoes can be made almost completely ahead. Do nearly everything - boil, peel and mash; stir in milk and salt - up to two days ahead. Before serving, reheat. Adding butter at the last minute makes them taste freshly mashed.
ingredient: 3 pounds russet (Idaho) potatoes, scrubbed but unpeeled + 1<U+2009>½ cups half and half, plus extra if necessary + Salt, to taste + 6 tablespoons butter, softened

name: Mascarpone Mashed Potatoes
summary: Not only is this a delicious alternative to regular mashed potato recipes, but it's a very user-friendly way to serve your potato side dish. They're really decadent: not too rich, but just rich enough, and perfect for any special occasion.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9x13-inch dish
ingredient: 4<U+2009>½ pounds russet potatoes, peeled and halved lengthwise + ½ cup mascarpone cheese at room temperature + 1 egg yolk + ¾ cup milk + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste + 1 cup butter, cut into chunks

name: Garlic Potatoes
summary: Yummy and easy to make garlic potatoes will make them come back for seconds.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ pounds red potatoes, cut into large chunks + 1 clove garlic, halved lengthwise + ½ cup milk + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley

name: Garlic Mashed Potatoes Secret Recipe
summary: This is my secret recipe for Garlic Mashed potatoes, reverse engineered from a certain Italian restaurant. This recipe for 100 servings, I usually cut it down to 10 servings (1 5lb bag of potatoes). I guarantee that these are the best potatoes you've ever tasted.
ingredient: 50 pounds unpeeled red potatoes, quartered + 8 pounds butter, room temperature + 3 pounds Romano cheese, grated + 3 cups chopped garlic + ½ cup salt + ½ cup dried oregano

name: Buttermilk Smashed Potatoes
summary: Smashed potatoes are the best! I always use red potatoes when I make them; they have the exact texture for this dish. These are so delicious!
ingredient: 2 pounds red potatoes + ½ cup buttermilk + 1 tablespoon butter + ¼ cup chopped fresh chives + 1 pinch salt to taste (Optional)

name: Red Garlic Mashed Potatoes
summary: These red-skinned mashed potatoes are just the creamiest. They are always a hit with company. Just a warning: they are addictive!
ingredient: 8 red potatoes, cubed + 2 teaspoons crushed garlic + ½ cup butter + ¼ cup half-and-half cream + ¼ teaspoon steak seasoning + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon white sugar

name: Sally's Spinach Mashed Potatoes
summary: This was one of my mother's best recipes. It is very quick, easy and delicious. A good way for the little ones to eat their spinach!
ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach + 6 potatoes, peeled and chopped + ½ cup butter + 1 cup sour cream + 1 tablespoon chopped onion + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon dried dill weed + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
summary: Russet potatoes are blended with roasted garlic, butter and milk. This recipe is a standard.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 medium head garlic + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 pounds russet potatoes, peeled and quartered + 4 tablespoons butter, softened + ½ cup milk + salt and pepper to taste

name: Twice Baked Mashed Potatoes
summary: A baked version of the favorite twice baked taters everyone loves. I also add in chopped onion and a bit of diced garlic sometimes, too. Great with ribs, chicken, or beef dishes.
ingredient: 6 Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled + ¼ cup butter, softened + ½ cup sour cream + ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 3 cups shredded Cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese blend, divided + 2 tablespoons butter, cut into small pieces + 1 tablespoon bacon bits, or more to taste

name: Baked Mashed Potatoes
summary: Mashed potatoes that are lighter and fluffier. Cream cheese gives them a richer flavor. Can be made ahead of time!
