ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ cups ricotta cheese + 1 cup chopped spinach + 1 egg, lightly beaten + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 cup basil leaves, torn + 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste + ½ clove garlic (Optional) + 2 tablespoons pine nuts + 1 extra large zucchini + 9 toothpicks, soaked in water + ¼ cup pasta sauce + 2 tablespoons grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese

name: Grilled Portobello Mushrooms with Mashed Cannellini Beans and Harissa Sauce
summary: This appetizer is loaded with so many flavors and it's vegetarian and healthy. Give it a shot if you want to impress! It may sound like a ton of work, but it really is simple. If you like bold flavors, you will love it!
ingredient: 1 roasted red pepper, peeled and minced + 2 tablespoons chopped shallot + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 teaspoon olive oil + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh mint + 1 teaspoon lime juice + ¾ teaspoon Dijon mustard + ½ teaspoon minced fresh cilantro + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes + 1 pinch ground coriander + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 2 cups canned cannellini beans + 2 cups water, or as needed + 2 teaspoons truffle oil + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 4 large portobello mushroom caps + 4 teaspoons olive oil + ½ cup vegetable broth + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Summer Bounty 'Pasta'
summary: This is a quick dish using fresh produce. Serve hot with some crusty bread for a delicious end-of-summer meal that's ready in minutes.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 cup mushrooms, sliced + 2 shallots, chopped + 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved + 1<U+2009>½ cups heavy whipping cream + 2 zucchini, cut into noodle-shape strands + 1 cup chopped fresh basil + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Thai Rice Noodle Salad
summary: Just made it up 5 minutes ago and it's really good. It can be served warm or cold; toss again right before serving. Do not overcook the noodles.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package dried rice noodles + 1 tablespoon olive oil + ¼ head romaine lettuce, chopped + ¼ red bell pepper, diced + ¼ cup chopped red onion + 3 green onions, chopped + ¼ cucumber, diced + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil, or to taste + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste + 1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger root, minced + ¼ jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced + 2 cloves garlic, minced + <U+2153> cup olive oil + ¼ cup rice vinegar + ¼ cup soy sauce + ¼ cup white sugar + 1 lemon, juiced + 1 lime, juiced + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground turmeric + ¼ teaspoon paprika

name: Vegan Mexican Quinoa Bowl with Green Chile Cilantro Sauce
summary: Quinoa gets tossed with red bell peppers, black beans, romaine, and red onions, then smothered in a dairy-free sauce with a jalapeño kick. An easy meal!
ingredient: 1 cup unsalted raw cashews + 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers + ¼ cup hemp milk + ½ jalapeno pepper with seeds, or more to taste + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>¼ cups chopped fresh cilantro + 3 cups water + 1<U+2009>½ cups quinoa + 2 romaine hearts, chopped + 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained + 3 cups chopped red bell pepper + ½ cup chopped red onion + 2 avocados, chopped

name: Guacamole
summary: You can make this avocado salad smooth or chunky depending on your tastes.
ingredient: 3 avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed + 1 lime, juiced + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup diced onion + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 pinch ground cayenne pepper (Optional)

name: California Melt
summary: A satisfying open-face vegetarian sandwich with avocado, almonds and mushrooms.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 2 mins,total: 17 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 open-faced sandwiches
ingredient: 4 slices whole-grain bread, lightly toasted + 1 avocado, sliced + 1 cup sliced mushrooms + <U+2153> cup sliced toasted almonds + 1 tomato, sliced + 4 slices Swiss cheese

name: Lentil Tacos
summary: This vegan version of classic tacos uses lentils instead of ground beef, along with other flavors so good you'll never miss the meat!
ingredient: 2 teaspoons ground ancho chile powder + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon ground coriander + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground fennel seed + 2 teaspoons olive oil + 1 small onion, minced + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 2<U+2009>½ cups cooked brown or green lentils + 3 tablespoons tomato paste + 2 tablespoons water, or as needed + 2 canned chipotle chiles in adobo sauce, seeded and minced + 1 teaspoon adobo or hot sauce + 8 (6 inch) vegan corn or flour tortillas + 1 cup shredded lettuce + 1 cup chopped tomatoes + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 1 cup guacamole + 1 medium lime, cut into 8 wedges

name: Homemade Black Bean Veggie Burgers
summary: With this black bean burger recipe, you will never want to eat frozen veggie burgers again. These are so easy, and you'll be proud to have created such a vegetarian delight.
ingredient: cooking spray + 1 (16 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed + ½ green bell pepper, cut into 2 inch pieces + ½ onion, cut into wedges + 3 cloves garlic, peeled + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon chili powder + 1 tablespoon cumin + 1 teaspoon Thai chili sauce or hot sauce + ½ cup bread crumbs

name: Microwave Corn on the Cob
summary: This is a no-nonsense recipe for corn on the cob. Perfect for when you run out of stove or grill space. I freeze the corn on the cob in plastic bags, and remove a single ear of frozen corn in the cold winter months to have the sweet taste of summer corn throughout the year!
ingredient: 1 ear corn, husked and cleaned

name: Fluffy Pancakes
summary: Tall and fluffy. These pancakes are just right. Topped with strawberries and whipped cream, they are impossible to resist.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 8 pancakes
ingredient: ¾ cup milk + 2 tablespoons white vinegar + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 egg + 2 tablespoons butter, melted + cooking spray

name: Best Fried Green Tomatoes
summary: You can also fry up red tomatoes with this recipe but make sure they are not overripe or they will be mushy. Serve these fried green tomatoes outside with a glass of iced tea one summer night and enjoy the sunset with someone you love.
ingredient: 4 large green tomatoes + 2 eggs + ½ cup milk + 1 cup all-purpose flour + ½ cup cornmeal + ½ cup bread crumbs + 2 teaspoons coarse kosher salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 quart vegetable oil for frying

name: Squash Casserole
summary: Tender squash, gooey cheese, and crunchy crackers make this a memorable side dish or a hearty main course.
ingredient: 4 cups sliced yellow squash + ½ cup chopped onion + ¼ cup water, or more as needed + 35 buttery round crackers, crushed + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 2 eggs, beaten + ¾ cup milk + ¼ cup butter, melted + 1 teaspoon salt + ground black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons butter

name: Grilled Asparagus
summary: The special thing about this recipe is that it's so simple. Fresh asparagus with a little oil, salt, and pepper is cooked quickly over high heat on the grill. Enjoy the natural flavor of your veggies.
ingredient: 1 pound fresh asparagus spears, trimmed + 1 tablespoon olive oil + salt and pepper to taste

name: Pan-Fried Asparagus
summary: This garlic asparagus dish is a Northern Italian side dish. My family loves it! Even the kids!
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ¼ cup butter + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 teaspoon coarse salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 pound fresh asparagus spears, trimmed

name: Easy Air Fryer Baked Potatoes
summary: Tender, delicious baked potatoes with a crispy, flavorful skin. Finish them with a dollop of sour cream, if you'd like.
ingredient: 4 large baking potatoes, scrubbed + 2 tablespoons olive oil + coarse kosher salt + ground black pepper + garlic powder + dried parsley + 4 tablespoons butter

name: Mouth-Watering Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These delicious mushrooms taste just like restaurant-style stuffed mushrooms and are my guy's absolute favorite.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 large mushrooms
ingredient: 12 whole fresh mushrooms + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper

name: Black Bean and Corn Salad
summary: This black bean and corn salad is very colorful and includes a delicious lime and garlic dressing.
ingredient: ½ cup olive oil + <U+2153> cup fresh lime juice + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground cayenne pepper + 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained + 1<U+2009>½ cups frozen corn kernels + 1 avocado - peeled, pitted and diced + 1 red bell pepper, chopped + 2 tomatoes, chopped + 6 green onions, thinly sliced + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro

name: Garlic Butter
summary: Sometimes the basics are the best! I've used this simple recipe for years to make garlic bread, and any leftovers go great on barbequed steaks, pasta, rice or potatoes. You can use any butter or margarine you like. Also, fresh or minced garlic in a jar works well. Adjust the amount of garlic to your taste.
ingredient: 1 cup butter, softened + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 tablespoon garlic salt + 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground paprika

name: Gnocchi I
summary: This simple potato, flour, and egg recipe is one my family has used for generations.
ingredient: 2 potatoes + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 egg

name: Italian Confetti Pasta Salad
summary: This recipe is so easy to make, and always such a hit! It is great for backyard barbecues. For best results, chill overnight.
ingredient: 1 cup mayonnaise + 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons chopped fresh basil + 2 cups colored rotini pasta + 1 cup chopped tomatoes + ½ cup chopped yellow bell pepper + ½ cup sliced black olives

name: Grilled Corn on the Cob
summary: Grilled corn on the cob is easy and perfect for every summer barbecue. With foil, butter, salt, and a little pepper, the corn will be perfectly tender and sweet.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 ears of corn
ingredient: 6 ears corn + 6 tablespoons butter, softened + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Easy Guacamole
summary: Simply a quick recipe for tasty guacamole! Great with tortilla chips or as a topping for Mexican foods!
ingredient: 2 avocados + 1 small onion, finely chopped + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 ripe tomato, chopped + 1 lime, juiced + salt and pepper to taste

name: Sweet and Sour Sauce
summary: Traditional sweet and sour sauce that tastes incredible. It is great served with meatballs, tempura, or even over rice!
ingredient: ¾ cup white sugar + <U+2154> cup water + <U+2153> cup white vinegar + ¼ cup soy sauce + 2 tablespoons cornstarch + 1 tablespoon ketchup

name: Crustless Spinach Quiche
summary: This crustless quiche made with eggs, spinach, and Muenster cheese is perfect to serve at any meal. With no heavy crust to make, this light-tasting quiche is ready in under an hour. Make it your own by adding leftover ham and substituting Cheddar, feta, or goat cheese for the Muenster. I serve this quick and easy quiche in the summer for brunch with a side of sausage links and a fresh fruit bowl!
ingredient: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 medium onion, chopped + 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach - thawed, drained, and squeezed dry + 5 large eggs, beaten + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 3 cups shredded Muenster cheese

name: Simple Pasta Salad
summary: An easy pasta salad with Italian dressing, simple yet very yummy. Almost any type of pasta may be used. Best if left to sit overnight.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package uncooked rotini pasta + 1 (16 ounce) bottle Italian salad dressing + 2 cucumbers, chopped + 6 tomatoes, chopped + 1 bunch green onions, chopped + 4 ounces grated Parmesan cheese + 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning

name: Potato Pancakes
summary: These traditional potato pancakes are wonderful comfort food. Serve with applesauce and sour cream for a light dinner, or with roast chicken for a hearty winter meal. You can use more flour if the mixture seems too wet.
ingredient: 4 large potatoes + 1 yellow onion + 1 egg, beaten + 1 teaspoon salt + ground black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or more as needed + 1 cup vegetable oil for frying, or as needed

name: Awesome Broccoli-Cheese Casserole
summary: My mom used to make this easy recipe every Thanksgiving when I was little. We kids could never get enough! It was our very favorite Thanksgiving vegetable. If you have children, or have some coming to visit you as guests this Thanksgiving, I guarantee that they will eat (and enjoy) this veggie dish! Even though I rarely cook with canned condensed soups, I still make this yummy broccoli casserole during the holiday season. It's fabulous with a Christmas ham and potatoes au gratin too. Mmmmmmm!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup + 1 cup mayonnaise + 1 egg, beaten + ¼ cup onions, chopped + 3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped broccoli + 8 ounces shredded sharp Cheddar cheese + salt and pepper to taste + 1 dash paprika

name: Churros
summary: Churros (Mexican fritters) are very common at fairs. In my border hometown, the line at this stand is always overwhelming. People wait hours in line just to get a taste of these churros. I have run across several recipes but this is the best one by far.
ingredient: 1 cup water + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons white sugar + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 2 quarts oil for frying + ½ cup white sugar, or to taste + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Manicotti
summary: Delicious! Serve with a crispy salad and garlic bread, and you'll have a dish your family will love! The kids like to help stuff the noodles too!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 pint part-skim ricotta cheese + 8 ounces shredded mozzarella cheese + ¾ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 2 eggs + 1 teaspoon dried parsley + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste + 1 (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce + 5<U+2009>½ ounces manicotti pasta

name: Marinated Cherry Tomato Salad
summary: This is a very delicious way to use an overabundance of cherry tomatoes.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 7,Yield: 6 to 8 servings
ingredient: 4 cups halved cherry tomatoes + ¼ cup vegetable oil + 3 tablespoons cider vinegar + 1 teaspoon dried parsley + 1 teaspoon dried basil + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon salt + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons white sugar

name: Roasted Cauliflower Steaks
summary: This cauliflower steak recipe is a nice change from boiling, mashing, and ricing. Try these oven roasted cauliflower steaks seasoned with a simple lemon-garlic sauce. Serve with chimichurri or topped with roasted tomatoes, olives, and feta.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 cauliflower steaks
ingredient: 1 large head cauliflower, sliced lengthwise through the core into 4 steaks + ¼ cup olive oil + 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Three Bean Salad
summary: This tasty three bean salad is great for buffets, summer picnics, and cookouts. It's easy to make but tastes best when chilled for at least 12 hours. It keeps well and serves a lot of people.
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can green beans + 1 pound wax beans + 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained and rinsed + 1 onion, sliced into thin rings + ¾ cup white sugar, or to taste + <U+2154> cup distilled white vinegar + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon celery seed

name: Roasted Cauliflower "Rice"
summary: Cauliflower rice is a great low-calorie dish to have in your arsenal especially if you are eating low-carb. Super low in carbs, yet such a satisfying dish you will forget it's made from a vegetable and not a grain. There are two reasons I opted for roasted riced cauliflower in place of sauteed: 1) more flavor and 2) better texture.
ingredient: cooking spray + 2 heads cauliflower, cut into 1/2-inch pieces + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons avocado oil + ¾ teaspoon salt, divided

name: Diabetic-Friendly Pork Stroganoff
summary: People with diabetes can enjoy cozy comfort foods like stroganoff. See how a few smart swaps can lower carbs, calories, and sodium without losing flavor or cheesy, creamy appeal.
ingredient: 6 ounces whole-grain penne pasta + 1<U+2009>½ cups reduced-sodium beef broth, divided + ½ cup sour cream + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard + ¾ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon chopped fresh thyme + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided + 1 pound pork tenderloin, cut into 1-inch chunks + 1 (8 ounce) package fresh button mushrooms, sliced + 1 (8 ounce) package broccoli, cut into bite-sized pieces + 1 cup sliced onion + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Zucchini-Tomato Saute
summary: Sooo easy to make and double or triple if needed. Serve as the main meal with a salad and crusty bread, or as a side dish.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 onion, sliced + 2 tomatoes, chopped + 2 pounds zucchini, peeled and cut into 1 inch thick slices + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste + ¼ cup uncooked white rice + ½ cup water

name: The Best Dry-Roasted Chickpea Recipe
summary: This is a tasty, crunchy snack and you can customize your seasoning based on your preferences. Dry-roasting is the key. Enjoy!
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed + 2 teaspoons olive oil + ¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Steel-Cut Oats and Quinoa Breakfast
summary: The best make-ahead breakfast! Full of fiber and protein will keep you full all morning. Keeps in the fridge for up to a week.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 3 cups water + ½ cup quinoa + ½ cup steel-cut oats + 2 tablespoons almond meal + 2 tablespoons flaxseed meal + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon

name: Sugar Free Blueberry Coffee Cake
summary: A fabulous blueberry coffee cake with a crumb topping. This recipe is one from a local B&B that I replaced all the sugar with substitutes because I have diabetes. I have received all praise and 'I can't believe it is sugar free.' The sugar can be put back in if you want. Either way it is wonderful.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 40 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 9x13 inch pan
ingredient: ¾ cup butter, melted and cooled + 1 cup milk + 3 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1<U+2009>½ cups granular sucrolose sweetener (such as Splenda®) + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 3 cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>¾ cups fresh or frozen blueberries + 1<U+2009>½ cups malitol brown sugar substitute + ¾ cup flour + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + ½ cup butter, softened

name: Eggplant Tomato Bake
summary: This is a simple, easy and low-fat recipe.
ingredient: 1 eggplant, sliced into 1/2 inch rounds + 1 tomato, sliced + ¼ cup grated fat-free Parmesan cheese

name: Slow Cooker Chicken Marrakesh
summary: I have been making this Moroccan-style recipe for years. It's so easy to make, it has become a tradition in our household.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 onion, sliced + 2 cloves garlic, minced (Optional) + 2 large carrots, peeled and diced + 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and diced + 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed + 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 2-inch pieces + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon ground turmeric + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon dried parsley + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes

name: Diabetic-Friendly Apple Muffins
summary: Just want to help diabetics.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen muffins
ingredient: vegetable oil cooking spray + 1<U+2009><U+2154> cups all-purpose flour + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons baking powder + 1 tablespoon stevia sugar substitute + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon sea salt + ¼ teaspoon nutmeg + <U+2154> cup skim milk + 1 egg, lightly beaten + ¼ cup reduced-calorie margarine, melted + 1 cup minced apple

name: Baked Beans from Scratch
summary: Navy beans, molasses, and maple syrup combine to make this classic dish at home.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 hrs,additional: 7 hrs 20 mins,total: 15 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 5 cups
ingredient: 1 cup dried navy beans + 4 cups water + ¼ cup ketchup + ¼ cup maple syrup + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 tablespoons molasses + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + ½ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon chili powder + 1 small onion, chopped

name: Dairy-Free Creamy Broccoli Soup
summary: The satiny texture of this soup will make you think it's cream-based, but it's absolutely dairy-free and delicious! It's a perfect dish to use up leftover broccoli stalks that don't fit into other meals. It freezes well and makes a great winter warm-up snack or lunch! Can be served immediately, seasoned with black pepper, curry powder, or even grated cheese (for people who don't mind dairy) or can be frozen in individual portions and microwaved later.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 large yellow onion, coarsely chopped + 3 large cloves garlic, coarsely chopped + 3 broccoli stalks, coarsely chopped + 2 broccoli florets and stalks, coarsely chopped + 2 large potatoes, peeled and coarsely chopped + <U+2153> celery root, coarsely chopped + 4 cups low-sodium chicken stock

name: Stir-Fried Mushrooms with Baby Corn
summary: Here is a Thai vegetable side dish with plenty of Chinese influences. Utilize whatever mushrooms are in season, such as straw, button, het kone or shiitake mushrooms.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons cooking oil + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 onion, diced + 8 baby corn ears, sliced + <U+2154> pound fresh mushrooms, sliced + 1 tablespoon fish sauce + 1 tablespoon light soy sauce + 1 tablespoon oyster sauce + 2 teaspoons cornstarch + 3 tablespoons water + 1 red chile pepper, sliced + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro

name: Grilled Corn Salad
summary: A yummy and easy side for hot summer days! Goes great with your grilled dishes or just to munch on. This recipe will last several days when covered in an airtight container and refrigerated.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 6 ears freshly shucked corn + 1 green pepper, diced + 2 Roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + ¼ cup diced red onion + ½ bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, or more to taste + 2 teaspoons olive oil, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Easy Apple Coleslaw
summary: This is our favorite cole slaw recipe, a yummy combo of fruit and veggies in a sweet dressing.
ingredient: 3 cups chopped cabbage + 1 unpeeled red apple, cored and chopped + 1 unpeeled Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped + 1 carrot, grated + ½ cup finely chopped red bell pepper + 2 green onions, finely chopped + <U+2153> cup mayonnaise + <U+2153> cup brown sugar + 1 tablespoon lemon juice, or to taste

name: Superfast Asparagus
summary: Roast asparagus is a 15-minute side dish (and YUM).
ingredient: 1 pound asparagus + 1 teaspoon Cajun seasoning

name: Puerto Rican Tostones (Fried Plantains)
summary: Tostones are crispy fried plantains. A plantain is a very firm banana. Serve as a side dish with your meal or as an appetizer.
ingredient: 1 green plantain + 5 tablespoons oil for frying + 3 cups cold water + salt to taste

name: Air Fryer Roasted Bananas
summary: Roasted bananas are great over ice cream, sprinkled with cinnamon-sugar, in a smoothie, or straight out of the air fryer. Made with only 2 ingredients and ready in less than 10 minutes.
ingredient: 1 banana, sliced into 1/8-inch thick diagonals + avocado oil cooking spray

name: Sweet Carrot Salad
summary: This salad is sweet and simple - great for a BBQ or a pot luck and best when left to sit for an hour to let flavors meld.
ingredient: 1 pound carrots, grated + 1 cup crushed pineapple + ½ cup raisins + 1 tablespoon honey + 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, or to taste + 1 dash lemon juice

name: Berry Fruit Salad
summary: Mixture of different delicious berries.
ingredient: 1 cup fresh strawberries, hulled and quartered lengthwise + 1 cup fresh blueberries + 1 cup fresh blackberries + 1 cup fresh raspberries + 1 teaspoon white sugar

name: World's Greatest Vegetable Broth
summary: This vegan broth is slightly thick with rich color and full flavor. The broth can be frozen in 1- or 1 1/2-cup blocks for later use. This recipe also leaves you with a bowl full of deliciously cooked vegetables. I love to snack on them!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 8,Yield: 2 quarts
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ pounds sweet onions, peeled and cut into wedges + 1 pound tomatoes, cored and quartered + 1 pound carrots, cut into 1-inch pieces + 1 pound green bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces + ½ pound turnips, cubed + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 pound celery, cut into 1-inch pieces + 1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped + 3 cloves garlic + 6 whole black peppercorns + 3 whole cloves + 1 bay leaf + 1 gallon water

name: Easy Mahi Mahi Fish Tacos
summary: These fish tacos are delicious and light. Best of both worlds! This is a great dish when you're on the go, as it's quick and easy. Enjoy. Add habanero hot sauce and low-fat sour cream to your preference.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon adobo seasoning + 4 (3 ounce) fillets mahi mahi + 1 dash lime juice + 1 medium tomato, diced + ½ red onion, chopped + 1 cup chopped fresh cilantro + 2 scallions, thinly sliced + 2 tablespoons lime juice + cooking spray + 8 (6 inch) corn tortillas + 1 avocado, sliced

name: Easy Southern Fried Green Tomatoes
summary: Simple recipe for fried green tomatoes, perfect for appetizers or a unique fried green tomato B.L.T.!
ingredient: waxed paper + 2 large eggs + 2 tablespoons water + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 cup yellow cornmeal + sea salt to taste + freshly ground black pepper to taste + 2 pounds green tomatoes, sliced + 1 cup canola oil for frying, or as needed

name: Air Fryer Fingerling Potatoes
summary: Air-fried fingerling potatoes are crispy on the outside and tender and creamy on the inside. This is a simple side dish that works for everyday meals as well as special occasions.
ingredient: 1 pound fingerling potatoes, halved lengthwise + 1 tablespoon olive oil + ½ teaspoon ground paprika + ½ teaspoon parsley flakes + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Summer Cucumber Jicama Salad
summary: This is a really great cucumber salad that's light and flavorful and makes a great starter! Tastes fine as it is, but can be salted and peppered to taste, if desired. Just remember to add all ingredients and mix before adding in the tomatoes, as they are extremely delicate and do not withstand stirring very well once they are cut.
ingredient: 1 large cucumber + ¼ jicama, peeled and cut into matchsticks + 1 lemon, zested + ½ lemon, juiced + 12 ounces white cherry tomatoes, quartered

name: Corn on the Cob in the Microwave
summary: Summer time and corn is in season. Sometimes it is too hot bring a pot of water to a boil. Short on time? This is when the microwave comes into play.
ingredient: 4 ears fresh corn, shucked + 4 dampened paper towels + 1 storage bag

name: Lemon-Orange Orange Roughy
summary: Orange roughy fillets with a citrus twist. Very quick to prepare.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 4 (4 ounce) fillets orange roughy + 1 orange, juiced + 1 lemon, juiced + ½ teaspoon lemon pepper

name: Salsa
summary: This is a recipe I just throw together, but it is very popular. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredient: 4 large tomatoes, chopped + 1 onion, chopped + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon lime juice + 1 tomatillo, diced (Optional) + salt to taste + 1 jalapeno pepper, minced

name: Frozen Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: Soy sauce and peanut butter add a nice Thai-style flavor to this stir-fry. Using frozen vegetables makes it a very quick and tasty vegetable side dish.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons soy sauce + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 2 teaspoons garlic powder + 2 teaspoons peanut butter + 2 teaspoons olive oil + 1 (16 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables

name: Fresh Strawberry Granita
summary: You can make and serve this gorgeous Italian frozen iced dessert anytime, but it's really best enjoyed during the summer months. Not only is it cold and delicious, but it forces you to stick your hot, sweaty face in the freezer four or five times to stir. The technique of using a fork several times to mix the freezing granita results in perfect icy crystals.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs 15 mins,total: 2 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds ripe strawberries, hulled and halved + <U+2153> cup white sugar, or to taste + 1 cup water + ½ teaspoon lemon juice (Optional) + ¼ teaspoon balsamic vinegar (Optional) + 1 tiny pinch salt

name: Easy Roasted Peppers
summary: This is a really basic way to roast peppers for use in any recipe. Choose any color peppers you like, or use a variety of colors for a beautiful presentation. After they are roasted you can add an oil and balsamic dressing, or fry in olive oil and garlic to serve with crusty bread.
ingredient: 6 red bell peppers

name: Easy Gluten-Free Macaroni and Cheese
summary: Cheesy gluten-free deliciousness that is super easy to make. Kid-approved!
ingredient: 10 ounces gluten-free elbow pasta + ¼ cup butter (Optional) + 1<U+2009>¼ teaspoons salt + ¾ teaspoon mustard powder + 4 cups milk + ¼ cup cornstarch + 4 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, divided + 2 gluten-free bread slices, toasted and broken into crumbs (Optional) + 1 teaspoon butter, softened (Optional) + ½ teaspoon paprika (Optional)

name: Cathy's Gluten-Free Oatmeal Waffles
summary: If you are bored with your morning bowl of oatmeal, here's a great alternative. Make lots of extra, freeze, and toast them on demand. Serve with butter, maple syrup and sliced banana …yummy!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 5 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 to 6 round waffles
ingredient: cooking spray + 1<U+2009>½ cups gluten-free rolled oats + ¾ cup almond milk + 1 egg, at room temperature, separated + 3 tablespoons melted butter + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 1 teaspoon baking powder

name: Turkey Spaghetti Zoodles
summary: A super simple one-pot dinner that's low calorie, low carb, paleo, gluten-free and takes just 10 minutes to make. This will be your go-to week night dinner! Serve immediately or store in the refrigerator up to 3 days.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil + 1<U+2009>¼ pounds ground turkey breast + 1 cup diced green bell pepper + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 2 teaspoons Italian seasoning + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes + 3 cups marinara sauce + 2 cups baby spinach leaves + 4 zucchini, cut into noodle-shape strands

name: Paleo Pecan-Maple Salmon
summary: This recipe is not only easy but healthy and tasty! Paleo, gluten-free and dairy-free!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 12 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 27 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 (4 ounce) fillets salmon + salt and ground black pepper to taste + ½ cup pecans + 3 tablespoons pure maple syrup + 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar + 1 teaspoon smoked paprika + ½ teaspoon chipotle pepper powder + ½ teaspoon onion powder

name: Gluten-Free Banana Walnut Chia Muffins
summary: This is my favorite gluten-free muffin recipe, very healthy and delicious! Can have as a snack or for a quick and easy breakfast.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 22 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 52 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 muffins
ingredient: <U+2153> cup water + 1 tablespoon chia seeds + 1<U+2009>¾ cups gluten-free all purpose baking flour + ¾ cup coconut sugar + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup plain fat-free yogurt + ¼ cup vegetable oil + 1 large egg + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 cup mashed ripe bananas + ¾ cup chopped walnuts

name: Gluten-Free Pizza Crust or Flatbread
summary: This recipe is for a crust that can be used for pizza or flatbreads. After 2 years of being GF, this is the best pizza crust/flatbread recipe I have. It is based on trial and error in an effort to improve other recipes. My kids say this is better than our homemade wheat flour crusts.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 large crust
ingredient: 1 cup very warm water + ½ teaspoon white sugar + 2 teaspoons yeast + 2 cups gluten-free flour blend + ½ cup rice flour + 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning + 1 teaspoon xanthan gum + 1 teaspoon unflavored gelatin powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar + 3 tablespoons olive oil

name: Almond Flour Brownies
summary: Delicious brownies that are actually almost healthy for you!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: ¾ cup blanched almond flour + <U+2154> cup agave nectar + ½ cup chopped walnuts (Optional) + 2 eggs + 5 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder + ¼ cup coconut oil + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: (Gluten Free) Magic Cookie Bars
summary: I did a combination of two recipes, peanut butter cookies with three ingredients and magic cookie bars. My brother-in-law loves magic cookie bars but is now gluten-free. I have been trying to come up with desserts for him so he doesn't feel left out. This is an amazing dessert and will stay fresh for days...if they last that long in your house! Perfect for Passover - no flour!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 55 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 1 9x13-inch dish
ingredient: 2 cups white sugar + 2 large eggs + 2 cups peanut butter + ¾ cup semisweet chocolate chips + ¾ cup dark chocolate chips + ½ cup chopped raw pecans + ½ cup chopped raw almonds + 1 cup flaked coconut + 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk

name: Rosemary Braised Lamb Shanks
summary: Lamb shank recipe for tender lamb slowly simmered with fresh rosemary, garlic, tomatoes, and red wine. Excellent served with polenta or roasted garlic mashed potatoes, my family's favorite, to soak up the wonderful sauce. This is a fantastic dish to make for company, as all the prep work is done at the beginning. All you have to do is wait.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 3 hrs 5 mins,total: 3 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 6
ingredient: 6 lamb shanks + salt and pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 3 large carrots, cut into 1/4 inch rounds + 2 onions, chopped + 10 cloves garlic, minced + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle red wine + 1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes with juice + 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed chicken broth + 1 (10.5 ounce) can beef broth + 5 teaspoons chopped fresh rosemary + 2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme

name: Stuffed Peppers
summary: Stuffed peppers with ground beef and rice are topped with a seasoned tomato sauce.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 1 hr 25 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 stuffed peppers
ingredient: 1 cup cold water + ½ cup uncooked long grain white rice + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 pound ground beef + 6 medium green bell peppers + 16 ounces tomato sauce, divided + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning

name: Quick Almond Flour Pancakes
summary: These almond flour pancakes are a wonderful substitute for regular pancakes when watching your carbs! They are very filling and are on the dense side. This is a basic recipe that can be tweaked. Any sweetener can be substituted for maple syrup. Enjoy!
ingredient: 1 cup almond flour + ¼ cup water + 2 eggs + 1 tablespoon maple syrup + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon oil, or as needed

name: Juicy Roasted Chicken
summary: My grandmother's recipe for roasted chicken. We are German and she used to do it this way all the time. I never have had a chicken this juicy before; this little trick works and makes the people eating it go silent. It's funny. We nibble on the celery after.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) whole chicken, giblets removed + salt and black pepper to taste + 1 tablespoon onion powder, or to taste + ½ cup margarine, divided + 1 stalk celery, leaves removed

name: Mayo Chicken
summary: This is my favorite chicken recipe, which I learned while doing low-carb dieting. I prefer dark meat so I'll use 4 legs and thighs. You can do this recipe with pork chops as well.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 cup mayonnaise + 2 cloves garlic, crushed + 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh rosemary + 1 teaspoon salt + freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 whole chicken, cut into 6 pieces + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Sarah's Applesauce
summary: This applesauce is delicious! I make it for my younger brother all the time and he loves it - and he hates canned applesauce!
ingredient: 4 apples - peeled, cored and chopped + ¾ cup water + ¼ cup white sugar + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Blackened Chicken
summary: Blackened chicken is great on a summer's day with fresh corn and mashed potatoes.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 chicken breast halves
ingredient: ½ teaspoon paprika + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon dried thyme + <U+215B> teaspoon onion powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground white pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + cooking spray

name: Mushy Peas
summary: Mushy peas are a great side dish with fried cod or salmon. You can add more liquid (water or cream) depending on how mushy you want your peas. Use low-fat milk if you're calorie-conscious.
ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen green peas + ¼ cup heavy cream + 1 tablespoon butter + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

name: Sirloin Steak with Garlic Butter
summary: This sirloin steak recipe is served with very garlicky butter that makes this steak melt-in-your-mouth wonderful! I have never tasted any other steak that came even close to this recipe. If you are having steak, don't skimp on flavor to save a few calories.
ingredient: ½ cup butter + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 2 teaspoons garlic powder + 4 pounds beef top sirloin steaks + salt and pepper to taste

name: Brazilian Cheese Bread (Pao de Queijo)
summary: Pao de queijo are yummy gluten-free, wheat-free breads that are good for those with celiac disease or gluten intolerance. Serve them plain or with marinara sauce. For more variety, try adding an herb seasonings, such as Italian seasoning, or try substituting other cheeses for the Parmesan.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 breads
ingredient: ½ cup olive oil or butter + <U+2153> cup water + <U+2153> cup milk or soy milk + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 cups tapioca flour + 2 teaspoons minced garlic + <U+2154> cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese + 2 beaten eggs

name: Crab Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These tasty crab-stuffed mushrooms are seasoned with thyme, oregano, and savory. Choose good-sized mushrooms for this appetizer, about 2 inches across. When cleaning mushrooms, don't run them under water; they're like little sponges and will absorb it. Just wipe them clean with a damp towel instead.
ingredient: 7 ounces crabmeat + 5 green onions, thinly sliced + ¼ teaspoon dried thyme + ¼ teaspoon dried oregano + ¼ teaspoon ground savory + ground black pepper to taste + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + <U+2153> cup mayonnaise + 1 pound fresh mushrooms + 3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon paprika

name: Easy Three-Ingredient Gluten-Free German Christmas Coconut Cookies
summary: These German coconut cookies (Kokosmakronen) are one of the most popular German Christmas cookies and use three ingredients. They are gluten free, lactose free, and very easy to make. Store in airtight containers.
ingredient: 4 egg whites + 1 cup white sugar + 2 cups unsweetened coconut flakes

name: Grilled Sea Bass
summary: This perfectly seasoned grilled sea bass dish includes a delicious garlic-parsley butter. Serve with steamed or grilled asparagus for a truly flavorful summer meal that's elegant enough to serve to guests.
ingredient: ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon paprika + lemon pepper to taste + sea salt to taste + 2 pounds sea bass + 3 tablespoons butter + 2 large cloves garlic, chopped + 1 tablespoon chopped Italian flat leaf parsley + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons extra virgin olive oil

name: Breakfast Brownies
summary: This is a hearty breakfast brownie, quick to fix, and yummy. My kids loved it! It's also gluten-free and dairy-free.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen brownies
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups quick-cooking oats + ¾ cup brown sugar + ¾ cup flax seed meal + ½ cup gluten-free all purpose baking flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 banana, mashed + ¼ cup rice milk + 1 egg + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: BBQ Pork for Sandwiches
summary: This is so easy and very tasty. Serve on buns with French fries or potato chips.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 4 hrs 30 mins,total: 4 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can beef broth + 3 pounds boneless pork ribs + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce

name: Green Grape Salad
summary: This is a wonderful dessert salad that never failed to be a hit. Made the day before the brown sugar makes the sauce taste like caramel. You can use less brown sugar, if you wish.
ingredient: 4 pounds seedless green grapes + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream + ½ cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 4 ounces chopped pecans + 2 tablespoons brown sugar

name: Slow Cooker Creamed Corn
summary: Creamed corn with cream cheese. So good and so easy!
ingredient: 1<U+2009>¼ (16 ounce) packages frozen corn kernels + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese + ½ cup butter + ½ cup milk + 1 tablespoon white sugar + salt and pepper to taste

name: Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies
summary: Heavy, yummy, and very peanut-buttery. You'll need lots of milk to eat these!!
ingredient: 1 cup peanut butter + 1 cup white sugar + 1 egg

name: Cornish Game Hens with Garlic and Rosemary
summary: This Cornish hen recipe is perfect for special occasions. Serve with crusty garlic bread and a nice light Chianti wine.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 hens
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil, divided + 4 Cornish game hens + salt and pepper to taste + 1 lemon, quartered + 8 sprigs fresh rosemary, divided + 24 cloves garlic + <U+2153> cup white wine + <U+2153> cup low-sodium chicken broth

name: Quinoa and Black Beans
summary: Very flavorful alternative to black beans and rice. Quinoa is a nutty grain from South America.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon vegetable oil + 1 onion, chopped + 3 cloves garlic, chopped + ¾ cup quinoa + 1<U+2009>½ cups vegetable broth + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 cup frozen corn kernels + 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro

name: Grilled Marinated Shrimp
summary: This makes the best shrimp! Remove from skewers and serve on a bed of pasta with sauce for a great meal.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 cup olive oil + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + 1 lemon, juiced + 2 tablespoons hot pepper sauce + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon tomato paste + 2 teaspoons dried oregano + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined with tails attached + 6 each skewers

name: Baby Spinach Omelet
summary: Enjoy this spinach omelet with tender baby greens, Parmesan cheese, and a little nutmeg cooked together for the perfect start to the day.
ingredient: 2 eggs + 1 cup torn baby spinach leaves + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground nutmeg + salt and pepper to taste

name: Buckeyes
summary: This buckeyes recipe is so good that I double it whenever I make it. Since it is peanut butter balls dipped in chocolate it is almost like candy. Real buckeyes are nuts that grow on trees and are related to the horse chestnut.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 30,Yield: 5 dozen
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups peanut butter + 1 cup butter, softened + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 6 cups confectioners' sugar + 4 cups semisweet chocolate chips

name: 4-Ingredient Keto Peanut Butter Cookies
summary: These keto peanut butter cookies are made with just 4 ingredients: peanut butter, vanilla extract, an egg, and some sugar substitute. Kids love these scrumptious low-carb keto cookies.
ingredient: 1 cup peanut butter + ½ cup low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®) + 1 egg + 1 teaspoon sugar-free vanilla extract

name: Smoked Fish Dip
summary: This recipe for smoked fish dip is world class, puts most others to shame, and is served in several prominent restaurants on the gulf coast of Florida. We used smoked whitefish, well boned, but any other smoked fish should work. Serve with crackers, lemon or lime wedges, and capers.
ingredient: 2 cups flaked smoked whitefish + 2 tablespoons fat-free mayonnaise + 4 tablespoons fat-free sour cream + 1 pinch Old Bay (tm) Seasoning + 4 drops hot pepper sauce, or to taste + 3 drops Worcestershire sauce, or to taste + 3 drops liquid smoke flavoring (Optional) + cracked black pepper to taste

name: Grandma's Five Cup Salad
summary: My Grandmother made this every year for Christmas when I was a kid.
ingredient: 1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained + 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained + 2 cups miniature marshmallows + 1 cup flaked coconut + 6 ounces sour cream

name: Crisp Pickled Green Beans
summary: This pickled green beans recipe is from my grandmother's cookbook that she passed on to all her grandchildren. The beans turn out very crisp with a wonderful dill flavor, and the red pepper flakes provide a nice punch. This recipe is much better than those that call for cooking the beans first.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 2 weeks 8 hrs,total: 2 weeks 8 hrs 35 mins,Servings: 48,Yield: 6 1/2-pint jars
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ cups distilled white vinegar + 2 cups water + ¼ cup salt + 1 clove garlic, peeled + 2<U+2009>½ pounds fresh green beans + 6 large sprigs dill + ¾ teaspoon red pepper flakes (Optional)

name: Seven Layer Gelatin Salad
summary: Don't wait until the last minute to make this recipe. Each layer has to set before the next one is added.
process: prep: 1 hr 10 mins,additional: 5 hrs 15 mins,total: 6 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 18,Yield: 1 - 9x13 inch dish
ingredient: 7 (3 ounce) packages assorted fruit flavored Jell-O® mix + 4<U+2009>½ cups boiling water, divided + 4<U+2009>½ cups cold water, divided + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk, divided + 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: Keto Chicken Parmesan
summary: A delicious keto-friendly chicken Parmesan. Enjoy a classic Italian dish, and keep your macros in check!
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon heavy whipping cream + 1<U+2009>½ ounces pork rinds, crushed + 1 ounce grated Parmesan cheese + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes (Optional) + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon Italian seasoning + ½ cup jarred tomato sauce (such as Rao's®) + ¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + 1 tablespoon ghee (clarified butter)

name: Keto Spaghetti Squash with Bacon and Blue Cheese
summary: Turn plain old spaghetti squash into a keto meal with the addition of bacon, mushrooms, spinach, and blue cheese. I like to double the blue cheese, especially when using a milder variety. Carbs in spaghetti squash can add up quickly, so use a small squash that's approximately 2 pounds.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 stuffed squash halves
ingredient: 1 small spaghetti squash + 1 tablespoon olive oil + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces + 1 (4 ounce) package mushrooms, sliced + 1 clove garlic, minced + 2 cups baby spinach + ¼ cup sour cream + 2 tablespoons crumbled blue cheese

name: Keto Pumpkin Cheesecake with Almond Pecan Crust
summary: This keto pumpkin cheesecake has a nutty almond-pecan crust. It's a yummy and rich-tasting cross between my decades-old cheesecake recipe and pumpkin pie that I converted to be low-carb. I also use low-fat cream cheese to reduce the amount of fat. It's wonderful for Thanksgiving, or just for fun anytime. Unless you tell people it's low-carb, they'll never guess!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 55 mins,additional: 4 hrs 40 mins,total: 5 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 1 9-inch cheesecake
ingredient: 1 cup almonds + 1 cup pecans + 2 (1 gram) packets granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®) + 3 tablespoons butter, melted + 3 (8 ounce) packages low-fat cream cheese, at room temperature + <U+2154> cup granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®) + 1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon + ½ teaspoon ground ginger + ¼ teaspoon ground cloves + ¼ teaspoon salt + 3 eggs

name: Keto Cauliflower Bacon Cheese Mash
summary: You will never miss eating mashed potatoes again now that you can have this deliciously creamy, bacon-cheese- flavored mashed cauliflower instead!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: ½ pound bacon, diced + 1 large head cauliflower, cut into florets + 1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese + 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature + 2 tablespoons medium-chain triglyceride (MCT) oil + ½ tablespoon apple cider vinegar + sea salt to taste

name: Spicy Ranch Cauliflower Crackers
summary: A spicy keto cracker made with cauliflower instead of flour! The perfect low-carb cracker. Store in an airtight container.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 35 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 18,Yield: 18 crackers
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen riced cauliflower + cheese cloth + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon dry ranch salad dressing mix + <U+215B> teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste + 1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese

name: Simple Cauliflower Keto Casserole
summary: Cauliflower in a creamy cheese sauce is a perfect keto recipe and delicious to boot! Make sure you season well with salt and pepper (nutmeg tastes great as well) otherwise it will taste too bland.
ingredient: ½ head cauliflower florets + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + ½ cup heavy cream + 1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Keto White Chicken Chili
summary: This is a keto version of the white chicken chili recipe made popular by Karen Celia Fox (she adapted it from The Kitchen for Exploring Foods caterers in Pasadena, California. The original recipe is fantastic!). The end result is a thick, creamy chili with chunks of sauteed and pulled chicken. Great for those cold winter nights! Serve immediately or refrigerate overnight for better flavor.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon oil, or as needed + 1 stick butter, divided + 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons chili powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + ¾ cup chicken broth + 2 cups heavy whipping cream + 4 ounces cream cheese + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons onion powder + 2 teaspoons cumin + 1 teaspoon hot sauce + 1<U+2009>½ cups grated Monterey Jack cheese + 2 (4 ounce) cans chopped green chilies

name: Keto Spinach-Artichoke Chicken
summary: Spinach artichoke dip meets baked chicken! These juicy chicken breasts are smothered with a cheesy spinach and artichoke topping. It's the ultimate comfort food for those following a keto or low-carb lifestyle, and will be loved by everyone in the family regardless of diet! Serve with a side of roasted broccoli or asparagus, or on top of cauliflower rice.
ingredient: ½ (10 ounce) package frozen spinach + 1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ (14 ounce) can quartered artichoke hearts, drained and chopped + ¼ cup shredded Parmesan cheese + ¼ cup mayonnaise + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon salt + 4 (8 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breasts + salt and pepper to taste + 1 tablespoon olive oil + ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Fluffy Microwave Scrambled Eggs
summary: Use your microwave to make light and fluffy scrambled eggs for a quick and easy breakfast to start your day. Follow the technique in this recipe for perfect results every time.
ingredient: 4 eggs + ¼ cup milk + <U+215B> teaspoon salt

name: Ultimate Low-Carb Zucchini Lasagna
summary: Zucchini slices step in for pasta in this low-carb and gluten-free beef lasagna that is delicious and satisfying; such a crowd pleaser!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 8-inch baking dish
ingredient: cooking spray + 1<U+2009>½ large zucchinis, thinly sliced lengthwise + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 pound ground beef + 1<U+2009>½ cups low-carb marinara sauce + 2 teaspoons salt, divided + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese + 1 egg + ½ teaspoon ground nutmeg + 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Oven-Baked Bacon
summary: I always bake bacon in the oven! You just need to plan a bit ahead as the bacon takes longer. With baking, the bacon grease stays nice and clean and you can reuse it to saute vegetables or eggs for extra flavor.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package bacon

name: 4-Ingredient Keto Peanut Butter Cookies
summary: These keto peanut butter cookies are made with just 4 ingredients: peanut butter, vanilla extract, an egg, and some sugar substitute. Kids love these scrumptious low-carb keto cookies.
ingredient: 1 cup peanut butter + ½ cup low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®) + 1 egg + 1 teaspoon sugar-free vanilla extract

name: Air Fryer Hamburger Patties
summary: When it's too cold to grill and you're craving a juicy burger, use your air fryer! The butter and bouillon mixture gives the patties a dark grilled color and deep beefy flavor. Add your favorite seasonings, if desired, but these are delicious as is! If you'd like to add cheese, turn off the air fryer once the patties are done and let the residual heat melt the cheese. Make sure you use cold meat, straight from the fridge, for best results.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 hamburger patties
ingredient: 1 pound 80% lean ground beef + 2 tablespoons melted butter + 1 tablespoon beef base (such as Better than Bouillon®) + freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Smoked Chicken Drumsticks
summary: These smoky chicken drumsticks are so versatile and easy! I like to use applewood chips or other fruit woods, but maple is also a great choice. Use your favorite BBQ rub. Letting the drumsticks air dry in the refrigerator overnight, combined with a higher smoking temperature, helps prevent rubbery skin that is common when smoking chicken. Serve with your favorite BBQ sauce, if desired.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 2 hrs,additional: 8 hrs,total: 10 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 drumsticks
ingredient: 12 chicken drumsticks + ¼ cup vegetable oil + <U+2153> cup BBQ rub

name: 90-Second Keto Bread in a Mug
summary: Try keto bread microwaved quickly and easily with only 5 ingredients in 90 seconds! This bread is so tasty and perfect for sandwiches and toast.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon butter + <U+2153> cup blanched almond flour + 1 egg + ½ teaspoon baking powder + 1 pinch salt

name: Air Fryer Rib-Eye Steak
summary: It's so easy to air-fry steaks in your air fryer. These definitely rival a steak cooked on the grill. You can marinate the rib-eyes in the morning before you leave for work, then cook them at night.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 2 hrs 5 mins,total: 2 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 2
ingredient: 2 rib-eye steaks, cut 1 1/2- inch thick + ½ cup reduced-sodium soy sauce + ¼ cup olive oil + 4 teaspoons grill seasoning (such as Montreal Steak Seasoning®)

name: Air Fryer Bacon
summary: This is what I've found to be the optimal way for cooking perfectly crispy bacon in the air fryer.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 15 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 0.5 pound of bacon
ingredient: ½ (16 ounce) package bacon

name: Basic Keto Cheese Crisps
summary: These cheese crisps are a delicious and ketogenic snack.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 24 crisps
ingredient: 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese

name: Air Fryer Ranch Pork Chops
summary: What could be simpler than ranch seasoning mix and 10 minutes in the air fryer? I prefer my chops slightly pink to ensure juiciness, but feel free to add an extra minute on each side for well done. Try different varieties of ranch mix (like spicy or bacon) to change up the flavor.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 boneless, center-cut pork chops, 1-inch thick + cooking spray + 2 teaspoons dry ranch salad dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch®) + aluminum foil

name: Baked Lemon-Butter Chicken Thighs
summary: These low-carb, keto-friendly chicken thighs are basted with a tangy and rich butter sauce. They are easy enough for a weeknight meal and guaranteed to impress the pickiest eaters. Serve over egg noodles, mashed potatoes, or rice, or alongside your favorite vegetables.
ingredient: 4 tablespoons butter, divided + 4 cloves garlic + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + 4 (8 ounce) skin-on, bone-in chicken thighs + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped

name: Keto Smothered Chicken Thighs
summary: Topped with bacon, mushrooms, green onions, and a creamy sauce, these chicken thighs are sure to become a favorite on your keto menu.
ingredient: 4 (8 ounce) skin-on, bone-in chicken thighs + 1 teaspoon paprika + salt and pepper to taste + 4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2 inch pieces + <U+2153> cup low-sodium chicken broth + 4 ounces sliced mushrooms + ¼ cup heavy whipping cream + 2 green onions, white and green parts separated and sliced

name: Keto Margarita
summary: Enjoy this keto margarita without feeling guilty! This recipe uses Swerveu0026reg; instead of sugar, and orange-flavored sparkling water to mimic the taste of orange liqueur.
ingredient: 3 cups ice + 2 fluid ounces tequila + 1 fluid ounce lime juice + 2<U+2009>½ teaspoons low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®) + 1 tablespoon coarse salt + 2 lime wedges + 1 pint-sized Mason jar + 2 fluid ounces orange-flavored sparkling water (such as La Croix®)

name: Easy Keto Alfredo Sauce
summary: This creamy keto Alfredo sauce is easy to make and a lovely treat for yourself and your guests! It pairs well with pasta or zoodles (spiralized zucchini). You can even add chicken or shrimp. Sauce will become very thick if stored in the refrigerator. Simply heat the sauce up for it to be pourable.
ingredient: ½ cup unsalted butter + 2 cloves garlic, crushed + 2 cups heavy whipping cream + ½ (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1<U+2009>½ cups grated Parmesan cheese + 1 pinch salt, or to taste + 1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste + 1 pinch ground white pepper, or to taste

name: Tuscan Pork Tenderloin
summary: This is a very easy weeknight pork tenderloin recipe that is also keto-friendly.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 4 teaspoons garlic, minced + 2 teaspoons dried rosemary + 2 teaspoons dried oregano + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 4 pounds pork tenderloin

name: Chicken Bacon Ranch Salad
summary: I always seem to have leftover cooked chicken. This simple, tasty salad is a great use of your leftover chicken, either white meat, dark meat, or a combination! Romaine lettuce, cooked chicken, avocado, and cherry tomatoes combine with ranch dressing, and everything is topped off with crunchy bacon. Use purchased ranch salad dressing, or stir up one of the buttermilk dressing recipes on the site. Enjoy for a hearty lunch with some crackers, or for dinner, with a crusty bread. This recipe is proportioned for one person, but it's easy to double or triple for your needs.
ingredient: 8 leaves romaine lettuce + 2 cups chopped romaine lettuce + ½ cup chopped cooked chicken + ½ cup chopped avocado + ½ cup cherry tomatoes, halved + 2 tablespoons prepared ranch dressing + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 2 slices cooked bacon, crumbled

name: Air Fryer Blackened Chicken Breast
summary: No need to dirty up a cast iron skillet and fill your house with smoke. Let your air fryer create that perfect blackened crust.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: 2 teaspoons paprika + 1 teaspoon ground thyme + 1 teaspoon cumin + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ½ teaspoon onion powder + ½ teaspoon black pepper + ¼ teaspoon salt + 2 teaspoons vegetable oil + 2 (12 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

name: Easy Air-Fried Chicken Breast
summary: Easy air fryer chicken recipe for one that can easily be scaled up for more people.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 18 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 28 mins,Servings: 1,Yield: 1 chicken breast
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) chicken breast + 2 teaspoons olive oil + salt to taste + freshly ground black pepper to taste + garlic powder to taste

name: Bacon on the Grill
summary: Bacon can easily be cooked on the grill for a mess free stove.
ingredient: 1 pound lean thick-cut bacon + aluminum foil

name: Keto Chicken Parmesan
summary: A delicious keto-friendly chicken Parmesan. Enjoy a classic Italian dish, and keep your macros in check!
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon heavy whipping cream + 1<U+2009>½ ounces pork rinds, crushed + 1 ounce grated Parmesan cheese + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes (Optional) + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon Italian seasoning + ½ cup jarred tomato sauce (such as Rao's®) + ¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + 1 tablespoon ghee (clarified butter)

name: Sous Vide "Poached" Eggs
summary: Poached eggs are normally cooked directly in simmering water, but that can be tricky and lead to rubbery, messy eggs. I have tried different variations of times and temps, and this is the method I find produces a perfectly set white with a runny yolk. Use a kitchen timer for precise results, not the timer on your immersion cooker. Fresh eggs have tighter whites and produce the best results.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 13 mins,additional: 3 mins,total: 21 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 "poached" eggs
ingredient: 4 large cold eggs + 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Low-Carb Almond Cinnamon Butter Cookies
summary: My quick and easy go-to keto and gluten-free cookie recipe whenever I want to have something sweet, with very few net carbs per cookie!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 12 mins,additional: 1 min,total: 23 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 cookies
ingredient: 2 cups blanched almond flour + ½ cup butter, softened + 1 egg + ½ cup low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®) + 1 teaspoon sugar-free vanilla extract + 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Sun-Dried Tomato and Goat Cheese Sous Vide Egg Bites
summary: These velvety egg bites are filled with the sweet-tart flavor of sun-dried tomatoes and creamy goat cheese. Elegant enough to serve at your next brunch, or as a make-ahead breakfast for those hectic weekday mornings.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 egg bites
ingredient: ¼ cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes + 1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 6 large eggs + ½ cup cottage cheese + 2 ounces goat cheese + 2 tablespoons heavy cream + ½ teaspoon salt + 6 (4-ounce) mason jars + cooking spray

name: Keto Creme Brulee
summary: This creme brulee is an elegant low-carb dessert made with only 4 ingredients and is also keto, gluten-free, and sugar-free diet friendly.
ingredient: 4 egg yolks + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 cups heavy whipping cream + 5 tablespoons low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®), divided

name: Chaffles with Almond Flour
summary: Chaffles are an overnight sensation in the low carb/keto world. Adding almond flour gives them a more traditional waffle texture and helps get rid of any eggy taste. Seriously, try them, they're delicious! I use an inexpensive mini waffle maker (such as Dash® Mini Maker Waffle) which produces perfect 4-inch chaffles. So many ways to use chaffles, the sky's the limit!
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 4-inch chaffles
ingredient: 1 large egg + 1 tablespoon blanched almond flour + ¼ teaspoon baking powder + ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + cooking spray

name: Vietnamese Fresh Spring Rolls
summary: These spring rolls are a refreshing change from the usual fried variety, and have become a family favorite. They are great as a cool summertime appetizer, and are delicious dipped in one or both of the sauces.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 5 mins,total: 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 spring rolls
ingredient: 2 ounces rice vermicelli + 8 rice wrappers (8.5 inch diameter) + 8 large cooked shrimp - peeled, deveined and cut in half + 1<U+2009><U+2153> tablespoons chopped fresh Thai basil + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh mint leaves + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + 2 leaves lettuce, chopped + 4 teaspoons fish sauce + ¼ cup water + 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice + 1 clove garlic, minced + 2 tablespoons white sugar + ½ teaspoon garlic chili sauce + 3 tablespoons hoisin sauce + 1 teaspoon finely chopped peanuts

name: Health Nut Blueberry Muffins
summary: An awesome healthy alternative to the usual blueberry muffin.
ingredient: ¾ cup all-purpose flour + ¾ cup whole wheat flour + ¾ cup white sugar + ¼ cup oat bran + ¼ cup quick cooking oats + ¼ cup wheat germ + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 1 teaspoon baking soda + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 cup blueberries + ½ cup chopped walnuts + 1 banana, mashed + 1 cup buttermilk + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Fast and Friendly Meatballs
summary: These oven-baked meatballs are fast and easy to prepare and very kid-friendly. You can serve them with pasta and spaghetti sauce or just eat them with ketchup, as my children do. Feel free to substitute lean ground beef for the ground turkey. The turkey should have at least 7% fat.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil + 1 (20 ounce) package ground turkey + 1 egg, beaten + <U+2153> cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs

name: Spiced Sweet Roasted Red Pepper Hummus
summary: Serve with pita bread-you can cut pita bread into wedges and toast it for a different taste sensation. Tahini is a sesame paste, you can usually find it in the Mediterranean section of your grocery store.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained + 1 (4 ounce) jar roasted red peppers + 3 tablespoons lemon juice + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons tahini + 1 clove garlic, minced + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley

name: Texas Caviar I
summary: Here's a spicy Texas favorite. Black-eyed peas and black beans are marinated in a fiery, flavorful mixture. This is great with tortilla chips or bread -- and plenty of cold iced tea!
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 8 cups
ingredient: ½ onion, chopped + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 1 bunch green onions, chopped + 2 jalapeno peppers, chopped + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1 pint cherry tomatoes, quartered + 1 (8 ounce) bottle zesty Italian dressing + 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can black-eyed peas, drained + ½ teaspoon ground coriander + 1 bunch chopped fresh cilantro

name: Easy Baked Tilapia
summary: This baked tilapia recipe is super easy. It only takes a few minutes to prepare, uses few ingredients, and is flavorful.
ingredient: 4 (4 ounce) fillets tilapia + 2 teaspoons butter + ½ teaspoon garlic salt, or to taste + ¼ teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or to taste + 1 lemon, sliced + 1 (16 ounce) package frozen cauliflower with broccoli and red pepper + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Marinated Turkey Breast
summary: This recipe came from my mother. These always turn out juicy and tender no matter how long my husband leaves them on the grill! Easy to prepare, but it's always best when marinated for at least 4 hours.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 4 hrs 10 mins,total: 5 hrs,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced + 1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh basil + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 (3 pound) boneless turkey breast halves + 6 whole cloves + ¼ cup vegetable oil + ¼ cup soy sauce + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 1 tablespoon brown sugar

name: Garlic Shrimp Linguine
summary: A dazzlingly simple and delicious recipe. This is an elegant dish to serve drop-in dinner guests.
ingredient: 1 pound uncooked linguine + 1 tablespoon butter + 3 tablespoons white wine + 2 teaspoons grated Parmesan cheese + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley + 1 pinch salt and pepper to taste + 1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

name: Mexican Jicama Snack
summary: I found this recipe while on a trip to Mexico. It is a great snack that is crunchy, has a great flavor, and is very healthy. My kids love this and they can help make it. Happy crunching!
ingredient: 1 large jicama + 2 lime, juiced + 1 tablespoon crushed red pepper, or to taste

name: Jamie's Sweet and Easy Corn on the Cob
summary: My mother-in-law gave me this quick and easy recipe for the sweetest, tastiest corn cobs!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 6 ears corn on the cob, husks and silk removed

name: Slow Cooker Chicken Creole
summary: The stewed tomatoes and jalapeno pepper give this slow cooker recipe its Creole zing, along with seasoning and other veggies. This is an easy and tasty Creole chicken recipe. Just put all ingredients into the slow cooker and let it simmer all day. It's perfect over egg noodles. Add extra water and veggies to the leftovers to make a tasty afternoon soup.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 12 hrs,total: 12 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + salt and pepper to taste + Creole-style seasoning to taste + 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, with liquid + 1 stalk celery, diced + 1 green bell pepper, diced + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 onion, diced + 1 (4 ounce) can mushrooms, drained + 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped

name: Microwave Corn on the Cob
summary: This is a no-nonsense recipe for corn on the cob. Perfect for when you run out of stove or grill space. I freeze the corn on the cob in plastic bags, and remove a single ear of frozen corn in the cold winter months to have the sweet taste of summer corn throughout the year!
ingredient: 1 ear corn, husked and cleaned

name: Crispy Hash Browns
summary: Good, old-fashioned, restaurant-style hash browns. Perfect with hot pepper sauce and ketchup!
ingredient: 2 medium russet potatoes, shredded + ½ medium onion, finely chopped + ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 egg + 1 cup oil for frying, or as needed + salt and pepper to taste

name: Pesto Pasta
summary: Easy to make, but full of flavor! Good hot or cold.
ingredient: ½ cup chopped onion + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons pesto + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + 1 (16 ounce) package pasta + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Grilled Asparagus
summary: The special thing about this recipe is that it's so simple. Fresh asparagus with a little oil, salt, and pepper is cooked quickly over high heat on the grill. Enjoy the natural flavor of your veggies.
ingredient: 1 pound fresh asparagus spears, trimmed + 1 tablespoon olive oil + salt and pepper to taste

name: Simple Roasted Butternut Squash
summary: Butternut squash is so good on its own, that barely any seasoning is needed. This recipe is so simple and easy.
ingredient: 1 butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1-inch cubes + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 cloves garlic, minced + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Fluffy French Toast
summary: This is the best French toast recipe. It's different because it uses flour. I have given it to some friends and they've all liked it better than the French toast they usually make!
ingredient: ¼ cup all-purpose flour + 1 cup milk + 3 eggs + 1 tablespoon white sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 pinch salt + 12 thick slices bread

name: Easy Roasted Broccoli
summary: Easy roasted broccoli. My favorite part is the roasted sliced stem pieces.
ingredient: 14 ounces broccoli + 1 tablespoon olive oil + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Sarah's Applesauce
summary: This applesauce is delicious! I make it for my younger brother all the time and he loves it - and he hates canned applesauce!
ingredient: 4 apples - peeled, cored and chopped + ¾ cup water + ¼ cup white sugar + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Three Bean Salad
summary: This tasty three bean salad is great for buffets, summer picnics, and cookouts. It's easy to make but tastes best when chilled for at least 12 hours. It keeps well and serves a lot of people.
ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can green beans + 1 pound wax beans + 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained and rinsed + 1 onion, sliced into thin rings + ¾ cup white sugar, or to taste + <U+2154> cup distilled white vinegar + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon celery seed

name: Amazing Pork Tenderloin in the Slow Cooker
summary: This crockpot pork tenderloin will melt in your mouth! The pork soaks up all the yummy juices as it cooks. Make sure to serve the au jus on the side — it's amazing. This recipe is so simple, you will love it!
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 4 hrs,additional: 10 mins,total: 4 hrs 15 mins,other-time: 10,Servings: 6
ingredient: 1 (2 pound) pork tenderloin + 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix + 1 cup water + ¾ cup red wine + 3 tablespoons soy sauce + 3 tablespoons minced garlic + freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Roasted New Red Potatoes
summary: Roasted red potatoes at their best — plain and simple. Red potatoes are tossed with olive oil, salt, and pepper, then roasted to perfection.
ingredient: 3 pounds small red new potatoes, halved + ¼ cup olive oil + 1 teaspoon salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Southern Fried Cabbage
summary: A favorite cabbage recipe at Mammaw's house! Cabbage is fried with onion and bacon in this simple, quick side dish. It's terrific with cornbread.
ingredient: 3 slices bacon, cut into thirds + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon salt, or to taste + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste + 1 head cabbage, cored and sliced + 1 white onion, chopped + 1 pinch white sugar

name: Black Beans and Rice
summary: Black beans and rice is the perfect 30-minute meal! This recipe is from The WEBB Cooks by Robyn Webb, courtesy of the American Diabetes Association.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon olive oil + 1 onion, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, minced + ¾ cup uncooked white rice + 1<U+2009>½ cups low sodium, low fat vegetable broth + 3<U+2009>½ cups canned black beans, drained + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper

name: Easy Broccoli Salad I
summary: A healthy, bright salad.
ingredient: 4 cups fresh broccoli florets + ¼ cup red onion, finely diced + 3 tablespoons raisins + 2 tablespoons dry roasted sunflower seeds + ¼ cup plain yogurt + 2 tablespoons orange juice + 1 tablespoon fat-free mayonnaise

name: Simply Steamed Asparagus
summary: This steamed asparagus is tender and tasty! Try using vinaigrette dressing in place of the butter, too.
ingredient: 1 bunch asparagus spears + 1 teaspoon butter + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Blackened Chicken
summary: Blackened chicken is great on a summer's day with fresh corn and mashed potatoes.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 chicken breast halves
ingredient: ½ teaspoon paprika + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon dried thyme + <U+215B> teaspoon onion powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground white pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + cooking spray

name: Pesto Pasta with Chicken
summary: This chicken pesto pasta is easy and delicious. Serve with crusty bread and salad for a quick dinner. Use as much or as little pesto sauce as you like. Using homemade pesto will taste even better, but it adds to prep time. Enjoy!
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package bow tie pasta + 1 teaspoon olive oil + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces + 1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste + ½ cup pesto sauce + <U+2153> cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and cut into strips

name: Homemade Black Bean Veggie Burgers
summary: With this black bean burger recipe, you will never want to eat frozen veggie burgers again. These are so easy, and you'll be proud to have created such a vegetarian delight.
ingredient: cooking spray + 1 (16 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed + ½ green bell pepper, cut into 2 inch pieces + ½ onion, cut into wedges + 3 cloves garlic, peeled + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon chili powder + 1 tablespoon cumin + 1 teaspoon Thai chili sauce or hot sauce + ½ cup bread crumbs

name: Delicious and Easy Corn on the Cob
