summary: I learned this recipe from a shopper in Stockbridge, Massachusetts, when I was young. I have used this for 40 years, and it has never failed to produce the most wonderful corn on the cob.
ingredient: ¼ teaspoon white sugar + 4 ears corn, husked and cleaned

name: Fish in Foil
summary: Baked fish in foil is a "no-smell" fish recipe, and the only one I make for my family (I hate fish, they love it!). Take foil packets to the table for service, and keep the packets around for wrapping and discarding bones and skin. Then when dinner's done, haul those babies to the outside trash.
ingredient: 2 rainbow trout fillets + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 teaspoons garlic salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 sheets heavy-duty aluminum foil + 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, sliced + 1 lemon, sliced

name: Easy Baked Tilapia
summary: This baked tilapia recipe is super easy. It only takes a few minutes to prepare, uses few ingredients, and is flavorful.
ingredient: 4 (4 ounce) fillets tilapia + 2 teaspoons butter + ½ teaspoon garlic salt, or to taste + ¼ teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or to taste + 1 lemon, sliced + 1 (16 ounce) package frozen cauliflower with broccoli and red pepper + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Roasted Vegetables
summary: A casserole dish of seasonal vegetables that is so easy to prepare. It can be made a day ahead - just reheat before serving. Lemon juice can be substituted for balsamic vinegar, and you can use baking potatoes if you don't have any Yukon Golds on hand.
ingredient: 1 small butternut squash, cubed + 2 red bell peppers, seeded and diced + 1 sweet potato, peeled and cubed + 3 Yukon Gold potatoes, cubed + 1 red onion, quartered + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary + ¼ cup olive oil + 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar + salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Penne with Chicken and Asparagus
summary: A light but super-tasty pasta dish, with fresh asparagus cooked in broth with sauteed garlic and seasoned chicken.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package dried penne pasta + 5 tablespoons olive oil, divided + 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into cubes + salt and pepper to taste + garlic powder to taste + ½ cup low-sodium chicken broth + 1 bunch slender asparagus spears, trimmed, cut on diagonal into 1-inch pieces + 1 clove garlic, thinly sliced + ¼ cup Parmesan cheese

name: Grilled Cilantro Salmon
summary: Summer is for salmon on the grill! This sensational salmon marinade combines honey, lime, garlic, and cilantro.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 Servings
ingredient: 1 bunch cilantro leaves, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, chopped + 2 cups honey + juice from one lime + 4 salmon steaks + salt and pepper to taste

name: Cinnamon-Curry Tuna Salad
summary: A very simple but delightfully wonderful and versatile tuna salad. Excellent for hors d'oeuvres, it also makes a great sandwich or snack.
ingredient: 2 (5 ounce) cans water packed tuna, drained and flaked + 2 teaspoons mayonnaise + 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard + 1 tablespoon sweet pickle relish + 2 teaspoons lemon juice + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon curry powder + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + salt to taste

name: Marinated Barbequed Vegetables
summary: These tasty vegetables can be cooked on skewers or thrown straight on the barbecue. Serve them hot or at room temperature. As cold leftovers, they're great with crusty bread.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 5 servings
ingredient: 1 small eggplant, cut into 3/4 inch thick slices + 2 small red bell peppers, seeded and cut into wide strips + 3 zucchinis, sliced + 6 fresh mushrooms, stems removed + ¼ cup olive oil + ¼ cup lemon juice + ¼ cup coarsely chopped fresh basil + 2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced

name: Mimi's Giant Whole-Wheat Banana-Strawberry Muffins
summary: A healthier version of a favorite breakfast treat! Bananas and strawberries lend a natural sweetness to these delicious and moist muffins.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 35 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 giant muffins
ingredient: 2 eggs + ½ cup unsweetened applesauce + ¼ cup vegetable oil + ¾ cup packed brown sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 3 bananas, mashed + 2 cups whole wheat flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + 1 cup frozen sliced strawberries

name: Cucumber-Mango Salsa
summary: This is a salsa my friend from Trinidad taught me when I was in the navy. We serve this at all Super Bowl parties and picnics in our family! Delish!
process: prep: 30 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 4 cups
ingredient: 3 mangos - peeled, seeded and diced + 1 cucumber - peeled, seeded, and diced + 2 jalapeno peppers, seeded and finely chopped + 1 large onion, finely diced + 1 clove garlic, minced + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 1 tablespoon lime juice, or to taste + salt and pepper to taste

name: Sarah's Applesauce
summary: This applesauce is delicious! I make it for my younger brother all the time and he loves it - and he hates canned applesauce!
ingredient: 4 apples - peeled, cored and chopped + ¾ cup water + ¼ cup white sugar + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Refried Beans Without the Refry
summary: Refried beans are simple to make when cooked in a slow cooker. This recipe will yield flavorful, fat-free refried beans seasoned with garlic, jalapeno, and cumin.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 15 servings
ingredient: 1 onion, peeled and halved + 3 cups dry pinto beans, rinsed + ½ fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped + 2 tablespoons minced garlic + 5 teaspoons salt + 1<U+2009>¾ teaspoons fresh ground black pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon ground cumin, optional + 9 cups water

name: Jay's Signature Pizza Crust
summary: This recipe yields a crust that is soft and doughy on the inside and slightly crusty on the outside. Cover it with your favorite sauce and topping to make a delicious pizza.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 50 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 1 giant pizza crust
ingredient: 2<U+2009>¼ teaspoons active dry yeast + ½ teaspoon brown sugar + 1<U+2009>½ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1 teaspoon salt + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 3<U+2009><U+2153> cups all-purpose flour

name: B and L's Strawberry Smoothie
summary: You'll love this strawberry smoothie recipe. It's an icy-cold treat!
ingredient: 8 strawberries, hulled + ½ cup skim milk + ½ cup plain yogurt + 3 tablespoons white sugar + 2 teaspoons vanilla extract + 6 cubes ice, crushed

name: Jamie's Sweet and Easy Corn on the Cob
summary: My mother-in-law gave me this quick and easy recipe for the sweetest, tastiest corn cobs!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 6 ears corn on the cob, husks and silk removed

name: Microwave Corn on the Cob
summary: This is a no-nonsense recipe for corn on the cob. Perfect for when you run out of stove or grill space. I freeze the corn on the cob in plastic bags, and remove a single ear of frozen corn in the cold winter months to have the sweet taste of summer corn throughout the year!
ingredient: 1 ear corn, husked and cleaned

name: Quick and Easy Pancit
summary: Quick pancit recipe that's easy and delicious. This noodle dish will remind you of Island Fiestas!
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package dried rice noodles + 1 teaspoon vegetable oil + 1 onion, finely diced + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 2 cups diced cooked chicken breast meat + 1 small head cabbage, thinly sliced + 4 carrot, thinly sliced + ¼ cup soy sauce + 2 lemons - cut into wedges, for garnish

name: Angel Food Cake
summary: Homemade angel food cake is worth the work. It is moist, unlike the sweet Styrofoam-like cakes available in the grocery bakery. A tube pan with a removable bottom is highly recommended.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 1 10-inch cake
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups egg whites + 1 teaspoon cream of tartar + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon almond extract + 1<U+2009>¼ cups cake flour + 1<U+2009>¾ cups white sugar + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Air Fryer Oreos®
summary: Craving that carnival food? With just 3 ingredients and an air fryer, you can make fried Oreos® at home!
ingredient: ½ cup complete pancake mix + <U+2153> cup water + cooking spray + 9 chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®) + 1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar, or to taste

name: Indian Style Basmati Rice
summary: This savory Indian rice recipe is flavored with whole spices and fried onions. Soaking the basmati rice before cooking makes all the difference. Serve this Indian-style rice with your favorite Indian curry or dal (lentils). Make sure you warn people not to bite into the whole spices!
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups basmati rice + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 (2 inch) piece cinnamon stick + 2 pods green cardamom + 2 whole cloves + 1 tablespoon cumin seed + 1 small onion, thinly sliced + 2<U+2009>½ cups water + 1 teaspoon salt, or to taste

name: Brazilian Grilled Pineapple
summary: These grilled pineapple slices are a favorite at a Brazilian steakhouse in Dallas. Not sure if this is the exact recipe they use but it tastes very close. Great side for kabobs and steak.
ingredient: 1 cup brown sugar + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into 6 wedges

name: Simple Baked Beans
summary: This baked bean recipe uses canned beans instead of the dry type so it is quick and easy to prepare.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 (16 ounce) cans baked beans with pork + ¼ cup molasses + ¼ cup chopped onions + 4 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 tablespoon prepared mustard + 2 tablespoons ketchup + 2 slices bacon, chopped

name: Homemade Crispy Seasoned French Fries
summary: My family loves homemade fries and with 4 children the bag fries from the store just weren't enough and became too expensive. So I tried batter — after all, it makes chicken, shrimp, and onion rings crispy so why not potatoes! Now even my husband can't get enough of these French fries. They even stay crispy when you reheat them in the microwave.
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ pounds russet potatoes, peeled + 1 cup vegetable oil for frying + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon garlic salt + 1 teaspoon onion salt + 1 teaspoon paprika + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup water, or as needed

name: Microwave Corn-on-the-Cob in the Husk
summary: This is one of my favorite ways to fix corn on the cob, even when I have several to fix. Without the water from boiling, the corn stays nice and sweet. Hope this helps just one young cook.
ingredient: 1 ear fresh corn in the husk

name: Baked Beans from Scratch
summary: Navy beans, molasses, and maple syrup combine to make this classic dish at home.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 hrs,additional: 7 hrs 20 mins,total: 15 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 5 cups
ingredient: 1 cup dried navy beans + 4 cups water + ¼ cup ketchup + ¼ cup maple syrup + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 tablespoons molasses + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + ½ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon chili powder + 1 small onion, chopped

name: Mongolian Beef and Spring Onions
summary: This Mongolian beef recipe with green onions has a soy-based sauce for a Chinese-style beef dish. Best served over soft rice noodles or rice.
ingredient: 2 teaspoons vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic + ½ teaspoon grated fresh ginger root + <U+2154> cup dark brown sugar + ½ cup soy sauce + ½ cup water + 1 pound beef flank steak, sliced 1/4 inch thick on the diagonal + ¼ cup cornstarch + 1 cup vegetable oil for frying + 2 bunches green onions, cut in 2-inch lengths

name: Strawberry Lime Smoothie Pops
summary: Strawberry banana smoothie pops make an easy summertime frozen treat.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 -8 ice pops
ingredient: 1 cup Almond Breeze Vanilla almondmilk + 1 cup frozen strawberries + ½ cup vanilla Greek yogurt + 1 tablespoon honey or maple syrup + 1 medium banana + ½ lime, juiced

name: Mawmaw's Simple Fried Green Tomatoes
summary: My grandmother's fried green tomatoes were famous in our community. The recipe is so simple, but the results are delicious!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 4 firm green tomatoes, cut into 1/4-inch slices + 1 quart ice water, or as needed + 1 cup canola oil, or as needed + 2 cups self-rising cornmeal + 2 cups all-purpose flour + salt to taste

name: Heather's Cilantro, Black Bean, and Corn Salsa
summary: This black bean and corn salsa is a fun summer recipe that can be served on its own or with tortilla chips. It is also beautiful, so make sure you have a clear bowl to put it in.
ingredient: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed + 1 (15 ounce) can yellow corn, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can white corn, drained + 1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes, drained + 1 bunch finely chopped cilantro + 5 green onions, finely sliced + 1 small red onion, finely chopped + 1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + ¼ cup lime juice + 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced + 2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste

name: Easy Red Beans and Rice
summary: This is an easy and delicious take on a Louisiana classic that you can prepare and cook in 40 minutes! I use turkey kielbasa to cut down on the fat, but not the flavor. Season with hot pepper sauce if you like.
ingredient: 2 cups water + 1 cup uncooked rice + 1 (16 ounce) package turkey kielbasa, cut diagonally into 1/4 inch slices + 1 onion, chopped + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 1 clove chopped garlic + 2 (15 ounce) cans canned kidney beans, drained + 1 (16 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, chopped + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + salt to taste + ½ teaspoon pepper

name: Roast Potatoes
summary: Learn how long to bake a potato at 450°F with this simple and delicious recipe for rosemary-kissed roasted red potatoes.
ingredient: 2 pounds red potatoes, cut into quarters + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon dried rosemary, crushed

name: Savory Sweet Potato Fries
summary: Slightly sweet and very filling, these sweet potato fries are a favorite with our family!
ingredient: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into French fry-size pieces + 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed + 2 tablespoons minced fresh rosemary, or to taste + coarse sea salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste

name: Smoked Fish Dip
summary: This recipe for smoked fish dip is world class, puts most others to shame, and is served in several prominent restaurants on the gulf coast of Florida. We used smoked whitefish, well boned, but any other smoked fish should work. Serve with crackers, lemon or lime wedges, and capers.
ingredient: 2 cups flaked smoked whitefish + 2 tablespoons fat-free mayonnaise + 4 tablespoons fat-free sour cream + 1 pinch Old Bay (tm) Seasoning + 4 drops hot pepper sauce, or to taste + 3 drops Worcestershire sauce, or to taste + 3 drops liquid smoke flavoring (Optional) + cracked black pepper to taste

name: Cherry Angel Food Cake
summary: The traditional angel food cake with a new twist - cherries!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 10 inch tube pan
ingredient: 1 cup sifted cake flour + 1 cup egg whites + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon cream of tartar + 1<U+2009>¼ cups white sugar + ¾ teaspoon vanilla extract + ¼ teaspoon almond extract + <U+2153> cup maraschino cherries, drained and sliced

name: Air Fryer Baked Potatoes
summary: A baked potato in the air fryer comes out beautifully crusty on the outside and light and fluffy on the inside, just what a great baked potato should be! Serve them with your favorite toppings, like sour cream, butter, or chives.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 baked potatoes
ingredient: 2 large russet potatoes, scrubbed + 1 tablespoon peanut oil + ½ teaspoon coarse sea salt

name: Stir-Fried Mushrooms with Baby Corn
summary: Here is a Thai vegetable side dish with plenty of Chinese influences. Utilize whatever mushrooms are in season, such as straw, button, het kone or shiitake mushrooms.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons cooking oil + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 onion, diced + 8 baby corn ears, sliced + <U+2154> pound fresh mushrooms, sliced + 1 tablespoon fish sauce + 1 tablespoon light soy sauce + 1 tablespoon oyster sauce + 2 teaspoons cornstarch + 3 tablespoons water + 1 red chile pepper, sliced + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro

name: Grilled Corn Salad
summary: A yummy and easy side for hot summer days! Goes great with your grilled dishes or just to munch on. This recipe will last several days when covered in an airtight container and refrigerated.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 6 ears freshly shucked corn + 1 green pepper, diced + 2 Roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + ¼ cup diced red onion + ½ bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, or more to taste + 2 teaspoons olive oil, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Candied Lemon Peel
summary: This is a good way to use up lemon rind and it goes good with coffee or on cake. It really does taste like candy, and you can do this to ANY citrus fruit. If you use oranges you can add brandy, cloves or other spices the mixture. Chop it up and put it in cookies, or just eat it by itself.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 15 servings
ingredient: 3 lemons + 8 cups cold water, or as needed + 2 cups white sugar, or as needed

name: Fiesta Slow Cooker Shredded Chicken Tacos
summary: Quick, easy, and tasty!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 cup chicken broth + 3 tablespoons taco seasoning mix + 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts

name: Mango Salsa
summary: A very tasty mango salsa that is great served over fish. My favorite is any fish blackened with Cajun seasoning and then topped with this salsa. Also great for dipping chips.
ingredient: 1 mango - peeled, seeded, and chopped + ¼ cup finely chopped red bell pepper + 1 green onion, chopped + 1 fresh jalapeno chile pepper, finely chopped + 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro + 2 tablespoons lime juice + 1 tablespoon lemon juice

name: Mango, Corn, and Black Bean Salsa
summary: My neighbor introduced me to this cool dish that can stand alone as an easy side dish or tastes great with chicken made up as fajitas. This is a recipe that can be altered to use up other fruits you have on hand. I have used a mix of mangoes and peaches to make this, and it would probably taste great with pineapple or other tart fruits, but if you like mangoes as much as I do, you will want to let that flavor dominate. Optional to chill before serving.
ingredient: 3 large mangoes, diced + 1 (15 ounce) can sweet corn, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained + 2 limes, juiced + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste

name: Orange, Honey and Soy Chicken
summary: This is a lovely sweet-and-sticky meal without the guilt the family whole family will enjoy. If you are cooking with rice or another side that takes awhile to cook, prepare that first.
ingredient: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, diced + 2 oranges, juiced + ¼ cup soy sauce + ¼ cup honey + 1 tablespoon garlic paste + 1 tablespoon ginger paste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Meyer Lemon Avocado Toast
summary: I like to use this recipe when I have a ripe avocado that I don't want to waste. It is absolutely delicious and a wonderful source of fiber and fatty acids. Feel free to get creative with the ingredients! Substitute cilantro with mint or parsley, or chia seeds with sesame or poppy seeds.
ingredient: 2 slices whole grain bread + ½ avocado + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste + 1 teaspoon Meyer lemon juice, or to taste + ¼ teaspoon Meyer lemon zest + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 1 pinch fine sea salt + ¼ teaspoon chia seeds

name: Tomato Cucumber Kachumbar
summary: Kachumbar is an Indian-style salad that is served on top of curry. Fresh herbs and lemon add a tangy crunch that lightens even the most intense gravies.
ingredient: 1 cup halved grape tomatoes + 1 cup diced cucumber + ½ cup chopped green onions + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro + 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Yellow Rice with Vegetables
summary: Spanish yellow rice with fresh veggies that everyone loves.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon vegetable oil + 1 small onion, chopped + 1 carrot, diced + ½ cup chopped broccoli florets + ¼ cup diced red bell pepper + 1 clove garlic, minced + 3 cups vegetable broth + 1<U+2009>½ cups rice + 1 (1.41 ounce) package sazon seasoning with coriander and achiote (such as Goya®) + 1 dash adobo seasoning with pepper (such as Goya®)

name: Paleo Chicken Stew
summary: I made this recipe up when I started eating paleo. I have now found it to be a staple in our home!
ingredient: 2 teaspoons olive oil + 1 small red onion, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into cubes + 2 sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped + 1 cup fresh spinach, or to taste + 1 pinch crushed red pepper, or more to taste + 1 pinch paprika, or more to taste + sea salt to taste + ½ cup chicken broth, or more to taste

name: Brandied Cherry Clafouti
summary: A warm French custard with brandied cherries. Almost any fruit can be used in this recipe.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs 5 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 cups canned tart cherries, drained + ¼ cup brandy + <U+2154> cup white sugar, divided + cooking spray (such as Pam®) + 1 cup milk + <U+2154> cup sifted all-purpose flour + 3 large eggs + 1 tablespoon vanilla extract + 1 tablespoon lemon zest + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon allspice + 1 teaspoon confectioners' sugar, or as needed

name: Pearl Couscous with Lentils, Carrots, Spinach, and Corn
summary: This is a recipe that is great as a side or even as a meal. It's so hearty! It's great served warm or cold. I sometimes substitute chickpeas for the lentils, but be aware that they have a slightly stronger flavor. The white wine is used for flavor but can be left out if desired. Reduced-sodium chicken broth can be used. This recipe keeps well in the fridge and can be served warm or cold.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon sesame oil + 1 small onion, diced + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 cup canned lentils, drained and rinsed + 1 cup diced carrots + ¾ cup corn kernels + 2 tablespoons dry white wine + 2 tablespoons chicken broth + 2 cups chicken broth + ¼ cup dry white wine + 1 (10 ounce) box pearl (Israeli) couscous + 2 tablespoons chicken broth + 2 tablespoons dry white wine + 2 cups baby spinach leaves, stems removed + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons lemon juice, or to taste + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste

name: Jamie's Sweet and Easy Corn on the Cob
summary: My mother-in-law gave me this quick and easy recipe for the sweetest, tastiest corn cobs!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 6 ears corn on the cob, husks and silk removed

name: Perfect Summer Fruit Salad
summary: The perfect fruit salad for a backyard bbq or any occasion. There are never leftovers! This is one of my favorite fruit salad recipes, as I think the sauce really makes it. This salad is tastier the longer you can let it soak in its juices. I prefer 3 to 4 hours in the refrigerator before I serve it. Enjoy.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: <U+2154> cup fresh orange juice + <U+2153> cup fresh lemon juice + <U+2153> cup packed brown sugar + ½ teaspoon grated orange zest + ½ teaspoon grated lemon zest + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 cups cubed fresh pineapple + 2 cups strawberries, hulled and sliced + 3 kiwi fruit, peeled and sliced + 3 bananas, sliced + 2 oranges, peeled and sectioned + 1 cup seedless grapes + 2 cups blueberries

name: Slow Cooker Chicken Creole
summary: The stewed tomatoes and jalapeno pepper give this slow cooker recipe its Creole zing, along with seasoning and other veggies. This is an easy and tasty Creole chicken recipe. Just put all ingredients into the slow cooker and let it simmer all day. It's perfect over egg noodles. Add extra water and veggies to the leftovers to make a tasty afternoon soup.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 12 hrs,total: 12 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + salt and pepper to taste + Creole-style seasoning to taste + 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, with liquid + 1 stalk celery, diced + 1 green bell pepper, diced + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 onion, diced + 1 (4 ounce) can mushrooms, drained + 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped

name: Microwave Corn on the Cob
summary: This is a no-nonsense recipe for corn on the cob. Perfect for when you run out of stove or grill space. I freeze the corn on the cob in plastic bags, and remove a single ear of frozen corn in the cold winter months to have the sweet taste of summer corn throughout the year!
ingredient: 1 ear corn, husked and cleaned

name: Easy Broccoli Salad I
summary: A healthy, bright salad.
ingredient: 4 cups fresh broccoli florets + ¼ cup red onion, finely diced + 3 tablespoons raisins + 2 tablespoons dry roasted sunflower seeds + ¼ cup plain yogurt + 2 tablespoons orange juice + 1 tablespoon fat-free mayonnaise

name: Cabbage Fat-Burning Soup
summary: This tomato and cabbage soup was rumored, in days of old, to melt away those thighs.
ingredient: 5 carrots, chopped + 3 onions, chopped + 2 (16 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes, with liquid + 1 large head cabbage, chopped + 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix + 1 (15 ounce) can cut green beans, drained + 2 quarts tomato juice + 2 green bell peppers, diced + 10 stalks celery, chopped + 1 (14 ounce) can beef broth

name: Delicious and Easy Corn on the Cob
summary: I learned this recipe from a shopper in Stockbridge, Massachusetts, when I was young. I have used this for 40 years, and it has never failed to produce the most wonderful corn on the cob.
ingredient: ¼ teaspoon white sugar + 4 ears corn, husked and cleaned

name: Angel Food Cake
summary: Homemade angel food cake is worth the work. It is moist, unlike the sweet Styrofoam-like cakes available in the grocery bakery. A tube pan with a removable bottom is highly recommended.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 1 10-inch cake
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups egg whites + 1 teaspoon cream of tartar + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon almond extract + 1<U+2009>¼ cups cake flour + 1<U+2009>¾ cups white sugar + ¼ teaspoon salt

name: Air Fryer Oreos®
summary: Craving that carnival food? With just 3 ingredients and an air fryer, you can make fried Oreos® at home!
ingredient: ½ cup complete pancake mix + <U+2153> cup water + cooking spray + 9 chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®) + 1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar, or to taste

name: Brazilian Grilled Pineapple
summary: These grilled pineapple slices are a favorite at a Brazilian steakhouse in Dallas. Not sure if this is the exact recipe they use but it tastes very close. Great side for kabobs and steak.
ingredient: 1 cup brown sugar + 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon + 1 pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into 6 wedges

name: Slow Cooker Barbeque Chicken
summary: This BBQ chicken crockpot recipe is super easy to prepare. The chicken simmers for hours in the slow cooker and turns out a little spicy.
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce (such as Sweet Baby Ray's®) + ¼ cup distilled white vinegar + ¼ cup brown sugar + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + ½ teaspoon red pepper flakes

name: Microwave Corn-on-the-Cob in the Husk
summary: This is one of my favorite ways to fix corn on the cob, even when I have several to fix. Without the water from boiling, the corn stays nice and sweet. Hope this helps just one young cook.
ingredient: 1 ear fresh corn in the husk

name: The Best Fresh Tomato Salsa
summary: A fresh tomato salsa that goes great with your favorite chips. It gets even better as the flavors meld.
ingredient: 3 cups chopped tomatoes + 1 cup onion, diced + ½ cup chopped green bell pepper + ¼ cup minced fresh cilantro + 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice + 4 teaspoons chopped fresh jalapeno pepper (including seeds) + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon kosher salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Baked Beans from Scratch
summary: Navy beans, molasses, and maple syrup combine to make this classic dish at home.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 8 hrs,additional: 7 hrs 20 mins,total: 15 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 5 cups
ingredient: 1 cup dried navy beans + 4 cups water + ¼ cup ketchup + ¼ cup maple syrup + 2 tablespoons brown sugar + 2 tablespoons molasses + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + ½ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon chili powder + 1 small onion, chopped

name: Dairy-Free Creamy Broccoli Soup
summary: The satiny texture of this soup will make you think it's cream-based, but it's absolutely dairy-free and delicious! It's a perfect dish to use up leftover broccoli stalks that don't fit into other meals. It freezes well and makes a great winter warm-up snack or lunch! Can be served immediately, seasoned with black pepper, curry powder, or even grated cheese (for people who don't mind dairy) or can be frozen in individual portions and microwaved later.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 large yellow onion, coarsely chopped + 3 large cloves garlic, coarsely chopped + 3 broccoli stalks, coarsely chopped + 2 broccoli florets and stalks, coarsely chopped + 2 large potatoes, peeled and coarsely chopped + <U+2153> celery root, coarsely chopped + 4 cups low-sodium chicken stock

name: Strawberry Lime Smoothie Pops
summary: Strawberry banana smoothie pops make an easy summertime frozen treat.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 -8 ice pops
ingredient: 1 cup Almond Breeze Vanilla almondmilk + 1 cup frozen strawberries + ½ cup vanilla Greek yogurt + 1 tablespoon honey or maple syrup + 1 medium banana + ½ lime, juiced

name: Quinoa and Black Beans
summary: Very flavorful alternative to black beans and rice. Quinoa is a nutty grain from South America.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon vegetable oil + 1 onion, chopped + 3 cloves garlic, chopped + ¾ cup quinoa + 1<U+2009>½ cups vegetable broth + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 cup frozen corn kernels + 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained + ½ cup chopped fresh cilantro

name: Heather's Cilantro, Black Bean, and Corn Salsa
summary: This black bean and corn salsa is a fun summer recipe that can be served on its own or with tortilla chips. It is also beautiful, so make sure you have a clear bowl to put it in.
ingredient: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed + 1 (15 ounce) can yellow corn, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can white corn, drained + 1 (14.5 ounce) can Italian-style diced tomatoes, drained + 1 bunch finely chopped cilantro + 5 green onions, finely sliced + 1 small red onion, finely chopped + 1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + ¼ cup lime juice + 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced + 2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste

name: Spicy Chicken Breasts
summary: This is a great skinless, chicken breast recipe that can be served over salad greens or as an entree! If serving over salad greens, cut chicken into strips and top with your favorite salsa or dressing.
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons paprika + 2 tablespoons garlic powder + 1 tablespoon salt + 1 tablespoon onion powder + 1 tablespoon dried thyme + 1 tablespoon ground cayenne pepper + 1 tablespoon ground black pepper + 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

name: Smoked Fish Dip
summary: This recipe for smoked fish dip is world class, puts most others to shame, and is served in several prominent restaurants on the gulf coast of Florida. We used smoked whitefish, well boned, but any other smoked fish should work. Serve with crackers, lemon or lime wedges, and capers.
ingredient: 2 cups flaked smoked whitefish + 2 tablespoons fat-free mayonnaise + 4 tablespoons fat-free sour cream + 1 pinch Old Bay (tm) Seasoning + 4 drops hot pepper sauce, or to taste + 3 drops Worcestershire sauce, or to taste + 3 drops liquid smoke flavoring (Optional) + cracked black pepper to taste

name: Cherry Angel Food Cake
summary: The traditional angel food cake with a new twist - cherries!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 - 10 inch tube pan
ingredient: 1 cup sifted cake flour + 1 cup egg whites + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon cream of tartar + 1<U+2009>¼ cups white sugar + ¾ teaspoon vanilla extract + ¼ teaspoon almond extract + <U+2153> cup maraschino cherries, drained and sliced

name: Spicy Watermelon
summary: This Latino dish makes a refreshing summer snack with a surprising combination of flavors! Children love it.
ingredient: ¼ teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon ground coriander + ¼ teaspoon chili powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon cayenne pepper + 2 cups cubed seeded watermelon + ½ lime, juiced

name: Stir-Fried Mushrooms with Baby Corn
summary: Here is a Thai vegetable side dish with plenty of Chinese influences. Utilize whatever mushrooms are in season, such as straw, button, het kone or shiitake mushrooms.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons cooking oil + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 onion, diced + 8 baby corn ears, sliced + <U+2154> pound fresh mushrooms, sliced + 1 tablespoon fish sauce + 1 tablespoon light soy sauce + 1 tablespoon oyster sauce + 2 teaspoons cornstarch + 3 tablespoons water + 1 red chile pepper, sliced + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro

name: Grilled Corn Salad
summary: A yummy and easy side for hot summer days! Goes great with your grilled dishes or just to munch on. This recipe will last several days when covered in an airtight container and refrigerated.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 6 ears freshly shucked corn + 1 green pepper, diced + 2 Roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + ¼ cup diced red onion + ½ bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, or more to taste + 2 teaspoons olive oil, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Candied Lemon Peel
summary: This is a good way to use up lemon rind and it goes good with coffee or on cake. It really does taste like candy, and you can do this to ANY citrus fruit. If you use oranges you can add brandy, cloves or other spices the mixture. Chop it up and put it in cookies, or just eat it by itself.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 15 servings
ingredient: 3 lemons + 8 cups cold water, or as needed + 2 cups white sugar, or as needed

name: Fiesta Slow Cooker Shredded Chicken Tacos
summary: Quick, easy, and tasty!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 cup chicken broth + 3 tablespoons taco seasoning mix + 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts

name: Dry Onion Soup Mix
summary: An onion soup mix that works as a replacement for a packet of purchased onion soup mix.
ingredient: ¼ cup dried onion flakes + 2 tablespoons low-sodium beef bouillon granules + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon parsley flakes + <U+215B> teaspoon celery seed + <U+215B> teaspoon paprika + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Mango Salsa
summary: A very tasty mango salsa that is great served over fish. My favorite is any fish blackened with Cajun seasoning and then topped with this salsa. Also great for dipping chips.
ingredient: 1 mango - peeled, seeded, and chopped + ¼ cup finely chopped red bell pepper + 1 green onion, chopped + 1 fresh jalapeno chile pepper, finely chopped + 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro + 2 tablespoons lime juice + 1 tablespoon lemon juice

name: Beef and Barley Soup III
summary: This is what I consider the ultimate beef soup. Great on a frosty day. For beef stock, I use 2 1/2 quarts water and 6 teaspoons beef base. Also, use inexpensive red wine. No need for the good stuff here, and cheaper actually works better! Try with leftover pot roast.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped onion + 1 cup chopped celery + 1 cup chopped carrots + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 10 cups beef stock + ¾ cup barley + 1 bay leaf + 3 sprigs fresh thyme, chopped + ½ cup red wine + 2 cups cubed potatoes + 2 cups diced cooked beef + 1 teaspoon browning sauce (Optional) + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped cabbage + salt and pepper to taste

name: Bohemian Pork Roast
summary: When I lived in Chicago used to go to Cicero for a treat like this, served with steamed dumplings and mashed potatoes. Use the drippings to make an incredible gravy.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 3 pounds bone-in pork roast + 2 tablespoons dried marjoram + salt and pepper to taste + 3 tablespoons caraway seed

name: Fruited Curry Chicken Salad
summary: A healthy and tasty chicken salad with a fruity twist - great on a croissant or in a honey pita. The salad is best if eaten the day after preparation. This allows the ingredients time to mingle, giving a fuller flavor.
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cooked and diced + 1 stalk celery, chopped + ½ onion, chopped + 1 small apple - peeled, cored and chopped + <U+2153> cup golden raisins + <U+2153> cup seedless green grapes, halved + ½ cup chopped toasted pecans + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon curry powder + ¾ cup mayonnaise

name: Greek Chicken
summary: A very good light summer dish. I serve it with sliced tomatoes, feta cheese, and garlic bread.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: ½ cup olive oil + 3 cloves garlic, chopped + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano + 2 lemons, juiced + 1 (4 pound) chicken, cut into pieces

name: Mexican Beef Supreme
summary: My boyfriend is from Mexico and he whipped this up one night and it turned out great. Beef, onions, garlic and peppers cooked in a delicious salsa verde sauce. Serve with rice, beans and tortillas. You may also add some sour cream to the sauce to make it creamier or add it after as a garnish.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 onion, diced + 1 pound cubed beef stew meat + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons minced garlic + ½ lime, juiced + 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped + 3 green onions, chopped + ¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1 (7 ounce) can green salsa

name: Sparkling Grilled Ham
summary: A big slice of ham, with a fruity marinade of sparkling grape juice, orange juice and spices.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 5 servings
ingredient: 1 cup sparkling white grape juice + 1 cup orange juice + ½ cup brown sugar + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar + 2 teaspoons dry mustard + ¾ teaspoon ground ginger + ¼ teaspoon ground cloves + 1<U+2009>½ pounds slice of cooked ham

name: Spinach Cantaloupe Salad with Mint
summary: Spinach salad with cantaloupe, avocado, red peppers, and mint. Truly a refreshing summer delight! Serve with crusty French bread and a lovely buttery chardonnay.
ingredient: 4 cups fresh spinach leaves + 1 cup sliced cantaloupe + 1 cup sliced avocado + ½ cup diced red bell pepper + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint leaves + 1 tablespoon mint apple jelly + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons white wine vinegar + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 clove garlic, minced

name: Steamed Zucchini
summary: A quick and healthy way to make zucchini.
ingredient: 4 zucchini + 2 cloves garlic + 1 tablespoon olive oil

name: Veronica's Apple Pancakes
summary: This delicious recipe is perfect for our Sabbath morning breakfast. One recipe is never enough for my family. The pancakes are always moist and nutritious. I recommend these pancakes to be eaten with hot cinnamon syrup!
ingredient: ¼ cup butter, melted + 1 egg + 1 cup milk + 1 cup shredded tart apple + 1<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 1<U+2009>¼ teaspoons baking powder + ¼ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 tablespoon white sugar

name: Broiled Tilapia Parmesan
summary: Flavorful recipe for this farm raised fish that is easy and done in minutes! The fish is broiled with a creamy cheese coating for an impressive flavor and texture.
ingredient: ½ cup Parmesan cheese + ¼ cup butter, softened + 3 tablespoons mayonnaise + 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice + ¼ teaspoon dried basil + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon onion powder + <U+215B> teaspoon celery salt + 2 pounds tilapia fillets

name: Jamie's Sweet and Easy Corn on the Cob
summary: My mother-in-law gave me this quick and easy recipe for the sweetest, tastiest corn cobs!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 6 ears corn on the cob, husks and silk removed

name: Basic Mashed Potatoes
summary: If you love good, old fashioned mashed potatoes this is the perfect recipe. Simple and delicious.
ingredient: 2 pounds baking potatoes, peeled and quartered + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 cup milk + salt and pepper to taste

name: Gnocchi I
summary: This simple potato, flour, and egg recipe is one my family has used for generations.
ingredient: 2 potatoes + 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 egg

name: Simple Roasted Butternut Squash
summary: Butternut squash is so good on its own, that barely any seasoning is needed. This recipe is so simple and easy.
ingredient: 1 butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1-inch cubes + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 cloves garlic, minced + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Strawberry Spinach Salad
summary: This strawberry spinach salad is a great way to get kids to eat spinach! Someone brought this salad to a potluck dinner, and I had to have the recipe. Since then, I've made it many times and been asked for the recipe every time I bring it somewhere.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr 10 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 4
ingredient: ½ cup white sugar + ½ cup olive oil + ¼ cup distilled white vinegar + 2 tablespoons sesame seeds + 1 tablespoon poppy seeds + 1 tablespoon minced onion + ¼ teaspoon paprika + ¼ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 quart strawberries - cleaned, hulled and sliced + 10 ounces fresh spinach - rinsed, dried and torn into bite-size pieces + ¼ cup almonds, blanched and slivered

name: Homemade Chicken Soup
summary: Homemade chicken soup - but you don't have to be sick to deserve or enjoy it - you do, so do! Good for body and soul!
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) whole chicken + 4 carrots, halved + 4 stalks celery, halved + 1 large onion, halved + water to cover + salt and pepper to taste + 1 teaspoon chicken bouillon granules (Optional)

name: Adrienne's Cucumber Salad
summary: Cool, delicious cucumber salad. For a pretty salad, peel only half of each cucumber, leaving strips of skin on each. Don't make the vinegar solution first and then chop the cucumber because it's important that the vinegar solution be hot to ensure proper flavoring.
ingredient: 4 cucumbers, thinly sliced + 1 small white onion, thinly sliced + 1 cup white vinegar + ½ cup water + ¾ cup white sugar + 1 tablespoon dried dill, or to taste

name: Easy Roasted Broccoli
summary: Easy roasted broccoli. My favorite part is the roasted sliced stem pieces.
ingredient: 14 ounces broccoli + 1 tablespoon olive oil + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Quick and Easy Home Fries
summary: These home fries turn out crispy every time. They're great for breakfast or as a side dish. If you prefer crispy hash browns, use shredded potatoes (instead of cubed) and follow the recipe directions.
ingredient: 3 medium russet potatoes, cubed + 3 tablespoons butter or margarine + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Nina's Cucumber Salad
summary: The recipe for this easy salad came from my grandma, who made it in the summers with fresh dill and cucumbers from her garden.
ingredient: ½ cup reduced-fat sour cream (such as Daisy®) + 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill + 3 cucumbers, halved lengthwise and thinly sliced crosswise + ½ cup thinly sliced red onion + coarse salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Sarah's Applesauce
summary: This applesauce is delicious! I make it for my younger brother all the time and he loves it - and he hates canned applesauce!
ingredient: 4 apples - peeled, cored and chopped + ¾ cup water + ¼ cup white sugar + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: Garlic Shrimp Kabobs
summary: This is a quick and easy shrimp kabob recipe, perfect for beginners. Requires minimal ingredients, but is bursting with flavor. Serve over a bed of rice with fresh lemon wedges.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 pound frozen shrimp, thawed and peeled + ¼ cup olive oil + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 2 teaspoons lemon juice + ¼ teaspoon pepper + 1 pinch finely chopped parsley + metal skewers + cooking spray

name: Roasted Cauliflower Steaks
summary: This cauliflower steak recipe is a nice change from boiling, mashing, and ricing. Try these oven roasted cauliflower steaks seasoned with a simple lemon-garlic sauce. Serve with chimichurri or topped with roasted tomatoes, olives, and feta.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 cauliflower steaks
ingredient: 1 large head cauliflower, sliced lengthwise through the core into 4 steaks + ¼ cup olive oil + 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Easy Broccoli Salad I
summary: A healthy, bright salad.
ingredient: 4 cups fresh broccoli florets + ¼ cup red onion, finely diced + 3 tablespoons raisins + 2 tablespoons dry roasted sunflower seeds + ¼ cup plain yogurt + 2 tablespoons orange juice + 1 tablespoon fat-free mayonnaise

name: Roasted Cabbage
summary: Delicious, roasted cabbage! I apologize for not having a measurement for you! I do not typically measure. If anybody tries this and would like to give tips on measurements, please feel free!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil + ½ head green cabbage, cut into 4 wedges + 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste + 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 2 lemons, halved

name: Delicious and Easy Corn on the Cob
summary: I learned this recipe from a shopper in Stockbridge, Massachusetts, when I was young. I have used this for 40 years, and it has never failed to produce the most wonderful corn on the cob.
ingredient: ¼ teaspoon white sugar + 4 ears corn, husked and cleaned

name: Chef John's Perfect Mashed Potatoes
summary: This mashed potatoes recipe will give you the proper technique to make perfect mashed potatoes every time — light, fluffy, and lump-free.
ingredient: 3 large russet potatoes, peeled and cut in half lengthwise + ½ cup whole milk + ¼ cup butter + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Roasted Vegetables
summary: A casserole dish of seasonal vegetables that is so easy to prepare. It can be made a day ahead - just reheat before serving. Lemon juice can be substituted for balsamic vinegar, and you can use baking potatoes if you don't have any Yukon Golds on hand.
ingredient: 1 small butternut squash, cubed + 2 red bell peppers, seeded and diced + 1 sweet potato, peeled and cubed + 3 Yukon Gold potatoes, cubed + 1 red onion, quartered + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary + ¼ cup olive oil + 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar + salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Slow Cooker Baked Potatoes
summary: These crockpot baked potatoes are a super-easy way to bake potatoes without heating the kitchen.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 4 hrs 30 mins,total: 4 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 potatoes
ingredient: 4 baking potatoes, well scrubbed + 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil + kosher salt to taste + 4 sheets aluminum foil

name: Traditional Gyro Meat
summary: This delicious gyro meat is the closest I've come to emulating my favorite Mediterranean restaurant's recipe. The Greek/Lebanese-style meatloaf is sliced and served with pita bread, tzatziki, and tomatoes. If you prefer, substitute pork or chicken for the ground lamb and beef. The preparation time seems long, but most of it is resting time, so you can be doing other things!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 10,Yield: 1 7x4-inch loaf
ingredient: ½ onion, cut into chunks + 1 pound ground lamb + 1 pound ground beef + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + 1 teaspoon dried marjoram + 1 teaspoon ground dried rosemary + 1 teaspoon ground dried thyme + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon sea salt

name: Spinach and Strawberry Salad
summary: My family loves this all year round if we can find strawberries. Even the grandchildren love this salad. Quick and easy.
ingredient: 2 bunches spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces + 4 cups sliced strawberries + ½ cup vegetable oil + ¼ cup white wine vinegar + ½ cup white sugar + ¼ teaspoon paprika + 2 tablespoons sesame seeds + 1 tablespoon poppy seeds

name: Fresh Sweet Corn Fritters
summary: Unbelievably light, these fritters are best with fresh sweet corn. Great for breakfast and with ham or ribs. Serve with maple syrup. Easy to make too! My husband loves these and anticipates corn season.
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + 3 ears fresh corn, kernels cut from cob + 2 eggs, separated + ½ cup heavy whipping cream + salt and freshly ground pepper to taste + 1 quart vegetable oil for frying, or as needed + 2 tablespoons cane syrup, or as desired (Optional)

name: Asian Coconut Rice
summary: This coconut rice is perfect! I tried many different ways to duplicate my favorite restaurant's coconut rice after they went out of business. Garnish with toasted coconut and chopped cilantro if you like.
ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk + 1<U+2009>¼ cups water + 1 teaspoon sugar + 1 pinch salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups uncooked jasmine rice

name: Oven-Baked Potato Slices
summary: I created this recipe by accident. After already starting dinner one night I realized I didn't have enough potatoes on hand to make mashed, so I improvised and came up with these baked potato slices. It's quick and easy and they are delicious. Just line your cookie sheet with nonstick foil and clean up is a snap! Enjoy!
ingredient: 4 medium baking potatoes, sliced 1/8-inch thick + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon celery seed + <U+215B> teaspoon paprika + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 1 dash salt + 4 tablespoons olive oil, or more as needed

name: McDonald's® Fries
summary: McDonald's fries are the best. Just how you love them.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 55 mins,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 8 potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch thick fries + ¼ cup white sugar + 2 tablespoons corn syrup + 1 quart canola oil, or as needed + sea salt to taste

name: Southern Fried Chicken Livers
summary: Mom made us fried chicken livers because they were cheap, and now the convenience stores sell them in the South! Use a fry screen — these things can pop and will burn you! Serve with pepper gravy or a packet of chicken gravy.
ingredient: 1 pound chicken livers + 1 egg + ½ cup milk + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + salt and pepper to taste + 1 quart vegetable oil for frying

name: Greek Chicken Pasta
summary: This pasta dish incorporates some of the flavors of Greece. It makes a wonderfully complete and satisfying meal. For extra flavor, toss in a few kalamata olives. Use whatever pasta you have or prefer.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package linguine pasta + ½ cup chopped red onion + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 cloves garlic, crushed + 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cut into bite-size pieces + 1 (14 ounce) can marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped + 1 large tomato, chopped + ½ cup crumbled feta cheese + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 2 teaspoons dried oregano + salt and pepper to taste + 2 lemons, wedged, for garnish

name: Greek Salad I
summary: This is an incredibly good Greek salad recipe, nice and tangy and even better in the summer when you use fresh vegetables!
ingredient: 1 head romaine lettuce- rinsed, dried and chopped + 1 red onion, thinly sliced + 1 (6 ounce) can pitted black olives + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 1 red bell pepper, chopped + 2 large tomatoes, chopped + 1 cucumber, sliced + 1 cup crumbled feta cheese + 6 tablespoons olive oil + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1 lemon, juiced + ground black pepper to taste

name: Grilled Octopus
summary: In this grilled octopus recipe, tenderized octopus is char-grilled and drizzled with extra-virgin olive oil, a squeeze of fresh lemon, and a sprinkling of fresh parsley. Simple, yet deliciously satisfying!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 6
ingredient: 2 tablespoons kosher salt + 1 tablespoon black peppercorns + 1 wine cork + 3<U+2009>½ pounds octopus, head and beak removed + 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil + ½ medium lemon + ½ tablespoon minced fresh parsley + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Pasta Fagioli
summary: A traditional Italian soup. Serve with a crisp salad and a hot loaf of garlic bread and you have a meal! Serve with grated Parmesan cheese on top.
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 stalks celery, chopped + 1 onion, chopped + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 2 teaspoons dried parsley + 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning + ¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes + salt to taste + 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth + 2 medium tomatoes, peeled and chopped + 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce + ½ cup uncooked spinach pasta + 1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, with liquid

name: Real Hummus
summary: This hummus is a family recipe passed down from many generations. Eat with warm pita bread.
ingredient: 2 cloves garlic, divided + 1 (19 ounce) can garbanzo beans, half the liquid reserved + 4 tablespoons lemon juice + 2 tablespoons tahini + 1 teaspoon salt + black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons olive oil

name: Greek Lentil Soup (Fakes)
summary: Fakes (pronounced 'Fah-kehs') is a staple in the Greek kitchen, and an especially filling meal. It is traditionally served with a drizzle of olive oil and lots of vinegar. Though the vinegar is of course optional, try it. It lifts the lentils and adds another dimension of flavor!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 8 ounces brown lentils + ¼ cup olive oil + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1 medium onion, minced + 1 large carrot, chopped + 1 quart water + 1 pinch dried oregano + 1 pinch crushed dried rosemary + 2 bay leaves + 1 tablespoon tomato paste + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 teaspoon olive oil, or to taste + 1 teaspoon red wine vinegar, or to taste (Optional)

name: Sugo di Pomodoro (Authentic Italian Tomato Sauce)
summary: This is a basic recipe for authentic Italian tomato sauce flavored with extra-virgin olive oil, garlic and basil. Toss with your favorite pasta or use for pizza, gnocchi and more.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil + 1 onion, chopped + 4 cloves garlic, halved + 2 (14 ounce) cans passata (crushed tomatoes) + ¼ cup fresh basil, torn in half + salt to taste

name: Cavatelli and Broccoli
summary: This is quick meal to make. Serve with garlic bread.
ingredient: 3 heads fresh broccoli, cut into florets + ½ cup olive oil + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1<U+2009>½ pounds cavatelli pasta + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese

name: Baked Falafel
summary: An easy, yummy way to make falafel. Serve with pita bread and your favorite tzatziki.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 4 patties
ingredient: ¼ cup chopped onion + 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon ground coriander + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon baking soda + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + 1 egg, beaten + 2 teaspoons olive oil

name: Flounder Mediterranean
summary: Flounder baked with fresh tomatoes, kalamata olives, capers, onion, and white wine. Serve with white rice and a green vegetable.
ingredient: 5 roma (plum) tomatoes + 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil + ½ Spanish onion, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, chopped + 1 pinch Italian seasoning + 24 kalamata olives, pitted and chopped + ¼ cup white wine + ¼ cup capers + 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice + 6 leaves fresh basil, chopped + 3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese + 1 pound flounder fillets + 6 leaves fresh basil, torn

name: Good for You Greek Salad
summary: A yummy and low-fat Greek salad recipe. You can use two green onions instead of the small red onion, if you wish.
ingredient: 3 large ripe tomatoes, chopped + 2 cucumbers, peeled and chopped + 1 small red onion, chopped + ¼ cup olive oil + 4 teaspoons lemon juice + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons dried oregano + salt and pepper to taste + 1 cup crumbled feta cheese + 6 black Greek olives, pitted and sliced

name: Grilled Spatchcocked Greek Chicken
summary: Speed up cook time on a whole chicken by spatchcocking it. It is simple to do and only requires a sharp pair of kitchen shears and 5 minutes of your time. Grilling over indirect heat keeps the bird moist.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 10 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 cup extra virgin olive oil + ¼ cup lemon juice + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 2 teaspoons minced fresh rosemary + 1 teaspoon dried tarragon + 1 (4.5 pound) whole chicken, spatchcocked + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Real Hummus
summary: This hummus is a family recipe passed down from many generations. Eat with warm pita bread.
ingredient: 2 cloves garlic, divided + 1 (19 ounce) can garbanzo beans, half the liquid reserved + 4 tablespoons lemon juice + 2 tablespoons tahini + 1 teaspoon salt + black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons olive oil

name: Chicken Souvlaki Salad
summary: This is a great Greek inspired salad with chicken souvlaki, romaine, bell pepper, cucumber, and tomatoes served with tzatziki dressing. Sprinkle with feta cheese if desired.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 tablespoon Greek seasoning + 1 lemon, juiced + 2 cloves garlic, finely grated or minced + 1 pound boneless chicken breasts, quartered lengthwise + 6 tablespoons tzatziki sauce + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice + 1 pinch salt + 1 head romaine, trimmed, washed and torn into bite-sized pieces + ½ cup thinly sliced red bell pepper + ½ English cucumber, sliced + 8 ounces cherry tomatoes, halved

name: Greek Tzatziki
summary: This cool Greek dip only gets better with time. Serve with pita bread, in gyros, on lamb or with whatever you like!
process: prep: 20 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 40,Yield: 5 cups
ingredient: 1 (32 ounce) container plain low-fat yogurt + ½ English cucumber with peel, grated + 1 clove garlic, pressed + 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice + 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil + 2 teaspoons grated lemon zest + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh dill + 1 tablespoon salt, or to taste + 1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste

name: Mediterranean Chicken
summary: Sauteed chicken simmered in a sauce of tomatoes, olives, white wine, garlic, and herbs. This recipe is from The WEBB Cooks, articles and recipes by Robyn Webb, courtesy of the American Diabetes Association. Preparation time: 20 minutes.
ingredient: 2 teaspoons olive oil + 2 tablespoons white wine + 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 3 cloves garlic, minced + ½ cup diced onion + 3 cups tomatoes, chopped + ½ cup white wine + 2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil + ½ cup kalamata olives + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + salt and pepper to taste

name: Grilled Octopus
summary: In this grilled octopus recipe, tenderized octopus is char-grilled and drizzled with extra-virgin olive oil, a squeeze of fresh lemon, and a sprinkling of fresh parsley. Simple, yet deliciously satisfying!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 6
ingredient: 2 tablespoons kosher salt + 1 tablespoon black peppercorns + 1 wine cork + 3<U+2009>½ pounds octopus, head and beak removed + 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil + ½ medium lemon + ½ tablespoon minced fresh parsley + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Greek Salad I
summary: This is an incredibly good Greek salad recipe, nice and tangy and even better in the summer when you use fresh vegetables!
ingredient: 1 head romaine lettuce- rinsed, dried and chopped + 1 red onion, thinly sliced + 1 (6 ounce) can pitted black olives + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 1 red bell pepper, chopped + 2 large tomatoes, chopped + 1 cucumber, sliced + 1 cup crumbled feta cheese + 6 tablespoons olive oil + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1 lemon, juiced + ground black pepper to taste

name: Mediterranean Orzo Salad
summary: This light and refreshing cold pasta salad is loaded with the flavors of the Mediterranean, and pairs well with grilled proteins, such as fish, pork, chicken or steak. If you make this in advance, reserve a bit of the dressing to add right before serving, as the pasta has a tendency to soak up the dressing as it sits over time.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: ½ (16 ounce) package uncooked orzo pasta + ½ pint cherry tomatoes, halved + ½ cup diced red onion + 1 cup diced cucumber + 1 cup pitted Mediterranean olives, cut in half + 1 cup finely diced Asiago cheese + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons minced fresh garlic + ½ cup extra-virgin olive oil + ½ cup red wine vinegar + ½ lemon, juiced + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ cup chopped fresh basil + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley

name: Greek Style Potatoes
summary: Greek Style Potatoes is a simple recipe, and the closest I can get to the real thing. The best is that it can be adjusted to your taste as you bake it. I sometimes add a little more lemon. The potatoes are moist, and great with green beans and baked chicken with a little salsa and feta on top.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: <U+2153> cup olive oil + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped + ¼ cup fresh lemon juice + 1 teaspoon dried thyme + 1 teaspoon dried rosemary + 2 cubes chicken bouillon + ground black pepper to taste + 6 potatoes, peeled and quartered

name: Avocado and Tuna Tapas
summary: Living in Spain I have come across a literal plethora of tapas. This tuna stuffed avocado is a light, healthy dish that goes best with crisp white wines and crunchy bread. This recipe is great for experimenting with a variety of different vegetables, spices, and kinds of vinegar.
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) can solid white tuna packed in water, drained + 1 tablespoon mayonnaise + 3 green onions, thinly sliced, plus additional for garnish + ½ red bell pepper, chopped + 1 dash balsamic vinegar + black pepper to taste + 1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste + 2 ripe avocados, halved and pitted

name: Briam (Greek Baked Zucchini and Potatoes)
summary: Briam is a traditional Greek roasted vegetable dish with potatoes, zucchini, tomatoes, and red onions with lots of olive oil. It is a typical example of Greek cuisine where a few simple ingredients are turned into an utterly delicious dish with little effort. It can be served as a main course. With olive oil as the only source of fat it is a quintessential example of the Mediterranean diet, and it is vegan to boot. If preferred, serve with a hearty chunk of feta on the side.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced + 4 large zucchini, thinly sliced + 4 small red onions, thinly sliced + 6 ripe tomatoes, pureed + ½ cup olive oil + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley (Optional) + sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Greek Island Chicken Shish Kebabs
summary: This is a nice change from the ordinary grilled chicken. This is excellent served with pita bread, a garlicky tzatziki, and a Greek salad. Lamb can be substituted for the chicken, and many variations on vegetables can be used.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 skewers
ingredient: ¼ cup olive oil + ¼ cup lemon juice + ¼ cup white vinegar + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon dried thyme + ¼ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces + 6 wooden skewers + 2 large green or red bell peppers, cut into 1-inch pieces + 1 large onion, quartered and separated into pieces + 12 cherry tomatoes + 12 fresh mushrooms

name: Greek Pasta with Tomatoes and White Beans
summary: An easy, quick, and tasty recipe. The flavors are wonderfully different as they are combined and meld together.
ingredient: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans Italian-style diced tomatoes + 1 (19 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed + 10 ounces fresh spinach, washed and chopped + 8 ounces penne pasta + ½ cup crumbled feta cheese

name: Grilled Sweet Potato Wedges
summary: Sweet potatoes on the grill have a smoky, caramelized flavor you can't achieve in the oven. These are mildly spicy, but adjust the cayenne to suit your taste. These are excellent served with grilled pork or fish.
ingredient: 2 medium sweet potatoes + ¼ cup olive oil, divided + ½ teaspoon smoked paprika + ½ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground cinnamon + <U+215B> teaspoon cayenne pepper

name: Mediterranean Chicken Sheet Pan Dinner
summary: Bold flavors and colors combine on one sheet pan for a simple yet impressive dinner. Bonus is the minimal cleanup!
ingredient: ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil + lemon, juiced + 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar + 1 teaspoon dried tarragon + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1 teaspoon paprika + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon black pepper + 4 chicken thighs with skin + 1 small red onion, sliced into petals + 8 mini bell peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded + 1 pound baby potatoes, halved + 1 lemon, sliced + ¼ cup crumbled feta cheese + ¼ cup fresh parsley, chopped + 8 pitted kalamata olives

name: Shrimp in Foil
summary: An easy recipe for shrimp in foil for the grill. Shrimp are quickly marinated in olive oil and parsley and then barbecued in a foil pouch.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 10 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 8 tablespoons olive oil + 1 cup chopped fresh parsley + 2 cloves garlic, minced + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste + 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined + 1 lemon, juiced + ½ lemon, sliced into wedges

name: Grilled Lamb Loin Chops
summary: Don't let their small size fool you, these chops are packed with maximum flavor! Try and find loin chops that are at least 1-inch thick for best results. These are best served medium to medium-rare, but add a few extra minutes per side if you prefer them a little more done.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr 5 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 2 tablespoons herbes de Provence + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons olive oil + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 2 teaspoons lemon juice + 8 (5 ounce) lamb loin chops + 1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Black Bean Hummus
summary: This is the absolute best hummus I have ever had. It goes great with some toasted pita bread. Add more lemon juice if this hummus tastes like it needs a little extra kick.
ingredient: 1 clove garlic + 1 (15 ounce) can black beans; drain and reserve liquid + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons tahini + ¾ teaspoon ground cumin + ½ teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ¼ teaspoon paprika + 10 Greek olives

name: Spinach and Feta Pita Bake
summary: This is great as a party appetizer or a full meal. Tasty, full of flavor and good for you. The crunchy crust is what I really like! You can play with the veggie toppings and cheeses for a great meal that is fast and delicious! Our favorite quick meal!
ingredient: 1 (6 ounce) tub sun-dried tomato pesto + 6 (6 inch) whole wheat pita breads + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped + 1 bunch spinach, rinsed and chopped + 4 fresh mushrooms, sliced + ½ cup crumbled feta cheese + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + 3 tablespoons olive oil + ground black pepper to taste

name: Insalata Caprese II
summary: Because this salad is so simple, fresh, top-quality tomatoes and mozzarella are important.
ingredient: 4 large ripe tomatoes, sliced 1/4 inch thick + 1 pound fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced 1/4 inch thick + <U+2153> cup fresh basil leaves + 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil + fine sea salt to taste + freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Mediterranean Kale
summary: Delicious.
ingredient: 12 cups chopped kale + 2 tablespoons lemon juice + 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1 teaspoon soy sauce + salt to taste + ground black pepper to taste

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
summary: An easy to make light salad that can be served with or without chicken for vegetarians.
ingredient: 2 cups water + 2 cubes chicken bouillon + 1 clove garlic, smashed + 1 cup uncooked quinoa + 2 large cooked chicken breasts - cut into bite size pieces + 1 large red onion, diced + 1 large green bell pepper, diced + ½ cup chopped kalamata olives + ½ cup crumbled feta cheese + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + ¼ cup chopped fresh chives + ½ teaspoon salt + <U+2154> cup fresh lemon juice + 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar + ¼ cup olive oil

name: Mediterranean Rice Salad with Vegetables
summary: This colorful Mediterranean rice salad is a great summertime dish. I used fresh zucchini, carrots, and bell peppers, but you can add any vegetable you like. Replace rice with couscous, farro, or barley, if you prefer.
ingredient: 4 cups water + 2 cups uncooked white rice + 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided + 1 teaspoon herb salt + 1 tablespoon chopped capers + 1 sprig fresh parsley, chopped + ½ lemon, zested + 3 zucchini, peeled and grated + 2 carrots, peeled and grated + ½ yellow bell pepper, cut into cubes + ½ red bell pepper, cut into cubes + 1 lemon, juiced + salt to taste

name: Lemon Rosemary Salmon
summary: This is the perfect romantic dinner for two when served with an Oregon Pinot Noir, crusty bread, wild rice, and salad.
ingredient: 1 lemon, thinly sliced + 4 sprigs fresh rosemary + 2 salmon fillets, bones and skin removed + coarse salt to taste + 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed

name: Chicken Breasts with Herb Basting Sauce
summary: Baked bone-in chicken breasts with a flavorsome garlic and herb basting sauce. Can also be made with skinless, boneless chicken.
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil + 1 tablespoon minced onion + 1 clove crushed garlic + 1 teaspoon dried thyme + ½ teaspoon dried rosemary, crushed + ¼ teaspoon ground sage + ¼ teaspoon dried marjoram + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon hot pepper sauce + 4 bone-in chicken breast halves, with skin + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons chopped fresh parsley

name: Insalata di Finocchi e Avocado (Fennel and Avocado Salad)
summary: In this salad, soft avocado goes perfectly with crispy fennel, the sweetness of one complementing the freshness of the other. Adding a dash of nutmeg makes this fragrant blend of flavors even more interesting. An impromptu salad, but one of my favorites.
ingredient: 3 bulbs fennel, thinly sliced + 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and cubed + 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste + 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg + salt to taste

name: Grilled Lemon Herb Pork Chops
summary: These are SO SIMPLE, yet so good - they taste just like steak! The chops can also be broiled in the oven.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 2 hrs,total: 2 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: ¼ cup lemon juice + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon salt + ¼ teaspoon dried oregano + ¼ teaspoon pepper + 6 (4 ounce) boneless pork loin chops

name: Chakchouka (Shakshouka)
summary: Chakchouka (also called shakshouka) is a Tunisian dish of tomatoes, onions, pepper, spices, and eggs. It's usually eaten for breakfast or lunch, but I think it's tasty anytime. And it's easy to make. It is similar to the Turkish dish 'Menemen' and to the Latin American breakfast dish 'Huevos Rancheros.'
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups chopped onion + 1 cup thinly sliced bell peppers, any color + 2 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste + 2<U+2009>½ cups chopped tomatoes + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + 1 teaspoon paprika + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 hot chile pepper, seeded and finely chopped, or to taste + 4 eggs

name: Ethiopian Cabbage Dish
summary: My Ethiopian friend brought this dish to a potluck and I've been making it ever since. It is healthy and delicious. Do not add liquid. The cabbage and potatoes release enough moisture on their own.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 40 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 5 servings
ingredient: ½ cup olive oil + 4 carrots, thinly sliced + 1 onion, thinly sliced + 1 teaspoon sea salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon ground turmeric + ½ head cabbage, shredded + 5 potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes

name: Jamaican Curried Goat
summary: He likes it hot, I like it good. We compromise on jalapeno peppers.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr 44 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs 59 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds goat stew meat, cut into 1-inch cubes + 2 fresh hot chile peppers, seeded and chopped + 2 tablespoons curry powder + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil + 1 onion, chopped + 1 rib celery, chopped + 2<U+2009>½ cups vegetable broth + 1 bay leaf + 3 potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch chunks, or more as desired

name: Lemony Steamed Fish
summary: Mild flavored, flaky fish fillets. Any number of different types of fish will work, and you can increase the recipe easily. Try halibut, cod, salmon, red snapper, trout, etc. Serve with a white and wild rice blend.
ingredient: 6 (6 ounce) halibut fillets + 1 tablespoon dried dill weed + 1 tablespoon onion powder + 2 teaspoons dried parsley + ¼ teaspoon paprika + 1 pinch seasoned salt, or more to taste + 1 pinch lemon pepper + 1 pinch garlic powder + 2 tablespoons lemon juice

name: Simple Country Ribs
summary: Extra tender, extra flavorful ribs, bursting with barbeque flavor.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ pounds pork spareribs + 2 (18 ounce) bottles barbeque sauce + 1 onion, quartered + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Guacamole
summary: You can make this avocado salad smooth or chunky depending on your tastes.
ingredient: 3 avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed + 1 lime, juiced + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup diced onion + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 pinch ground cayenne pepper (Optional)

name: Slow Cooker Root Beer Pulled Pork
summary: This simple slow cooker pulled pork recipe is big hit with my family of picky eaters. For a spicy kick, mix 1 part Frank's® RedHot® Buffalo sauce and 1 part of your favorite mustard-based BBQ sauce. You can use a pork loin instead of pork shoulder, if desired. Combine with your favorite BBQ sauce and enjoy.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 1 (4 pound) pork shoulder roast + 2 tablespoons coarse kosher salt, or to taste + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle root beer + 1 (4 fluid ounce) bottle liquid smoke flavoring, or to taste + 4 cloves garlic

name: Slow Cooker Chicken Creole
summary: The stewed tomatoes and jalapeno pepper give this slow cooker recipe its Creole zing, along with seasoning and other veggies. This is an easy and tasty Creole chicken recipe. Just put all ingredients into the slow cooker and let it simmer all day. It's perfect over egg noodles. Add extra water and veggies to the leftovers to make a tasty afternoon soup.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 12 hrs,total: 12 hrs 10 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + salt and pepper to taste + Creole-style seasoning to taste + 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, with liquid + 1 stalk celery, diced + 1 green bell pepper, diced + 3 cloves garlic, minced + 1 onion, diced + 1 (4 ounce) can mushrooms, drained + 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped

name: Easy Guacamole
summary: Simply a quick recipe for tasty guacamole! Great with tortilla chips or as a topping for Mexican foods!
ingredient: 2 avocados + 1 small onion, finely chopped + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 ripe tomato, chopped + 1 lime, juiced + salt and pepper to taste

name: Homemade Chicken Soup
summary: Homemade chicken soup - but you don't have to be sick to deserve or enjoy it - you do, so do! Good for body and soul!
ingredient: 1 (3 pound) whole chicken + 4 carrots, halved + 4 stalks celery, halved + 1 large onion, halved + water to cover + salt and pepper to taste + 1 teaspoon chicken bouillon granules (Optional)

name: Marie's Easy Slow Cooker Pot Roast
summary: Moist and juicy pot roast done in a slow cooker with carrots, onion and potatoes.
process: prep: 40 mins,cook: 9 hrs,total: 9 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 6 to 8 servings
ingredient: 4 pounds chuck roast + salt and pepper to taste + 1 packet dry onion soup mix + 1 cup water + 3 carrots, chopped + 1 onion, chopped + 3 potatoes, peeled and cubed + 1 stalk celery, chopped

name: Baked Chicken Wings
summary: Easy, crispy, and delicious. I normally serve with a side of rice, chicken gravy, and a vegetable or salad.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 10 wings
