ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil + 3 cloves garlic, pressed + 2 teaspoons chili powder + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 10 chicken wings

name: Grandma's Famous Salmon Cakes
summary: Wondering how to make salmon cakes? This is a recipe for my grandmother's famous salmon cakes. It's a family recipe that has been passed down through generations. Serve them with macaroni and cheese or any other type of side dish.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 30 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 8 salmon cakes
ingredient: 1 (14.75 ounce) can salmon, drained and flaked + 2 large eggs, beaten + 1 small onion, diced + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 3 tablespoons vegetable oil

name: Easy Roasted Broccoli
summary: Easy roasted broccoli. My favorite part is the roasted sliced stem pieces.
ingredient: 14 ounces broccoli + 1 tablespoon olive oil + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Sauteed Green Beans
summary: This recipe is a quick and easy way to sautee fresh green beans. It can easily be jazzed up with some onions, fresh garlic, or mushrooms - let your imagination run wild! This recipe also is very good for fresh asparagus.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons olive oil + ¾ pound fresh green beans, trimmed + ½ teaspoon onion salt + ½ teaspoon garlic salt + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + freshly ground pepper to taste

name: Greek Lemon Chicken and Potatoes
summary: Greek chicken and potatoes is a classic. I don't have the energy or courage to cater for a living but, if I did, this lemony dish would be one of my go-to entrees, and not just for big, fat weddings. It's a proven crowd-pleaser, simple to make, and easy on the wallet.
ingredient: 4 pounds skin-on, bone-in chicken thighs + 3 russet potatoes, peeled and quartered + ½ cup fresh lemon juice + ½ cup olive oil + 6 cloves garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon dried oregano + 1 tablespoon kosher salt + 1 teaspoon dried rosemary + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 1 cup chicken broth, divided + 1 teaspoon chopped fresh oregano, or to taste

name: Slow Cooker Baby Back Ribs
summary: These baby back ribs cooked in a crockpot are the best I've had, short of the actual grilling method of course! This is a very simple recipe that I came up with a few years ago. It's not rocket science, just ribs cooked in the slow cooker and finished with barbeque sauce in the oven. This is what I do when I want ribs during the week and have to work all day. I'm eating them within 30 minutes of getting home, and they turn out perfect every time!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 4 hrs 10 mins,total: 4 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 6
ingredient: 3 pounds baby back ribs, trimmed + salt and ground black pepper, to taste + ½ onion, sliced + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce

name: Roasted Cauliflower Steaks
summary: This cauliflower steak recipe is a nice change from boiling, mashing, and ricing. Try these oven roasted cauliflower steaks seasoned with a simple lemon-garlic sauce. Serve with chimichurri or topped with roasted tomatoes, olives, and feta.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 30 mins,total: 40 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 cauliflower steaks
ingredient: 1 large head cauliflower, sliced lengthwise through the core into 4 steaks + ¼ cup olive oil + 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste

name: Grilled Veggie Skewers
summary: Veggie kabobs are a yummy way to eat grilled vegetables.
ingredient: 1 fresh pineapple, cut into chunks + 2 medium zucchinis, cut into 1-inch slices + 2 medium yellow squash, cut into 1-inch slices + ½ pound whole fresh mushrooms + 1 medium red onion, cut into chunks + 12 cherry tomatoes + 1 medium red bell pepper, cut into chunks + 8 bamboo skewers, soaked in water for 20 minutes + <U+2153> cup olive oil + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons dried basil + ¾ teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Roasted New Red Potatoes
summary: Roasted red potatoes at their best — plain and simple. Red potatoes are tossed with olive oil, salt, and pepper, then roasted to perfection.
ingredient: 3 pounds small red new potatoes, halved + ¼ cup olive oil + 1 teaspoon salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Best Potatoes Ever!
summary: These Indian potatoes taste awesome for lunch or dinner with chipatis, rotis, or wheat tortillas. The spices can be found at any Indian grocery store.
ingredient: 4 large potatoes, peeled and cubed + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons ghee (clarified butter) + 1 teaspoon cumin seeds + 2 green chile peppers, chopped + 1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger root, finely chopped + 1 teaspoon chili powder + 1 teaspoon coriander, ground + 1 teaspoon amchoor (dried mango powder) + ½ teaspoon salt + 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped

name: Baked Split Chicken Breast
summary: This is a very easy, but elegant, baked chicken breast recipe that looks like you've spent hours in the kitchen when you've barely lifted a finger!
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: 2 large bone-in chicken breast halves with skin + ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil + ½ teaspoon garlic, minced + ½ teaspoon coarse sea salt + ½ teaspoon cracked black pepper + ¼ teaspoon dried rosemary + ¼ teaspoon dried basil

name: Unstuffed Cabbage Roll
summary: This is an easy casserole made with ground beef, cabbage, garlic, and tomatoes. My kids don't even like cabbage, but they love this. Serve with rice for a comforting weeknight dinner. Also, the longer it stands the better it tastes!
ingredient: 2 pounds ground beef + 1 large onion, chopped + 1 small head cabbage, chopped + 2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes + 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce + ½ cup water + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 2 teaspoons salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper

name: BBQ Country-Style Ribs
summary: Tasty country-style ribs coated with your favorite BBQ sauce and twice-baked until tender.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 hrs,total: 3 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 10 ribs
ingredient: 10 country style pork ribs + 2 teaspoons minced garlic + 1 medium lemon, thinly sliced + 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce

name: Spicy Grilled Shrimp
summary: This grilled shrimp recipe is fast and easy to prepare and destined to be the hit of any barbeque. And, weather not permitting, the shrimp cook up great under the broiler, too.
ingredient: 1 large clove garlic + 1 teaspoon coarse salt + 1 teaspoon paprika + ½ teaspoon cayenne pepper + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 teaspoons lemon juice + 2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined + 8 wedges lemon, for garnish

name: Greek-Style Lemon Roasted Potatoes
summary: Greek lemon potatoes are a great complement to souvlaki. Here they're oven-roasted, but I often cook them on the BBQ with the souvlaki. All you need is a great Greek salad for a full meal!
ingredient: 3 pounds potatoes, peeled and cut into thick wedges + <U+2153> cup olive oil + 2 lemons, juiced + 2 teaspoons salt + 1 teaspoon oregano + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 3 cups chicken broth

name: Fried Cabbage with Bacon, Onion, and Garlic
summary: This fried cabbage with bacon is a family favorite that is put into every cookbook for my kids when they move out and get married. It is a beautiful dish with many colors and full of flavor. Warning, it is addictive.
ingredient: 6 slices bacon, chopped + 1 large onion, diced + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 large head cabbage, cored and sliced + 1 tablespoon salt, or to taste + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon onion powder + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon paprika

name: Oven Roasted Potatoes
summary: A great roasted potato side dish made with olive oil and herbs.
ingredient: <U+215B> cup olive oil + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + ½ teaspoon dried basil + ½ teaspoon dried marjoram + ½ teaspoon dried dill weed + ½ teaspoon dried thyme + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + ½ teaspoon dried parsley + ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes + ½ teaspoon salt + 4 large potatoes, peeled and cubed

name: Greek Chicken
summary: A very good light summer dish. I serve it with sliced tomatoes, feta cheese, and garlic bread.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 8 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: ½ cup olive oil + 3 cloves garlic, chopped + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano + 2 lemons, juiced + 1 (4 pound) chicken, cut into pieces

name: Blackened Chicken
summary: Blackened chicken is great on a summer's day with fresh corn and mashed potatoes.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 chicken breast halves
ingredient: ½ teaspoon paprika + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground cumin + ¼ teaspoon dried thyme + <U+215B> teaspoon onion powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground white pepper + <U+215B> teaspoon salt + 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + cooking spray

name: Roasted Cabbage
summary: Delicious, roasted cabbage! I apologize for not having a measurement for you! I do not typically measure. If anybody tries this and would like to give tips on measurements, please feel free!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil + ½ head green cabbage, cut into 4 wedges + 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste + 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 2 lemons, halved

name: Roasted Green Beans
summary: Roasted green beans are a great alternative to fast-food French fries. My family and friends love these as a snack or hors d'oeuvre. No matter how many I make, it's never enough!
ingredient: 2 pounds fresh green beans, trimmed + 1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed + 1 teaspoon kosher salt + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper

name: King Crab Appetizers
summary: These crab tartlets have long since been a family favorite and are requested often at holiday get togethers.
ingredient: 2 (12 ounce) packages refrigerated biscuit dough + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (6 ounce) can crab meat, drained + 2 tablespoons mayonnaise + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese + ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 2 tablespoons thinly sliced green onion + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 pinch paprika

name: Rockin' Oysters Rockefeller
summary: This is a slight variation on the classic dish Oysters Rockefeller. Serve this delicious dish and watch your guests cry, 'I love you!!!'
ingredient: 48 fresh, unopened oysters + 1<U+2009>½ cups beer + 2 cloves garlic + seasoned salt to taste + 7 black peppercorns + ½ cup butter + 1 onion, chopped + 1 clove garlic, crushed + 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained + 8 ounces Monterey Jack cheese, shredded + 8 ounces fontina cheese, shredded + 8 ounces mozzarella cheese, shredded + ½ cup milk + 2 teaspoons salt, or to taste + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons fine bread crumbs

name: Bacon and Date Appetizer
summary: An easy, quick appetizer that I first tasted at a Native American wedding ceremony. Dates are stuffed with almonds and wrapped in bacon!
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package pitted dates + 4 ounces almonds + 1 pound sliced bacon

name: Brandade
summary: There are certain things that if I see on a menu, I will almost always order them, and brandade is one of those things. This amazing dish from the south of France can be made many different ways, but it's usually some sort of combination of salt cod, potato, garlic, and olive oil. This should always be baked and eaten piping hot, ideally with some homemade crostini.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 1 day,total: 1 day 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 servings
ingredient: 1 pound salted cod fish + 1<U+2009>½ cups whole milk + 6 sprigs fresh thyme + 2 bay leaves + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 1 pound Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cut into 2-inch chunks + 8 large cloves garlic, halved + 1 teaspoon lemon zest + ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil, divided + ½ lemon, juiced + 1 pinch freshly ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon creme fraiche (Optional)

name: Original Champagne Cocktail
summary: This classic drink dates back to the Civil War era and makes even a less expensive bottle of Champagne taste great with the addition of Angostura bitters and a sugar cube.
ingredient: 1 sugar cube + 2 dashes Angostura bitters + 6 fluid ounces chilled Champagne + 1 lemon twist

name: Artichoke Bruschetta
summary: This is a great bruschetta recipe based on an artichoke dip. It's always a huge hit! Try adding spinach or tomatoes!
ingredient: 1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped + ½ cup grated Romano cheese + <U+2153> cup finely chopped red onion + 5 tablespoons mayonnaise + 1 French baguette, cut into 1/3 inch thick slices

name: Brie Cheese Appetizer
summary: A light, fluffy puff pastry is filled with melted Brie cheese and hot fruit preserves. If you do not want a sweet wheel, you may substitute herbed cheese spread for the preserves. Baking times are the same for the substitution.
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) wheel Brie cheese + 3 tablespoons apricot preserves + ½ (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed + 1 egg white

name: Perfect Crab-Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These little goodies are the perfect addition to your next holiday gathering or even the perfect appetizer to serve before a cozy dinner at home. Everyone will be dazzled by every delicious bite (they won't be able to keep their hands off of them!) You can smile while you think of how easy they were to toss together! And the best part - I usually end up with leftover stuffing, which freezes beautifully until the next carry-in!
ingredient: 2 tablespoons butter + 2 tablespoons minced green onion + 1 cup cooked crabmeat, finely chopped + ½ cup dry bread crumbs + ¼ cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese + 1 egg, beaten + 1 teaspoon lemon juice + ½ teaspoon dried dill weed + ½ cup butter, melted + 1<U+2009>½ pounds fresh button mushrooms, stems removed + ½ cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese + ¼ cup dry white wine

name: Cape Cod Cocktail Meatballs
summary: These cocktail meatballs are perfect for a Christmas, New Year's Eve, or any party that you want to impress. They are the first appetizer to go, and everyone wants the recipe. The recipe originated in Cape Cod (cranberry country). Bon appetit!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 50 mins,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 40 meat balls
ingredient: 2 pounds ground beef + 1 cup bread crumbs + ¼ cup chopped fresh parsley + 2 eggs + 2 tablespoons grated onion + 2 tablespoons soy sauce + ¼ teaspoon garlic powder + 1 (16 ounce) can jellied cranberry sauce (such as Ocean Spray®) + 1<U+2009>½ cups ketchup + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons packed brown sugar + 1 tablespoon lemon juice

name: Blood Orange Tart
summary: This citrus-y tart with a shortbread crust is made with colorful blood orange juice, zest, and slices for garnish.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 50 mins,additional: 3 hrs 15 mins,total: 4 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ cup cold unsalted butter, cut into 1/2-inch pieces + <U+2154> cup sugar + 2 tablespoons cornstarch + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 cup blood orange juice + 3 eggs, lightly beaten + 1 egg yolk, lightly beaten + 2 tablespoons blood orange zest + 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, cut into 1/2-inch pieces + 1 blood orange, thinly sliced

name: The Golden Bauble Cocktail with Prosecco, Amaretto, and Glitter
summary: The Golden Bauble is the absolute pinnacle of class and sophistication at a dinner party. It's also the perfect candlelit bath accompaniment. Or so I'm told! I only have a shower at home, but let's be honest, that probably won't stop me form having one in it. What makes this cocktail so special is the wide-rimmed circular glass. It spreads out the rich golden color and gives a certain sparkling glow. This little dash of gold looks great on any table spread.
ingredient: 1 teaspoon honey, or as needed + 2 teaspoons golden sprinkles, or to taste + 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger amaretto liqueur + ¼ (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger gingerbread-flavored syrup (such as Monin®) + 1<U+2009>½ fluid ounces Prosecco, chilled + 1<U+2009>½ fluid ounces fizzy white grape juice

name: Brown Sugar Smokies
summary: These bacon-wrapped little smokies with a brown sugar glaze are yummy! You can make these little smokies on skewers or toothpick them to secure.
ingredient: 1 pound bacon + 1 (16 ounce) package little smokie sausages + 1 cup brown sugar, or to taste

name: Chef John's Individual Beef Wellingtons
summary: Enjoy these individual beef Wellingtons with no regrets and no second thoughts! Perfectly cooked filet mignon topped with a rich, savory mushroom pate is wrapped in a crispy pastry crust and served on top of a buttery pastry base for a 1-2 punch that's hard to beat. Serve as-is or with a simple, brown pan sauce.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 2 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons unsalted butter + 10 large brown mushrooms, finely chopped + ¼ teaspoon salt + 2 tablespoons minced shallots + freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste + 3 tablespoons white wine + 2 ounces pate + 4 (8 ounce) filet mignon steaks + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons salted butter + 1 (17.25 ounce) package frozen puff pastry + 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard + 1 large egg, beaten + 1 teaspoon water

name: Blood Orange Mimosa
summary: Great blood orange-pineapple mimosa for any lazy morning.
ingredient: ½ cup pink sanding sugar, or as needed + 1 (750 milliliter) bottle brut Champagne + ½ cup pineapple juice + ½ cup blood orange juice + 2 fluid ounces orange liqueur (such as Grand Marnier®)

name: Pesto Puff Pastry Pinwheel
summary: With three main ingredients you can make this gorgeous giant puff pastry pinwheel in no time. Pesto and ricotta fill layers of puff pastry that are cut and twisted into a pinwheel which begs to be pulled apart!
ingredient: 2 sheets puff pastry + 2 teaspoons all-purpose flour, or as needed + 8<U+2009>½ ounces ricotta cheese + 8<U+2009>½ ounces pesto

name: Baked Ham and Cheese Sliders
summary: These baked ham and cheese sliders are the most delicious sandwiches and perfect for any party. They are so good that even the pickiest of eaters will eat these.
ingredient: ¾ cup melted butter + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons Dijon mustard + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons Worcestershire sauce + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons poppy seeds + 1 tablespoon dried minced onion + 24 mini sandwich rolls + 1 pound thinly sliced cooked deli ham + 1 pound thinly sliced Swiss cheese

name: Pine Cone Cheese Ball
summary: Any cheese ball is a welcome addition to a holiday party spread, but when you bring one that looks like a pine cone, you're talking about a real showstopper.
ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 4 ounces goat cheese, softened + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh tarragon + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme + ½ clove garlic, minced, or more to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 1 cup whole almonds, or as needed + 3 large fresh rosemary sprigs

name: Oliebollen (Dutch Doughnuts)
summary: Ollie-bollen, or Oliebollen, are a Dutch pastry similar to a doughnut. It's typically a deep-fried pastry filled with raisins and dusted with powdered sugar. Some modern variations serve them topped with berry filling, but this is a traditional recipe. Oliebollen are a traditional treat on New Year's.
process: prep: 2 hrs,cook: 8 mins,total: 2 hrs 8 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 1 dozen
ingredient: 1 (0.6 ounce) cake compressed fresh yeast + 1 cup lukewarm milk + 2<U+2009>¼ cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons salt + 1 egg + ¾ cup dried currants + ¾ cup raisins + 1 Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and finely chopped + 1 quart vegetable oil for deep-frying + 1 cup confectioners' sugar for dusting

name: Red Wine Hot Chocolate
summary: Chocolate and red wine are two things that go so well together. Combining them on a cold winter night and topping it off with a creamy froth and a sprinkle of grated chocolate will make you feel all warm and cozy inside.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups half-and-half, divided + 4 ounces semisweet Belgian chocolate (43% cacao) + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons white sugar + ½ cup Cabernet Sauvignon + 1 pinch grated chocolate

name: Holiday Pomegranate Mignonette
summary: This beautiful mignonette, paired with fresh raw oysters makes for a stunning appetizer at any holiday gathering.
process: prep: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons champagne vinegar + 1 tablespoon pomegranate juice + ½ shallot, minced + ½ teaspoon fresh cracked pepper + 1 pinch white sugar + 1 tablespoon pomegranate seeds

name: New Year's "Good Luck" Pasta Fazool
summary: It's a scientific fact that eating pork, beans, or greens at the beginning of a new year brings you great luck-just imagine if we put all three of those things together in a single dish. This is so satisfying and delicious that even if it brought me bad luck, I'd still make it. Best served with some crusty, toasted bread.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 45 mins,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 12 ounces bacon, sliced into 1-inch pieces + ½ cup diced onion + ½ cup diced celery + 1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste + ½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste + ¼ teaspoon dried thyme + ¼ teaspoon dried oregano + 2 tablespoons tomato paste + 4 cloves garlic, finely minced + 4 cups chicken broth + 1 cup water + 1 large bunch Swiss chard + 1 (15.5 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained + 1<U+2009>¼ cups orecchiette pasta + 1 tablespoon freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano, or to taste (Optional) + 1 drizzle olive oil (Optional) + 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste (Optional)

name: Slow Cooker Lancaster County Pork and Sauerkraut
summary: Old fashioned pork and sauerkraut that is served here on New Year's Day for luck! Serve with mashed potatoes, and apple sauce for dipping the pork in.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 20 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 (4 pound) pork loin roast + 1 teaspoon caraway seeds + salt and pepper to taste + 2 cups sauerkraut with liquid

name: Basic Crepes
summary: Here is a simple but delicious crepe batter which can be made in minutes. It's made from ingredients that everyone has on hand.
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + 2 eggs + ½ cup milk + ½ cup water + ¼ teaspoon salt + 2 tablespoons butter, melted

name: Sausage Egg Casserole
summary: Assemble the ingredients the night before, and bake this casserole in the morning. Stand back and wait for the compliments. I've made it with fat free cottage cheese, egg substitute, and reduced fat sausage; the taste is still wonderful!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 20 mins,additional: 8 hrs,total: 9 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: ¾ pound ground pork sausage + 1 tablespoon butter + 4 green onions, chopped + ½ pound fresh mushrooms, sliced + 10 eggs, beaten + 1 (16 ounce) container low-fat cottage cheese + 1 pound Monterey Jack cheese, shredded + 2 (4 ounce) cans diced green chile peppers, drained + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon salt + <U+2153> cup butter, melted

name: Baked Ham and Cheese Sliders
summary: These baked ham and cheese sliders are the most delicious sandwiches and perfect for any party. They are so good that even the pickiest of eaters will eat these.
ingredient: ¾ cup melted butter + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons Dijon mustard + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons Worcestershire sauce + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons poppy seeds + 1 tablespoon dried minced onion + 24 mini sandwich rolls + 1 pound thinly sliced cooked deli ham + 1 pound thinly sliced Swiss cheese

name: Mouth-Watering Stuffed Mushrooms
summary: These delicious mushrooms taste just like restaurant-style stuffed mushrooms and are my guy's absolute favorite.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 20 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 large mushrooms
ingredient: 12 whole fresh mushrooms + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon minced garlic + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ teaspoon onion powder + ¼ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper

name: Bananas Foster
summary: This bananas foster recipe is a Father's Day favorite that we all love. Sweet bananas are warmed in a buttery rum sauce and served over vanilla ice cream.
ingredient: ¼ cup butter + <U+2154> cup dark brown sugar + 3<U+2009>½ tablespoons rum + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 3 bananas, peeled and sliced lengthwise and crosswise + ¼ cup coarsely chopped walnuts + 1 pint vanilla ice cream

name: Potato Pancakes
summary: These traditional potato pancakes are wonderful comfort food. Serve with applesauce and sour cream for a light dinner, or with roast chicken for a hearty winter meal. You can use more flour if the mixture seems too wet.
ingredient: 4 large potatoes + 1 yellow onion + 1 egg, beaten + 1 teaspoon salt + ground black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or more as needed + 1 cup vegetable oil for frying, or as needed

name: Best Spinach Dip Ever
summary: This is my dad's spinach dip recipe. The entire family loves it! A flavorful spinach mixture fills a tasty bread bowl. Your family will love it, too.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 bread bowl with dip
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) container sour cream + 1 cup mayonnaise + ½ (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained + 1 (4 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and chopped + 1 (1.8 ounce) package dry leek soup mix + 1 (1 pound) loaf round sourdough bread

name: Southern Fried Cabbage
summary: A favorite cabbage recipe at Mammaw's house! Cabbage is fried with onion and bacon in this simple, quick side dish. It's terrific with cornbread.
ingredient: 3 slices bacon, cut into thirds + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 1 teaspoon salt, or to taste + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste + 1 head cabbage, cored and sliced + 1 white onion, chopped + 1 pinch white sugar

name: Country Fried Squash
summary: This fried squash recipe was my grandmother's and it actually won a Blue Ribbon at the Tennessee State Fair! Be sure to use fresh squash, I use butternut but other squash would also be good.
ingredient: ½ cup milk + 1 egg, beaten + ½ cup all-purpose flour + ½ cup cornmeal + 1 pinch garlic salt + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 1 pinch salt + 1 cup oil for frying + 6 pounds butternut squash - peeled, seeded and sliced

name: Roasted Vegetables
summary: A casserole dish of seasonal vegetables that is so easy to prepare. It can be made a day ahead - just reheat before serving. Lemon juice can be substituted for balsamic vinegar, and you can use baking potatoes if you don't have any Yukon Golds on hand.
ingredient: 1 small butternut squash, cubed + 2 red bell peppers, seeded and diced + 1 sweet potato, peeled and cubed + 3 Yukon Gold potatoes, cubed + 1 red onion, quartered + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary + ¼ cup olive oil + 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar + salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Instant Pot® No-Stress Buffalo Chicken Dip
summary: Want to make Buffalo chicken dip and all you have is frozen chicken? No stress, just cook the frozen chicken breasts in a pressure cooker such as an Instant Pot®, start to finish in 30 minutes. Instructions for thawed chicken are included.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) frozen chicken breasts + 1 cup chicken broth + 8 ounces cream cheese + ½ cup sriracha sauce + ½ cup ranch dressing + 1 tablespoon chile-garlic sauce (Optional) + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 green onion, thinly sliced

name: Meatball-Stuffed Garlic Bread Sliders
summary: We're getting close to the Super Bowl, and it's not about who wins the trophy, but rather who wins the snack table. If you show up with these super fun sliders, that will be you. The real secret to these beauties is placing the meatball in through the top of the roll, versus splitting and stuffing in the traditional manner. Maybe it's the symmetry, or center of gravity, that makes these just feel right in your hand. If you're short on time, using pre-made meatballs will do.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 40 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 18,Yield: 18 rolls
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided + 1 yellow onion, diced + 5 cloves garlic, minced, divided + 1 pound ground beef + 2 tablespoons chopped Italian parsley, plus more for garnish + 1 large egg + ¼ cup plain bread crumbs + 1 cup shredded fontina cheese, divided + 2 teaspoons kosher salt + freshly ground black pepper to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste + 3 tablespoons unsalted butter + 18 dinner rolls + 2 cups spicy tomato sauce + 2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese

name: Air Fryer Buffalo Chicken Wings
summary: Push the deep fryer aside and pull out the air fryer instead next game day. There is no need to add all of that oil when you can achieve crispy wings straight out of the air fryer. Serve with celery sticks and ranch dressing, if desired.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 5 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 2<U+2009>½ pounds chicken wings + 1 tablespoon olive oil + <U+2154> cup cayenne pepper sauce + ½ cup butter + 2 tablespoons vinegar + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper

name: Sandie's Seven-Layer Bean Dip
summary: At every family gathering, I am asked to make this dish. It's so yummy, it's always the first thing to go. Serve dip with chips or spread onto tortillas. It's great when topped with guacamole!
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) container sour cream + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (1 ounce) package taco seasoning mix + 1 pound ground beef + 1 teaspoon ground cumin + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon salt + ground black pepper to taste + 1 (30 ounce) can refried beans + 1 (16 ounce) jar salsa + 1 (16 ounce) jar salsa con queso + 2 cups shredded Mexican cheese blend + 1 plum tomato, chopped + 1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained + 3 green onions, chopped

name: Guacamole
summary: You can make this avocado salad smooth or chunky depending on your tastes.
ingredient: 3 avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed + 1 lime, juiced + 1 teaspoon salt + ½ cup diced onion + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro + 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced + 1 teaspoon minced garlic + 1 pinch ground cayenne pepper (Optional)

name: Football Cheese Ball
summary: Your pigskin party isn't complete without this cute and tasty cheese ball! Serve with your favorite crackers.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 2 hrs 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 45 mins,Servings: 18,Yield: 18 servings
ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + ¼ cup finely chopped green onions + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + ½ (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix + ½ slice American cheese, sliced into strips

name: Over the Top Nachos
summary: These nachos can be served as a meal, but all the good stuff makes for a great appetizer or snack while watching a game or a quick lunch for your family and friends. Better plan on making two plates of these, they're really good! Serve with sour cream, salsa, and guacamole.
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + 1 onion, finely diced + salt and pepper to taste + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 (16 ounce) can refried beans + 1 (14.5 ounce) package tortilla chips + 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, sliced

name: Touchdown Chili
summary: Every year when football season rolls around and the weather begins to cool, my husband requests I make this hearty, beanless chili. It receives rave reviews from everyone.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 3 hrs 15 mins,total: 3 hrs 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 2 pounds ground beef + 1 large onion, chopped + 6 cloves garlic, chopped + <U+2153> cup chili powder + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons ground cumin + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons dried basil + 1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice + 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers, drained + 1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer + 1 tablespoon white vinegar + 3 tablespoons brown sugar + 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™) + 2 teaspoons salt + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper

name: Buffalo Chicken Dip
summary: This tangy, creamy Buffalo chicken dip tastes just like Buffalo chicken wings! Perfect for parties and game day, this chicken dip is best served hot with crackers and celery sticks. Everyone loves the results!
ingredient: 2 (10 ounce) cans chunk chicken, drained + ¾ cup pepper sauce (such as Frank's Red Hot®) + 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened + 1 cup Ranch dressing + 1<U+2009>½ cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 bunch celery, cleaned and cut into 4 inch pieces + 1 (8 ounce) box chicken-flavored crackers

name: Slow Cooker Texas Pulled Pork
summary: Slow cooked, Texas-style pulled pork that is served on a buttered and toasted roll. My family's favorite.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 5 hrs,total: 5 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 sandwiches
ingredient: 1 teaspoon vegetable oil + 1 (4 pound) pork shoulder roast + 1 cup barbeque sauce + ½ cup apple cider vinegar + ½ cup chicken broth + ¼ cup light brown sugar + 1 tablespoon prepared yellow mustard + 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 tablespoon chili powder + 1 extra large onion, chopped + 2 large cloves garlic, crushed + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons dried thyme + 8 hamburger buns, split + 2 tablespoons butter, or as needed

name: Baked Potato Dip
summary: I got this recipe from a former co-worker. It is so easy and so good! Makes a great potato topper as well! Serve with potato chips.
ingredient: 2 (16 ounce) containers sour cream + 1 (3 ounce) can bacon bits + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 bunch green onions, chopped

name: The Best Meatballs
summary: I never knew how to make good meatballs until I found this recipe. I normally make mine with just ground beef and they still taste great. I've used the combination of pork, beef and veal and they are equally good. Definitely use fresh bread crumbs and freshly grate your cheese instead of using the canned variety...it really does make a difference.
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + ½ pound ground veal + ½ pound ground pork + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 2 eggs + 1 cup freshly grated Romano cheese + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons chopped Italian flat leaf parsley + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 2 cups stale Italian bread, crumbled + 1<U+2009>½ cups lukewarm water + 1 cup olive oil

name: Easy Guacamole
summary: Simply a quick recipe for tasty guacamole! Great with tortilla chips or as a topping for Mexican foods!
ingredient: 2 avocados + 1 small onion, finely chopped + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 ripe tomato, chopped + 1 lime, juiced + salt and pepper to taste

name: Baked Chicken Wings
summary: Easy, crispy, and delicious. I normally serve with a side of rice, chicken gravy, and a vegetable or salad.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 10 wings
ingredient: 3 tablespoons olive oil + 3 cloves garlic, pressed + 2 teaspoons chili powder + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 10 chicken wings

name: Chicken Quesadillas
summary: This chicken quesadilla recipe is great to make for parties. Zesty chicken, cooked peppers, and melted cheese are a delightful combination. Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream and salsa.
ingredient: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, diced + 1 (1.27 ounce) packet fajita seasoning + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 2 green bell peppers, chopped + 2 red bell peppers, chopped + 1 onion, chopped + 10 (10 inch) flour tortillas + 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese + 1 tablespoon bacon bits

name: Best Spinach Dip Ever
summary: This is my dad's spinach dip recipe. The entire family loves it! A flavorful spinach mixture fills a tasty bread bowl. Your family will love it, too.
process: prep: 15 mins,additional: 6 hrs,total: 6 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 1 bread bowl with dip
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) container sour cream + 1 cup mayonnaise + ½ (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained + 1 (4 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and chopped + 1 (1.8 ounce) package dry leek soup mix + 1 (1 pound) loaf round sourdough bread

name: Hot Artichoke and Spinach Dip II
summary: This dip is amazing -- so cheesy and fragrant. If you don't like artichokes, don't worry -- you'll never know they're in there! My only question is: Is it okay to just eat it with a spoon right out of the dish?
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ¼ cup mayonnaise + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + ¼ cup grated Romano cheese + 1 clove garlic, peeled and minced + ½ teaspoon dried basil + ¼ teaspoon garlic salt + salt and pepper to taste + 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped + ½ cup frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained + ¼ cup shredded mozzarella cheese

name: Best Fruit Dip
summary: This fruit dip is really light and fluffy. Great to serve with your favorite fruit at parties, holidays, or any time!
ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (7 ounce) jar marshmallow creme

name: Taco Dip
summary: This taco dip is so scrumptious. It's delicious even when I use low-fat Cheddar and low-fat sour cream! Serve with baked tortilla chips for dipping.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) container nonfat sour cream + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix + ¼ head iceberg lettuce - rinsed, dried, and shredded + 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese + 3 medium chopped tomatoes + 1 medium green bell pepper, chopped + 1 (2.25 ounce) can black olives, drained

name: Seven Layer Taco Dip
summary: This 7-layer taco dip is always a big hit at parties and family get-togethers. People gather around the platter until it's gone.
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) can refried beans + 1 (1 ounce) package taco seasoning mix + 1 (16 ounce) container sour cream + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (16 ounce) jar salsa + 1 large tomato, chopped + 1 medium green bell pepper, chopped + 1 bunch chopped green onions + 1 small head iceberg lettuce, shredded + 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 (6 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained

name: Restaurant-Style Buffalo Chicken Wings
summary: Try this hot wings recipe for Buffalo chicken wings similar to those served at a popular restaurant chain. If you have ever had them, you will love them.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 20 mins,Servings: 5,Yield: 10 chicken wings
ingredient: ½ cup all-purpose flour + ¼ teaspoon ground paprika + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper + ¼ teaspoon salt + 10 chicken wings + 2 cups vegetable oil for frying, or as needed + ¼ cup butter + ¼ cup hot sauce + 1 pinch ground black pepper + 1 pinch garlic powder

name: Veggie Pizza
summary: When serving this veggie pizza, I never have leftovers. You can use low-fat or nonfat sour cream for this dish if you'd like.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr 5 mins,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 1 pizza
ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated crescent rolls + 1 cup sour cream + 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 1 (1 ounce) package ranch seasoning mix + 1 teaspoon dried dill weed + ¼ teaspoon garlic salt + 1<U+2009>½ cups chopped fresh broccoli + ½ cup halved and thinly-sliced radishes + 1 small onion, finely chopped + 1 red bell pepper, chopped + 1 carrot, grated + 1 stalk celery, thinly sliced

name: Traditional Filipino Lumpia
summary: This is a traditional Filipino dish. It is the Filipino version of the egg rolls. It can be served as a side dish or as an appetizer.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 1 hr 10 mins,Servings: 15,Yield: 30 lumpia
ingredient: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 pound ground pork + 2 cloves garlic, crushed + ½ cup chopped onion + ½ cup minced carrots + ½ cup chopped green onions + ½ cup thinly sliced green cabbage + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon garlic powder + 1 teaspoon soy sauce + 30 lumpia wrappers + 2 cups vegetable oil for frying

name: Slow Cooker Pulled Pork
summary: Root beer and pulled pork might not seem like a likely pairing but here it makes all the difference. Topped with your favorite BBQ sauce, it's sure to bring rave reviews.
ingredient: 1 (2 pound) pork tenderloin + 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle root beer + 1 (18 ounce) bottle your favorite barbecue sauce + 8 hamburger buns, split and lightly toasted

name: Chicago-Style Hot Dog
summary: This hot dog is a Windy City classic and a big favorite with sports fans! The frank must be all-beef, the bun must be poppy seed, and the ingredients must be piled onto the bun in the order specified. And whatever you do, don't spoil the splendor of this Chicago dog with ketchup!
ingredient: 1 all-beef hot dog + 1 poppy seed hot dog bun + 1 tablespoon yellow mustard + 1 tablespoon sweet green pickle relish + 1 tablespoon chopped onion + 4 tomato wedges + 1 dill pickle spear + 2 sport peppers + 1 dash celery salt

name: Seven Layer Bars
summary: These 7 layer bars are easy to make, and very rich. You can use different kinds of chips (vanilla or peanut butter) to suit your taste.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 36,Yield: 3 dozen bar cookies
ingredient: ½ cup unsalted butter + 1<U+2009>½ cups graham cracker crumbs + 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips + 1 cup butterscotch chips + 1 cup chopped walnuts + 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups shredded coconut

name: Scott Hibb's Amazing Whisky Grilled Baby Back Ribs
summary: Man, when your guests bite into these at the Memorial Day cookout, they'll savor meat so tender and juicy that it slides right off the bone and gets you the respect you deserve! I have found that the major restaurant chains who make this awesome dish pre-cook their ribs SLOWLY before the quick grilling process.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 2 hrs 40 mins,total: 3 hrs,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 2 (2 pound) slabs baby back pork ribs + coarsely ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon ground red chile pepper + 2<U+2009>¼ tablespoons vegetable oil + ½ cup minced onion + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + ½ cup tomato paste + ½ cup white vinegar + ½ cup brown sugar + 2<U+2009>½ tablespoons honey + 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce + 2 teaspoons salt + ¼ teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper + 1<U+2009>¼ teaspoons liquid smoke flavoring + 2 teaspoons whiskey + 2 teaspoons garlic powder + ¼ teaspoon paprika + ½ teaspoon onion powder + 1 tablespoon dark molasses + ½ tablespoon ground red chile pepper

name: Outrageous Warm Chicken Nacho Dip
summary: This is my jazzed up version of classic queso dip taken to a heartier level, perfect for football games, tailgating or for taking along to pot lucks in a slow cooker! This is a serious crowd-pleaser that is served hot as a dip, spooned over crisp tortilla chips nacho-style, or rolled up in a warm flour tortilla! The heat can be turned up or down with the addition of jalapenos to taste.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 35 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 12 servings
ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®), drained + 1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®), cubed + 2 large cooked skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, shredded + <U+2153> cup sour cream + ¼ cup diced green onion + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons taco seasoning mix + 2 tablespoons minced jalapeno pepper, or to taste (Optional) + 1 cup black beans, rinsed and drained

name: Easy Homemade Chili
summary: Easy homemade chili. Goes great with cornbread or over corn chips for a chili pie! I like to use spicy pinto beans.
ingredient: 1 pound ground beef + 1 onion, chopped + 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes + 1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce + 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans + 1<U+2009>½ cups water + 1 pinch chili powder + 1 pinch garlic powder + salt and pepper to taste

name: Spam Musubi
summary: Spam musubi is a popular snack in Hawaii. It is a type of sushi that features marinated cooked Spam. I got this recipe from a local Hawaiian friend when I was living there.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 4 hrs 30 mins,total: 5 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 pieces
ingredient: 2 cups uncooked short-grain white rice + 2 cups water + 6 tablespoons rice vinegar + ½ cup white sugar + ¼ cup soy sauce + ¼ cup oyster sauce + 1 (12 ounce) container fully cooked luncheon meat (such as Spam) + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil + 5 sheets sushi nori (dry seaweed)

name: Kabobs
summary: Grilled kabobs made with steak and chicken stay moist and flavorful. These kabobs are made with skewered meat with peppers, onions, and mushrooms in a honey teriyaki sauce. They're simple to make and delicious to eat.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 40 mins,Servings: 10
ingredient: ½ cup teriyaki sauce + ½ cup honey + ½ teaspoon garlic powder + ½ pinch ground ginger + 1<U+2009>½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into cubes + 1 pound beef sirloin, cut into 1 inch cubes + 2 red bell peppers, cut into 2 inch pieces + 1 large sweet onion, peeled and cut into wedges + 1<U+2009>½ cups whole fresh mushrooms + skewers

name: Slow Cooker Cocktail Smokies
summary: This lil smokies recipe could easily be changed up to suit your taste. These addictive little appetizers are so easy to make and great for potlucks as well.
ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce + 1 (8 ounce) jar grape jelly + 2 (16 ounce) packages miniature smoked sausage links

name: Annie's Fruit Salsa and Cinnamon Chips
summary: Easy to make, tasty fruit salsa and cinnamon tortilla chips. Great as an appetizer or a snack. Great for anytime!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 20 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 10,Yield: 10 servings
ingredient: 2 kiwis, peeled and diced + 2 Golden Delicious apples - peeled, cored and diced + 8 ounces raspberries + 1 pound strawberries + 2 tablespoons white sugar + 1 tablespoon brown sugar + 3 tablespoons fruit preserves, any flavor + 10 (10 inch) flour tortillas + butter flavored cooking spray + 2 tablespoons cinnamon sugar

name: Easy Lemon-Pepper Chicken Wings
summary: My family and I love lemon-pepper wings, especially during football season. I got tired of spending so much money on them for our party that I decided to whip up my own version of Wingstop's lemon-pepper chicken wings. The end result was an empty platter and pleased bellies.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 10 mins,total: 20 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 12 chicken wings
ingredient: 2 cups oil, or as needed + 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil + 1 tablespoon lemon-pepper seasoning + 12 chicken wings

name: Valentine Night Strawberries
summary: Strawberries stuffed with lightly-sweetened cream cheese and walnuts are perfect for that romantic evening. They go great with champagne! Pecans also work well in this recipe.
ingredient: 20 fresh strawberries + 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + 2 tablespoons chopped walnuts + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons confectioners' sugar

name: Creamy Pesto Shrimp
summary: One of our family's favorites, it's also great when made with crab meat instead of the shrimp.
ingredient: 1 pound linguine pasta + ½ cup butter + 2 cups heavy cream + ½ teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese + <U+2153> cup pesto + 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined

name: Chocolate Truffle Cookies
summary: A very dark, rich chocolate cookie for the true chocoholic. This recipe uses relatively little flour, resulting in dense, fudge-like cookies. These cookies keep well in the freezer (but you may have a hard time waiting for them to thaw before you eat them).
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 10 mins,additional: 1 hr 35 mins,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 36,Yield: 3 dozen
ingredient: 4 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped + 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips + 6 tablespoons butter + 3 eggs + 1 cup white sugar + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons vanilla extract + ½ cup all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder + ¼ teaspoon baking powder + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips

name: Chocolate-Covered Strawberries
summary: The simplest version of chocolate-covered strawberries I know. Paraffin was originally used instead of shortening. White chocolate may be drizzled over the milk chocolate for a fancier look. They are perfect for weddings when decorated with frosting bow ties, bells, butterflies, roses, etc.
ingredient: 16 ounces milk chocolate chips + 2 tablespoons shortening + toothpicks + 1 pound fresh strawberries with leaves

name: Smothered Filet Mignon
summary: A great combination of flavors. Serve with some mashed garlic red potatoes and sweetened green beans for a fabulous special occasion meal. Don't forget to serve a bottle of Cabernet or Zinfandel.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 4 (6 ounce) filet mignon steaks + seasoned salt to taste + cracked black pepper to taste + ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil + ¼ cup balsamic vinegar + 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard + 2 teaspoons dried rosemary + 1 tablespoon butter + 2 cups onion slices + 1 teaspoon white sugar + 4 ounces blue cheese, crumbled

name: Sweetheart Cupcakes
summary: Instead of just plain white cupcakes, I took it a step further and made them special. You can change the colors for any holiday. Shades of green for St. Patrick's Day, pastel colors for Easter, red white and blue for the 4th of July. You get the picture.
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 40 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 2 dozen cupcakes
ingredient: 1 (18.25 ounce) package white cake mix + 1<U+2009>¼ cups water + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 3 egg whites + 8 drops red food coloring + 2 drops raspberry candy oil

name: Easy Valentine Sandwich Cookies
summary: This recipe makes seventeen 3-inch sandwich cookies and seventeen 1 ½-inch heart-shaped cookies. You'll need a 3-inch heart-shaped cutter and a 1 ½-inch heart-shaped cutter. Frost with Pink Valentine Frosting (see recipe).
ingredient: 1 cup butter + 1<U+2009>½ cups confectioners' sugar + 1 large egg + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon almond extract (Optional) + 2<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 teaspoon baking soda + 1 teaspoon cream of tartar

name: Surf and Turf for Two
summary: This is a simple way to make a special dinner any night of the week. You probably have most of the ingredients in your pantry already. Serve shrimp alongside steaks with your favorite sides.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 tablespoon butter, melted + 1 tablespoon finely minced onion + 1 tablespoon white wine + 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon lemon juice + 1 teaspoon dried parsley + 1 teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®) + 1 clove garlic, minced + <U+215B> teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 12 medium shrimp, peeled and deveined + 2 (4 ounce) filet mignon steaks + 2 teaspoons olive oil + 1 teaspoon steak seasoning

name: Lobster Mac and Cheese
summary: High class meets down home. This dish is just my style. The amazing combination of flavors make this one of my favorites.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 30 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 - 4 quart casserole
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package elbow macaroni + 1 (2 pound) lobster, split + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 small onion, diced + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 shallot, chopped + 10 black peppercorns + 2 cups milk + 5 tablespoons butter + 5 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 1 pound shredded Gruyere cheese + 3 cups shredded Cheddar cheese + 1 cup grated Romano cheese + kosher salt and pepper to taste + 3 tablespoons panko bread crumbs

name: Love Potion No. 9
summary: Everyone will be crushing on this drink that's perfect for Valentine's Day.
ingredient: 1 cup white sugar + 1 cup water + 2 cups quartered fresh strawberries + coarse white decorating sugar + 1 fluid ounce vodka + ½ fluid ounce amaretto liqueur + ice + 2 fluid ounces Champagne, chilled + 3 tablespoons vanilla ice cream + 1 strawberry

name: Romantic Valentine's Day Salad
summary: The little red hearts are cut out of cooked beet to turn this simple salad into a lovely romantic Valentine's Day appetizer. In Italy, lettuce is usually only dressed with olive oil and salt, but you can of course use another dressing. Fresh mozzarella cubes make a nice addition.
ingredient: 1 large beet + 2 cups mixed salad greens + 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste + salt to taste

name: Valentine Pizza
summary: Make this pizza for your Valentine! The rosemary dough is made in a bread machine, and then made into three heart shaped pizzas.
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr 30 mins,total: 2 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 3 medium pizzas
ingredient: 3 cups bread flour + 1 (.25 ounce) envelope active dry yeast + 1<U+2009>¼ cups warm water + 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary + 1 (14 ounce) can pizza sauce + 3 cups shredded mozzarella cheese + 2 ripe tomatoes, sliced + 1 zucchini, sliced + 15 slices vegetarian pepperoni + 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives

name: Filet Mignon and Balsamic Strawberries
summary: Also great for barbecues! The succulent meat together with this summer fruit complement each other surprising well! A great idea for something new. Serve steaks over mashed potatoes.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 2 cups strawberries, sliced + ¼ cup brown sugar + ¼ cup balsamic vinegar + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 4 (6 ounce) filet mignon (beef tenderloin) + salt and pepper to taste + 1 tablespoon chilled butter + freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Perfect Chicken
summary: Chicken stock, wine, onions, garlic, mushroom, cream, butter, herbs, lemon, and capers reduce to make a perfect sauce. Served alongside mushroom rice and asparagus; it is HEAVEN! Patience is key with the sauce. The flavors will come together beautifully if you allow them to reduce as directed.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 1 hr 15 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 servings
ingredient: 2 cups chicken broth + ½ cup chopped onion + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 1 cup white wine + ½ cup sliced fresh mushrooms, or more to taste + 1 teaspoon dried rosemary + 1 teaspoon dried sage + 1 cup heavy cream + 2 tablespoons butter + ½ lemon, juiced + 1 tablespoon capers, drained + ½ cup cornstarch, or as needed + 4 skinless, boneless chicken thighs + 2 tablespoons olive oil

name: Red Velvet Cookies
summary: These red velvet cookies are just as good as the cake, only on a smaller scale. They melt in your mouth!
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon baking soda + ½ teaspoon salt + 2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened baking chocolate, broken into pieces + ½ cup unsalted butter, softened + <U+2154> cup brown sugar, firmly packed + <U+2153> cup white sugar + 1 large egg + 1 tablespoon red food coloring + ¾ cup sour cream + 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips (Optional) + ¼ cup unsalted butter, softened + 4 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 2 cups confectioners' sugar, sifted

name: Old Fashioned Coconut Cream Pie
summary: Coconut cream pie recipe that's tried and true. It took many years of searching and baking to find the right one, and this is it. Enjoy!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 4 hrs,total: 4 hrs 50 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 1 9-inch pie
ingredient: 1 cup sweetened flaked coconut + 3 cups half-and-half + ¾ cup white sugar + ½ cup all-purpose flour + 2 large eggs, beaten + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 (9 inch) pie shell, baked + 1 cup frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: The Best Rolled Sugar Cookies
summary: Whenever you make these cookies for someone, be sure to bring along several copies of the recipe! You will be asked for it, I promise! NOTE: I make icing with confectioners' sugar and milk. I make it fairly thin, as I 'paint' the icing on the cookies with a pastry brush. Thin enough to spread easily but not so thin that it just makes your cookies wet and runs off.
process: prep: 20 mins,bake: 6 mins,chill: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 26 mins,Servings: 60,Yield: 60 cookies
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ cups butter, softened + 2 cups white sugar + 4 eggs + 1 teaspoon vanilla extract + 5 cups all-purpose flour + 2 teaspoons baking powder + 1 teaspoon salt

name: Maple Salmon
summary: This maple glazed salmon is delicious and very easy to prepare. I love maple syrup in everything and decided to use it in the marinade. My husband totally loved it; he wasn't a salmon fan until now.
process: prep: 10 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 30 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 4,Yield: 4 fillets
ingredient: ¼ cup maple syrup + 2 tablespoons soy sauce + 1 clove garlic, minced + ¼ teaspoon garlic salt + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 pound salmon

name: Chocolate Ganache
summary: Chocolate ganache is a mixture of cream and chocolate that has lots of uses with homemade baked goods. Perfect for cakes, truffles, and pastries, this deliciously rich topping can be used as a filling, frosting, or glaze.
process: prep: 5 mins,cook: 5 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 cups
ingredient: 9 ounces bittersweet chocolate, roughly chopped + 1 cup heavy cream + 1 tablespoon dark rum (Optional)

name: Pineapple Upside Down Cupcakes
summary: These pineapple upside down cupcakes are great to make for family gatherings or as treats to pack into lunches. It's an easy recipe; adaptations can be made to make this completely from scratch. This is just a yummy simplified version!
process: prep: 20 mins,cook: 20 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 24,Yield: 24 cupcakes
ingredient: cooking spray + ½ cup butter, melted + 1<U+2009>½ cups brown sugar + 24 maraschino cherries + 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple + 1 (18.25 ounce) package pineapple cake mix (such as Duncan Hines® Pineapple Supreme) + 1<U+2009><U+2153> cups pineapple juice + <U+2153> cup vegetable oil + 3 eggs + 1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar for dusting, or as needed

name: Cream Puffs
summary: These homemade cream puffs are made with a light choux pastry that puffs up when baked. In this version, they are filled with a rich vanilla cream that's easy to make with instant pudding. Drizzle melted chocolate on top for a fancy dessert that will wow your guests!
process: prep: 30 mins,cook: 25 mins,total: 55 mins,Servings: 20,Yield: 20 to 25 cream puffs
ingredient: 2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix + 2 cups heavy cream + 1 cup milk + ½ cup butter + 1 cup water + ¼ teaspoon salt + 1 cup all-purpose flour + 4 large eggs

name: Lemon Chicken Piccata
summary: This delicious lemon chicken piccata dish is exquisite and easy to prepare. The light and luscious lemon sauce really pops without being too acidic; it is simply divine. Serve it with herb-roasted potatoes or lemon-rice pilaf.
ingredient: 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1/2-inch medallions + salt and pepper to taste + ½ cup all-purpose flour + 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 cup low sodium chicken broth + ½ lemon, thinly sliced + ¼ cup fresh lemon juice + 2 tablespoons capers, drained and rinsed + 3 tablespoons butter + 2 tablespoons minced Italian (flat-leaf) parsley

name: Cajun Seafood Pasta
summary: This recipe is a hot one, but delicious! If you are weak of tongue, then divide the amounts of peppers in half. Better to add more than spoil your creation! Bay scallops are preferred, but the larger sea scallops can be used if they are cut in half. This dish can also be placed in a casserole dish and placed under the broiler until top turns golden brown!
ingredient: 2 cups heavy whipping cream + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme + 2 teaspoons salt + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes + 1 teaspoon ground white pepper + 1 cup chopped green onions + 1 cup chopped parsley + ½ pound shrimp, peeled and deveined + ½ pound scallops + ½ cup shredded Swiss cheese + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 pound dry fettuccine pasta

name: Savory Sea Scallops and Angel Hair Pasta
summary: This scallop pasta dish is a very simple, easy to prepare meal that you will most likely be asked to make again. The taste, if carefully prepared and not overcooked, is incredible. Enjoy!
ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package angel hair pasta + ¼ cup butter + 2 cloves garlic, minced + 2 pounds sea scallops, rinsed and patted dry + 3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley + 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice + salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste + ½ cup heavy cream (Optional) + 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese to taste (Optional)

name: Homemade Four Cheese Ravioli
summary: Great homemade Italian ravioli recipe that I have recreated to taste like the ravioli at Maggiano's restaurant. Don't be intimidated by the large list of ingredients, it is well worth it!
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 4,Yield: 20 ravioli
ingredient: 2 cups all-purpose flour + 1 pinch salt + 2 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons water + 1 teaspoon olive oil + 1 (8 ounce) container ricotta cheese + 1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened + ½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese + ½ cup shredded provolone cheese + 1 egg + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons dried parsley + 2 tablespoons olive oil + 2 cloves garlic, crushed + 3 tablespoons prepared basil pesto sauce + 2 cups heavy cream + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 (24 ounce) jar marinara sauce + 1 egg + 1 tablespoon water

name: Asparagus Quiche
summary: A delectable combination of ingredients that result in a tasty quiche dish.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 35 mins,total: 1 hr,Servings: 12,Yield: 2 - 8 inch quiche
ingredient: 1 pound fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1/2 inch pieces + 10 slices bacon + 2 (8 inch) unbaked pie shells + 1 egg white, lightly beaten + 4 large eggs eggs + 1<U+2009>½ cups half-and-half cream + ¼ teaspoon ground nutmeg + salt and pepper to taste + 2 cups shredded Swiss cheese

name: Rockin' Oysters Rockefeller
summary: This is a slight variation on the classic dish Oysters Rockefeller. Serve this delicious dish and watch your guests cry, 'I love you!!!'
ingredient: 48 fresh, unopened oysters + 1<U+2009>½ cups beer + 2 cloves garlic + seasoned salt to taste + 7 black peppercorns + ½ cup butter + 1 onion, chopped + 1 clove garlic, crushed + 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained + 8 ounces Monterey Jack cheese, shredded + 8 ounces fontina cheese, shredded + 8 ounces mozzarella cheese, shredded + ½ cup milk + 2 teaspoons salt, or to taste + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 2 tablespoons fine bread crumbs

name: Spaghetti Carbonara II
summary: A super rich, classic 'bacon and egg' spaghetti dish. Great to serve for company. This recipe also makes an unusual brunch offering.
ingredient: 1 pound spaghetti + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 8 slices bacon, diced + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 1 onion, chopped + 1 clove garlic, minced + ¼ cup dry white wine + 4 eggs + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 pinch salt and black pepper to taste + 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese

name: Cheese Puffs (Gougeres)
summary: Light, airy, cheese puffs are a versatile addition to a meal or appetizer plate. Tiny, they're like soup nuts. Larger, they pair well with beer or wine. Even bigger, they can be split and filled with ham, chicken, tuna salad, or even more cheese! These are easier to make than the recipe sounds, yet the result looks impressive enough that you can tell your friends you slaved over them.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 25 mins,additional: 15 mins,total: 1 hr 25 mins,Servings: 12,Yield: 24 medium puffs
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon fresh ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon dried thyme + ½ teaspoon chili powder + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + 1 cup whole milk + 1 stick butter (cut into 1/2 inch cubes) + 6 large eggs (at room temperature) + ½ cup grated Parmesan or Romano cheese + ¾ cup grated Gruyere cheese + 1 ounce pepperoni, diced (Optional) + 2 tablespoons milk + 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese

name: Easy OREO Truffles
summary: These Oreo truffles are very easy and delicious. You can't go wrong with Oreo, cream cheese, and chocolate!
process: prep: 45 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 45 mins,Servings: 42,Yield: 42 truffles
ingredient: 45 OREO Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, divided + 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened + 2 (8 ounce) packages BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Baking Chocolate, melted

name: Pork Chops in Garlic Mushroom Sauce
summary: This recipe is my twist on a fancy restaurant meal we got on Valentine's Day. The recipe has half the amount of garlic than was originally used. Hope everyone else enjoys it just as much as we do. Garnish with fresh parsley, chives, or thyme leaves.
ingredient: 2 pounds boneless pork chops + ½ teaspoon paprika + 1 pinch kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste + ¼ cup butter, divided + 1 (8 ounce) package sliced fresh mushrooms + 4 cloves garlic, minced + 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard + 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour + 2 cups beef broth

name: Baked Salmon II
summary: This is a great recipe for beginners! This was my first time making fish and it was a hit. Even my 9 year old daughter who wouldn't dream of eating fish EVER had half of my portion!
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 45 mins,additional: 1 hr,total: 2 hrs,Servings: 2,Yield: 2 servings
ingredient: 2 cloves garlic, minced + 6 tablespoons light olive oil + 1 teaspoon dried basil + 1 teaspoon salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 tablespoon lemon juice + 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped + 2 (6 ounce) fillets salmon

name: Mardi Gras King Cake
summary: The King Cake is a New Orleans tradition that involves a pastry, a tiny plastic baby, and a party. King Cake is baked with a tiny plastic baby hidden inside; whoever gets the slice with the baby in it has to host the next party. Make sure to buy a new tiny plastic baby so you can get the full effect from this cake! Sprinkle with purple, green, and gold sugar, or decorate with whole pecans and candied cherries.
process: prep: 45 mins,cook: 30 mins,additional: 3 hrs,total: 4 hrs 15 mins,Servings: 16,Yield: 2 cakes
ingredient: 1 cup milk + ¼ cup butter + <U+2154> cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + ½ cup white sugar, divided + 2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast + 2 eggs + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons salt + ½ teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg + 5<U+2009>½ cups all-purpose flour + 1 cup packed brown sugar + <U+2154> cup chopped pecans + ½ cup all-purpose flour + ½ cup raisins + 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon + ½ cup melted butter + 1 cup confectioners' sugar + 1 tablespoon water + 1 plastic baby doll

name: Baked Chicken and Sausage Gumbo
summary: Gumbo doesn't have to be hard! Instead of slowly cooking and stirring a roux for what seems like forever, try this alternative baked method. It's not a shortcut per se, but cooking it in the oven will save you from having to stand over the stove for hours. Serve hot with a spoonful of white rice.
process: prep: 35 mins,cook: 1 hr 50 mins,total: 2 hrs 25 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 chicken thighs
ingredient: 1 cup all-purpose flour + ¼ cup vegetable oil + ¼ cup melted butter + 6 bone-in, skin-on chicken thighs + 1 pound smoked pork sausage, cut into 2-inch pieces + kosher salt to taste + 1 large onion, diced + 1 cup diced celery + 1 cup diced green bell pepper + 6 cups chicken broth + 2 teaspoons kosher salt + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + ½ teaspoon dried thyme + 1 bay leaf + ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste + 1 cup diced tomatoes + 1 cup frozen sliced okra, thawed + 4 green onions, chopped

name: Air Fryer Beignets
summary: These beignets take on a wholesome aspect as they're cooked in an air fryer. You will need a silicone egg-bite mold, available through retailers like Amazon®.
ingredient: cooking spray + ½ cup all-purpose flour + ¼ cup white sugar + <U+215B> cup water + 1 large egg, separated + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons melted butter + ½ teaspoon baking powder + ½ teaspoon vanilla extract + 1 pinch salt + 2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar, or to taste

name: Crab Stuffed Flounder
summary: This is an easy recipe that my children have enjoyed. They're not big fish eaters either!
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ pounds flounder fillets + 1 cup crabmeat - drained, flaked and cartilage removed + 1 tablespoon finely chopped green bell pepper + ¼ teaspoon ground dry mustard + ¼ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + ¼ teaspoon salt + ground white pepper, to taste + 3 crushed saltine crackers + 1 egg white + 1 tablespoon mayonnaise + ¼ cup butter, melted + 1 egg yolk + 5 tablespoons mayonnaise + ½ teaspoon paprika + 1 tablespoon dried parsley

name: Real N'awlins Muffuletta
summary: These gigantic sandwiches were invented a century ago at Sicilian Deli here in New Orleans. The spicy, tangy olive salad is what really sets this meat and cheese sandwich apart. A genuine muffuletta should be made on oven-fresh Italian bread topped with sesame seeds. Be sure and use the highest-quality ingredients available; it really makes a difference! Since you're going to all the trouble of making the olive salad, consider doubling the recipe so you'll have some extra waiting around for when you get another muffuletta craving -- it keeps for at least a month! Note: Use round bread loaves for real muffuletta.
process: prep: 40 mins,additional: 1 day,total: 1 day 40 mins,Servings: 8,Yield: 8 servings
ingredient: 1 cup pimento-stuffed green olives, crushed + ½ cup drained kalamata olives, crushed + 2 cloves garlic, minced + ¼ cup roughly chopped pickled cauliflower florets + 2 tablespoons drained capers + 1 tablespoon chopped celery + 1 tablespoon chopped carrot + ½ cup pepperoncini, drained + ¼ cup marinated cocktail onions + ½ teaspoon celery seed + 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1 teaspoon dried basil + ¾ teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ cup red wine vinegar + ½ cup olive oil + ¼ cup canola oil + 2 (1 pound) loaves Italian bread + 8 ounces thinly sliced Genoa salami + 8 ounces thinly sliced cooked ham + 8 ounces sliced mortadella + 8 ounces sliced mozzarella cheese + 8 ounces sliced provolone cheese

name: Andouille, Shrimp, and Chicken Jambalaya
summary: A Cajun jambalaya that suits the whole family!
ingredient: 3 cups chicken broth, divided + 1<U+2009>½ cups white rice + 1 pound andouille sausage, diced + 1 large sweet onion (such as Vidalia®), chopped + 3 green onions, or to taste, chopped + 1 cup chopped celery + 1 large green bell pepper, chopped + 2 tablespoons Creole seasoning (such as Tony Cachere's®) + 2 tablespoons minced garlic + 1 teaspoon hot sauce (such as Frank's® RedHot ®) + ground black pepper to taste + 1 (14.5 ounce) can tomato sauce + 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes + 1 pound shrimp, peeled and deveined + 1 cooked whole chicken breast, shredded + 1 cup chicken broth

name: Easy Red Beans and Rice
summary: This is an easy and delicious take on a Louisiana classic that you can prepare and cook in 40 minutes! I use turkey kielbasa to cut down on the fat, but not the flavor. Season with hot pepper sauce if you like.
ingredient: 2 cups water + 1 cup uncooked rice + 1 (16 ounce) package turkey kielbasa, cut diagonally into 1/4 inch slices + 1 onion, chopped + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 1 clove chopped garlic + 2 (15 ounce) cans canned kidney beans, drained + 1 (16 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, chopped + ½ teaspoon dried oregano + salt to taste + ½ teaspoon pepper

name: Instant Pot Jambalaya with Shrimp and Chicken
summary: This tasty chicken and shrimp jambalaya is made all in one pot — your Instant Pot! Heat lovers can double the hot pepper sauce to give it an extra kick. Serve over white rice.
ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided + 14 ounces andouille sausage, sliced + 1 medium onion, chopped + 2 cloves garlic, crushed + 1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cubed + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 2 stalks celery, chopped + 1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes + 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined + ½ teaspoon dried thyme + ½ teaspoon salt + ½ teaspoon seasoned salt + ¼ teaspoon pepper + ¼ teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®) + 2 tablespoons chopped green onions

name: Crawfish Fettuccine II
summary: This recipe is great for 'creamy pasta' lovers. Fettuccine noodles can easily be substituted with angel hair pasta.
process: prep: 15 mins,cook: 1 hr,total: 1 hr 15 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 6 tablespoons butter + ½ cup chopped green onion + 1 green bell pepper, chopped + 1 clove garlic, minced + 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour + 1 pound crawfish, peeled + 1 (8 ounce) package processed cheese food, cubed + 1 cup half-and-half cream + 2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning + 1 large tomato, chopped + 1 pound dry fettuccini pasta + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Bananas Foster
summary: This bananas foster recipe is a Father's Day favorite that we all love. Sweet bananas are warmed in a buttery rum sauce and served over vanilla ice cream.
ingredient: ¼ cup butter + <U+2154> cup dark brown sugar + 3<U+2009>½ tablespoons rum + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons vanilla extract + ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon + 3 bananas, peeled and sliced lengthwise and crosswise + ¼ cup coarsely chopped walnuts + 1 pint vanilla ice cream

name: Sazerac Cocktail
summary: There's a lot to love about this classic whiskey and bitters beverage. The official drink of New Orleans, the Sazerac is every bit as aromatic and flavorful as most anything else from down on the bayou.
ingredient: ice + 3 dashes Peychaud's Bitters® + 2 dashes Angostura Bitters® + 1 sugar cube + 1 cup ice cubes + 2 fluid ounces rye whiskey + 1 lemon peel

name: Firecracker Shrimp Roll with Crab Aioli
summary: Inspired by a shrimp po'boy with crab mayo seen on 'Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives,' I decided to do an extra spicy version and give it a 4th of July-friendly name. The result is an explosively flavored combination of hot, crunchy shrimp and cold crabby mayo. This was one of the best things I've had in a long time, and that's after eating it barely warm; for best results, though, be sure to enjoy this just as soon as it's safe to eat, in all its crunchy glory.
process: prep: 25 mins,cook: 15 mins,additional: 5 mins,total: 45 mins,Servings: 6,Yield: 6 servings
ingredient: 1 cup mayonnaise + 1 cup lump crabmeat + 2 cloves garlic, finely crushed + salt to taste + 1 pinch cayenne pepper + ¼ teaspoon Worcestershire sauce + 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh tarragon + 2 pounds shrimp, peeled and deveined + 1 cup buttermilk + 2 teaspoons hot sauce + 1 teaspoon ground chipotle pepper + 2 teaspoons cayenne pepper + 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper + 2 teaspoons kosher salt + 1 cup all-purpose flour + <U+2153> cup cornmeal + 2 teaspoons paprika + 2 teaspoons kosher salt + 6 soft sandwich rolls + 2 cups thinly sliced romaine lettuce + canola oil for frying + 1 pinch cayenne pepper

name: Roasted Okra
summary: A good Southern gardener needs okra recipes. In season, I find myself bringing in okra by the armload nearly every other day. Stewed okra is great, but for a little variety, we like to roast ours from time to time. This is so simple and easy and the okra tends to be less gummy or slimy when roasted. Chopped tomato makes a great addition when we have some handy.
ingredient: 18 fresh okra pods, sliced 1/3 inch thick + 1 tablespoon olive oil + 2 teaspoons kosher salt, or to taste + 2 teaspoons black pepper, or to taste

name: Cajun Seafood Pasta
summary: This recipe is a hot one, but delicious! If you are weak of tongue, then divide the amounts of peppers in half. Better to add more than spoil your creation! Bay scallops are preferred, but the larger sea scallops can be used if they are cut in half. This dish can also be placed in a casserole dish and placed under the broiler until top turns golden brown!
ingredient: 2 cups heavy whipping cream + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil + 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme + 2 teaspoons salt + 2 teaspoons ground black pepper + 1<U+2009>½ teaspoons crushed red pepper flakes + 1 teaspoon ground white pepper + 1 cup chopped green onions + 1 cup chopped parsley + ½ pound shrimp, peeled and deveined + ½ pound scallops + ½ cup shredded Swiss cheese + ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese + 1 pound dry fettuccine pasta

name: Louisiana Crawfish Boil
summary: This crawfish boil is quite a feast! Invite the family and dig into this messy, yummy meal. Combining crawfish, sausage, corn, mushrooms, potatoes, and artichokes, this is a dish you'll crave over and over. Add other seafood or vegetables to your liking.
ingredient: 2 heads garlic, unpeeled + 5 bay leaves + 2 (3 ounce) packages dry crab boil + 1 tablespoon liquid shrimp and crab boil seasoning + salt and ground black pepper to taste + 15 red potatoes, washed + 3 large oranges, halved + 3 large lemons, halved + 2 large whole artichokes + 2 (16 ounce) packages mushrooms, cleaned + ½ pound fresh green beans, trimmed + 2 large onions, sliced + 30 pieces baby corn + 2 (16 ounce) packages smoked sausage, cut into 1/2 inch slices + 50 live crawfish, rinsed

name: Cajun Chicken Pasta
summary: Cajun chicken pasta is easy and delicious. Cajun cooking combines French, Southern, and other influences. It's robust, country-style cookery, just like this dish. Laissez les bons temps roulez and bon appétit!
ingredient: 4 ounces linguine pasta + 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves + 2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning + 2 tablespoons butter + 1 red bell pepper, sliced + 1 green bell pepper, sliced + 4 fresh mushrooms, sliced + 1 green onion, chopped + 1 cup heavy cream + ¼ teaspoon dried basil + ¼ teaspoon lemon pepper + ¼ teaspoon salt + <U+215B> teaspoon garlic powder + <U+215B> teaspoon ground black pepper + ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Beignets
summary: A traditional New Orleans–style beignet recipe. Grab a café au lait and you're set!
ingredient: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast + 1<U+2009>½ cups warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C) + 1 cup evaporated milk + ½ cup white sugar + 2 eggs + 1 teaspoon salt + 7 cups all-purpose flour, divided + ¼ cup shortening + 1 quart vegetable oil for frying + ¼ cup confectioners' sugar

name: Blackened Seasoning Mix
summary: This blackened seasoning recipe uses just eight ingredients to make a homemade, salt-free Cajun seasoning mix.
ingredient: 1<U+2009>½ tablespoons paprika + 1 tablespoon garlic powder + 1 tablespoon onion powder + 1 tablespoon ground dried thyme + 1 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper + 1 teaspoon dried basil + 1 teaspoon dried oregano

name: Pickle Brine Chicken
